speak;Caellach;You'll take her, I've no fear.|We fought as mercenaries together, and I know what you're capable of.|I could search the continent over and not find a man to match your skills.
speak;Aias;I'm honored to hear you say that.|But I've no interest in the titles and trapping of Grado's Imperial Army.
speak;Caellach;Don't say that.|You're glad you came with me, right?|You know we were both sick to death of living like desert rats.|I'm going to be king one day.|This war is just the beginning.
speak;Caellach;Word has it that the Knights of Rausten are riding from the north.|They're mine.|I can trust this mess to your capable hands, can't I, Aias?

speak;Aias;You remember what they called me when we were mercenaries, don't you?|I was never once wounded on the field of battle.|Not once...|My skill is not garnish and loud like yours, but I've never known defeat.
speak;Caellach;Yes, that is true.|I'm depending on you, Aias.
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika.|The enemy is arrayed before us.|We've word that Pablo's mercenary army is closing in from the rear.|You must be cautious.
speak;Larachel;All we have to do is hold them off until the Knights of Rausten arrive.|If we can do that, victory is as good as ours.|Let's get started, shall we, Eirika?

name: ReinT5Cormag
_source: speak;Cormag;Where is she?|Where is she?!|I will avenge my brother!

name: ReinT10
_source: speak;Pablo;Grr...I've misread the situation. I|can't believe I've been forced out of Carcino.|It's those accursed Frelia Knights riding down on us from the north.|If things don't change quickly, I'll be forced to appeal to Grado for aid.|We must prove ourselves worthy allies of Grado.|We must have them in out debt!|First, I'll use my magic to bury those enemies in the distance.

name: CormagTalkEirika
_source: speak;Cormag;You don't know me, but you know my brother well enough.|I'm Cormag. I'm the brother of Glen, general of the Grado army, whom you killed?

speak;Cormag;This is no longer war, and this is not a battlefield.|This is a duel, and I fight to avenge my brother.|He died in combat, and I'll not foul his name by murdering you unarmed.|But I will have vengeance.
speak;Eirika;Hold!|What is the meaning of this?|Glen...|Are you telling me General Glen is dead?
speak;Cormag;Do not play me for a fool!|You will not...|Your lies do nothing but stain your honor.|Nothing more.
speak;Eirika;You've got it wrong!|You're making a mistake.|Your brother and I never fought.|He lowered his lance and left the battlefield to confront your emperor.
speak;Cormag;...My brother?|You lie!|Where is your proof?
speak;Eirika;I've no proof.|But...|Here are the words he spoke to me.|He told me he believed I possessed a gentle heart when we met before.|He said I had not lost that quality...
speak;Cormag;I see...|Those are indeed my brother's words.|But then who?|Who benefits from-|...Ah! ...Valter!
speak;Cormag;...Princess Eirika of Renais.|I would be your ally.

speak;Cormag;I don't care why you're fighting.|I've no interest in your goals.|I want nothing but revenge, and I will have it.|If I can kill Valter with these two hands either by <red>Axe</> or by <red>Lance</>, what care I if Grado brands me a traitor?

name: KillBoss
_source: speak;Aias;Rausten knights?!|That means Caellach's-|Curses...|All troops!|Retreat at once!
speak;SoldierGreen;Forward the lances!|Show them the might of Rausten!
speak;Eirika;The Knights of Rausten!|Just as L'Arachel said...|Reinforcements have arrived in Jehanna!
speak;Larachel;What I'd like to know is what took them so long!|However, it seems that all has worked out in the end.

name: Survive
_source: speak;Aias;Rausten knights?!|That means Caellach's-|Curses...|All troops!|Retreat at once!
speak;SoldierGreen;Forward the lances!|Show them the might of Rausten!
speak;Eirika;The Knights of Rausten!|Just as L'Arachel said...|Reinforcements have arrived in Jehanna!
speak;Larachel;What I'd like to know is what took them so long!|However, it seems that all has worked out in the end.

name: FightAias
_source: speak;Aias;It's not over yet.|Victory still hands in the balance.|Their key is defeating the enemy commander, but...

name: FightAiasEirika
_source: speak;Aias;Ah...|So here you are. The princess Eirika.
speak;Aias;You're not at all what I had expected...|I would test the arm that bested Glen.

name: DeathAias
_source: speak;Aias;Very...impressive.|You've pierced the battle formations I'd perfected...|No one's ever done that.|Renais's tactician has earned my highest regard.|I must pull back for now...

name: FightPablo
_source: speak;Pablo;Grrr...|I've got more money then you've ever seen.|What say you?|Join me, and take a seat of power at my side.

name: DeathPablo
_source: speak;Pablo;Argh...|It can't be...I...|You can't have my gold...|It's all...mine...

name: Outro
_source: speak;SoldierGreen;Princess!|Knights of Rausten, 2nd battalion, reporting for duty!
speak;Larachel;Well done.|You may lift your eyes.
speak;Larachel;What?|Oh, you mean...|Don't be silly.|This is nothing.|Please don't concern yourself.
speak;Dozla;I do believe, milady, that your disguise has been penetrated.

speak;Larachel;Oh...|I suppose there's naught to be done about it now.|Very well, Eirika.|You've found me out!|The beauteous wanderer who's been your boon companion is none other then...|the jewel of the theocracy of Rausten, Princess L'Arachel herself!|I was acting under divine order to strike down evil in this land.
speak;Eirika;.....|Is that so? But why did you...
speak;SoldierGreen;The truth is...|The princess was enflamed by the words of the court troubadour, Saaga...|She forced us to allow her to journey forth anonymously on a quest for justice.

speak;Larachel;What's this?|War funds?|Oh, what a grand uncle.|He's just so thoughtful.|Princess Eirika of Renais.|Rausten will not yield to Grado.|Together, let us defeat the empire in the name of righteousness!
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika.|Prince Innes.|I've received word from the front.|The palace of Jehanna was attacked by Grado forces and has surrendered.
speak;Innes;She may yet live.|We must hurry.
speak;Seth;The palace has already been occupied by imperial troops.|The Grado army is being led by Lyon, the imperial prince.
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Caellach;That was something awful.|I never expected to see you get beaten so roundly.

speak;Aias;Yes.|It was a complete failure.|The Rausten knights arrived far more quickly then I'd anticipated.|But it doesn't matter, does it?|Whether I won or lost?|You were planning on abandoning me from the start, weren't you?

speak;Caellach;...Yeah, sorry.|I'm not going to let things end for me here.|I want to rise...|To climb higher and higher.|I will not be chained to my past.|I will not be chained to you.|I truly apologize, but you die here.|Good-bye, my friend.

name: OnLevelSelect_13B
_source: speak;Narrator;Ephraim leads the group to Za'albul Marsh in search of the missing Myrrh.|They learn from soldiers and villagers that Myrrh had been captured by General Selena, one of Grado's commanders.|She was last seen heading east.|To regain their companion, the group will now be forced to fight.
speak;Narrator;Ephraim steels his heart to the reality that he must face Selena.

name: Village_1
_source: speak;Villager Girl;Dame Selena often visits our village when she's on patrol.|She even came to our aid when we were attacked by bandits.|
speak;Villager Girl;Please, I beg of you. Don't hurt Dame Selena.

name: Village_2
_source: speak;Woman1;You must have gone through a lot to make it here.|Did you come to warn us about the fighting going on?|Thanks so much.|Here, please take this staff.|Oh, go on.|Don't be shy.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Selena;So this is a dragonstone...|The description was accurate.|It looks like an ordinary gemstone.|If only His Majesty hadn't ordered me to bring this to the capital immediately...|I've heard reports that Prince Ephraim and a Frelian army have landed nearby.|If I didn't have those blasted restrictive orders, I could-
speak;Myrrh;Return the stone to me...|Please...I'll do anything.
speak;Selena;Why do you want the stone?|Who are you?|You're not from Grado, that's for sure.
speak;Myrrh;Without the stone, I...|Please, give it back to me.

speak;Myrrh;My name is Myrrh.|I come from Darkling Woods.|I was betrayed, and my stone was taken from me.|I was imprisoned, caged, to be transported somewhere.|Prince Ephraim came to my rescue.|I've been traveling in his care ever since.
speak;Selena;You're with Ephraim?|I can't let you leave.|Maybe I should take you back to the capital with me.
speak;Myrrh;Wait...|You're from Grado?|Tell me, has anyone around you-|Have you noticed any changes in the people around you recently?
speak;Selena;Changes?|What do you mean by that?
speak;Myrrh;Anyone near you...|Has anyone been transformed, either in spirit or demeanor?|Does anyone act in such a way as to appear a different person altogether?
speak;Myrrh;The darkness is to blame.|I've come here to stop it.
speak;Selena;You will tell me more.|If I find you are lying, I will punish you.|Do you understand?
speak;Myrrh;Yes.|Are you ready?|I will tell you everything I know.
speak;Selena;...I see.|Myrrh, I think I understand everything you've told me.
speak;Selena;But I cannot believe it.|How can I allow myself to believe it?|If it's true, then...|then His Majesty is already-

speak;Selena;It is a fluorspar...|His Majesty presented it to me when I was promoted to general.|This gemstone is proof of my commission.|It's one of Grado's treasures...|I received it years ago, but I remember that day like it was yesterday.|His Majesty smiled so kindly.|His voice was filled with dignity and affection...
speak;Myrrh;Dame Selena, you love your emperor, don't you?
speak;Myrrh;I can see it.|Dame Selena, I can see how much you treasure...

speak;Selena;His Majesty is most compassionate.|You see, I'm a commoner.|I was raised in a desolate, impoverished village.|My family couldn't afford our taxes.|No one could.|We were desperate. Some of us considered...horrible things to make enough money to survive winter.|Then, supplies began to arrive.|We were told they came from the emperor himself.|He sent them to us, a poor frontier town who couldn't even afford to pay taxes.
speak;Selena;Neighboring kingdoms must have thought the emperor mad, I can only guess.|But His Majesty did not care about his standing among kings.|He cared for his people.|He saved us.

speak;Selena;That spring, I went to the capital and became a soldier, then a knight.|I wanted to dedicate my life to the emperor who had saved it.|I felt I understood his dream, I felt I shared his vision...
speak;Selena;Myrrh, this wave of dark energy you spoke of...|Can its evil really change a person that completely?
speak;Myrrh;Yes...|All trace of this person would be consumed...destroyed.
speak;Selena;How can this process be reversed?
speak;SoldierRed;Dame Selena.|Enemy troops are heading this way!|We await your orders.
speak;Selena;Understood.|Tell the men we meet them head on.
speak;Selena;Myrrh. I release you.|Return to Prince Ephraim's side.
speak;Selena;I apologize, but I cannot return your dragonstone to you.|I vowed never again to fail in my duty to His Majesty.|If you want the dragonstone back, tell Ephraim he must defeat me.
speak;Selena;Go now!|This place will soon run red!
speak;Selena;All troops to arms!|For the glory of Grado!
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, the Grado troops are lining up to the fore.|Their commander is a Grado general...|It's Selena Fluorspar.
speak;Larachel;Selena...|I've heard she wields the power of the thunderstorm...|that she uses its might to attack from afar without mercy.
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, I urge you to exercise caution when faced with such magic.
speak;Gerik;Prince Innes said they would be around here somewhere.|Now where in blazes is this Ephraim?
speak;Tethys;From this distance, I can't tell which army is Frelia and which Grado.|We'll have to move in closer if we're to sort this all out.
speak;Tethys;Oh, what an adorable girl.|It's all right.|Come here...
speak;Gerik;You're a bit young to be on your own.|Did you get lost then?
speak;Tethys;There's no reason to be afraid.|This fellow's a bit scary to look at, but he's not so bad.
speak;Gerik;Come now...|Hmph. But she is right, you know.|If you keep looking so scared, you're likely to hurt my feelings.
speak;Tethys;Please, little one, tell us your name.
speak;Myrrh;I am Myrrh.|I wish to return to Ephraim's side.
speak;Gerik;Ephraim?|We're supposed to be guarding someone by that name....|Can you help us find him?
speak;Myrrh;It's because I forced you to bring me with you...|I didn't want to be a burden to you any longer.|But all I've done is made you worry...|I'm...sorry...
speak;Ephraim;It's fine, Myrrh.|I'm the one who should be sorry.|I failed in my promise to watch over you.|The battle's about to begin.|I want you to move to the rear.
speak;Myrrh;Ephraim...|Those aren't bad people.|I spoke to one, and she listened-
speak;Ephraim;All right.|I'll do my best to persuade them to join us.
speak;Gerik;This may be our last battle...|I still got my <red>Sword</> and can use an <red>Axe</>.|I've got plenty of fight in me!|Maybe can even find a <red>Lance</> to use!|Ha ha ha!

name: GerikTalkMarisa
_source: speak;Gerik;Oh, Marisa!|So Ewan found you after all, eh?|Sorry for the trouble.|Appears the guild made an error.|Blast it all.|I should have double-checked everything myself.
speak;Gerik;Have you taken any wounds?|They send you all the way to Taizel, after all.|What ill luck that was...
speak;Marisa;I'm fine.|I'll fight at your side.
speak;Gerik;Ah, that's comforting.|We've been hired to guard a Prince Ephraim.|Before we do, though, we'd better take care of these enemy troops, huh?|Let's move, Marisa.

name: GerikTalkEphraim
_source: speak;Gerik;I'm Gerik, mercenary commander.|Prince Innes bought our swords and sent use here to join you.|Any problem with that?
speak;Gerik;Yeah, and the prince had a message for you as well.|He said.|"I've no need of assistance, Ephraim, but I'm sure you do."|That's all.|I figured you would know what he was talking about.
speak;Ephraim;Well, that's definitely from Innes.|Regardless, your aid is welcome.|Please join us in our fight.

name: TethysTalkEwan
_source: speak;Tethys;Ewan, you've completed the task you were given, haven't you?|This is a dangerous place.|Please, go wait at the inn.|I'll be there to collect you as soon as I'm able.
speak;Ewan;No way!|I want to fight, too.|I've become friends with Prince Ephraim, you know?|We're going to take out the big, bad evil empire.
speak;Tethys;Wait just a minute, Ewan!|Ah!|Ooh, that troublemaker.

name: SelenaTalkEphraim
_source: speak;Selena;Indeed I am.|And you are Prince Ephraim.
speak;Ephraim;I know you've spoken with Myrrh.|Withdraw your troops.|You must know the emperor is not rational!
speak;Ephraim;Then why?|Why do we still fight?
speak;Selena;I am a general of the empire.|His Majesty's word is law.
speak;Ephraim;That's ridiculous.|You know the emperor is deranged, and yet you follow his orders?!|Is that truly loyalty?!
speak;Selena;Prince Ephraim, you cannot understand.|I know the path I'm given is foolish.|Yet I am a knight, and I have no other.
speak;Ephraim;Selena, please!|Surrender!|I have no wish to see you die here!
speak;Selena;Me?|Die?|Prince Ephraim, you misunderstand me.|I have no intention of dying.|Madness though it may be, I will be the one doing the killing today.

name: SelenaTalkDuessel
_source: speak;Selena;General Duessel...|I must offer you my apologies.|I called you a traitor, but I was mistaken.|Your loyalty never wavered, not for an instant.
speak;Selena;And yet you must know that I have no intention of withdrawing.|So let us not waste words.|Let us settle this with steel, my friend.
speak;Duessel;That's how it is to be, then?|One of us dies by the other's hands?
speak;Selena;Yes. It's the path I've chosen.|I have no regrets.
speak;Duessel;I see...|Well.|I, too, must follow the path that I have chosen.

name: FightSelena
_source: speak;Selena;Fluorspar...|His Majesty gave me this name.|Therefore, I...

name: DeathSelena
_source: speak;Selena;I am so...very tired...|Now I, too...will...

name: Outro
_source: music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;General Selena possessed a curious stone.|Myrrh, is this the dragonstone you lost?
speak;Myrrh;Yes, it is.|But I'm saddened by its return.|My dragonstone is here and yet...|My heart is heavy with remorse...

speak;Myrrh;Ephraim, can you tell me why this had to happen?|Dame Selena was a good person.|She was filled with joy when she spoke of the emperor.|Why did Dame Selena have to die?|Why did we have to take up arms against her?

speak;Ephraim;I'm sorry...|If I could have convinced her to lay down her arms, I would have.|It was simply not possible.|I had no choice.|She had to die.|I know you don't approve, but you must know I have my reasons.
speak;Myrrh;My apologies...|Ephraim, I...|I am not seeking to blame you.|It's just that...I grieve for her.

speak;Myrrh;I ventured out of the forest, chasing after that dark energy.|I thought perhaps that I could negate its evil force.|Is your cause so different from Selena's?|How many good people must die alongside the wicked?
speak;Myrrh;What can we do to end this without any more good people dying?
speak;Ephraim;I don't have any answer for you.|But I will continue on toward the capital, and perhaps I will find one there.|I will learn the truth of this madness.

name: OnLevelSelect_14A
_source: speak;Narrator;Thanks to the arrival of reinforcements from Princess L'Arachel of Rausten,
speak;Narrator;Eirika and her allies successfully repel the Grado invaders.|Still, Jehanna Hall remains under siege, on the edge of ruin.
speak;Narrator;En route, Eirika learns that the hall has indeed been captured by Grado.
speak;Narrator;To rescue Queen Ismaire and recover Jehanna's Sacred Stone, Eirika leads an assault on the royal hall.

name: Intro
_source: speak;LyonF;...I yield.|The point is yours, Eirika.|You're swift, aren't you?|Compared to you, I'm-|I've been bested at fencing by a woman.|Pitiful crown prince, am I not?

speak;LyonF;Oh, no, Eirika.|It is.|The people need a strong ruler.|They don't want a weakling like me.|They want the strength you and Ephraim share.|My body is frail.|I prefer to spend my time locked away in the castle, reading...|I think my father would be better served if someone else took my place.|I'm sure all of our retainers feel the same...
speak;EirikaSepia;You're wrong, Lyon.|An emperor without compassion will never hold the people's love.|And one day, your compassion will surely save us all.|I believe that.
speak;LyonF;Eirika...|Thank you.|Yes.|I...I will do my best.|Even though I lack your strength, there must be some good I can do.
speak;LyonF;By the way, Eirika...|If it pleases you, would you accept this?
speak;Seth;Jehanna Hall has been completely occupied by Grado soldiers.|I'm sorry to report that Queen Ismaire is already...
speak;Innes;And the one giving orders to the troops in the palace is Crown Prince Lyon?
speak;Larachel;What is there to give us pause?|Should we not storm the palace and retake it by strength of arms?

speak;Innes;Frelia's spy network reports that Prince Lyon is an initiate of dark magic.|If this is true, even approaching him will be a serious challenge.|I'd heard the prince dislikes violence.|However, it could all have been a ruse.
speak;Innes;Still, if we don't retake the palace, we've no hope of defeating Grado.|We must rescue the queen, no matter the cost...
speak;Carlyle;Queen Ismaire...|Please do not resist.|I have no desire to see you harmed.

speak;Ismaire;Carlyle...|Why have you betrayed us?|After all these years of loyal service as Jehanna's most decorated commander...|Without you, I could not have ruled these long years since my husband's passing.|It was through your unwavering support alone that I still sit upon the throne.|You are the cornerstone of Jehanna.|You have held my trust more than any man.|So tell me why.|Why have you betrayed us?|Why have you betrayed me?
speak;Carlyle;Your Highness-No...|My queen...|Ismaire...|It is your own fault.|You are too lovely, my queen.

speak;Carlyle;The first time I met you, twenty years ago now...|I saw you in the garden of this very palace...|and I was bewitched.|Your pale beauty far surpassed that of any flower.|I was in the grips of an unforgivable desire.|You were the wife of my king, to whom I'd sworn life and loyalty.|I told myself a grand lie that day.|I told myself I could be happy simply serving you as your most loyal knight.

speak;Carlyle;After years of duty, years of service, years of...of silence...|I became aware once more of the feelings I'd buried deep within myself.|How could I leave this world without expressing my true desires?|Could anything be more desolate?|More devoid of meaning?|That is when I made my decision.|I would follow my heart and claim your hand as my own.
speak;Ismaire;Carlyle...|You forget yourself.|You ruin our country and kill our countrymen.|Did you think I would be pleased?|Did you think I would love you for this?
speak;Carlyle;I need no country.|I care nothing for my countrymen.|I can see nothing but you.|If you would only be mine...
speak;SoldierRed;To arms, mercenaries.|We're under attack!|You there!|Ready your weapons!
speak;Rennac;What?!?|No, no, no.|That was never part of the deal.|The only fight I'm here for is with the locks of the treasure chamber.
speak;SoldierRed;Hah...|Don't get so excited.|I doubt you mercenaries will see any action at all once we soldiers've finished.

speak;Rennac;Yeah, great.|You go do that.|Whew...|With all these soldiers around, I shouldn't have to lift a finger.|I'll just sit here and wait for them to win the day.|Then, I collect my pay!|No more being ordered around by that selfish princess and her moronic bodyguard.|This is the life.|Lady Luck loves me.|But something doesn't feel right...

name: SecretShop
_source: shop;{unit};Hero Crest,Knight Crest,Orion Bolt,Elysian Whip,Guiding Ring,Ocean Seal,Fili Shield,Hoplon Guard;vendor

name: ReinT1
_source: speak;Caellach;Hey, Carlyle!|Impressive work you've done here.|My compliments.
speak;Carlyle;...I gave you everything I promised.|I opened the hall to your forces.
speak;Caellach;Yes.|The palace is mine.|My palace...|Oh, how I do like the sound of that.
speak;Carlyle;Do whatever you want with the royal treasury.|The only treasure I wish to leave here with is the queen of my heart.
speak;Caellach;Oh, yeah, about your queen?..|There's been a change of plans.
speak;Caellach;Don't move, Carlyle.|You twitch, and the queen dies.
speak;Carlyle;Blackheart!|What is the meaning of this?

speak;Caellach;Calm down.|You'll get her back as soon as I'm done with her.|Jehanna's Sacred Stone is around here somewhere.|I've got to find it and destroy it.|I need this woman to guide me to its hiding place.
speak;Carlyle;Do not lay a hand on my queen!
speak;Caellach;Don't get so incensed.|I'm not going to harm her.|I'm not like that freak Valter.|I'm kind to women.|But if you make a wrong move, you'll lose your prize.|Understood?
speak;Caellach;There are some annoying pests outside who think to win back the hall.|I want you to take care of them.|Lose, and the queen will never be yours.
speak;Carlyle;If my queen comes to any harm in your care...
speak;Caellach;Yes, of course.|I know all about the might of your sword arm.|As long as the Sacred Stone is destroyed, you'll get all you ask for.
speak;Lyon;Caellach...|You will put an end to this.|Destroying the Sacred Stones is...|Ugh...ack...
speak;Caellach;What's this?|Are you still ill?|You know, you're not very princely.|C'mon. Follow me.

name: Seize
_source: speak;Caellach;This is as good a place as any.|All right, Your Majesty.|Hand over the Sacred Stone.
speak;Ismaire;...I know nothing of the Sacred Stone's keeping place.

speak;Caellach;Don't waste me time.|My partner here sees everything.|When the rebellion began, you went straight to the palace altar.|You had hoped to prevent us from smashing the Sacred Stone.|But you have the Stone of Jehanna with you right now, don't you?
speak;Caellach;Hand it over.|Cooperate, and I'll let you live.
speak;Caellach;Oh, give it up, will you?|I've no time for games.|If you resist, I'll just kill you and take it anyway.
speak;Caellach;Shut up, Prince.|My orders come from higher than you.|You've not going to start disobeying his word, are you?
speak;Caellach;Last chance.|Give me your Sacred Stone.
speak;Caellach;Ha ha!|A queen to the end.|I like you.|You've got guts.{br}Good-bye.
speak;Caellach;And here's the Sacred Stone.|That makes two for me.|I'm on a roll now.
speak;Caellach;And another Sacred Stone has been destroyed.|Grado, Frelia, and now Jehanna...|Only two stones remain.
speak;Lyon;Ah...|What should I do?|C-Caellach...|You must help her.
speak;Caellach;Leave her.|Let her last breath be a harsh and ragged rasp.|She's not long for this world.|Why, if you really wanted to help her, you'd deliver the final blow yourself!
speak;Caellach;...What a joke.|I have a little work to wrap up in the hall before we leave.|You should hit the road pretty soon, too, Prince.
speak;Eirika;I wonder where Queen Ismaire is.
speak;Innes;I heard she was in the throne room, but there's no sight of her.|And there's no Sacred Stone, either.

name: RennacTalkEirika
_source: speak;Rennac;Hey, that's a comely lass.|Think I'll have a few words...|Wait. Er, haven't I met you before?
speak;Eirika;You...|You were traveling with L'Arachel before, weren't you?
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel is traveling with us.|Should I let her know you're here?

speak;Rennac;Uh, no!|Wait a moment!|You...|You don't have to bother her.|Actually I wanted to ask you something.|How would you like to hire me?|The name's Rennac.|I'm a world-class thief, and proud of it.|A man of many talents.|Lockpicks are for amateurs.|I can pick chests and doors with my bare hands.|And I'm better with a blade than most swordsmen.
speak;Rennac;I'm a useful fellow to have around.|And cheap, too!|Only 9,980 gold!|Well, what do you think?
speak;Larachel;Aha!|So this is where you've wandered off to, Rennac!
speak;Rennac;Wait...|hold on now.|Go with you where?|Look, sorry, but I've been hired by the Grado Empire, and...|Hello!|I'm talking to you!
speak;Larachel;Rennac, whatever is the matter?|I promise to listen to your story later, but now, we must be going!

speak;Rennac;No, I'm no servant, like that kook Dozla.|I'm a mercenary.|I escorted you to Renais like I was hired to do, didn't I?|You have no right to drag me across creation without any pay whatsoever!
speak;Larachel;Is this about wages?|I believe you've received ample compensation.

speak;Rennac;Ample?!|Do you even know what that word means?|You're the princess of Rausten!|I thought working for you would pay well.|Yet your purse strings are knotted tight, and I've almost been killed so many-
speak;Larachel;The joy that comes from doing good is not something that can be purchased.|There.|All better?|Let's go.
speak;Rennac;NO!|I said I don't want to!|Riding with you is-
speak;Rennac;...And there she goes.|Oh...By the Stones, why did I ever take that job in the first place?
speak;Rennac;Right, right.|I'm coming...|Now should I use my <red>Sword</>, <red>Dark</> magic, or some <red>Anima</> magic?

name: FightCarlyle
_source: speak;Carlyle;I...I just wanted the two of us...

name: RennacTalkLarachel
_source: speak;Larachel;Aha!|So this is where you've wandered off to, Rennac!
speak;Rennac;Wait...|hold on now.|Go with you where?|Look, sorry, but I've been hired by the Grado Empire, and...|Hello!|I'm talking to you!
speak;Larachel;Rennac, whatever is the matter?|I promise to listen to your story later, but now, we must be going!

speak;Rennac;No, I'm no servant, like that kook Dozla.|I'm a mercenary.|I escorted you to Renais like I was hired to do, didn't I?|You have no right to drag me across creation without any pay whatsoever!
speak;Larachel;Is this about wages?|I believe you've received ample compensation.

speak;Rennac;Ample?!|Do you even know what that word means?|You're the princess of Rausten!|I thought working for you would pay well.|Yet your purse strings are knotted tight, and I've almost been killed so many-
speak;Larachel;The joy that comes from doing good is not something that can be purchased.|There.|All better?|Let's go.
speak;Rennac;NO!|I said I don't want to!|Riding with you is-
speak;Rennac;...And there she goes.|Oh...By the Stones, why did I ever take that job in the first place?
speak;Rennac;Right, right.|I'm coming...|Now should I use my <red>Sword</>, <red>Dark</> magic, or some <red>Anima</> magic?

name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;Wait, Lyon!|Don't run away!|My brother and I have been so worried about you...|We know more than anyone the gentleness of your spirit.|Your father is deranged, isn't he?|That's why Grado invaded Renais, right?|Tell me, Lyon...|Please...|Tell me what has happened.

speak;Lyon;I'm sorry, Eirika.|I've wanted to see you and Ephraim for so long now...|I wanted to see you so that I could apologize. The invasion of Renais...|I couldn't stop it.|I'm sorry, but I still cannot talk to you.|Not yet...
speak;Eirika;You...|You have a reason, don't you?
speak;Lyon;Mm...|I can't talk about it now, but...|I promise I will tell you everything someday.
speak;Eirika;I see...|I believe you, Lyon.|I must tell you, I'm a little relieved.|I was afraid you'd changed as much as your poor father has.|I'm so glad.
speak;Lyon;Me, too, Eirika...|No, you have changed.|You're even more beautiful than you were before.
speak;Lyon;I'm sorry, I have to go.|But please remember this.|This war started because I was too weak to stop it, but...|I'll always be your friend.
speak;Larachel;Eirika, what are you doing?|It seems Queen Ismaire has been found.|This way!
speak;Seth;We're too late.|Her injuries are...|She will not last much longer.
speak;Ismaire;Please forgive me, Joshua...|I was a foolish mother...|I was so intent on being queen that I spared no time to be your mother.|But I loved you nonetheless...|Please understand...

speak;Joshua;I'm sorry, Mother.|I should never have left you.|I've no excuse...|I wanted to see the world as a man, not as a prince.|I wanted to be worthy.|I planned on returning to your side afterward...|I was so foolish.|If I'd been here, I could have-
speak;Ismaire;No, it's fine.|You're here now...|Listen to me, Joshua.|The Stone of Jehanna has...|been destroyed.|The one who tempted Carlyle is responsible...
speak;Ismaire;...Carried a dark stone...|It is...the origin of all this...|It should not exist...|Joshua...you must...|Our country...our people...
speak;Ismaire;Thank you...Joshua...|I have something...|Something I must give you...

speak;Ismaire;It's one of the Sacred Twin relics, unique to House Jehanna...|He who would rule our land must possess it...|I've watched over it since your father passed away.|I kept it safe and waited for this day to come...
speak;Joshua;Mother...|I have it now. I understand its meaning...
music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500

speak;Joshua;It's been more than ten years.|I'd grown tired of the formality of palace life, so I...just left.|I wrote a farewell and left the palace, taking nothing with me.|I felt I could never understand the people while I stayed sequestered in a castle.|I abandoned my identity and roamed the continent, working where I could.|I wanted only to be worthy of becoming king.|I knew one day I would return.|Gods, I was so foolish!|I was such a child, I see it now.|Was I simply rebelling against my mother?|Punishing her for tending to her duties?

speak;Joshua;I was a fool, yes, but I learned much over these ten years.|I have learned about the hearts of our people, how they need to be governed.|I have learned how our country needs to change and to grow.|I have learned much, but I've lost much more.|Mother...
speak;Joshua;I made a promise.|I want to continue what she began.|I will help defeat Grado.|I will defend Jehanna and her allies.|...I know it doesn't sound like me, but...
speak;Innes;On behalf of Frelia, I came to Jehanna with a letter to the throne.|I give it to you.|Prince Joshua of Jehanna...|Let us fight together.
speak;Larachel;Renais, Frelia, Rausten, and Jehanna.|Four nations...united!
speak;Eirika;Yes, I suppose that's true.|And my brother is with us as well.|And if it were possible...|Lyon...|I wish you could be here with us, too.
speak;SoldierBlue;Fire!|Fires have broken out all through the hall!
speak;SoldierBlue;The curtains were soaked in oil, with torches set about the hall.|It's a trap!|Someone did this during all the fighting.|You must flee!|Quickly, before the flames engulf us all!
speak;Eirika;Is everyone well?|Did anyone get left behind?

speak;Larachel;We all made it.|It's so smoky that it's hard to tell, but we're here.|What a cowardly act, setting fire to the palace hall.|But we've escaped without injury.|The enemy's trap has failed.
speak;Innes;...No, it hasn't.|Assemble the troops now.|The enemy is coming.
speak;Innes;This is the reason for the fire.|To drive us from the palace.|They'll be attacking soon.|No other plan makes sense.
speak;Larachel;How is it that you know that?
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika.|I've just received word that Grado reinforcements are headed this way.|There are two armies, led by Generals Valter and Caellach.
speak;Innes;Two armies...|They're willing to send so many here and leave the capital defenseless?
speak;Larachel;Why does everyone seem so distraught?|It matters not who stands in our path.|We shall smite them all with the power of righteousness!

speak;Seth;Princess Eirika...|It's going to be very difficult for us to continue.|One of Grado's generals alone is more than a match for us.|Compound that with the exhaustion of our troops, and I'm not sure we can-

speak;Innes;Bah...|With Jehanna Hall in flames, we've no place to hole up and dig in for a siege.|We have to retreat.|We have to win ourselves time for form a plan.|Grado sent two generals...|What could be happening in their capital?|And what of Ephraim?|Is he still alive?

name: OnLevelSelect_14B
_source: speak;Narrator;Myrrh returns safely to Ephraim's side.
speak;Narrator;A noble warrior to the end, Selena fought with great honor, never once using Myrrh as a hostage.
speak;Narrator;Ephraim renews his vow to pierce the veil of mystery surrounding the Grado Empire.
speak;Narrator;Selena is added to the list of innocents who Grado must account for.|The center of the Grado Empire.|Emperor Vigarde should have been here, but...

name: SecretShop
_source: shop;{unit};Angelic Robe,Energy Ring,Secret Book,Speedwing,Goddess Icon,Dragonshield,Talisman,Swiftsole,Body Ring;vendor

name: ReinT2
_source: speak;Rennac;Ha ha!|The spectacular capital of Grado.|The richest city on the continent.|With my expert eye, I judge this card to be an incomparable treasure.|Once this is all done, I think I'll just scamper off on my own...

name: Intro
_source: speak;Ephraim;The Grado capital...|It looks like it hasn't changed at all since the last time I was here.|Eirika and I came here once long ago with our father.|Duessel taught me the lance, and I studied history with Lyon.|I never imagined I'd come back here armed for battle.

speak;LyonF;...And so the hero Grado and his companions used the five Sacred Stones to seal away the evil of the Demon King, and his wicked soul was locked within the Stone of Grado.|The Stone of Grado came to be known as the Fire Emblem.|To this day, it's kept safe and honored as a national treasure of the empire.|...I think that's about it.|For more on Grado's life, read Founding Emperor Grado.|It's comprehensive.
speak;EphraimSepia;...It's so thick.|...And the letters are so small.
speak;LyonF;But you have to read it.|You don't want Father MacGregor to discipline you again.
speak;EphraimSepia;...I'm no good with books.|The problem is they don't move.|I get bored silly.|I understand so much better when you explain it to me, Lyon.

speak;LyonF;Yes, but...it's kind of weird to be helping you all the time.|It's just that I admire you, Ephraim.|I want to be strong, like you-brave and handsome...|I've got an idea.|Why don't you teach me to wield a lance, Ephraim?|I can't let my defeat to Eirika go unchallenged.|I look foolish.
speak;EphraimSepia;It's a deal.|We practice tomorrow, though.|If you want to beat Eirika, you have to take this seriously.
speak;LyonF;Just go easy on me, all right?
speak;Ephraim;Another tremor...|They happen a lot, don't they?
speak;Myrrh;Yes, I was startled.|Ephraim, this place...|Did it always shake like this?
speak;Ephraim;Yeah, Grado's been prone to earthquakes for a long time.|Tiny tremors like that happen all the time.|Don't worry.
speak;Myrrh;I can feel it-from inside the castle, I can feel the darkness.|I feel a broad pool of darkness deep within its walls.
speak;Ephraim;Perhaps it's coming from the throne room.|That's where Emperor Vigarde, the man who started this, is. Let's go.
speak;Lyon;Father...|Have we been foolish? When you died, I couldn't accept the loss...|I...|If only I'd been stronger...|Urgh!
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;SoldierRed;Your Majesty!|Enemy soldiers are headed this way!|Oh, Prince-
speak;Lyon Evil;...Hi.|What's wrong?|Why such an unusual expression on your face?|I'd rather you didn't look upon me as though I were some horrid beast.
speak;Lyon Evil;Did you say we were under attack?|I want all of you to strike the foe.|Bring your weapons to bear on Ephraim.|Is that acceptable, Father?
speak;Lyon Evil;Command Grado, Emperor Vigarde...|Destroy Ephraim...

name: RennacTalkEphraim
_source: speak;Rennac;Huh?|...You're a man.|Sorry, pal, but I'm not interested in men.
speak;Ephraim;What are you doing here in the castle?|You seem to be weighed down a bit.|Helping yourself to the treasure?
speak;Rennac;Ha!|I've no idea what you're talking about.|Now, wait a minute...|You couldn't be...|Aren't you Prince Ephraim?!?
speak;Rennac;I-I thought so.|You're the one they call the Beast of Renais...|I've heard tales of how you've looted and pillaged your way across the land...
speak;Rennac;H-Hold on!|Calm down!|You won't get any treasure by killing me.|If you want these goods, it'll cost you.|10,000 gold.
speak;Rennac;Yeah...|Is that too high?|Fine, then you get my sword as well.|I'll join your army.|So that's me and the treasure for only 9,980 gold!|What do you say?
speak;Ephraim;You know, I have no idea how I got pulled into this conversation.|9,980 gold, eh?|I haven't decided yet...
speak;Larachel;Aha!|So this is where you've wandered off to, Rennac!
speak;Rennac;Wait...|Hold on now.|Go with you where?|Look, I'm sorry, but I've been hired by the Grado Empire, and...|Hello!|I'm talking to you!
speak;Larachel;Rennac, whatever is the matter?|I promise to listen to your story later, but now, we must be going!

speak;Rennac;No, I'm no servant, like that kook Dozla.|I'm a mercenary.|I escorted you to Renais like I was hired to do, didn't I?|You have no right to drag me across creation without any pay whatsoever!
speak;Larachel;Is this about wages?|I believe you've received ample compensation.

speak;Rennac;Ample?!|Do you even know what that word means?|You're the princess of Rausten!|I thought working for you would pay well!|Yet your purse strings are knotted tight, and I've almost been killed so many-
speak;Larachel;The joy that comes from doing good is not something that can be purchased.|There.|All better?|Let's go.
speak;Rennac;NO!|I said I don't want to!|Riding about with you is-|...And there she goes.|Oh... By the Stones, why did I ever take that job in the first place?
speak;Rennac;Right, right.|I'm coming...|Now should I use my <red>Sword</>, <red>Dark</> magic, or some <red>Anima</> magic?

name: RennacTalkLarachel
_source: speak;Larachel;Aha!|So this is where you've wandered off to, Rennac!
speak;Rennac;Wait...|Hold on now.|Go with you where?|Look, I'm sorry, but I've been hired by the Grado Empire, and...|Hello!|I'm talking to you!
speak;Larachel;Rennac, whatever is the matter?|I promise to listen to your story later, but now, we must be going!

speak;Rennac;No, I'm no servant, like that kook Dozla.|I'm a mercenary.|I escorted you to Renais like I was hired to do, didn't I?|You have no right to drag me across creation without any pay whatsoever!
speak;Larachel;Is this about wages?|I believe you've received ample compensation.

speak;Rennac;Ample?!|Do you even know what that word means?|You're the princess of Rausten!|I thought working for you would pay well!|Yet your purse strings are knotted tight, and I've almost been killed so many-
speak;Larachel;The joy that comes from doing good is not something that can be purchased.|There.|All better?|Let's go.
speak;Rennac;NO!|I said I don't want to!|Riding about with you is-|...And there she goes.|Oh... By the Stones, why did I ever take that job in the first place?
speak;Rennac;Right, right.|I'm coming...|Now should I use my <red>Sword</>, <red>Dark</> magic, or some <red>Anima</> magic?

name: FightVigardeAndEphraim
_source: s;Ephraim;Vigarde!|Why did you invade Renais?|Why did you kill my father?
s;Ephraim;Answer me, Vigarde!|...So you really have lost hold of all your senses, haven't you?

name: FightVigardeAndDuessel
_source: s;Duessel;Your Majesty...|It's too late, isn't it?|...Forgive me.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Seth;It must be some type of dark magic.|Regardless, the capital has been captured.|I'll lead a patrol through the castle.|There may be enemy soldiers remaining.
speak;Ephraim;I'll go with you.|Lyon may be somewhere within the castle.
speak;Lyon Evil;Hello, Ephraim.|I've been waiting for you.|Looks like you've beaten my father.|I thought you might...|You really are powerful, aren't you?
speak;Ephraim;Lyon!|Is that you?|Lyon, you must tell me!|What has happened here in Grado?

speak;Ephraim;Why are you in this place?|Your father...|Emperor Vigarde, why didn't you stop him?|Don't tell me you're caught up in this madness, too!|Answer me, Lyon!|You always told me you wanted what your father wanted-peace!
speak;Lyon Evil;Let me tell you something, Ephraim.|I've been waiting for this moment for a very, very long time.

speak;Lyon Evil;I will make the world Grado's-|No, MY plaything.|I've been planning this my whole life.|Why else would I befriend you and Eirika?|I needed to learn where and how to attack and destroy Renais...|Thanks to the two of you, I learned all I needed to know.|While you feigned compassion for my weakness and scorned me in your hearts.
speak;Lyon Evil;And then my chance arrived.|I replaced my useless father, readied my tools, and set my plan in motion.|I began by destroying Renais...|And then I murdered your father.
speak;Lyon Evil;Shall I tell you a story?|Would you like to hear of your father's last moments?|You'll laugh really.|Your father's such a weakling, and yet he tried so hard...
speak;Ephraim;Lyon!|No more insults to my father, or I may forget myself!

speak;Lyon Evil;Oh, are you angry, Ephraim?|But, not even you can stop me now.|The Stones of Grado and Frelia are dust, and Jehanna's is soon to follow...|...Which leaves only two more...|I will destroy them one at a time...|I shall see my dream fulfilled...

speak;Lyon Evil;Ephraim, you are in my way. Therefore...|Ergh...|...How bothersome.|I truly do wish to be your opponent, but I'm not yet at full strength.|Let's meet again, shall we?|Assuming you live, of course.|I'll grant you the honor of dying at my hand.|Like father, like son, eh?
music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500
speak;SoldierBlue;Reporting in, sir!|We've found a cell in the back.|There were captives...
speak;Knoll;Has my execution been moved up on the schedule?|Wait.|You're not a Grado soldier.|Who are you?
speak;Ephraim;I am Ephraim of Renais.|And who are you?
speak;Knoll;That's an odd question for an executioner.|My name is Knoll.|Until recently, I was one of Grado's top researchers in arcane matters.
speak;Seth;So why is it you are locked up here?
speak;Ephraim;You need not answer if you do not wish to.|Tell me, what is Lyon attempting to do?|I still have things I intend to ask him.
speak;Knoll;You wish to speak to Prince Lyon?|You really don't know anything, do you?
speak;Ephraim;What do you mean?|Is there something wrong with Lyon?|What do you know?

speak;Knoll;I'll tell you all I know, if you would like.|However, I think you will not thank me once you hear it.|It all began one year ago...|That was when the emperor died.|The emperor's health worsened, and then he...
speak;Ephraim;Hold.|What are you talking about?|One year ago?|That's before Grado's invasion of Renais began.|And I just saw the emperor.|I killed him with my own hands.

speak;Knoll;Allow me to continue in the order in which everything occurred.|One year ago, the emperor died of the illness that had plagued him.|Prince Lyon was devastated.|He fell into an endless despair.|He felt unworthy to take the throne, unable to rule without his father.
speak;Knoll;He then began to look for a way to overturn his father's demise.|He wanted to resurrect him-

speak;Knoll;Yes.|As you know, the Stone of Grado is possessed of...unique powers.|It was once used to seal away the Demon King, and it alone held the dark one's soul.|It burned within with the Demon King's rage, and we called it the Fire Emblem.|Prince Lyon and a team of mages skilled in ancient lore hoped to harness its energies.|I remember the joy in Prince Lyon's eyes when he spoke of using it to save lives.

speak;Knoll;Prince Lyon told us he intended to use the Fire Emblem to restore the emperor.|His death had been kept from the public, but rumors were beginning to fly.|We knew we had to hurry, before the people learned the truth of the emperor's death.|Prince Lyon dedicated himself to research, skipping meals, foregoing sleep...|And then...

speak;Knoll;I wasn't there, so I did not witness it firsthand.|By the time I arrived, the deed had already been done.|The Fire Emblem had been shattered, split in two.|One was a Sacred Stone, and the other...
speak;LyonF;Oh, hello, it's you...|What was your name again?|Ah yes, Knoll.|You're one of my researchers.|I've glad tidings for you.|My father is back.
speak;KnollF;Your...|Your Majesty!|This is incredible!|Prince Lyon, what miracle is this?|It cannot be!|What-?|What is that stone?

speak;LyonF;This?|This is the Dark Stone.|It bears even more power than any Sacred Stone.|I extracted and condensed all of the magic bound within the Fire Emblem.|The Dark Stone's power is what gave my father back the spark of life.
speak;LyonF;Now that the Dark Stone is mine, I have no need for this empty husk.
speak;KnollF;P-Prince Lyon!|The Sacred Stone...|What have you done?
speak;LyonF;They are all in the way.|The Sacred Stones, I mean.|Four more remain, and they must all be destroyed.|The only stone we need now is this Dark Stone of mine.
music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500

speak;Knoll;After that...|His Majesty ordered the invasion of Renais, as Prince Lyon asked him to.|Father MacGregor grew concerned with Prince Lyon's health.|He tried several times to dissuade him from his path.|Prince Lyon executed him personally.|I, too, was branded a traitor and arrested.|My execution was scheduled for tomorrow.
speak;Knoll;Wish that I knew.|Prince Lyon frightens me now.|He is...transformed...
speak;Knoll;This way, Prince Ephraim.|I believe it's here...
speak;Ephraim;What is it?|What is this place?
speak;Knoll;This is the former resting place of the Stone of Grado, the Fire Emblem.|We've kept the Sacred Twins of Grado here as well.|If we're still lucky, they may still be here.

speak;Ephraim;The Sacred Twins...|Those are the ancient weapons once wielded by the founders of our nation.|Let's see if I remember my studies...|Emperor Grado's were the magic tome Gleipnir and Garm, the black axe.
speak;Knoll;That is correct.|You know your history well.
speak;Ephraim;Yeah, it's something I learned long ago from Lyon.
speak;Ephraim;Well, let's see if they're still here, shall we?
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim.|Here...|I've found the Sacred Twin relics.
speak;Ephraim;And here they are...|Yet I don't understand.|The Sacred Stone was destroyed, but these were left untouched? Why?
speak;Knoll;I know not...|Perhaps...|No, never mind.|It's an idle thought.|Prince Ephraim, please take these relics with you.
speak;Knoll;Yes.|I want you to have them.|And maybe...|Maybe someone else wanted you to have them as well.
speak;Knoll;I never predict things would turn out this way.|But my <red>Dark</> magic might help.|I know a couple of <red>Staff</> spells as well.
speak;Ephraim;You've come at a good time, soldier.|I want you to take a message to Frelia.|Actually...
speak;Messenger;We've received dire news from Jehanna!|It's about Princess Eirika and Prince Innes...|They're under attack by Grado forces led by Tiger Eye and Moonstone.
speak;Seth;Caellach Tiger Eye and Valter Moonstone...|They're supposed to be the most powerful of Grado's imperial generals.|For them to have abandoned the capital and led the battle into Jehanna...
speak;Messenger;The Knights of Rausten have ridden to the eastern front to aid Frelia, but the enemy attacks have been brutal.|I fear for their survival.
speak;Ephraim;We march for Jehanna immediately!|We will rescue Eirika.
speak;Messenger;B-but even if we leave now, we will not make it in time...
speak;Ephraim;We'll make it.|Rest easy on that.|Eirika is my sister.|That one will never lay down her blade.|And I am Eirika's brother.|There is no way I'll let my sister die!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Seth;Yes, it's me.|Please, you must rest.|If we continue like this, you'll...
speak;Eirika;No...|it's all right.|We're all suffering...|We're still completely surrounded by Grado's armies...|We may all die at any moment...|I can't lose focus now.|Has anything changed?

speak;Seth;Unfortunately, no.|On every front, our forces meet with defeat upon defeat.|Rausten's knights are scattered and worn, and the enemy is closing in around them.|And this accursed sand...|Most of the units can't get proper footing and are being slowed down.|Mounted units are having the worst time, as their movement is severely limited.|Princess Eirika...|I ask that you leave for safety.|We'll use flying units and magic users to hold the foe here.
speak;Eirika;No.|I will not retreat.|If I give up now...|My brother would not forgive me.|I'm the princess of Renais.|I will fight, either to victory or to death.|Brother, I...

speak;Riev;Valter...|You should stop playing around.|If you don't finish off Eirika's forces swiftly...|Her brother's left the capital.|He should be arriving here shortly.|You don't want to be fighting her still when he arrives.|Trust me.|We are equals here in Grado's army.|Would you like me to assist?
speak;Valter;All you need to do is vanish, you disgusting old man.|Eirika is mine.|I won't let you have her.|She is so strong, so beautiful...|She's the prey I've dreamed of.

speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Your fangs are still sharp, eh?|Good.|Very good.|Ah, Valter...|You're a beast.|You're bound to no country.|You care nothing for friend or foe.|Kill a man, claim a woman...|You live for nothing more, you wretched beast.|That's your strength.|That's what makes you stronger than any many alive.|A beast acts without remorse.|Man's morality cannot win.|It's nature's way...|The stage is all yours, Valter.|Do not fail to get the girl's bracelet.|Our master demands it...
speak;Valter;The time is nigh, Eirika...{br}Come to me!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Ephraim;There's Jehanna Hall...|It's nothing but a ruin now.|Blast!|I don't know what's happened, but...|I'd better get to Eirika and the others as soon as possible.

speak;Seth;I've discovered which of Grado's generals lead the forces surrounding the hall.|Valter the Moonstone and Caellach the Tiger Eye.|Two of the strongest of the empire's generals, with near-peerless forces.|Above all else, we must rescue Princess Eirika, and yet...|If you fall, Prince Ephraim, we're all finished.|And this accursed sand...|Most of the units can't get proper footing and are being slowed down.|Mounted units are having the worst time, as their movement is severely limited.|Some of us can move better than others, though...|A combination of magic wielders and sky riders should give us some advantage.|Whatever we do, we must move cautiously.
speak;Ephraim;I understand.|This is just like the battle for Renvall.|We either rescue Eirika or defeat all the enemy troops.|If we accomplish either goal, victory is ours.|Let's move!
speak;Caellach;Ah, Prince Lyon.|Thank you, Your Highness, for gracing me with...your royal...er...
speak;Lyon;You can stop.|There's no need for you to put on airs.|You were made general for your military prowess, not your flowery speech.
speak;Caellach;And an honor it is.|You know, Prince Lyon, you've got a lot of nerve.|You're really worked over your dear friend the princess of Renais.|Are you satisfied?
speak;Lyon;Is there some reason you ask?
speak;Caellach;No, not really.|I just wanted to see how you'd react.|That's all.

speak;Lyon;She...|Eirika has always been a very important person in my life.|Both she and her brother have been friends of mine for a long time.|Tell me, Caellach, do you have any friends to speak of?

speak;Caellach;Huh?|Yeah, I got one.|An old mercenary I fought with, went by the name of Joshua.|He was a fool and a scoundrel, but now that he's gone, I miss the lad.|I don't know where he's at or what he's doing, but...
speak;Lyon;Do you miss that life?|Do you ever want to be a mercenary again, to see him?

speak;Caellach;Nope.|The time we worked together was fun and all, but...|No.|I don't want to end up another no-name mercenary lying dead in a ditch.|I'd rather serve the Grado Empire and make a name for myself.|I'm going to see how far my axe will take me.|And then, one day...
speak;Lyon;One day, you'll kill me and be emperor in my stead.|Is that it?
speak;Lyon;It's all right.|Think whatever you like if it helps you do your duty.|As long as you do what I assign you to do, I'm happy.|But for now, I'm going.|You know what you need to do.

speak;Caellach;Yep, leave it to me.|I am General Caellach, the Tiger Eye of the Grado Imperial Army, after all!|Once my prey is within my reach, I never let it escape.|Too bad for the princess, but they've no chance of winning.|None at all.

name: Turn5
_source: speak;Ephraim;That building beyond the dunes is Jehanna Hall.|I expect that's where we'll find Eirika and her companions.|Duessel, Knoll.|It's time we rescued Eirika.|I'll need all your strength.
speak;Duessel;Of course, Your Highness.|I've pledged my service and my axe.|You shall have both.
speak;Knoll;Princess Eirika...|She's a friend of Prince Lyon's, isn't she?|I'll do what I can to help you.|I feel like that is what Prince Lyon would want.

speak;Ephraim;The enemy's numbers are great, but we do not need to face them alone.|We must move quickly to join forces with Eirika and her company.|I'm sure Seth and Innes will be there waiting for us.|Let's move!
speak;Duessel;I will not fall here!|If I have an <red>Axe</>, <red>Sword</>, or <red>Lance</>, I will endure!
speak;Knoll;I never predicted this...|But my <red>Dark</> magic and <red>Anima</> magic can help.|I know a couple of <red>Staff</> spells as well.
speak;Ephraim;Eirika!|Here I come!|By <red>Lance</>, <red>Axe</>, or <red>Sword</>, I will get to you!
speak;Ephraim;Eirika!|Here I come!|By <red>Lance</>, <red>Axe</>, or <red>Sword</>, I will get to you!

name: Turn2
_source: speak;Eirika;Prince Innes...|And Saleh.|I'm sorry.|I'm absolutely powerless here...

speak;Innes;Eirika, you have nothing to apologize for.|We're not defeated yet.|Jehanna Hall has fallen, that much is true.|But if we can hold out until Ephraim arrives, we still have a chance of victory.
speak;Saleh;And reports place Lady Myrrh at Prince Ephraim's side.|It is my duty to protect her.|I will not die without having fulfilled my obligation to her.

speak;Eirika;You're right...|I made a promise, too.|I told Ephraim I would live to see him again.|We just have to pull together.|All of us.|We just have to hold out a little longer.|If we pool our strength now, I vow that we will all live to see our friends again.
speak;Saleh;My <red>Anima</> magic and <red>Staff</> techniques will be useful here.|If needed, I can use some <red>Dark</> magic as well.|Although I hope I don't have to use it....

speak;Innes;I'll show Ephraim I can get out of situations like this.|My <red>Bow</> is tuned up just for this!|My father even trained me to use a <red>Sword</> for close combat.|I can also use a <red>Lance</> too if things get desperate...

name: Village_1
_source: speak;Villager Old Woman 1;Jehanna Hall...has fallen.|I wonder what's become of Queen Ismaire.|You there...|Take this, and do some good with it.

name: Village_1
_source: speak;Villager Old Woman 1;Jehanna Hall...has fallen.|I wonder what's become of Queen Ismaire.|You there...|Take this, and do some good with it.

name: House_1
_source: speak;Man1;According to this ancient document...|...There was a huge battle here long, long ago.|Every day, I'm out here digging up ancient weapons and artifacts out of the sand.|There are still more to be found, of that you can be sure.|It's even said a long-dead sage left a copy of Metis's Tome out here...|Oh! But I won't give that to anyone if I find it.|Not a chance!

name: House_1
_source: speak;Man1;According to this ancient document...|...There was a huge battle here long, long ago.|Every day, I'm out here digging up ancient weapons and artifacts out of the sand.|There are still more to be found, of that you can be sure.|It's even said a long-dead sage left a copy of Metis's Tome out here...|Oh! But I won't give that to anyone if I find it.|Not a chance!

name: House_2
_source: speak;Villager Man;All the highest generals in Grado's army receive titles named after gemstones.|The emperor currently has six gemstones fighting in his service.|Caellach, the Tiger Eye, commands the forces fighting here.|The Moonstone, Valter, is taking part in this battle as well.|Glen, also known as the Sunstone, died in the mountains of Carcino.|Selena Fluorspar was killed in western Grado.|Duessel, whom they call Obsidian, is missing in action...|The Blood Beryl, whose real name is Riev, has also gone missing.|Hm?|How do I know all this?|I know I may look young and naive, but this is my job.|I'm here to pass this information along to help you out.|And it's good information, too, so don't waste it.

name: House_2
_source: speak;Villager Man;All the highest generals in Grado's army receive titles named after gemstones.|The emperor currently has six gemstones fighting in his service.|Caellach, the Tiger Eye, commands the forces fighting here.|The Moonstone, Valter, is taking part in this battle as well.|Glen, also known as the Sunstone, died in the mountains of Carcino.|Selena Fluorspar was killed in western Grado.|Duessel, whom they call Obsidian, is missing in action...|The Blood Beryl, whose real name is Riev, has also gone missing.|Hm?|How do I know all this?|I know I may look young and naive, but this is my job.|I'm here to pass this information along to help you out.|And it's good information, too, so don't waste it.

name: EphraimTalkEirika
_source: speak;Eirika;Brother?|Is that really you?|You're not some phantom, are you?
speak;Eirika;...Ephraim.|Even when we were children, you were always there to protect me.

name: EphraimTalkEirika
_source: speak;Eirika;Brother?|Is that really you?|You're not some phantom, are you?
speak;Eirika;...Ephraim.|Even when we were children, you were always there to protect me.

name: EphraimTalkInnes
_source: speak;Innes;It's been a long time, Ephraim.
speak;Innes;You arrived sooner than I'd expected.|Eirika is safe.|You've no need to worry.
speak;Ephraim;I've heard that you've been watching over Eirika.|I would like to offer you my gratitude.
speak;Innes;It's not necessary.|Besides, there's still a war to be won.|We can't rest easy till every last Grado soldier's been defeated.

name: FightCaellachNormal
_source: speak;Caellach;You're a stepping-stone...|And I'm moving up.|Don't take it personally.

name: FightCaellachJoshua
_source: speak;Caellach;Hey!|If it isn't Joshua.|It's been a long time.|Have you been well?
speak;Joshua;I've been all right.|Still working as a mercenary.|When did you get all proper and join the Grado army?

speak;Caellach;Didn't I tell you?|I wasn't about to waste my life as a nameless soldier.|Still, I think back on those days a lot lately...|My axe and your sword...|The two of us were a deadly pair, eh?
speak;Caellach;By the way...|I know all about you, Joshua.|Who you really are I mean.|The prince of Jehanna, huh?|When did you plan on sharing the wealth, you sneaky dog?

speak;Joshua;Listen...|You can't reduce a nation to loot waiting to be divided.|And more importantly, I made a vow to my mother.|I'm going to succeed her as ruler of my homeland.|Hey Caellach...|You're the one who killed my mother, aren't you?
speak;Caellach;Yeah...|Sorry 'bout that.|Things happen, you know?|C'mon, Joshua, don't hate me.|This is war.|There's nothing you can do about it.|Besides, grudges get in the way of work, right?
speak;Joshua;That's true.|It's as you say.|Listen Caellach...|I've got to kill you now.|Don't hold it against me.

speak;Caellach;You arrogant...|You haven't changed a bit!|I've always wanted to show you who's better, Joshua.|And I'm even stronger than I used to be.|I'm gonna wipe that smug look off your face for good!

name: FightCaellachNormal
_source: speak;Caellach;You're a stepping-stone...|And I'm moving up.|Don't take it personally.

name: FightCaellachJoshua
_source: speak;Caellach;Hey!|If it isn't Joshua.|It's been a long time.|Have you been well?
speak;Joshua;I've been all right.|Still working as a mercenary.|When did you get all proper and join the Grado army?

speak;Caellach;Didn't I tell you?|I wasn't about to waste my life as a nameless soldier.|Still, I think back on those days a lot lately...|My axe and your sword...|The two of us were a deadly pair, eh?
