speak;Joshua;Listen...|You can't reduce a nation to loot waiting to be divided.|And more importantly, I made a vow to my mother.|I'm going to succeed her as ruler of my homeland.|Hey Caellach...|You're the one who killed my mother, aren't you?
speak;Caellach;Yeah...|Sorry 'bout that.|Things happen, you know?|C'mon, Joshua, don't hate me.|This is war.|There's nothing you can do about it.|Besides, grudges get in the way of work, right?
speak;Joshua;That's true.|It's as you say.|Listen Caellach...|I've got to kill you now.|Don't hold it against me.

speak;Caellach;You arrogant...|You haven't changed a bit!|I've always wanted to show you who's better, Joshua.|And I'm even stronger than I used to be.|I'm gonna wipe that smug look off your face for good!

name: DeathCaellach
_source: speak;Caellach;Bla-Blast...|A bit more, and...a crown...|would have been...mine...

name: DeathCaellach
_source: speak;Caellach;Bla-Blast...|A bit more, and...a crown...|would have been...mine...

name: FightValterNormal
_source: speak;Valter;I've no use for these bloodless minnows...|Give me prey that will sate my bloodlust...|I hunger!

name: FightValterCormag
_source: speak;Valter;What now, Cormag?|Have you betrayed your oaths and your emperor?
speak;Cormag;I have.|I can no longer serve Grado.|But I must know the truth, Valter, and you will tell me.|You're the one who murdered my brother, aren't you?
speak;Valter;...Hmph.|No reason for lies, seeing as you're nothing but a traitor.|You're right, Cormag!|I was the one who cut your brother down.|He was just like you, a weak, pitiful fool.
speak;Cormag;How can I not?|I've dreamt of revenge, chased it for days...|And now it's here before me!|Oh, Valter...|Your death will be slow and agonizing.

name: FightValterEirika
_source: speak;Valter;Mmm...|I've been waiting for you, Eirika!
speak;Valter;Have you forgotten?|We met once at Castle Renais.|No?|Look closely, Eirika.|Do you not remember the face of he who will master you?
speak;Valter;Yes, resist.|It's much more fun for me that way.|Come, Eirika.|I should like to tame you.
speak;Eirika;I am here on a mission.|One that I swore to my brother I would fulfill.|I will not be stopped by the likes of you!

name: FightValterEphraim
_source: speak;Valter;Hello again, Ephraim.|I let you flee once, but this time, there's no escape.
speak;Ephraim;Escape?|I'm not going anywhere.|I came here for you.|I came to defeat you.
speak;Valter;What's this?|A scurrying little mouse that roars like a lion?|Are you saying this time will be different than last?|Will you finally provide me with some amusement?
speak;Ephraim;I'll do far more than that.|I'll provide you with a messy end to your sorry life.

name: FightValterNormal
_source: speak;Valter;I've no use for these bloodless minnows...|Give me prey that will sate my bloodlust...|I hunger!

name: FightValterCormag
_source: speak;Valter;What now, Cormag?|Have you betrayed your oaths and your emperor?
speak;Cormag;I have.|I can no longer serve Grado.|But I must know the truth, Valter, and you will tell me.|You're the one who murdered my brother, aren't you?
speak;Valter;...Hmph.|No reason for lies, seeing as you're nothing but a traitor.|You're right, Cormag!|I was the one who cut your brother down.|He was just like you, a weak, pitiful fool.
speak;Cormag;How can I not?|I've dreamt of revenge, chased it for days...|And now it's here before me!|Oh, Valter...|Your death will be slow and agonizing.

name: FightValterEirika
_source: speak;Valter;Mmm...|I've been waiting for you, Eirika!
speak;Valter;Have you forgotten?|We met once at Castle Renais.|No?|Look closely, Eirika.|Do you not remember the face of he who will master you?
speak;Valter;Yes, resist.|It's much more fun for me that way.|Come, Eirika.|I should like to tame you.
speak;Eirika;I am here on a mission.|One that I swore to my brother I would fulfill.|I will not be stopped by the likes of you!

name: FightValterEphraim
_source: speak;Valter;Hello again, Ephraim.|I let you flee once, but this time, there's no escape.
speak;Ephraim;Escape?|I'm not going anywhere.|I came here for you.|I came to defeat you.
speak;Valter;What's this?|A scurrying little mouse that roars like a lion?|Are you saying this time will be different than last?|Will you finally provide me with some amusement?
speak;Ephraim;I'll do far more than that.|I'll provide you with a messy end to your sorry life.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Ephraim;And I've missed you.|I can't tell you how happy I am to see you safe.|Oh, I almost forgot.|I have something to give you.

speak;Ephraim;These are called Sacred Twins.|We took these relics from Grado.|The dark tome Gleipnir and the black axe Garm...|I doubt either of us can use them, but...|Why not see if one of your companions can use them.|They might have better luck.
speak;Eirika;They're from Grado?|Does this mean Grado Keep has fallen?
speak;Ephraim;Yes.|I conquered the capital and defeated Emperor Vigarde.|But still...
speak;Larachel;Eirika, may I make a suggestion?|We've been able to join forces here so...|How about if we all get together and trade information.|There are people on both sides waiting after all.
speak;Ephraim;I see unfamiliar faces among you here, so allow me to introduce myself.|I am Ephraim, Eirika's brother and crown prince of Renais.
speak;Larachel;I'm Princess L'Arachel of Rausten.|The pleasure is mine, of course.

speak;Ephraim;I'll begin by telling you of how we've fared in our mission.|We seized the Grado capital and defeated their emperor, Vigarde.|Grado's capital guard have, to a man, surrendered and laid down their arms.|Pockets of resistance remain, but the war itself is over.

speak;Ephraim;However, something remains that still bothers me.|A Grado man named Knoll told me about something called a Dark Stone.|Their mages had uncovered lore that led them to craft a powerful magic stone.|This Dark Stone may have been the catalyst of Grado's transformation.|It seems to be the source of that black wave of energy Myrrh described.|Vigarde died some time ago, but the power of the stone played him like a puppet.|The war and everything that passed since was planned by the Dark Stone's master.
speak;Ephraim;...I still can't believe it, but I'll tell you nonetheless.|According to Knoll, the man behind this is Lyon, the imperial prince.|He said Lyon's got the Dark Stone.
speak;Eirika;No, that doesn't make any sense.|Ephraim and I know Lyon better than that.|We've been friends for years.|Lyon's not the sort of person who could start a war like this.

speak;Eirika;I saw Lyon recently.|Ephraim, you might know this, but after I abandoned the sea route to Rausten, I traveled overland with Prince Innes to Jehanna.|We ran into trouble with Grado's forces, and I chanced upon Lyon.|He didn't share the details of his situation, but he intimated that he was on our side.|Despite all appearances, he was on our side.|So Lyon...
speak;Ephraim;Yes.|But, he was like a completely different person.|To be honest, he didn't seem to be completely...human.

speak;Ephraim;I'll tell you what I saw.|I found Lyon inside Grado Keep.|This is what he told me.|He said he was behind this war.|He said he'd befriended us solely so that, one day, he could invade Renais...|He told me he killed our father.

speak;Ephraim;I know.|I can't believe it either.|I refuse to believe it.|How could he have planned all this since he was a child...|I simply can't fathom it.|I've heard Lyon changed when he acquired the Dark Stone.|I've no interest in magic, but...|There was something uncanny about him.|It seemed almost as though he were being controlled by something himself.

speak;Innes;The two of you might find this hard to accept, but...|The state of Prince Lyon's heart matters little.|He has the Dark Stone.|That rock is the cause of all that's happened.|The prince must be stopped.
speak;Larachel;Not yet.|There is something that needs doing first.

speak;Larachel;Prince Ephraim, I do believe you felt it as well.|The Dark Stone held by Prince Lyon...|It exudes a malefic miasma...|We might be able to handle Prince Lyon alone, but that stone is beyond our ken.

speak;Larachel;We've all heard the legend of the five Sacred Stones.|They alone possessed the power to seal the Demon King away forever.|So, of course, to dispel demonic magic, we must use the Sacred Stones!
speak;Innes;You expect us to pin the outcome of this war on some fool legend?
speak;Ephraim;...Not just the legend.|We also have hope.|According to Lyon, he has already seen to the destruction of Grado's, Frelia's, and Jehanna's stones.

speak;Eirika;Hm.|That explains something...|Grado forces attacked me, intent on destroying the Stone of Renais.|If that could be the reason they chose to invade Renais...|The power of the Sacred Stones may be greater than we'd ever known.
speak;Larachel;Yes, exactly!|If we acquire a Sacred Stone, we'll be able to oppose the Dark Stone's might!
speak;Innes;But three of the stones have been shattered, and our options are few.|Do you suppose that, during the invasion of Renais...
speak;Ephraim;No, I don't think so.|The Stone of Renais is hidden by the power of Eirika's and my bracelets.
speak;Eirika;Grado has made many attempts to take our bracelets.|Every one has failed, and so the stone may still be safe.
speak;Ephraim;We have to confirm that, of course.|We've defeated Grado, and we must turn our eyes to our homeland.|It's time to return to Renais.
speak;Saleh;I'm grateful to see you well.|The people of Caer Pelyn will be overjoyed that you're safe.
speak;Myrrh;I must apologize to you, Saleh.|You were there to protect me from the very start of my journey.|When we were attacked, I was separated from you, and...|I'm so sorry to have worried you.
speak;Saleh;Lady Myrrh.|As long as you are safe, we have nothing to be worried about.|It will be my honor to serve you until your mission is complete.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;Thanks to you, Ephraim.|Ah...|Wait a moment.|I've something to give you.
speak;Eirika;These are the Sacred Twin relics of Jehanna.|The ice sword Audhulma and the wind blade Excalibur.
speak;Ephraim;Jehanna's Sacred Twins?|But it seems like we were too late...|Jehanna Hall has fallen.
speak;Eirika;Yes, and Queen Ismaire died resisting Grado.
speak;Larachel;Now that we have, at last, been reunited once again, perhaps this would be a good time to share information.|I'm sure we all are most anxious to learn of what has happened.
speak;Ephraim;I see unfamiliar faces among you here, so allow me to introduce myself.|I am Ephraim, Eirika's brother and crown prince of Renais.
speak;Larachel;I'm Princess L'Arachel of Rausten.|The pleasure is mine, of course.

speak;Ephraim;I'll begin by telling you of how we've fared in our mission.|We seized the Grado capital and defeated their emperor, Vigarde.|Grado's capital guard have, to a man, surrendered and laid down their arms.|Pockets of resistance remain, but the war itself is over.

speak;Ephraim;However, something remains that still bothers me.|A Grado man named Knoll told me about something called a Dark Stone.|Their mages had uncovered lore that led them to craft a powerful magic stone.|This Dark Stone may have been the catalyst of Grado's transformation.|It seems to be the source of that black wave of energy Myrrh described.|Vigarde died some time ago, but the power of the stone played him like a puppet.|The war and everything that passed since was planned by the Dark Stone's master.
speak;Ephraim;...I still can't believe it, but I'll tell you nonetheless.|According to Knoll, the man behind this is Lyon, the imperial prince.|He said Lyon's got the Dark Stone.
speak;Eirika;No, that doesn't make any sense.|Ephraim and I know Lyon better than that.|We've been friends for years.|Lyon's not the sort of person who could start a war like this.

speak;Eirika;I saw Lyon recently.|Ephraim, you might know this, but after I abandoned the sea route to Rausten, I traveled overland with Prince Innes to Jehanna.|We ran into trouble with Grado's forces, and I chanced upon Lyon.|He didn't share the details of his situation, but he intimated that he was on our side.|Despite all appearances, he was on our side.|So Lyon...
speak;Ephraim;Yes.|But, he was like a completely different person.|To be honest, he didn't seem to be completely...human.

speak;Ephraim;I'll tell you what I saw.|I found Lyon inside Grado Keep.|This is what he told me.|He said he was behind this war.|He said he'd befriended us solely so that, one day, he could invade Renais...|He told me he killed our father.

speak;Ephraim;I know.|I can't believe it either.|I refuse to believe it.|How could he have planned all this since he was a child...|I simply can't fathom it.|I've heard Lyon changed when he acquired the Dark Stone.|I've no interest in magic, but...|There was something uncanny about him.|It seemed almost as though he were being controlled by something himself.

speak;Innes;The two of you might find this hard to accept, but...|The state of Prince Lyon's heart matters little.|He has the Dark Stone.|That rock is the cause of all that's happened.|The prince must be stopped.
speak;Larachel;Not yet.|There is something that needs doing first.

speak;Larachel;Prince Ephraim, I do believe you felt it as well.|The Dark Stone held by Prince Lyon...|It exudes a malefic miasma...|We might be able to handle Prince Lyon alone, but that stone is beyond our ken.

speak;Larachel;We've all heard the legend of the five Sacred Stones.|They alone possessed the power to seal the Demon King away forever.|So, of course, to dispel demonic magic, we must use the Sacred Stones!
speak;Innes;You expect us to pin the outcome of this war on some fool legend?
speak;Ephraim;...Not just the legend.|We also have hope.|According to Lyon, he has already seen to the destruction of Grado's, Frelia's, and Jehanna's stones.

speak;Eirika;Hm.|That explains something...|Grado forces attacked me, intent on destroying the Stone of Renais.|If that could be the reason they chose to invade Renais...|The power of the Sacred Stones may be greater than we'd ever known.
speak;Larachel;Yes, exactly!|If we acquire a Sacred Stone, we'll be able to oppose the Dark Stone's might!
speak;Innes;But three of the stones have been shattered, and our options are few.|Do you suppose that, during the invasion of Renais...
speak;Ephraim;No, I don't think so.|The Stone of Renais is hidden by the power of Eirika's and my bracelets.
speak;Eirika;Grado has made many attempts to take our bracelets.|Every one has failed, and so the stone may still be safe.
speak;Ephraim;We have to confirm that, of course.|We've defeated Grado, and we must turn our eyes to our homeland.|It's time to return to Renais.
speak;Saleh;I'm grateful to see you well.|The people of Caer Pelyn will be overjoyed that you're safe.
speak;Myrrh;I must apologize to you, Saleh.|You were there to protect me from the very start of my journey.|When we were attacked, I was separated from you, and...|I'm so sorry to have worried you.
speak;Saleh;Lady Myrrh.|As long as you are safe, we have nothing to be worried about.|It will be my honor to serve you until your mission is complete.

name: OnLevelSelect_15B
_source: speak;Narrator;Grado's General Caellach has attacked Jehanna Hall, forcing its surrender.
speak;Narrator;Though Eirika and her troops have left the Hall, Grado's forces pursue them relentlessly.|Trapped in the burning desert, enemy forces close in on them from all sides.
speak;Narrator;With no time to wait for Frelia's troops, Ephraim leaves for Jehanna immediately.
speak;Narrator;He must go to his sister's aid.

name: Ch.7BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Eirika;What is a soldier doing sleeping in the training grounds like this?
speak;SoldierBlue;Princess!|Sorry for dozing off in this place!|I think it may have been because of this spear I found on the battlefield the other day.
speak;SoldierBlue;Yeah!|It looked like such a beautiful spear that I had to take it with me!|...Though I think it may be cursed...
speak;Eirika;Oh dear...|Isn't that dangerous? Why don't you just get rid of it?
speak;SoldierBlue;Because it's so strong, and you feel so revitalized after you use it!|Alhough you do fall asleep right after using it...
speak;Eirika;It may be hard to use a spear that makes you sleep on the battlefield.
speak;SoldierBlue;Probably...|Here, you take it princess.|Maybe you'll find a better use for it than I can.
speak;Eirika;Ok?...|I'll see what I can do with it then.
speak;SoldierBlue;Well, that's that then!|I better get back to my training!
speak;Eirika;Ok, best of luck to you.
speak;Eirika;Wow, that is one sleepy knight...

name: Ch.7BaseConvo3
_source: speak;Moulder;Correct.|I was informed to deliver to you this package that came from town.
speak;Lute;Ah, perfect.|I got a great deal on this book, so I'm glad they successfully it delivered to me.|It is very rare for a store to go out of their way for one customer.
speak;Moulder;Indeed, I was surprised myself.|Usually they only do that for me if it's medical supplies for the sick.
speak;Lute;Hence why I am so happy this arrived.
speak;Lute;You sound worried.|It's ok, a genius like myself can handle it.
speak;Moulder;I hope so, for your sake.|In my lifetime I've seen what the tempting powers of the dark can do to one's soul...
speak;Lute;I'll be fine.|I can handle any power that comes my way.
speak;Moulder;Artur told me how talented you are.|He wouldn't want anything bad to happen to you, so please keep him in your mind.
speak;Lute;You're right...|He is very much the type to worry...
speak;Moulder;Blessings upon you child.|I pray for a bright future for you.

name: Ch.7BaseConvo4
_source: speak;Joshua;Hm?|Who are you two?|Why are you staring at me?
speak;Franz;I am Franz!|A knight of Renais!
speak;Ross;I'm Ross, son of General Garcia of Ide!
speak;Joshua;I see...|Those are big titles for such young kids...
speak;Ross;We aren't kids!|We fought with you on the battlefield too, you know!
speak;Joshua;Hmmm...|Now that I think of it, I do think I remember seeing you two fighting as well...
speak;Franz;Yeah!|We saw you fighting and you looked so cool with your swordmanship!
speak;Joshua;Ah, that was me not even being serious.|I was getting pretty bored at that time.
speak;Ross;Wow!|That's so cool!|I hope I get that confident one day!|What's your secret mister?
speak;Joshua;Oh, I can't just give them away for free there pal.|We can maybe make a bet?|Got some money on ya kid?
speak;Franz;Money?|I think we have some funds available...
speak;Joshua;Perfect!|I'll get the dice ready, and-
speak;Seth;Joshua!|What are you doing?!|Get over here, now!
speak;Joshua;Uh oh...|Looks like that boss guy Seth is after me again...|I better get out of here before he catches me...

name: Ch.7BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Seth;It looks like we'll be resting here for a little bit.|The troops have been working hard lately.
speak;Eirika;They have been.|I should go and see if they are holding up ok.
speak;Seth;Wait, I fear you might be pushing yourself too hard lately, Princess.
speak;Eirika;I'm ok Seth, I just want to do what I can for everyone.|We can't afford to lose...
speak;Seth;Do you doubt yourself, my Lord?
speak;Eirika;Everything just happened so fast.|I don't know what to think anymore...
speak;Seth;Princess, draw your sword.|I'm going to help you improve your swordmanship.
speak;Seth;I can't stop you from doubting many things, but I can help you not doubt your own blade.|Draw it and we'll start practicing.
alert;Eirika gained some WEXP in swords!

name: OnLevelSelect_16A
_source: speak;Narrator;The capital of Renais.|After the twins' absence, seeing their home ruined by war brings them terrible grief.
speak;Narrator;Orson, a former Knight of Renais, has been assigned to guard Castle Renais.|However, he switched allegiances, betraying his oaths of loyalty to his homeland.
speak;Narrator;Eirika marks her homecoming by vowing to see Renais healed.

name: OnLevelSelect_16B
_source: speak;Narrator;The capital of Renais.|After the twins' absence, seeing their home ruined by war brings them terrible grief.
speak;Narrator;Orson, a former Knight of Renais, has been assigned to guard Castle Renais.|However, he switched allegiances, betraying his oaths of loyalty to his homeland.
speak;Narrator;Eirika marks her homecoming by vowing to see Renais healed.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Ephraim;What has happened to our home?|What has happened to Castle Renais?|How did it come to be so ruined?|So desolated?
speak;Seth;Spies report that the castle is being held by the traitor Orson.
speak;Ephraim;Orson...|In retrospect, I realize he's been acting odd for a while now.|He seemed so...|dispirited.
speak;Seth;His wife passed away some six months back.|The loss may have been too much for his mind to bear.|His love and devotion for his wife were well known among the knights.
speak;Seth;Now, he sits alone in the king's former bedchambers.|He makes no effort to govern.|No one is allowed to enter the chambers, and he takes no meals.
speak;Eirika;What could he possibly be doing?

speak;Seth;I do not know.|The spies had no insight into his behavior.|He does nothing to deal with the dark creatures and bandits roaming the land.|Reports say all of Renais is engulfed in chaos.|Region after region is revolting, and Orson's reign is already crumbling.|Left alone, it may very well collapse under the weight of its own neglect.
speak;Ephraim;We cannot allow the situation to reach that point.|We're going home, Eirika.|We're going to the castle.
speak;Myrrh;I-I will fight with you.|Now that Selena has returned my dragonstone to me...|I'll do what I can until its power runs out.|Let's take back your home.
speak;Myrrh;For the two of you...|I simply want to help.
speak;Ephraim;All right.|I understand.|But you must make me a promise.|You are never to stray from our sides.|Got that?
speak;Orson Evil;What is it, Monica?|You seem so happy today.|OF COURSE I know what today is.|I'd never forget your birthday!|I have a present for you, dear.|I think you'll like it....
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500

speak;Mercenary1;You know something?|That Orson...|He gives me the creeps.|What do you think he's doing back there?|I've heard lots of bizarre rumors from the master of the mess hall.|...Do you think he needs help?|Could he be dangerous?

speak;SoldierRed;I don't care.|I'm here for the money.|As long as I get paid, I'm happy.|But on the subject of rumors, have you heard the stories of the secret treasure?|There's supposed to be some fabulous wealth hidden in Castle Renais.|I tell you, if I find it, I'm gone.
speak;Riev;It does my heart good to see you looking so happy, Orson.|See what joy your treachery has brought you?|I told you treason would be sweet.
speak;Orson Evil;Get out.|This is Monica and my place.|I will not have our home disturbed by anyone.|I did as you asked.|I betrayed Renais.|My promise has been kept.
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh.|How long are you going to continue this nonsense?|Eirika and Ephraim have joined forces.|Even now, their united forces march toward the capital, toward you.

speak;Riev;You can't imagine they'll forgive you for your treachery, can you?|I expect the sin of your betrayal has shattered your entire family's name.|And after all you did to free your wife from the cold clutches of the grave?|It's a shame she'll be sent back there dangling from the hangman's noose.
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh.|Oh, but it can, and it will.|Unless you do something to stop it.|You understand what is required, don't you?|You have your orders, Orson.|Heh heh heh.

speak;Orson Evil;...Monica, I'm sorry.|I have something I must do.|Please wait for me here.|Oh, darling, don't look so sad.|I'll be back soon, and then I'll never leave.|I must do this to protect our happiness.|You understand that, don't you?|All right then.|I'll be back.
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh.|He believes that thing is his wife?|Aren't people amusing?
speak;Riev;Oh my, your nasty little illness rearing its ugly little head again?|There's no need to worry.|The pain will pass shortly.|Leave everything to your humble servant, Riev. Heh heh heh.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Ephraim;What has happened to our home?|What has happened to Castle Renais?|How did it come to be so ruined?|So desolated?
speak;Seth;Spies report that the castle is being held by the traitor Orson.
speak;Ephraim;Orson...|In retrospect, I realize he's been acting odd for a while now.|He seemed so...|dispirited.
speak;Seth;His wife passed away some six months back.|The loss may have been too much for his mind to bear.|His love and devotion for his wife were well known among the knights.
speak;Seth;Now, he sits alone in the king's former bedchambers.|He makes no effort to govern.|No one is allowed to enter the chambers, and he takes no meals.
speak;Eirika;What could he possibly be doing?

speak;Seth;I do not know.|The spies had no insight into his behavior.|He does nothing to deal with the dark creatures and bandits roaming the land.|Reports say all of Renais is engulfed in chaos.|Region after region is revolting, and Orson's reign is already crumbling.|Left alone, it may very well collapse under the weight of its own neglect.
speak;Ephraim;We cannot allow the situation to reach that point.|We're going home, Eirika.|We're going to the castle.
speak;Myrrh;I-I will fight with you.|Now that Selena has returned my dragonstone to me...|I'll do what I can until its power runs out.|Let's take back your home.
speak;Myrrh;For the two of you...|I simply want to help.
speak;Ephraim;All right.|I understand.|But you must make me a promise.|You are never to stray from our sides.|Got that?
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Mercenary1;Huh? Who do you think you are? These are the chambers of Orson, steward of Renais. There's no place here for a street urchin like you, boy.
speak;SoldierRed;You... You fool! This is Prince Lyon!
speak;Mercenary1;What? This whelp is... I-I beg your forgiveness!
speak;Lyon;...... It's all right. I'm not the sort of person others hold in esteem.
speak;Mercenary1;...Who in the world is that? What a creepy-looking man.

speak;Mercenary1;You want to talk about creepy, that Orson's the one who chills my hide. What do you think he's doing back there? I've heard lots of bizarre rumors from the master of the mess hall. ...Do you think he needs help? Could he be dangerous?

speak;SoldierRed;I don't care. I'm here for the money. As long as I get paid, I'm happy. But on the subject of rumors, have you heard the stories of the secret treasure? There's supposed to be some fabulous wealth hidden in Castle Renais. I tell you, if I find it, I'm gone.
speak;Orson Evil;What is it, Monica?|You seem so happy today.|OF COURSE I know what today is.|I'd never forget your birthday!|I have a present for you, dear.|I think you'll like it....
speak;Lyon;Do you still recognize me, Orson, or are you entirely lost to this world? Yes, it's me, Prince Lyon. I'm the one to whom you are indebted for resurrecting your beloved wife.
speak;Orson Evil;...Get out. This is Monica and my place. I will not have our home disturbed by anyone. I did as you asked. I betrayed Renais. My promise has been kept.
speak;Lyon;Yes, and I'm very grateful to you. I came by today to offer you a piece of advice. Nothing more. Ephraim is coming, Orson. He's on his way here to steal the happiness you two share.
speak;Lyon;That's right, Orson. And he's angry. I don't think he'll forgive you for betraying Renais. You've done so much to free your wife from the grave. It's a shame she'll die with you.
speak;Lyon;That's all I have to say to you. What you do now is up to you.

speak;Orson Evil;...Monica, I'm sorry.|I have something I must do.|Please wait for me here.|Oh, darling, don't look so sad.|I'll be back soon, and then I'll never leave.|I must do this to protect our happiness.|You understand, don't you?|All right then. I'll be back.

name: Seize
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: Seize
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: FighOrsonNormal
_source: speak;Orson Evil;...I won't let you come between us.|Monica and I will live here happily together.|Forever...

name: FighOrsonNormal
_source: speak;Orson Evil;...I won't let you come between us.|Monica and I will live here happily together.|Forever...

name: Outro
_source: music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, Princess Eirika.|The castle has been secured.|And...
speak;Seth;...This way.|This is the room Orson was holed up in.
speak;Ephraim;This same magic was used to control Emperor Vigarde.|She's already dead, and her corpse was used to...
speak;Ephraim;You needn't look any longer, Eirika.|Let's go outside.
speak;Seth;...You can't say this thing is truly alive anymore.|I'll...
speak;Ephraim;No...|I'll do it.|...The two of them spent every day in here, did they?|Orson was mad.|But I think he was happy...
speak;Eirika;Mmm...|We can repair the castle, and what was stolen, we can do without.|But the wounds and suffering inflicted upon the people of Renais...

speak;Ephraim;It's too late to undo their pain.|Once I become king, I must set our country right.|I doubt the people will give me a warm reception, though.|I did abandon them.|All I can do is try to win back their trust, no matter how long it takes...
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, Prince Ephraim.|You should look outside.
speak;Crowd;Prince Ephraim!|Princess Eirika!|The king has returned!|Our king!|Glory to Renais!|Long live King Ephraim!

speak;Seth;...They're not cheering for you.|They cheer because Orson's misrule is at an end.|They cheer the possibility of a better tomorrow, not the deeds we did today.|But how will the hearts of the people move tomorrow and the next day?|That is for you to decide.
speak;Ephraim;I will not let their hopes and dreams be shattered again.|I will be king.|Like my father before me, I will dedicate myself to their happiness.
speak;Eirika;And I will do all I can to help, Ephraim.

speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, Princess Eirika.|Before Renais fell, King Fado entrusted me with this message:|"Raise the twin bracelets in the hall of kings.|The seal will be broken.|The resting place of the Sacred Stone will be revealed"...
speak;Eirika;So we're supposed to raise our bracelets over our heads, right?
speak;Ephraim;This is the Stone of Renais...
speak;Eirika;Yes.|This is one of the five stones that defeated the Demon King.
speak;Ephraim;If Lyon had acquired our bracelets, the stone would have been destroyed by now.|Together, we protected the only power that can help us stop Lyon's insanity.
speak;Eirika;Yes.|It's the only hope left to us.|Hope for you and me, and the last true hope for peace...
speak;Ephraim;What is this?|Are they reacting to the light of the stone?
speak;Eirika;I can't believe the bracelets contain so much power...

speak;Ephraim;I wonder if Father anticipated all of this long ago.|When I was growing up, I never thought about becoming king.|I only wanted to be a good soldier, a good warrior.|The best on the battlefield.|Father never understood what I wanted, but...|I never understood him, either.
speak;Ephraim;It was the same when Grado invaded Renais.|I should have stayed home to defend the kingdom...|Instead, I raced off to fight for personal glory.
speak;Eirika;Brother...|I don't think you know how well Father understood your feelings.|When I last saw him, he was concerned for nothing but our safety...
speak;Seth;Eirika is correct.|King Fado asked after your exploits every day.|He always told me what a fine king you would one day make.
speak;Seth;Now Prince Ephraim, Princess Eirika.|Please wait for me for a moment.|The Sacred Twins of Renais should be near the stone's reliquary.|I'll grab them real quick.
speak;Seth;Ah, here we go.|This lance can only be one of the Sacred Twins of Renais.|Please, Prince Ephraim, take this sacred relic and feel its weight.
speak;Ephraim;So this is one of our Sacred Twin relics, is it?|I've never seen them.|Look, there's a name inscribed here.|Siegmund, the Flame Lance.
speak;Seth;And this blade is sister to the lance, the other Sacred Twin of legend.|Princess Eirika, if you would?
speak;Eirika;Of course.|There's a name carved here as well.|Sieglinde, the Thunder Blade...

speak;Eirika;These are the ancient weapons of our ancestors-the weapons of heroes.|They were enshrined generations ago, to be used only by the king...|and only in times of dire need.|Such an awful power they possess, and yet we need them to restore peace.|I've seen enough of the horrors of war, but I can't turn my back on it.|If we merely turn our eyes away, we surrender our world to atrocity.|And so, I must fight.|I'll do whatever I must do to bring back the peace we once knew.
speak;Larachel;What is happening?|Have you found the Sacred Stone?
speak;Larachel;Wow!|It truly is spectacular.|This goes some way to brighten the dark shadows that loom over us.
speak;Innes;Our country's Sacred Stones have been shattered by Grado's men.|The Stone of Renais is our last remaining weapon.

speak;Larachel;No, it's not.|You have forgotten the stone of my beloved Rausten.|Remember, there were five Sacred Stones for our five nations.|The Stones of Grado, Frelia, and Jehanna are gone, but hope is not.|We have the Stone of Renais, after all, and that of Rausten is safe.|Our road is clear, my friends.|I must guide you to Rausten.
speak;Eirika;You're right.|L'Arachel, we're counting on you to lead the way.
speak;Larachel;Of course.|And you will all be welcome to stay in the palace.|And, Eirika, you shall be my guest in my own private quarters!|Let us be on our way.

name: Outro
_source: music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500

speak;Seth;...This way.|This is the room Orson was holed up in.

name: OnLevelSelect_17A
_source: speak;Narrator;The Sacred Stones that defeated the Demon King radiate a constant and dazzling light.
speak;Narrator;The Sacred Stones are the only power against the dark, the last hope of humanity.
speak;Narrator;It is only natural that evil would seek to destroy the Sacred Stones...|There can be no other force behind this attempt to gain the stones.|A childhood friend appears before Eirika.

name: OnLevelSelect_17B
_source: speak;Narrator;The Sacred Stones that defeated the Demon King radiate a constant and dazzling light.
speak;Narrator;The Sacred Stones are the only power against the dark, the last hope of humanity.
speak;Narrator;It is only natural that evil would seek to destroy the Sacred Stones...|There can be no other force behind this attempt to gain the stones.|A childhood friend appears before Eirika.

name: Intro
_source: speak;EphraimSepia;How do you intend to use the Sacred Stone, Lyon?|Do you really think you can tap into its power?

speak;LyonF;Mm...|My research isn't complete yet, but there's no mistaking the power the Sacred Stones contain.|And the Stone of Grado seems especially responsive to my dark magic.|I suppose it's because it contains both sacred and demonic properties.|Regardless, if I can just press my studies a little harder...|Well, I think I might be able to use it to heal my father's illness.|If that works, there's no telling how many other people I can help as well.
speak;EirikaSepia;Do you think this is wise?|The power contained within the stones is beyond our understanding...|My father tells me that the stones possess a power not to be trifled with.

speak;LyonF;Uh-huh...|Father MacGregor is also against it.|That's why they still won't give me direct access to the Stone of Grado.|For the time being, I've made do with the radiant energies surrounding it.|They're nothing compared to the raw power of the stone itself, but...|If I can show Father MacGregor some real progress, perhaps one day...
speak;EphraimSepia;Using the Sacred Stones to study magic...
speak;LyonF;Ephraim, Eirika, what do you two think?|Using the divine power of the Sacred Stones in this way...|You don't think it's a very good idea, do you?

speak;EphraimSepia;...It's just that I know nothing at all of magic.|I wish that there were some way I could help you, but I simply can't.|But, Lyon, I've seen how hard you've worked to help others.|I know how much you want the power to make others happy.|I know these things, and because I know you, I trust your intentions.
speak;EphraimSepia;If you hope to use the power of the Sacred Stone for good, I trust you can.|I'm behind you all the way.

speak;EirikaSepia;I agree with Ephraim entirely.|You spend every night in the library, studying cures for your father's illness.|The power of the Sacred Stones is too powerful to be used for personal gain.|But you, Lyon...|I think you'll be fine.|You're the kindest person I know.

speak;LyonF;Thanks, both of you.|Hearing those words from you means a lot to me.|Actually-and this hasn't been made public yet-but...|I've already saved someone using the knowledge I've gleaned so far.

speak;LyonF;Uh-huh...|A while back, a fire ravaged Serafew, and a little girl got trapped in the flames.|Her burns were terrible.|Not even healing staves were able to cure her injuries.|But just a sliver of the stone's power restored her life and healed her wounds.|We saved that girl's life, Ephraim!|Oh, if you could have seen the tears of joy in her mother's eyes!
speak;EphraimSepia;You really did it, huh?|You are special, Lyon. Congratulations!

speak;LyonF;Well...|thanks.|But there's still so much more to be done.|I am happy, though.|To be honest, I just want to be able to help people.|I want to put the ancient magics to use for the common good...|That's how I feel.

speak;LyonF;And as my research moves forward, I'll be able to do much more, too.|We have only the barest understanding of how dark magic operates.|Maybe we can use it not only to heal wounds, but also to stop diseases...|What if we can read the future, predict disasters, move mountains!?
speak;EirikaSepia;Hold on, Lyon.|You can't take too much on yourself all at once.|What good is helping people if you sacrifice yourself to do it?
speak;LyonF;Oh...|Yes, of course.|Sorry.|I got carried away.
speak;EphraimSepia;You have a soft heart, Lyon.|I bet you haven't taken any real time off at all.|So this is what we're going to do.|Today, we're going into the city.|And you're going with us, Lyon.
speak;LyonF;What?|But, Ephraim, you've got a history report due.
speak;EphraimSepia;We're taking today off.|C'mon, let's go.
speak;EirikaSepia;It's just one day, and I won't tell anyone.|Won't it be fun for the three of us to spend a day in the city?
speak;LyonF;Ephraim, Eirika...|Thanks so much.|I'm lucky to have the two of you as friends.
speak;Ephraim;We have the Stone of Renais.|The final Sacred Stone is in Rausten.
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel, can you tell us anything about the Stone of Rausten?
speak;Larachel;Naturally!|As Rausten's very own princess, I know a thing or two about our stone.|The palace reliquary currently houses our Sacred Stone.|Follow me, and I'll take you there.
speak;Innes;I sent the Frelian army ahead before us.|They should be en route to Rausten.|If we hurry, we can join up with them at the banks of the Narube River.
speak;SoldierGreen;Do not falter!|Show them the might of Frelia!
speak;Woman2;Lady S-Syrene...|The enemy is headed this way.
speak;Syrene;Are you serious?|Grado's been defeated, and still they fight on?|And they're tough.
speak;OldMan1;You Frelian fools have been wiped out by those guys...|Oh, no...|Now we're finished as well.
speak;Syrene;Everyone, please remain calm.|If you panic and flee, the enemy will simply surround you.|If you remain here and don't move, I promise to protect you all.
speak;Innes;Is that Syrene?|What's going on?|We must go to her aid.
speak;Eirika;Lyon...|Where have you been all this time?
speak;Ephraim;Lyon?|We met recently in Grado Keep, right?|Do you remember what you told me then?|You told me this was all your doing, that you had started this war.
speak;Lyon;What?|Ephraim?|Why are you so angry?|We haven't seen each other in so long?|What happened?
speak;Ephraim;Wait, Eirika!|You said it yourself.|Lyon must be under the control of someone or something else.

speak;Eirika;Don't be ridiculous!|There must be something wrong with you, Ephraim!|Lyon is one of our dearest and closest friends, remember?|He told me that, no matter what happened, he was still on our side.|Isn't that right, Lyon?
speak;Lyon;Yes, Eirika.|Of course it is.|So please, come here.|Closer...|Ah!|Gah...ahh...|Uuuuhhaaah...|ga...
speak;Lyon;Get away...from me....quickly...|If you....don't..|I will surely....|Destroy you...
speak;Lyon Evil;Hi.|It's been a while since I saw you two last, hasn't it?
speak;Eirika;Lyon...|Is that really you speaking, Lyon?
speak;Ephraim;Stay back, Eirika.|Keep your guard up.|That's not Lyon.
speak;Lyon Evil;I'm not Lyon?|That's rich.|A masterpiece.|You always thought Lyon was kind, gentle, and weak, didn't you?|Admit it.

speak;Ephraim;No!|Lyon, Eirika, and I were friends.|There were things we kept to ourselves, of course, but we shared so much.|And no matter what happened, no matter how much time passed...|We're still friends.|Lyon would never betray us.|Not in a million years.|You're not Lyon.
speak;Lyon Evil;Hmmph...|Looks like I was wrong to disregard the value of human emotions.;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon Evil;I've had my fun pretending to be human, but the need for charades has passed.|You are correct.|This body no longer belongs to your young Lyon.|I devoured his pathetic heart ages ago.;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon Evil;Do you really not know me?|What a poorly educated prince.|Think about it.|Remember the legends of your pitiful kind...|What was sealed within the Stone of Grado?|What is the name of terror?;;;noir;;white
speak;Larachel;It's as we feared after all.|That can only be...
speak;Ephraim;The great adversary of antiquity...|The Demon King...
speak;Lyon Evil;Heh heh|ha hahahahah!|Lyon... Lyon... O prince of misery.|Come out.|Be not shy...|This body is lost to you...|It is mine to compel...;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon Evil;Your dreams, Lyon...|I am about to make them come true for you.|I am about to crush Prince Ephraim and take Princess Eirika for my own.|Isn't this all that you've ever prayed for, young fool of a prince?;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;Rejoice, Lyon.|The time has come...|Ephraim, the man you envy...|Eirika, the woman you desire...|I will now grant you all of your darkest wishes!;;;noir;;white
speak;Syrene;I am a commander!|Don't doubt my ability with <red>Lance</>, or <red>Sword</>!|I can even smite enemies with <red>Anima</> magic too!

speak;LyonF;Uh-huh...|A while back, a fire ravaged Serafew, and a little girl got trapped in the flames.|Her burns were terrible.|Not even healing staves were able to cure her injuries.|But just a sliver of the stone's power restored her life and healed her wounds.|We saved that girl's life, Ephraim!|Oh, if you could have seen the tears of joy in her mother's eyes!
speak;EphraimSepia;You really did it, huh?|You are special, Lyon. Congratulations!

speak;LyonF;Well...|thanks.|But there's still so much more to be done.|I am happy, though.|To be honest, I just want to be able to help people.|I want to put the ancient magics to use for the common good...|That's how I feel.

speak;LyonF;And as my research moves forward, I'll be able to do much more, too.|We have only the barest understanding of how dark magic operates.|Maybe we can use it not only to heal wounds, but also to stop diseases...|What if we can read the future, predict disasters, move mountains!?
speak;EirikaSepia;Hold on, Lyon.|You can't take too much on yourself all at once.|What good is helping people if you sacrifice yourself to do it?
speak;LyonF;Oh...|Yes, of course.|Sorry.|I got carried away.
speak;EphraimSepia;You have a soft heart, Lyon.|I bet you haven't taken any real time off at all.|So this is what we're going to do.|Today, we're going into the city.|And you're going with us, Lyon.
speak;LyonF;What?|But, Ephraim, you've got a history report due.
speak;EphraimSepia;We're taking today off.|C'mon, let's go.
speak;EirikaSepia;It's just one day, and I won't tell anyone.|Won't it be fun for the three of us to spend a day in the city?
speak;LyonF;Ephraim, Eirika...|Thanks so much.|I'm lucky to have the two of you as friends.
speak;Ephraim;We have the Stone of Renais.|The final Sacred Stone is in Rausten.
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel, can you tell us anything about the Stone of Rausten?
speak;Larachel;Naturally!|As Rausten's very own princess, I know a thing or two about our stone.|The palace reliquary currently houses our Sacred Stone.|Follow me, and I'll take you there.
speak;Innes;I sent the Frelian army ahead before us.|They should be en route to Rausten.|If we hurry, we can join up with them at the banks of the Narube River.
speak;SoldierGreen;Do not falter!|Show them the might of Frelia!
speak;Woman2;Lady S-Syrene...|The enemy is headed this way.
speak;Syrene;Are you serious?|Grado's been defeated, and still they fight on?|And they're tough.
speak;OldMan1;You Frelian fools have been wiped out by those guys...|Oh, no...|Now we're finished as well.
speak;Syrene;Everyone, please remain calm.|If you panic and flee, the enemy will simply surround you.|If you remain here and don't move, I promise to protect you all.
speak;Innes;Is that Syrene?|What's going on?|We must go to her aid.
speak;Eirika;Lyon...|Where have you been all this time?
speak;Ephraim;Lyon...|We met recently in Grado Keep, right?|Do you remember what you told me then?
speak;Lyon Evil;Of course I remember.|What of it?
speak;Lyon Evil;I can repeat it for you now if you would like.|The ruins of Renais?|The murder of your father?|It was all my doing.|I, Lyon, prince of Grado, made it happen.
speak;Ephraim;Don't be fooled, Eirika.|Keep your guard up.|That's not Lyon.
speak;Lyon Evil;What amusing things come babbling out of your mouth.|You always thought of Lyon as kind, gentle, and weak, didn't you?|Admit it.

speak;Ephraim;No!|Lyon, Eirika, and I were friends.|There were things we kept to ourselves, of course, but we shared so much.|And no matter what happened, no matter how much time passed...|We're still friends.|Lyon would never ever betray us.|Not in a million years.|You're not Lyon.
speak;Lyon Evil;...I see.|So I have no reason to continue hiding my true identity, do I?;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;You are correct.|This body no longer belongs to your young Lyon.|I devoured his pathetic heart ages ago.;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon Evil;Do you really not know me?|What a poorly educated prince.|Think about it.|Remember the legends of your pitiful kind...|What was sealed within the Stone of Grado?|What is the name of terror?;;;noir;;white
speak;Larachel;It's as we feared after all.|That can only be...
speak;Ephraim;The great adversary of antiquity...|The Demon King...
speak;Lyon Evil;That's right.|You know to fear my name.|Prince Lyon was a weakling.|Now, he is dead.;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon Evil;Prince Ephraim of Renais...|You hold a Sacred Stone.|Give it to me.|I have no wish to see a warrior die a pitiful death beneath my feet.|Bend your knee.|If you pledge service to me, I may yet let you live.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Do you take me for a fool?

speak;Lyon Evil;You've made your choice, have you?|A poor choice...|But it does afford me a chance to show you something special.|A force no human flesh can withstand.|A horror beyond words.|A power that will place this sad world under my dominion.|I am the Demon King...|Behold my might.;;;noir;;white
speak;Syrene;I am a commander!|Don't doubt my ability with <red>Lance</>, or <red>Sword</>!|I can even smite enemies with <red>Anima</> magic too!

name: DefeatBoss_17A
_source: speak;Lyon Evil;Urr...|Bah...|Can't hold up to such as this? Accursed human flesh is too brittle, too weak...;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;Now, I know your strength.|It is time to leave.|I sacrifice this flesh and return to my body of old.|This does not end.|The world will drown again in darkness.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;We will not let you flee!|After him, Eirika!|We have to find where he's gone.|Search everywhere!|I can't allow him to desecrate my friend's body any longer!
music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: DefeatBoss_17B
_source: speak;Lyon Evil;Not yet...|I have not the strength.|But I am the Demon King...|The world will be mine, as it was in ancient days.|Injuries such as these are not enough to stop me...;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;Come, Ephraim.|You should follow me.|If you've the strength to defeat me, that is...;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;We will not let you flee!|After him, Eirika!|We have to find where he's gone.|Search everywhere!|I can't allow him to desecrate my friend's body any longer!
music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: SyreneTalkVanessa
_source: speak;Vanessa;I'm here with Prince Innes!|We arrived to join the fray!|We'll take over now.|There's no need for you to exhaust yourself.
speak;Syrene;Understood.|The chain of command must be clear, though, so I'll take orders from your commander.|Pass this message to whoever leads your forces, will you?
speak;Syrene;You've matured since I saw you last.|And...|You've grown beautiful as well.

name: SyreneTalkVanessa
_source: speak;Vanessa;I'm here with Prince Innes!|We arrived to join the fray!|We'll take over now.|There's no need for you to exhaust yourself.
speak;Syrene;Understood.|The chain of command must be clear, though, so I'll take orders from your commander.|Pass this message to whoever leads your forces, will you?
speak;Syrene;You've matured since I saw you last.|And...|You've grown beautiful as well.

name: SyreneTalkTana
_source: speak;Syrene;Princess Tana!|You must stay back.|This place is dangerous!
speak;Tana;No!|I won't let you die!|Hold on, I'm coming to help you at once!
speak;Syrene;Princess Tana...|You've grown so much.|Very well.|I'm yours to command, my lady.

name: SyreneTalkTana
_source: speak;Syrene;Princess Tana!|You must stay back.|This place is dangerous!
speak;Tana;No!|I won't let you die!|Hold on, I'm coming to help you at once!
speak;Syrene;Princess Tana...|You've grown so much.|Very well.|I'm yours to command, my lady.

name: SyreneTalkSyrene
_source: speak;Syrene;Prince Innes...is it...|Ah...|It really is you, isn't it, Prince Innes?|Being rescued by you...|It's like a dream...
speak;Syrene;Oh...|Oh, yes!|Please forgive me!|The Frelian troops we dispatched were ambushed and decimated.|My squad is all that remains.
speak;Innes;So many dead...|You can rest easy now, Syrene. I'm here.|Victory is assured.|Let's go.

name: SyreneTalkInnes
_source: speak;Syrene;Prince Innes...is it...|Ah...|It really is you, isn't it, Prince Innes?|Being rescued by you...|It's like a dream...
speak;Syrene;Oh...|Oh, yes!|Please forgive me!|The Frelian troops we dispatched were ambushed and decimated.|My squad is all that remains.
speak;Innes;So many dead...|You can rest easy now, Syrene. I'm here.|Victory is assured.|Let's go.

name: FightLyonNormal
_source: speak;Lyon Evil;Do you challenge me?|You humans are so inconstant.|You've forgotten what it is to fear me.;;;noir;;white

name: FightLyonNormal
_source: speak;Lyon Evil;Do you challenge me?|You humans are so inconstant.|You've forgotten what it is to fear me.;;;noir;;white

name: Outro
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Innes;No need to panic.|My soldiers pursue Prince Lyon's trail.|Our trackers are excellent.|They'll have him soon.
speak;Innes;There's something I need to speak with you about.|The messenger I sent to Frelia returned not long ago.|She brought a package I'd requested:|Frelia's Sacred Twins.
speak;Innes;Yes.|Frelia may have lost her Sacred Stone...|However, it seems the Sacred Twin relics remained undisturbed.|I had them brought here.|Behold!
speak;Innes;Frelia's Sacred Twins.|Nidhogg, the Serpent Bow, and Vidofnir, the Winged Lance.|I want you to take them.
speak;Eirika;These are for you, aren't they?|They're for the rulers of Frelia.
speak;Innes;No, I entrust them to your care.|You're the leader of this army.|Use them as you see fit.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Prince Innes...|I appreciate your sacrifice.
speak;Innes;It is no sacrifice, and I require no thanks.|We're fighting for the same thing here.|Victory.
speak;Woman1;Lady Syrene!|Thank you!|We all owe you our gratitude...
speak;Syrene;No, it wasn't my doing.|We prevailed because of superior leadership.
speak;OldMan1;We owe you a debt of gratitude that can never be repaid.|It's not much, but please accept this staff as a small token.

name: Outro
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Innes;There's no need to panic.|The soldiers are following Prince Lyon's trail.|Our trackers are excellent.|They'll know his whereabouts momentarily.
speak;Innes;By the way, there's something I need to speak with you about.|The messenger I sent to Frelia returned not long ago.|She brought a package I'd requested:|Frelia's Sacred Twins.
speak;Innes;Yes.|Frelia may have lost her Sacred Stone...|However, it seems the Sacred Twin relics remain undisturbed.|I had them brought here.|Behold!
speak;Innes;Frelia's Sacred Twins.|Nidhogg, the Serpent Bow, and Vidofnir, the Winged Lance.|I want you to take them.
speak;Ephraim;But these are Frelia's weapons.|You should hold on to them.
speak;Innes;No, I entrust them to you.|You're the leader of this army.|Use them as you will.
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|I'll make sure they wind up in worthy hands.|Thank you, Innes.|This helps.
speak;Innes;Don't thank me.|We're fighting for the same thing here:|Victory.
speak;Woman1;Lady Syrene!|Thank you!|We all owe you our gratitude...
speak;Syrene;No, it wasn't my doing.|We prevailed because of superior leadership.
speak;OldMan1;We owe you a debt of gratitude that can never be repaid.|It's not much, but please accept this staff as a small token.

name: OnLevelSelect_18A
_source: speak;Narrator;The group sets off in search of Grado's elusive Imperial Prince Lyon.|Innes has ordered Frelian troops to aid in the hunt.|The troops return with news that Lyon has moved north.
speak;Narrator;The group's search for Lyon leads them to Mt. Neleras, in the heart of Darkling Woods.
speak;Narrator;The scorching heat and sulphur stench render the area unfit for human habitation...|Endless numbers of gorgon eggs stud the forbidding landscape.

name: OnLevelSelect_18B
_source: speak;Narrator;The group sets off in search of Grado's elusive Imperial Prince Lyon.|Innes has ordered Frelian troops to aid in the hunt.|The troops return with news that Lyon has moved north.
speak;Narrator;The group's search for Lyon leads them to Mt. Neleras, in the heart of Darkling Woods.
speak;Narrator;The scorching heat and sulphur stench render the area unfit for human habitation...|Endless numbers of gorgon eggs stud the forbidding landscape.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Eirika;L'Arachel...|May I ask for your advice?
speak;Larachel;What is it, Eirika?|There's no need to be so formal.

speak;Eirika;It's about Lyon...|My brother was right.|Lyon's been possessed by the Demon King.|He...|He's no longer the Lyon I once knew.|But I can't help feeling...|There must be some way to bring him back.

speak;Eirika;Please help me, L'Arachel.|I want to save him.|Rausten is the spiritual heart of Magvel.|They keep the ancient lore.|You're their princess.|You must know something about the demons of legend.|Is there anything that can save Lyon?
speak;Larachel;I'm so sorry, Eirika.|To the best of my knowledge, there is no way to aid him.
speak;Eirika;That can't be!|There must be something!|Any clue, no matter how slight...

speak;Larachel;Our oldest legends tell us just this...|Only one person has ever been able to shake off the Demon King's domination.|Rausten's founder, Saint Latona the sure-hearted, shattered his fetters.|If one possesses a strength of will beyond that of normal men...|Only then can one throw off the shackles of the Demon King.|But you saw it yourself, Eirika, with your own two eyes.|Your friend Lyon's body has already been claimed by the Demon King.|Once it's gone that far, there's nothing that can be done.|When the Demon King takes over someone, he devours his spirit, his very soul.|Even if his hold on Lyon's body could be released, that body would have no soul.|There is no power in Rausten...|not even the Sacred Stone...|that can perform so great a miracle as to restore a shattered soul.

speak;Larachel;Eirika?|I understand how you feel, but the prince is gone.|The Lyon you knew no longer exists.|It's more important now that you care for yourself.|If we pursue the Demon King, we're likely to suffer for it.|I want you to return to Rausten Palace and rest yourself.

speak;Eirika;Thank you, L'Arachel.|However, I must stay with the company.|I have to believe there's something I can do to help him.|Lyon was always so kind.|He wanted nothing more than to help people.|It's too terrible to picture him imprisoned by the Demon King.|Imprisoned with no hope of salvation.
speak;SoldierGreen;This way!|The enemy went into the recesses of this valley.
speak;Eirika;Yes.|An unpleasant odor, like sulphur.|It's emanating from this valley.
speak;Ephraim;No...|He's led us into a trap!|Watch out!|Everyone, steer clear of those eggs!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Larachel;E-Ephraim.|I must ask that you slow down!|If you travel so swiftly, we cannot keep up.
speak;Ephraim;I'm riding ahead.|I can't waste any more time.|I must catch the Demon King as quickly as possible.
speak;Larachel;And when you find him?|Tell me, what then?

speak;Ephraim;...L'Arachel.|Rausten is the spiritual heart of Magvel.|They keep the ancient lore.|You're their princess.|You must know something about the demons of legend.|I do not need consolation or peace of mind.|I need facts.|Lyon, as he is now...|Can he be saved?
speak;Larachel;I'm sorry...|To the best of my knowledge, there's nothing to be done.

speak;Larachel;Your friend Lyon's body has already been claimed by the Demon King.|Once it's gone that far, there's nothing that can be done.|When the Demon King takes over someone, he devours his spirit, his very soul.|Even if his hold on Lyon's body could be released, that body would have no soul.|There is no power in Rausten...not even the Sacred Stone...|that can perform so great a miracle as to restore a shattered soul.
speak;Ephraim;Is that so...|I understand.|Let's go, L'Arachel.
speak;Larachel;W-wait a moment.|Hmph!|Were you listening to me at all?|I'm sorry, but the prince...
speak;Ephraim;...I heard you.|There's no hope of saving Lyon.|And if I cannot save him...|I will bring him peace with my own hands.
speak;Larachel;But...|Can you do it?|Even if you get the chance, can you bring yourself to kill him?|It would be best if you and your sister left this to the rest of us.
speak;Ephraim;No...I'm going to do it.|Lyon is my friend.|The Demon King stole him from me.|I will be the one to kill him.
speak;Larachel;If your mind's made up, there's not much I can do, is there?|Let's go then.
speak;Larachel;There's no need for you to apologize.|Your words alone have won my forgiveness.
speak;SoldierGreen;This way!|The enemy went into the recesses of this valley.
speak;Eirika;Yes.|An unpleasant odor, like sulphur.|It's emanating from this valley.
speak;Ephraim;No...|He's led us into a trap!|Watch out!|Everyone, steer clear of those eggs!

name: Rout
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: RoutEP
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: Rout
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: RoutEP
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;Lyon's back there!|I won't abandon him!
speak;Lyon;Forgive me...Eirika...|It's over...for me...|The Demon King has devoured my soul...|I'm mad...and I'm going...|to die...
speak;Eirika;Lyon...|What should I do?|How can I help you?|Tell me!|I'll do anything, but you have to tell me!
speak;Lyon;My body...is being ravaged by the Demon King.|If it continues unchecked, nothing can save me.|But if I had the power of a Sacred Stone...|I could save...my soul...
speak;Lyon;Please...Eirika...|I don't want to die yet...|I want to live...with you...|If I had the Sacred Stone...|I could...heal myself...|Please...
speak;Eirika;Could the Sacred Stone really do that?|Could it heal you?
speak;Eirika;I...trust you, Lyon.|I have a stone right here.
speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha.....|Heh heh heh...|An abominable Sacred Stone...|Here in my grasp.
speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha...heh heh heh.|How disappointing for you.|This body is mine now.|Nothing remains of your dear boy's soul.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You only pretended to be Lyon...|You deceived me.|Return him!|Return Lyon now!

speak;Lyon Evil;I'm afraid there's no hope of that.|You see, I've devoured him.|Bite by bite, slowly.|How I savored it.|Nothing remains but this suit of flesh I wear.|There is nothing to heal.|Not even the power of a Sacred Stone can craft something from nothing.|He cannot be saved.;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha...|Bwah ha ha ha!|I love how humans look when they're drowning in despair.|Now is the time to be done with this stone.;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon Evil;Oh...caught up, have you?|Hmm, I've changed my mind.|I'll leave the girl alive.|Take her.|There are memories of you in this flesh I wear.|And I hunger to see your face bear more suffering and pain.;;;noir;;white
music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;Eirika!|Wake up!|Do you know who I am?
speak;Ephraim;Let's go back.|L'Arachel will be worried, Eirika...|You can weep now.|As much as you need.|Weep for me, as well.
speak;Seth;...It appears the enemy fled over this cliff.
speak;Eirika;I see no way we can pursue him now...
speak;Ephraim;So he got away, is that it?

speak;Larachel;There's no cause to be discouraged.|Beyond these mountains lie the heart of Darkling Woods.|Before we enter, we must head north to Rausten.|After all, we still need the Sacred Stone of Rausten.|As long as even one stone remains, all hope is not lost.|Come on.|We cannot give in to despair when victory draws so near!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Ephraim;...I've one thing to ask before I slay you.|Where is Lyon now?|When I kill you...|will Lyon return?
speak;Lyon Evil;Heh heh...|How little you understand.|Lyon is no longer part of your world.|He cannot be restored.|I have devoured every last delicious scrap of his small soul.;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;Why does this upset you?|What does it matter what happens to that weakling now?|He was a sickly cretin whose trivial dreams were nothing but hopeless-;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;SHUT UP!|He was my friend.|We'll always be friends.|I made a promise to him.|You stole Lyon's soul and corrupted his dreams!|I'll crush the life out of you
speak;Lyon Evil;Don't resist.|Soon you will be unable to move at all...;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;So you had the Stone of Renais with you after all.|If you'll just give me a moment to destroy it...;;;noir;;white
speak;Lyon Evil;And that's the end of your Sacred Stone...|Now then, Prince Ephraim.|Are you prepared?;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Curse you...|Do it!!!|Finish me!|With my dying breath, I'll cut you to ribbons.
speak;Ephraim;What are you waiting for?!|Are you frightened?

speak;Lyon Evil;...Tell me, Prince Ephraim of Renais.|Why do you fight on?|Do you think you accomplish your sad desire?|Can you restore your homeland from the grave?|Overthrow evil?|Or protect your sister?;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;You won't kill me.|I'll do all these things, fiend...|All these things and more.|For my friend Lyon...|I will avenge his soul.|I won't let his gentle image be defiled...
speak;Lyon;I guess it's true...|You haven't changed, Ephraim.

speak;Ephraim;What's going on?|You're the Demon King...|You're the ancient evil...|You told me you'd devoured Lyon's soul, that nothing remained.|So why did you...|How do you know about me?|It's not...|Could it be...you...
speak;Lyon;Uh-huh...|That's right.|It's me, Lyon, Prince of Grado.|I'm not the Demon King.|Sorry, Ephraim.|That whole thing about the Demon King eating my soul and me dying?|That was all a lie.
speak;Ephraim;Wha- Why?!|Why would you say such a thing?!

speak;Lyon;Listen, Ephraim.|I've always loved you.|I've always hated you.|I've always looked up to you.|I wanted to be just like you.|Then one day I realized...|Someone like me could never become someone like you.|You and Eirika are...overpowering.|You blinded me with your radiance.|How could I live in your shadows and not seethe with jealousy?

speak;Lyon;Before I ever touched the Dark Stone...|I had a vision.|A vision of the future of Magvel.|I saw myself standing with two roads stretched out before me.|One led to the Demon King, devouring both my body and soul.|The other showed me the power to fight the Demon King's dominion.|And I, well..|...Gaa...urgh.

speak;Lyon;Then I acquired the Dark Stone.|The Demon King began to eat my soul and corrupt my flesh.|I almost vanished beneath the Demon King's mantle.|Then I remembered you...|My mind blazed into wakefulness.|All at once, my mind shouted out, I will not be devoured!|Just as I was about to lose myself to the Demon King.|I was able to drive him back.|The Demon King's desires are simple-foul, but uncomplicated.|He wants nothing but the destruction, conquest, and subjugation of man.|These shallow desires are nothing to the dreams of the human heart.|And of the two roads I had seen, I chose the latter.

speak;Lyon;But I didn't want to appear before you here in the role of Lyon.|Lyon, the piteous victim...|The Demon King, the fiendish villain...|It was all an act-high drama for you all, to suit this grand occasion.|That's right, Ephraim.|I'm the Demon King...|The Demon King is me.
speak;Ephraim;You lie...|It can't be.|It's not possible.|Lyon was...|My friend was kind and caring...|He was a good person...|But you...|You are not that person!
speak;Ephraim;You...|You're the Demon King.|Lyon is gone, and you are a liar!|You're trying to trick me.|You're trying to confuse me!|I'm right, aren't I?!|Tell me I'm right, Lyon!|TELL ME!

speak;Lyon;I'm sorry, Ephraim.|Ephraim, listen to me.|Ten days from now...|When the moon is swallowed by shadow...|In Darkling Woods, I will perform a ceremony...|Through this ceremony, I will gain immense power.|Power not change not only Grado, but the entire world.

speak;Lyon;But after that...|I cannot save myself.|I'll become the Demon King of old and try to destroy all of mankind.|Ephraim.|If you want to stop this, you must come to Darkling Woods.|I want you to come.|I need you to stop me.|You must promise.
music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;...Is that you, Eirika?|Don't worry.|It's nothing.
speak;Ephraim;Lyon is...|Lyon's my friend.|Forever and always.
speak;Eirika;Brother... Let's get out of here.|L'Arachel and the others are worried.
speak;Seth;...It appears the enemy fled over this cliff.
speak;Eirika;I see no way we can pursue him now...
speak;Ephraim;So he got away, is that it?

speak;Larachel;There's no cause to be discouraged.|Beyond these mountains lie the heart of Darkling Woods.|Before we enter, we must head north to Rausten.|After all, we still need the Sacred Stone of Rausten.|As long as even one stone remains, all hope is not lost.|Come on.|We cannot give in to despair when victory draws so near!
