name: FightRievNormal
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|One Sacred Stone remains.|Once it is destroyed, darkness will consume the world.|What will you do?|Will you cower in fear?|Heh heh heh...

name: FightRievNormal
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|One Sacred Stone remains.|Once it is destroyed, darkness will consume the world.|What will you do?|Will you cower in fear?|Heh heh heh...

name: DeathRiev
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|No!|No!|It's been so long.|I got carried away.|I'd best stop and withdraw for now.|Follow me.|Come to Darkling Woods...|The Demon King awaits your pleasure...

name: DeathRiev
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|No!|No!|It's been so long.|I got carried away.|I'd best stop and withdraw for now.|Follow me.|Come to Darkling Woods...|The Demon King awaits your pleasure...

name: OnLevelSelect_19A
_source: speak;Narrator;The Sacred Stone of Renais has been broken.|Constant strife with dark creatures has made the group's progress near impossible.
speak;Narrator;Princess L'Arachel of Rausten suggests they pay a visit to Rausten Court.|It is here that the final Sacred Stone is sealed away.
speak;Narrator;L'Arachel rides cheerfully toward her homeland with the company in tow.

name: OnLevelSelect_19B
_source: speak;Narrator;The Sacred Stone of Renais has been broken.|Constant strife with dark creatures has made the group's progress near impossible.
speak;Narrator;Princess L'Arachel of Rausten suggests they pay a visit to Rausten Court.|It is here that the final Sacred Stone is sealed away.
speak;Narrator;L'Arachel rides cheerfully toward her homeland with the company in tow.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Larachel;Home at last.|My dear, sweet palace.|Uncle, I've returned.
speak;Mansel;Oh, L'Arachel!|It's good to see you safe!
speak;Larachel;Of course I'm safe, Uncle.|Evil can never defeat the forces of righteousness!
speak;Mansel;Ha!|You're exactly right, my dear!|Now tell me, who are our guests?
speak;Eirika;Pontifex Mansel of Rausten, allow me to introduce myself.|I am Eirika, Princess of Renais.|I come to you today as an emissary of Frelia.
speak;Ephraim;And I am Ephraim, Prince of Renais.|I come with Eirika to warn you of the danger our world faces.

speak;Mansel;...Hmm, I see.|That is a tough tale to swallow all at once...|However, I have heard of the fell creatures in Darkling Woods.|L'Arachel. You will need the Stone of Rausten if we have any hope of victory.
speak;Larachel;That is so, Uncle.|I would like permission to open the temple seal.
speak;Mansel;Hmm...|There's no need to rush yourself so, L'Arachel.|You're home again, in this blessed haven.|You should rest.
speak;Larachel;How can I relax until I know that our Sacred Stone is safe?|At the least, I'd like to ensure that the temple seal is intact.|Oh...
speak;Larachel;I think we'll take a night to rest after all.|Everyone is so exhausted.|My dear friend Eirika especially has had a very trying time of late.
speak;Larachel;Don't look so sad.|It wreaks such havoc on your beauty.
speak;Eirika;Lyon was one of my dearest friends...|I feel so helpless.|There's nothing I can do to help him...
speak;Larachel;Your friend is gone, Eirika.|All that remains is the Demon King, masquerading as Lyon.|For the good of all humanity, he must be defeated.|Ah...|If only it truly were that easy, though.

speak;Larachel;Eirika...|I never knew Prince Lyon.|I cannot pretend to understand the sadness you must feel.|However, I do know this...|If the Lyon you hold so dear were here with you today...|What do you think he would want you to do?

speak;Larachel;There's no need to rush, Eirika.|Take your time and think it through.|You need to find your own answer.|Now then, it's about time we found ourselves something to eat.|It's hard to be optimistic on an empty stomach.
speak;Eirika;Yes, I'll be right there.|Thank you, L'Arachel.
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Guard duty?|At this time of night?|Such a diligent soldier.
speak;Riev;Where are you looking?|I'm over here.
speak;Riev;What's wrong?|I'm right here.|Heh heh heh...
speak;Riev;Is the darkness too deep for you to penetrate?|Can't you see what the night is hiding?

speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Humans will never conquer darkness.|The guardian of light, Rausten, will drown in a never-ending night.|Come, my pretties.|It's time to go.|The day of Rausten's destruction has at long last arrived!
speak;SoldierGreen;Your Holiness!|There's been an attack!|We think it's Grado's men, fleeing from Frelia's forces.|However, they've breached the palace defenses at multiple points.

speak;SoldierGreen;The imperial guard is at a terrible disadvantage of numbers right now.|It's less a battle than a slaughter.|I'm not sure they will be able to hold out until the Knights of Rausten arrive.
speak;Mansel;How has this happened?|Our sacred capital invaded?|I must...
speak;Larachel;Uncle, please, you must keep yourself safe.|We can take care of this.|Is everyone ready to go?
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, please?|Prince Ephraim and I will handle this.
speak;Ephraim;Seth, it's all right.|Eirika can take care of herself.|Isn't that right, Eirika?
speak;Eirika;Yes.|I'm sorry if I troubled you.|Let's go.|We have to protect Pontifex Mansel.

speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|The day is coming, and swiftly...|The day of our triumph, our vengeance!|Self-righteous fools of Rausten!|Where are your miracles now?!|March on!|March, minions of the Demon King!|Your time is upon you!|Tonight, we claim not only Pontifex Mansel's sad life, but also Rausten's Sacred Stone!|Heh heh heh...|You cretin, Mansel...|I will have my revenge.|You should never have excommunicated me.|The Demon King will be your new master!

speak;Eirika;Lyon?|You were so selfless.|Your generosity seemed to flow from a bottomless well.|I'm so sorry, Lyon.|I couldn't save you.|But I know what you would have wanted.|I know it as I know my own name.|So watch, Lyon.|I will defeat the Demon King.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Larachel;Home at last.|My dear, sweet palace.|Uncle, I've returned.
speak;Mansel;Oh, L'Arachel!|It's good to see you safe!
speak;Larachel;Of course I'm safe, Uncle.|Evil can never defeat the forces of righteousness!
speak;Mansel;Ha!|You're exactly right, my dear!|Now tell me, who are our guests?
speak;Eirika;Pontifex Mansel of Rausten, allow me to introduce myself.|I am Eirika, Princess of Renais.|I come to you today as an emissary of Frelia.
speak;Ephraim;And I am Ephraim, Prince of Renais.|I come with Eirika to warn you of the danger our world faces.

speak;Mansel;...Hmm, I see.|That is a tough tale to swallow all at once...|However, I have heard of the fell creatures in Darkling Woods.|L'Arachel. You will need the Stone of Rausten if we have any hope of victory.
speak;Larachel;That is so, Uncle.|I would like permission to open the temple seal.
speak;Mansel;Hmm...|There's no need to rush yourself so, L'Arachel.|You're home again, in this blessed haven.|You should rest.
speak;Larachel;How can I relax until I know that our Sacred Stone is safe?|At the least, I'd like to ensure that the temple seal is intact.|Oh...
speak;Larachel;I think we'll take a night to rest after all.|Everyone is so exhausted.|My dear friend Eirika especially has had a very trying time of late.
speak;Ephraim;What are you talking about, Tana?|There's nothing wrong with me.|I'm always like this.
speak;Tana;That's not true.|I've never seen you look so sad as you do right now.|If you're depressed, I'm sure my brother would worry...|And I...well, I...

speak;Ephraim;Tana.|You're the princess of Frelia.|Perhaps it's unwise of you to be so friendly to Eirika and me.|After all, alliances aside, our two countries' needs may differ.|Who knows what the future holds?|Those ties could snap in an instant...
speak;Tana;You and Eirika are both my friends.
speak;Tana;We come from different countries, it's true, but...but...|No matter what happens, the friendship I feel for you will never change!
speak;Ephraim;I'm sorry, Tana.|I wasn't thinking straight.|Please don't cry.
speak;Ephraim;You're right, though.|No matter what happens, the bond between us will never disappear.|And it's because Lyon is my friend that I have to put an end to this.|Thank you, Tana.
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Guard duty?|At this time of night?|Such a diligent soldier.
speak;Riev;Where are you looking?|I'm over here.
speak;Riev;What's wrong?|I'm right here.|Heh heh heh...
speak;Riev;Is the darkness too deep for you to penetrate?|Can't you see what the night is hiding?

speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Humans will never conquer darkness.|The guardian of light, Rausten, will drown in a never-ending night.|Come, my pretties.|It's time to go.|The day of Rausten's destruction has at long last arrived!
speak;SoldierGreen;Your Holiness!|There's been an attack!|We think it's Grado's men, fleeing from Frelia's forces.|However, they've breached the palace defenses at multiple points.

speak;SoldierGreen;The imperial guard is at a terrible disadvantage of numbers right now.|It's less a battle than a slaughter.|I'm not sure they will be able to hold out until the Knights of Rausten arrive.
speak;Mansel;How has this happened?|Our sacred capital invaded?|I must...
speak;Larachel;Uncle, please, you must keep yourself safe.|We can take care of this.|Is everyone ready to go?
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, we'll take care of this.|Please...
speak;Ephraim;I'm sorry.|I've been useless and worse lately.|I'm over it now.|I'm ready to fight.|Let's go!|Take out the enemy, and protect Pontifex Mansel!

speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|The day is coming, and swiftly...|The day of our triumph, our vengeance!|Self-righteous fools of Rausten!|Where are your miracles now?!|March on!|March, minions of the Demon King!|Your time is upon you!|Tonight, we claim not only Pontifex Mansel's sad life, but also Rausten's Sacred Stone!|Heh heh heh...|You cretin, Mansel...|I will have my revenge.|You should never have excommunicated me.|The Demon King will be your new master!
speak;Ephraim;Lyon is my friend.|No matter what has happened, that one fact will not change.|I know this.|I will not falter in my resolve.|Lyon, because I'm your friend, I will strike you down.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;Yes, we did it somehow.|I wonder if everyone else is OK.
speak;Eirika;Yes.|Thank you, L'Arachel.|Your words guided me.
speak;Larachel;My-my words?|It was nothing... |Come, we should find the Sacred Stone.|If anything were to happen to it...
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel?|Your face is flushed.|Is anything amiss?
speak;Larachel;I'm holding it in my very hand!|The Stone of Rausten!|Its glorious radiance suits my complexion, wouldn't you say?
speak;Ephraim;This is it.|The last one.|The last remaining Sacred Stone.
speak;Larachel;It is.|And the time to defeat the Demon King draws near.
speak;Eirika;We should be leaving.|We have to act before those creatures gain more momentum.
speak;Myrrh;Yes.|We should make haste.|The poison spreads.|It is growing ever stronger.
speak;Myrrh;Darkling Woods...|Where the Demon King fell...
speak;Mansel;L'Arachel, must you leave so soon?|You've only just returned, and you have to leave?
speak;Larachel;Uncle, defeating evil is the highest calling I can perform.
speak;Mansel;Of course, my dear.|It is a divine calling, but...
speak;Larachel;You needn't worry, Uncle.|After all, I'm not on my own.|I have my friends.
speak;Mansel;I see.|You've been blessed, L'Arachel.|Blessed with many good friends.
speak;Larachel;I am indeed, Uncle.|And they, in turn, are blessed with me!|Farewell, Uncle.|I shall return.|Once evil has been vanquished, we'll all return safe and sound.
speak;Mansel;Hold on.|Not so fast now.|I have something I wish to present to Princess Eirika.
speak;Mansel;Yes, Princess.|I'd like you to accept this gift.
speak;Larachel;Oh!|Aren't those...|Aren't those the Sacred Twins of Rausten?

speak;Mansel;That's right, dear niece.|These are the weapons of Saint Latona, most holy father of Rausten.|Here, we have glorious Ivaldi, and its twin, the divine Staff of Latona.|I will also spare some funding to feed and arm your forces.|After all, there is much that you must do before you leave these halls.
speak;Larachel;So they are the blessed Latona's most sacred relics...|Is this allowed?

speak;Mansel;I know the law, L'Arachel.|The relics must never leave the temple, with the sole exception of the occasional ascension ceremony, but I think that, when the world needs saving, we can make the odd exception.
speak;Mansel;You will return them, of course...|once you've finished your task.|Princess Eirika, I would have your oath on this.
speak;Eirika;Of course.|You have my word.|We shall return safely, and we shall restore your relics.
speak;Larachel;Darkling Woods is home to naught but demons now.|Indeed, I hear tell that none who enter its borders ever leave again.|We ought to stock up on supplies in town before we set out.
speak;Eirika;Yes, we must be as prepared as possible before we set out.|I don't want to take any reckless chances with our lives.
speak;Larachel;My beloved countrymen!|The combat was fierce, but you protected the palace honorably.|The valorous Knights of Rausten shall live on in story and song!
speak;SoldierGreen;Thank you, my lady.|As always, it is our honor to serve.|Princess Eirika, before you leave, please take this tome.|We pray for your swift and safe return!
speak;Eirika;I appreciate your gift.|I swear I will not allow your valor to be wasted!
speak;Larachel;As long as the righteousness of justice fills our hearts, how can we lose?|Men, I ask that you watch after my dear uncle.
speak;SoldierGreen;You have our world, my lady.|In the twin names of justice and order!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Tana;Ephraim!|I'd glad to see that your spirits are up.
speak;Ephraim;Ah, Tana.|And I have you to thank for it.
speak;Tana;It was nothing.|As long as you're back to your old self, that is thanks enough.
speak;Larachel;I'm holding it in my very hand!|The Stone of Rausten!|Its glorious radiance suits my complexion, wouldn't you say?
speak;Ephraim;This is it.|The last one.|The last remaining Sacred Stone.
speak;Larachel;It is.|And the time to defeat the Demon King draws near.
speak;Eirika;We should be leaving.|We have to act before those creatures gain more momentum.
speak;Myrrh;Yes.|We should make haste.|The poison spreads.|It is growing ever stronger.
speak;Myrrh;Darkling Woods...|Where the Demon King fell...
speak;Mansel;L'Arachel, must you leave so soon?|You've only just returned, and you have to leave?
speak;Larachel;Uncle, defeating evil is the highest calling I can perform.
speak;Mansel;Of course, my dear.|It is a divine calling, but...
speak;Larachel;You needn't worry, Uncle.|After all, I'm not on my own.|I have my friends.
speak;Mansel;I see.|You've been blessed, L'Arachel.|Blessed with many good friends.
speak;Larachel;I am indeed, Uncle.|And they, in turn, are blessed with me!|Farewell, Uncle.|I shall return.|Once evil has been vanquished, we'll all return safe and sound.
speak;Mansel;Hold on.|Not so fast now.|I have something I wish to present to Prince Ephraim as well.
speak;Mansel;That's right, Prince.|I'd like you to accept this gift.
speak;Larachel;Oh!|Aren't those...|Aren't those the Sacred Twins of Rausten?

speak;Mansel;That's right, dear niece.|These are the weapons of Saint Latona, most holy father of Rausten.|Here, we have glorious Ivaldi, and its twin, the divine Staff of Latona.|I will also spare some funding to feed and arm your forces.|After all, there is much that you must do before you leave these halls.
speak;Larachel;So they are the blessed Latona's most sacred relics...|Is this allowed?

speak;Mansel;I know the law, L'Arachel.|The relics must never leave the temple, with the sole exception of the occasional ascension ceremony, but I think that, when the world needs saving, we can make the odd exception.
speak;Mansel;You will return them, of course...|once you've finished your task.|Prince Ephraim, I would have your oath on this.
speak;Larachel;Darkling Woods is home to naught but demons now.|Indeed, I hear tell that none who enter its borders ever leave again.|We ought to stock up on supplies in town before we set out.
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I think stocking up would be in our best interest.|I intended to see that we all return unharmed.
speak;Larachel;My beloved countrymen!|The combat was fierce, but you protected the palace honorably.|The valorous Knights of Rausten shall live on in story and song!
speak;SoldierGreen;Thank you, my lady.|As always, it is our honor to serve.|Prince Ephraim, before you go, please take this tome.|We pray for your swift and safe return!
speak;Ephraim;As I pray for your safety, too.|I won't let your valorous deeds be wasted this day!
speak;Larachel;As long as the righteousness of justice fills our hearts, how can we lose?|Men, I ask that you watch after my dear uncle.
speak;SoldierGreen;You have our world, my lady.|In the twin names of justice and order!

name: OnLevelSelect_20A
_source: speak;Narrator;According to legend, the Sacred Stones have sealed evil away from the world.|Four of the fives stones have been destroyed, leaving only the last stone intact.|The last stone must be protected to stave off the Demon King's restoration.
speak;Narrator;Eirika and company challenge the demons of Darkling Woods.

speak;Narrator;According to legend. the original possessors of the Sacred Stones defeated the Demon King in Darkling Woods. His foul blood seeped into the land, corrupting every seed and every root. The once-pristine forest was transformed by the flood of disease and venom. Legend says the Demon King's corpse lies there still, not dead but dreaming. Dreaming of when the last stone is crushed, and he will rise from his bed of rocks and worms and return to the surface. Within Darkling Woods, hideous fiends roam in increasing numbers, as if responding to some unheard call...

name: OnLevelSelect_20B
_source: speak;Narrator;According to legend.|The original possessors of the Sacred Stones defeated the Demon King in Darkling Woods.|His foul blood seeped into the land, corrupting every seed and every root.|The once-pristine forest was transformed by the flood of disease and venom.|Legend says the Demon King's corpse lies there still, not dead but dreaming.|Dreaming of when the last stone is crushed, and he will rise from his bed of rocks and worms and return to the surface.|Within Darkling Woods, hideous fiends roam in increasing numbers, as if responding to some unheard call...

name: Intro
_source: speak;Lyon Evil;Mm...|Hah hah.|A moment more, and my rebirth will be unstoppable-irreversible.|None remain who can stop me now.;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;You can clothe yourself in human flesh, but you cannot hide your foul mien.|Eight hundred years wasn't long enough, Demon King.

speak;Lyon Evil;One of the dragonkin, hm...|Ah.|I've seen your face before, lizard.|Yes, during that accursed battle so long ago.|When those wretched men bound me in their fetters.|They fought with an ally from the dragonkin at their side...|I believe his name was Morva.;;;noir;;white

speak;Morva;The protection of the blessed stones is lost.|The dark is rising.|Malevolence given will and form now walks these lands unopposed.|Ancient king of shadows...|they appear to be waiting for you.

speak;Lyon Evil;Very perceptive.|And now I am here.|I must tell them their wait is over.|I must tell them I have been reborn.|Begone, dragon.|I am changed.|I can no longer be stopped by the likes of you.;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;I live and breathe to protect mankind.|I cannot abandon them to you.|Now, as it once did so long ago, these woods will witness your defeat.

speak;Lyon Evil;So, your dragon blood still runs so hot that you would dare to try to stop me... Dragons.|That reminds me...|Not long back, I fought a rabble of men who traveled with a dragon child.|Tell me, Morva, was that your daughter...;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;Myrrh left this place long ago to test the limits of your influence.|Could she have...
speak;Lyon Evil;Could she have what...|Pray, continue.;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;You will answer me.|Your reply will determine...

speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha ha ha ha...|Such information had no use to you now.|You have dared to challenge me.|You have no time for joy or sorrow.|No, best to focus now on this, the moment of your death.|I would hate for you to miss it.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I know...|I can feel it too.

speak;Seth;This is Darkling Woods...|It was here the heroes met the Demon King and with the Sacred Stones defeated him.|I've heard the lingering energies of that battle are the source of the monster.|But I never imagined it would be as bad as this...
speak;Myrrh;It's worse than before...|It's grown so much stronger.|Simply standing here is a struggle...|But we don't need to worry.|My father is here.|He'll take care of everything.
speak;Myrrh;Over there.|On the other side of that swamp is the Black Temple of the Demon King.|My father stands guard near it.|This is where my father and I have lived for as long as I can remember.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|So this forest is like a home to you.

speak;Myrrh;Uh-huh...|I get to see Father again.|I'm so happy.|My foster father leads the dragon tribe.|In the last great war...|both of my true parents were killed.|Morva took me in and raised me as though I were his own child.
speak;Eirika;So that's how you came to live here...
speak;Myrrh;My father holds back the monsters that are born in Darkling Woods.|He's so strong, and so very gentle.|One day, I hope to be like him...|......Oh!
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, Prince Ephraim, we're under attack.|A horde of those foul beasts is headed straight for us.
speak;Eirika;Myrrh, are you well...|If you're ill, we should get you to-
speak;Myrrh;No, no...|It's nothing.|I'll fight with you.|I'll fight, and we'll drive back the dark children.
speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha ha ha...|Riev...|I'm leaving this to you.;;;noir;;white
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|As you wish.|Please proceed with the rites of resurrection, sire.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Morva;What are you doing here, human?|You should return to your own kind.|This is no place for you to tread.|This is darkness's domain...|This is desecrated land.
speak;Lyon;That's why I've come.|I have the power of the Demon King.|I will save us all.
speak;Morva;You...|Evil grips your heart...|No-you've given your heart to evil.

speak;Morva;What a tragedy...|Human flesh cannot contain the demon.|It cannot control him.|You think yourself safe, but already, your control slips.|I see the madness eating at you.|I see the beginning of the end.
speak;Lyon;You're wrong.|This...|Ah...urg...|I do this of my own will...|I will save Grado's people.

speak;Lyon;I had a vision...|I saw my life traveling two roads.|Down one, the Demon King conquers both my body and soul.|Down the other, I master the Demon King, and with that power...urg...|With that power, I avert disaster.|I gave the people a better future...|I resist the Demon King's attempts to wrest away my will...|I saw this, and I made my decision.|I walk the second road.

speak;Morva;You fool...|The Demon King has blinded you to his true wish.|How can you not see it?|He's had you since the moment you first held the Dark Stone.|He has been hiding within you, luring you deeper into the shadows of his heart.|He commands you and remakes you to suit his dark design.
speak;Morva;You think yourself unchanged?|You think yourself the master?|I see only more evidence that the Demon King commands you now.|Can you not sense-
speak;Lyon;It's not true!|I...|I will save everyone.

speak;Morva;Think back!|Remember!|Are you truly the man you used to be?|Would you justify war and murder to bring about peace and justice?|Remember who you were, and tell me if you are still yourself!
speak;Lyon;All of this matters not.|I know the Demon King has claimed me.|It is not important...|Not if I can save the world.|My own soul is irrelevant.

speak;Morva;...It is as I feared.|You will not give up this madness.|I am Morva, the dragonkin who guards the entrance to these woods.|I do not have the ability to save you.|All I can do is destroy the demon that coils around your heart.|To prevent the further damnation of your soul...|I can only grant you eternal sleep.
speak;Lyon;I cannot sleep.|I have not yet-|There is no taboo I will not break, no sacrifice.|I will not make...|I...
speak;Morva;...You are beyond reason.|Therefore I, too, must do what I was born to do.|As it was in that ancient battle...|You will die here, Demon King.
speak;Eirika;I know...|I can feel it too.

speak;Seth;This is Darkling Woods...|It was here the heroes met the Demon King and with the Sacred Stones defeated him.|I've heard the lingering energies of that battle are the source of the monster.|But I never imagined it would be as bad as this...
speak;Myrrh;It's worse than before...|It's grown so much stronger.|Simply standing here is a struggle...|But we don't need to worry.|My father is here.|He'll take care of everything.
speak;Myrrh;Over there.|On the other side of that swamp is the Black Temple of the Demon King.|My father stands guard near it.|This is where my father and I have lived for as long as I can remember.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|So this forest is like a home to you.

speak;Myrrh;Uh-huh...|I get to see Father again.|I'm so happy.|My foster father leads the dragon tribe.|In the last great war...|both of my true parents were killed.|Morva took me in and raised me as though I were his own child.
speak;Eirika;So that's how you came to live here...
speak;Myrrh;My father holds back the monsters that are born in Darkling Woods.|He's so strong, and so very gentle.|One day, I hope to be like him...|......Oh!
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, Prince Ephraim, we're under attack.|A horde of those foul beasts is headed straight for us.
speak;Eirika;Myrrh, are you well...|If you're ill, we should get you to-
speak;Myrrh;No, no...|It's nothing.|I'll fight with you.|I'll fight, and we'll drive back the dark children.
speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha ha ha...|Riev...|I'm leaving this to you.;;;noir;;white
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|As you wish.|Please proceed with the rites of resurrection, sire.

name: EnemyT1Talk
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Soon...soon...|It happens soon!|The Demon King will be restored to all his former glory!|And I, his faithful servant, will bask in his radiant power...|Then, oh, then I will have my revenge on those who scorned me!|The Demon King has created for me a fine weapon–a draco zombie!|This fierce beast and I will guard the Black Temple's entrance.|As long as we stand watch, no one will interrupt his rituals.|We will drown all who dare approach in this virulent mud!|Heh heh heh...|Heh heh heh heh heh!

name: EnemyT1Talk
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Soon...soon...|It happens soon!|The Demon King will be restored to all his former glory!|And I, his faithful servant, will bask in his radiant power...|Then, oh, then I will have my revenge on those who scorned me!|The Demon King has created for me a fine weapon–a draco zombie!|This fierce beast and I will guard the Black Temple's entrance.|As long as we stand watch, no one will interrupt his rituals.|We will drown all who dare approach in this virulent mud!|Heh heh heh...|Heh heh heh heh heh!

name: FightRievNormal
_source: speak;Riev;Grrr...|Your eyes annoy me...|Why do you not despair...|Why do you not surrender...

name: FightRievNormal
_source: speak;Riev;Grrr...|Your eyes annoy me...|Why do you not despair...|Why do you not surrender...

name: Seize
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: Seize
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500

name: DeathRiev
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Even if you defeat me, you're too late to stop it.|The one true demon...|will rise...

name: DeathRiev
_source: speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|Even if you defeat me, you're too late to stop it.|The one true demon...|will rise...

name: Outro
_source: speak;Ephraim;So this is the Black Temple...|The Demon King is here.
speak;Eirika;We have to stop him before he can begin the ritual.|Let's waste no time, Brother.
speak;Myrrh;Um...|I...|I just met with my father.|I had not seen or spoken with him for quite a while.
speak;Eirika;You saw your father...|Then we must speak with him-
speak;Myrrh;No...|He told me he couldn't see you.|He said it wasn't a good idea for him to meet so many people.|As the tribal chieftain, he feels he should maintain his distance.
speak;Myrrh;But he offered me words of encouragement and praised my efforts thus far.|He told me in his kindly voice to come home to him safely.|I will do my best to honor his faith in me.
speak;Eirika;He sounds like a good father.
speak;Myrrh;He is...|Mistress Eirika...|I'll do all I can.|For my father-and for all of you as well.|I will help you, and we will defeat the Demon King.
speak;Eirika;Are you sure you want to go with us, Myrrh...|You had so wanted to be with your father
speak;Myrrh;Yes...|I'm sure.|Once we are finished dealing with this evil, I will have time then.|Let's hurry, Mistress Eirika.
speak;Eirika;Myrrh...|I understand.|Let's get moving.|The faster we can end this nightmare, the better.
speak;Myrrh;From this building...|a repulsive energy oozes.|The Demon King...|He's here.
speak;Lyon;Lyon...|It's almost time.|Your beloved Eirika is on her way.;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon;Ha ha...|Lyon, prince of frailty.|To believe that a weak man like you thought to oppose me...|You're an arrogant little insect, nothing more.|And now, you're dead.|I will devour you, and you will be lost forever.;;;noir;;white

speak;Lyon;Ha ha.|Does it hurt...|Are you suffering...|Oh, but it does not end for you yet.|Oh, no.|I've left you this one shard of awareness for a reason.|I want you to watch yourself as you crush Eirika.|You should thank me!|Ha ha hah hah hah!;;;noir;;white

name: Outro
_source: speak;Ephraim;So this is the Black Temple...|The Demon King is here.
speak;Eirika;We have to stop him before he can begin the ritual.|Let's waste no time, Brother.
speak;Ephraim;Here you are.|Myrrh, we were worried...|Myrrh?|Are you...crying?
speak;Myrrh;N-no...|It's nothing.|The poison in these woods is thick.|It burns my eyes.
speak;Ephraim;What a minute...|That dragon...|Could he have been-
speak;Myrrh;O-of course not...|There's nothing wrong.|After everything you all have suffered, this is-|I can't...|This is nothing...
speak;Ephraim;I'm so sorry.|You kept silent this whole time so as not to trouble us.
speak;Myrrh;...E-everything's fine, Ephraim...|I'm fine.|See?|I'm ready to...to...
speak;Ephraim;Myrrh.|Let yourself cry.|These are dark times.|There's no reason to hide your sorrow.
speak;VigardeF;Lyon...|This is...|the end for me.|From now on...|you...
speak;VigardeF;You must concern yourself...|with Grado...|The people...|our people must be saved...|Lyon...|tell me again.|What will happen to Grado?

speak;LyonF;I have seen it many times now, as have the court mages.|It's the same every time, Father.|It's always the same.|Sometime in the coming years, the southern continent will collapse.|Countless people will die instantly.|Those who don't will likely starve.
speak;LyonF;None but the mages and I know of the vision, as you ordered.|But...|if we don't do something, all of those people will die.|Please tell me, Father.|What should I do?|What...
speak;VigardeF;Lyon...|When I die...|You will be emperor...|The emperor...|must protect his country.|There is nothing more...|that I can do.|It's you...|You must protect our people.
speak;LyonF;B-but, Father...|I don't have the power...|Ah!|R-Renais...|If I ask Eirika and Ephraim for help, I'm sure they would-

speak;VigardeF;You would ask Renais to rescue us from...|a natural disaster?|They would not help us...|Grado's borders would overflow with starving refugees by the thousands.|Renais would close her borders to us.|It's only natural...|Renais has a duty to protect herself.
speak;VigardeF;Lyon...|You are the one...|who must...|save our people.|You must take my place...|The citizens of Grado...|are counting on...you...
speak;LyonF;Father?!|No...wait!|I cannot do anything without you, Father!
speak;LyonF;I am...weak.|Because I am weak...|people will die.|I...
speak;LyonF;Knoll...|I...|Open the seal on the Sacred Stone of Grado.

speak;LyonF;You've seen the scrolls.|You know there is a way to stop the coming disaster.|If those scrolls are correct, the rites they describe can save all of Grado.|But it will require a staggering amount of dark energy-and a sacrifice as well.|The human body cannot contain the powers these rites demand...|And yet...|Of the five Sacred Stones, Grado's alone possesses a greater power...|It is the very prison housing the soul of the ancient Demon King.|If we could harness its power, well...|If we can do that, we can avert disaster and save countless lives.
speak;LyonF;I forget nothing!|I know I am too weak.|Because of me, all of Grado will be destroyed.|I need...|I need the Sacred Stone.|I must become stronger.|I will become stronger.

speak;Lyon;Everything is in readiness.|The Stones have been destroyed.|The Demon King's power swells.|The Black Temple possesses all the demonic power I will need.|The rites can begin.|All that remains is for me to sacrifice my life...|The disaster will be averted.|My people will be saved...

name: Intro
_source: speak;LyonF;When tomorrow comes...|you have to go home, don't you...
speak;EirikaSepia;Yes...|Thank you for everything, Lyon.|I'll never forget the time I spent here.
speak;LyonF;Do you think we'll see each other again...
speak;EirikaSepia;Yes, of course.|My brother and you and me.|We are friends, after all.|Aren't we...
speak;EirikaSepia;I hope your study of the Sacred Stones is fruitful.|I know you'll use the wisdom you glean to make your people happy.

speak;LyonF;Thank you, Eirika.|You know, you're the only reason I was able to save that girl.|There were times when I wanted to give up, to admit failure.|But you were always there.|You were always encouraging me to succeed.|That's what kept me going.|I just thought of you.
speak;LyonF;Eirika...|I...I've always...|I'm sorry...|Forget what I was saying.|I could never be like Ephraim...

speak;LyonF;I guess this is it, Eirika.|Hope to see you again someday.|I'm going to focus on my work and do my best until that day.|My research will progress, and my discoveries will benefit us all.|One day, I will be a prince worthy of you, and I will see you again.
speak;Eirika;Lyon...|It is you, isn't it, Lyon...!
speak;Lyon;Yes...|But I'm...|I'm almost completely gone.|Before I'm lost entirely, I want to apologize.|I'm sorry, Eirika.|This is all my fault.|I was too weak...
speak;Eirika;You're not to blame, Lyon.|It was the Demon King.|He was controlling you...

speak;Lyon;No, that's not true, Eirika.|When the Demon King reached into me from inside the Dark Stone...|When he whispered he would see all my dreams and desires made true...|I...I did not reject him.|In the shadows of my heart, he saw jealousy...vanity...|It was my weakness that put these emotions there, allowed them to thrive.
speak;Eirika;Everyone has weaknesses, Lyon.|You're not the only one.|I do.|I'm sure my brother does...|Don't hate yourself for having these feelings, please.

speak;Lyon;Thank you, Eirika.|You were always...so kind.|The Demon King will claim my flesh as a vessel for his resurrection.|Before that can happen...|I want you to kill me.|I'm sorry, Eirika.|I'm already-

speak;Lyon Evil;Oh, please...|Are you done turning your failings into some sad epic of personal tragedy...|It's time we started then.|I have a ritual to complete...and some nuisances to kill.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Shut your mouth.|I won't allow you to desecrate Lyon's body any further.|You will not return to this world.|I will stop you myself if I must.
speak;Lyon Evil;Ah, is that so...|And do you honestly think yourself capable, wench...|You once prayed for this fool's salvation.|Can you bring yourself to kill him...;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I can and I will.|I made a promise to Lyon, and I intend to honor it.

name: Intro
_source: speak;EphraimSepia;Don't make that face.|We'll see each other again.|All three of us-you, me, and Eirika.
speak;LyonF;Yeah...|I know.|But when we get older, when we each take the reigns of our nations, we probably won't meet again...|Not like this, I mean.|Not as friends.
speak;EphraimSepia;What's that got to do with anything?|Kings are humans, too.|Emperors need not be friendless, you know.

speak;LyonF;I suppose you're right.|You have a knack for cutting to the heart of things.|But becoming a king or an emperor is not something you can take lightly.|I really don't think we'll be the same people we are right now...|What if Renais and Grado went to war?|What if we were forced to fight?
speak;EphraimSepia;Don't be ridiculous.|That would never happen.
speak;LyonF;If...|If it did...|We'd still be friends, wouldn't we?
speak;EphraimSepia;Even if that happens, yes.|We're friends forever.|Nothing can change that.|You'll see.
speak;LyonF;Hm...|All right, Ephraim.|Then I will see you again.
speak;Lyon;You came after all, Ephraim.|I'm glad.
speak;Ephraim;Lyon.|Is this...|Is this my fault?|Am I responsible for how much you've changed?|I haven't seen you for two years now...|Have you..hated me that entire time?

speak;Lyon;No, Ephraim.|I was never dishonest.|I liked you both.|I still do.|But I was envious of you, too.|That's why I...desired this.|You may not believe me when I tell you this, but...|Even now, after all this, I still consider you a friend.
speak;Ephraim;Lyon...|You know that I do, too.|I spoke the truth to you...|I truly thought that we would always be friends.|That's why I...|I have to stop you.

speak;Lyon;Of course. I know...|You are Ephraim, after all.|You could do no less, my friend.|Well, come then, Ephraim.|Try and stop me.|I will defeat you, and then I will save the people of Grado.|No one...|No one will stand in my way.

name: FightLeonNormal
_source: speak;Lyon Evil;Come, and face your death!|I'm waiting, you miserable fool.|Your corpse will make a perfect offering in my resurrection.;;;noir;;white

name: FightLeonNormal
_source: speak;Lyon;I am the Demon King...|I know nothing of human frailty.|I am supreme...

name: Intro
_source: speak;Lyon;Eirika...You stopped me, didn't you...|I'm glad...
speak;Lyon;Listen...Eirika...|I never had the courage to tell you, but...I've always loved you...
speak;???;The time has come...|My resurrection is at hand...
speak;???;Now, humans...Lament your fate.|Weep for the dead.|Despair for the living. Wail and tremble in grief.|Grovel in awe and fear.|I am returned.
music;49- Lights in the Dark Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;Don't be afraid, Eirika. I'm here.|Our friends are here.|We have the Sacred Stone, and we have each other.|We will not lose.|We will defeat him.
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel!|It's time.|We have to use the final Sacred Stone.|We must use its power against the Demon King, as in the stories of old!

speak;Larachel;You must listen to me, Eirika.|The stories are true.|The stone does hold the power to stop the Demon King.|However, the source of its power is human will, the desire for peace within our hearts.
speak;Larachel;Yes, that's right.|We need not pray for the Sacred Stones to aid us now.|No, we need only focus ourselves and concentrate on a better future.

speak;Eirika;I understand, L'Arachel.|Listen, everyone.|I can never repay you for all you've done so far.|Now, please, one last time...|Lend me your strength.|To defeat the Demon King!|To restore peace to our lands!|To take the peace we all dream of and make it real!
prep;t;47- The Final Battle Orchestral Cover
music;47- The Final Battle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;Is everybody ready?|We're going to win.
speak;Seth;My only wish is to serve and protect the two of you...
speak;Franz;There must be something that I can do!
speak;Gilliam;We can't let our guard down.
speak;Vanessa;Please, let everyone come through this unscathed...
speak;Moulder;Hm.|I wonder if we can reenact the legend.
speak;Ross;Watch with pride, Father!|I'll show you who's the strongest!
speak;Garcia;This may be my last battle.|I'll hold nothing back.
speak;Neimi;I'm starting to wonder if I really should be here...
speak;Colm;Fighting's all well and good, but where's all the treasure?
speak;Artur;That's the king of all demons...|What a ferocious sight he is.
speak;Lute;Oh, that's the Demon King, isn't it?|Yes, I've read all about him.
speak;Joshua;So, what's Lady Luck have in store for me today?
speak;Forde;We've got to do what we can, right?
speak;Kyle;We're with you all the way, Prince Ephraim!
speak;Tana;There's nothing to fear.|I'll protect everyone!
speak;Innes;Bah...|I am in NO way inferior to this so-called Demon King.
speak;Tethys;Don't tense up!|You'll fight better if you're relaxed.
speak;Larachel;I, L'Arachel, strike in the name of righteousness, order, and Rausten!
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Same goes for me!
speak;Ewan;I'll show you all what my magic can do.
speak;Duessel;We must be steel blades with which to pierce the enemy.
speak;Knoll;That's the heart of the darkness I've studied?|It can't be...
speak;Syrene;I will show you honour and valour of the Frelian Pegasus Knights.

speak;Fomortiis;Gaa...grrr...|Abominable Sacred Stone...|I will not suffer imprisonment again.|How...|You possess only one...|Do not fool yourselves.|You cannot fully imprison me...|I will grind that wretched rock and your accursed bones to powder!

speak;Larachel;We did it.|The Demon King's soul has been bound once more.|But, Eirika, it's not over yet.|The Demon King's soul rages against its prison.|We must return it to its proper place-and quickly.|But first, we must defeat the Demon King's soulless body!

speak;Larachel;Uh-huh...|The real battle's just beginning.|Our ancestors paid dearly for their victory.|A mountain of corpses...|It's written the Demon King was surrounded by the dead before he finally fell.
speak;Seth;We're all prepared to do what must be done.
speak;Eirika;I have no desire to make any more heartbreaking sacrifices.|I promised we would all return safely, and return safely we shall!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Lyon;I guess that proves it.|You're too strong, Ephraim...|I've always...|admired...
speak;Lyon;You know, Ephraim...|I always wanted to be you.|I wanted to be strong and handsome...|With Eirika always at my side...|That's what I wanted to be.|I had...|I had nothing...

speak;Ephraim;Don't be ridiculous, Lyon.|Who was it that taught me history?|Who covered for me when I stumbled?|Didn't you see how I looked up to you?|I admired your compassion, your wisdom, your thoughtfulness....
speak;Lyon;Oh, yeah...|That seems so long ago...|I did keep you out of trouble, didn't I?|Thanks for remembering.|See?|You're thoughtful, too...
speak;Ephraim;Lyon...|Wait!|Don't close your eyes!|I'm going to save you!|I'll find a way!|I...
speak;Lyon;No, don't...|Thanks, anyway.|It was all my fault...|Don't look so sad.|C'mon, Ephraim, smile.|Like you used to...
speak;???;The time has come...|My resurrection is at hand...

speak;???;Heh heh...heh heh heh...|Well done, Lyon.|The sacrifice of your flesh and the sum of your efforts...|They were all for naught.|Grado's disaster cannot be averted.|My resurrection is at hand.|All this time, you imagined yourself in possession of your own free will, but it was I who planted the seed from which your ambitions grew.|My deceit made you my puppet, and oh, how you danced at the end of my strings.|You could never have been saved.|It's a shame, isn't it, Lyon?|And now I...|I am reborn.
music;49- Lights in the Dark Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;Demon King!|You are responsible for all the misery we've seen!|Lyon...|My friend...|You're the one...

speak;Ephraim;I know. This power is greater than anything we've ever faced....|But none of that matters.|I've learned so much...|My lance is stronger than ever.|That thing deceived and murdered my friend...|No matter what happens, I'm going to destroy it!
speak;Ephraim;L'Arachel!|It's time to use it.|Prepare the last Sacred Stone!|We have to use its power on that beast, like in the legends!

speak;Larachel;You must listen to me, Ephraim.|The stories are true.|The stone does hold the power to stop the Demon King.|However, the source of its power is human will, the desire for peace within our hearts.
speak;Larachel;Yes, that's right.|We need not pray for the Sacred Stone to aid us now.|No, we need only focus ourselves and concentrate on a better future.

speak;Ephraim;I understand.|Everyone!|Listen to me!|This is the final battle.|If we can defeat this thing, it's over.|We face the king of demons, the monster that once ruled all Magvel.|He's more powerful than any one of us here.|But we have something that beast will never have.|We have community, friendship, love...|We have all the virtues of humanity.|That is our weapon.|That is our strength.

speak;Colm;Fighting's all well and good, but where's all the treasure?
speak;Artur;That's the king of all demons...|What a ferocious sight he is.
speak;Lute;Oh, that's the Demon King, isn't it?|Yes, I've read all about him.
speak;Joshua;So, what's Lady Luck have in store for me today?
speak;Forde;We've got to do what we can, right?
speak;Kyle;We're with you all the way, Prince Ephraim!
speak;Tana;There's nothing to fear.|I'll protect everyone!
speak;Innes;Bah...|I am in NO way inferior to this so-called Demon King.
speak;Tethys;Don't tense up!|You'll fight better if you're relaxed.
speak;Larachel;I, L'Arachel, strike in the name of righteousness, order, and Rausten!
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Same goes for me!

speak;Duessel;We must be steel blades with which to pierce the enemy.
