speak;Syrene;I will show you honour and valour of the Frelian Pegasus Knights.
speak;Ephraim;Is everybody ready?|We're going to win.

speak;Fomortiis;Gaa...grrr...|Abominable Sacred Stone...|I will not suffer imprisonment again.|How...|You possess only one...|Do not fool yourselves.|You cannot fully imprison me...|I will grind that wretched rock and your accursed bones to powder!

speak;Larachel;Yes, we did it.|The Demon King's soul has been bound once more.|But, Ephraim, it's not over yet.|The Demon King's soul rages against its prison.|We must return it to its proper place-and quickly.|But first, we must defeat the Demon King's soulless body!

speak;Larachel;Uh-huh...|The real battle's just beginning.|Our ancestors paid dearly for their victory.|A mountain of corpses...|It's written the Demon King was surrounded by the dead before he finally fell.
speak;Seth;We are all prepared to do what must be done.
speak;Ephraim;No...|I'll do it. I have no intention of seeing anyone else die!

name: Outro
_source: music;67- Victory and the Future Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Larachel;Yes.|Evil has been imprisoned, locked away.|The legends of old have been mirrored in our actions today.
speak;Innes;No, we've done far more than the legends ever told.|We've destroyed the Demon King's body.|He can never come back.
speak;Eirika;That's right.|And we have you all to thank for it.
speak;Ephraim;And another thing...|In that ancient battle, it took the might of the five heroes to do what we did.|We did not have their extraordinary power to draw upon.
speak;Eirika;No, we didn't.|We conquered darkness and restored peace to the land, thanks to you.|It was because you never gave in, you never stopped fighting.|None of you, not once.|Thank you...
speak;Syrene;This means we've accomplished our mission!|I must relay the good news to King Hayden at once.
speak;Tana;Yes.|I'm sure Father will be most pleased.|Brother!|This means peace will be restored, doesn't it...|Shall I fly back to Frelia and let him know...
speak;Innes;There's no need to rush.|I'm sure he knows.|After all, we were together, and that ensured our victory.
speak;Moulder;Hmmm...|Looks like we're on the outside looking in, eh...|Even so, the fighting's over.|And that's something to be happy about.
speak;Gerik;Well that took some doing, but we finally finished the job.
speak;Tethys;We certainly earned our pay...|Please tell me we're going to enjoy it.
speak;Gerik;Let's see now...|Shall we head back to Jehanna...|I guess we could stop in at the guild and get our next contract, eh...
speak;Tethys;But the queen's gone...|I wonder what Jehanna will do now.
speak;Gerik;I'm sure it'll all work out.|After all's said and done, it's our home.|C'mon. It's time for Gerik's band to ride.
speak;Joshua;...Hm...|Heads.|Looks like I should be getting back as well.|Homecoming time...
speak;Natasha;It's over, isn't it...|The demon that drove Grado to madness is dead and gone.
speak;Amelia;I-I can't believe that I was part of this whole thing...
speak;Cormag;The war is over.|But so much remains to be done.|Our country lost this war.|The road ahead will be long and hard.
speak;Duessel;That's true.|And yet...|It's a road we must travel.|That's the burden survivors must shoulder.
speak;Knoll;Yes.|And we must fulfill the dreams of Emperor Vigarde and Prince Lyon.
speak;Dozla;Gwaa ha ha!|And a job well done it was, Princess L'Arachel.
speak;Rennac;Whew...|It's finally over.|So it's about time for me to...
speak;Larachel;Hold it!|I gave you no orders to leave!|I am the princess of Rausten, lest you forget.|I have many missions yet to fulfill.|Come, Dozla, Rennac.|It's time to go!
speak;Dozla;Gwaa ha ha!|Wait up!|Let's move, Rennac!
speak;Saleh;Let's return home, Lady Myrrh.|Our friends and family will be worrying about us...
speak;Ewan;What...|Hey, Teacher!|Where are you going...|Wait up.|I'm coming with you.
speak;Garcia;You did well, Ross.|You're a true warrior, my pride and joy.
speak;Ross;But you're still the best, Father!|That's right!|My father's the best warrior in all of Magvel!
speak;Colm;Bah, I'm glad everyone's so happy, but...|They'd better not forget that they won only with our help.|Right, Neimi...
speak;Artur;O glorious light, were you witness to our victory...|The foul demon has been purged from the earth.
speak;Lute;The ancient Demon King was as powerful as the scrolls described.|And yet, in the end, we were able to defeat him!|After all, there's no one better than us.
speak;Seth;Your continued safety is all that matters to me, Princess Eirika.
speak;Franz;General!|Princess Eirika!|We can finally return to Renais, can't we...
speak;Eirika;Yes, we can go home.|All of us unharmed...
speak;Forde;Ah, I'm exhausted.|I'd like nothing more than to laze about a while...|Alas, we're not going to have that opportunity, are we, Prince Ephraim...
speak;Ephraim;No.|The reconstruction of Renais is going to keep us busy.|Keep your strength up.|I'm going to need you in the days ahead.
speak;Kyle;We'll be beside you through it all!
speak;Eirika;All right, let's go home.|Let's go back to the people who are waiting for us...

name: Outro
_source: music;67- Victory and the Future Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Larachel;Yes.|Evil has been imprisoned, locked away.|The legends of old have been mirrored in our actions today.
speak;Innes;No, we've done far more than the legends ever told.|We've destroyed the Demon King's body.|He can never come back.
speak;Eirika;That's right.|And we have you all to thank for it.
speak;Ephraim;And another thing...|In that ancient battle, it took the might of the five heroes to do what we did.|We did not have their extraordinary power to draw upon.
speak;Eirika;No, we didn't.|We conquered darkness and restored peace to the land, thanks to you.|It was because you never gave in, you never stopped fighting.|None of you, not once.|Thank you...
speak;Syrene;This means we've accomplished our mission!|I must relay the good news to King Hayden at once.
speak;Tana;Yes.|I'm sure Father will be most pleased.|Brother!|This means peace will be restored, doesn't it...|Shall I fly back to Frelia and let him know...
speak;Innes;There's no need to rush.|I'm sure he knows.|After all, we were together, and that ensured our victory.
speak;Moulder;Hmmm...|Looks like we're on the outside looking in, eh...|Even so, the fighting's over.|And that's something to be happy about.
speak;Gerik;Well that took some doing, but we finally finished the job.
speak;Tethys;We certainly earned our pay...|Please tell me we're going to enjoy it.
speak;Gerik;Let's see now...|Shall we head back to Jehanna...|I guess we could stop in at the guild and get our next contract, eh...
speak;Tethys;But the queen's gone...|I wonder what Jehanna will do now.
speak;Gerik;I'm sure it'll all work out.|After all's said and done, it's our home.|C'mon. It's time for Gerik's band to ride.
speak;Joshua;...Hm...|Heads.|Looks like I should be getting back as well.|Homecoming time...
speak;Natasha;It's over, isn't it...|The demon that drove Grado to madness is dead and gone.
speak;Amelia;I-I can't believe that I was part of this whole thing...
speak;Cormag;The war is over.|But so much remains to be done.|Our country lost this war.|The road ahead will be long and hard.
speak;Duessel;That's true.|And yet...|It's a road we must travel.|That's the burden survivors must shoulder.
speak;Knoll;Yes.|And we must fulfill the dreams of Emperor Vigarde and Prince Lyon.
speak;Dozla;Gwaa ha ha!|And a job well done it was, Princess L'Arachel.
speak;Rennac;Whew...|It's finally over.|So it's about time for me to...
speak;Larachel;Hold it!|I gave you no orders to leave!|I am the princess of Rausten, lest you forget.|I have many missions yet to fulfill.|Come, Dozla, Rennac.|It's time to go!
speak;Dozla;Gwaa ha ha!|Wait up!|Let's move, Rennac!
speak;Saleh;Let's return home, Lady Myrrh.|Our friends and family will be worrying about us...
speak;Ewan;What...|Hey, Teacher!|Where are you going...|Wait up.|I'm coming with you.
speak;Garcia;You did well, Ross.|You're a true warrior, my pride and joy.
speak;Ross;But you're still the best, Father!|That's right!|My father's the best warrior in all of Magvel!
speak;Colm;Bah, I'm glad everyone's so happy, but...|They'd better not forget that they won only with our help.|Right, Neimi...
speak;Artur;O glorious light, were you witness to our victory...|The foul demon has been purged from the earth.
speak;Lute;The ancient Demon King was as powerful as the scrolls described.|And yet, in the end, we were able to defeat him!|After all, there's no one better than us.
speak;Seth;Your continued safety is all that matters to me, Princess Eirika.
speak;Franz;General!|Princess Eirika!|We can finally return to Renais, can't we...
speak;Eirika;Yes, we can go home.|All of us unharmed...
speak;Forde;Ah, I'm exhausted.|I'd like nothing more than to laze about a while...|Alas, we're not going to have that opportunity, are we, Prince Ephraim...
speak;Ephraim;No.|The reconstruction of Renais is going to keep us busy.|Keep your strength up.|I'm going to need you in the days ahead.
speak;Kyle;We'll be beside you through it all!
speak;Eirika;All right, let's go home.|Let's go back to the people who are waiting for us...

name: Intro
_source: speak;Larachel;It is time for me to be on my way, my friends.|As the princess of Rausten, I still have many duties to perform.|Oh, Princess Eirika...|If it pleases you, I would be ever so delighted if you joined my tea club.|I insist that you come.|Oh, say you will, won't you?
speak;Joshua;I've much to do here in Jehanna.|I'll start with what can be done and keep going from there.|First, I must talk to Mother.|She should know that we've won, so that she can rest easily.

speak;Innes;We of Frelia will do what we can to aid in the restoration of Renais.|If you have need of our assistance, you have but to ask.|I seldom trust people who act from purely altruistic motives...|But I'll grant you that friendships are a worthy exception to my distrust.
speak;Eirika;We've finally made it home, haven't we?
speak;Ephraim;Aaah.|You must be exhausted after the journey.|Shall we rest, Eirika?

speak;Eirika;That would be nice...|But first we must seal this away...|This stone banished the Demon King.|With such power...|Do you suppose we could bring back Father and Lyon...|That everyone who died in this dreadful war could be-

speak;Eirika;I know, I know.|Such things would be-|I cannot wish for such things.|No matter how it hurts, or rather because it hurts, we must learn to accept sorrow.|We must take it into our hearts and tame our grief...
speak;Ephraim;Eirika...|Tell me, Sister...|If Lyon were here with us, what do you think he would want?

speak;Ephraim;Yes.|You see, I think I know.|It was the reason for his studies.|It's why he wanted to know about the Sacred Stones-or rather the Fire Emblem.|Let's take Lyon's dreams and fulfill them in his stead.|We can do that, can't we?|Without relying on any mystic power?
speak;Eirika;You're right, Brother, we can.|Let us fulfill his dreams.|As Lyon wanted, as we all want...|So we may live in peace and joy.
music;68- Fly With the Breeze Orchestral Cover;500

speak;Lyon;Oh, are you...|I'm...|My name is Lyon.|Uh-huh.|That's me...|The son of the emperor.|You're Prince Ephraim and Princess Eirika from Renais, aren't you?|I heard you were coming, and I've been waiting here all day.|I've always wanted...|I don't have any friends my own age...|So, Prince Ephraim...|Princess Eirika...|What do you say?|From now on, let's be friends...
if;game.check_alive('Seth') and game.game_vars['EirikaAndSeth'] != True and game.game_vars['SethAndNatasha'] != True

ending;Seth;Seth, the Silver Knight;Seth returned to Renais with Ephraim and his fellow knights. His dedicated service made him the most trusted of the new king and queen's guardsmen, as well as the most famous of knights in all of Renais.
ending;Franz;Franz the Faithful;He continued to serve Renais with the same devotion that he had during the War of the Stones. His generous nature and easy smile made him a favorite among the people.

ending;Gilliam;Silent Gilliam;Gilliam returned to his home of Frelia, where he continued to serve the crown as a faithful knight. His imposing countenance was said to strike fear in the hearts of even the most arrogant and brash of Frelia's new recruits.

ending;Moulder;Moulder, Wise Counselor;After the War of the Stones, Moulder continued to serve the royal family of Frelia. His wisdom served to guide  King Innes as it had served King Hayden before him.
if;game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['SyreneAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['FordeAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['InnesAndVanessa'] != True
ending;Vanessa;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;She remained on active duty as an airborne knight in Frelia's army. Her beauty and determination became the standard to which her fellow knights aspired.
if;game.check_alive('Ross') and game.game_vars['GarciaAndRoss'] != True and game.game_vars['RossAndAmelia'] != True

ending;Ross;Ross, His Father's Son;He returned to Ide, village of his youth, and helped rebuild it after the bandit attack that brought it to ruin. Years later, he set out on his own to perfect his fighting skill and hone both body and spirit.
if;game.check_alive('Garcia') and game.check_alive('Ross') and game.game_vars['GarciaAndRoss'] == True

paired_ending;Garcia;Ross;Garcia, the Warrior Reborn;Ross, His Father's Son;Father and son returned to Ide, where they toiled together to rebuild their village. Ross grew to become a greater warrior than even his father. When he himself had a son, that child continued his family’s legacy.

ending;Garcia;Garcia, the Warrior Reborn;He returned to Ide to help with its reconstruction after the bandit attack. Afterward, he reenlisted in the army, serving Renais as a troop leader. His strength, valor, and experience inspired many.

ending;Colm;Colm, Good-Natured Thief;He politely refused an invitation to become a spy for Renais, returning instead to his hometown. He spent the rest of his days as a chivalrous rogue helping those in need from the shadows.
if;game.check_alive('Neimi') and and game.check_alive('Colm') and game.game_vars['ColmAndNeimi'] == True

paired_ending;Colm;Neimi;Colm, Good-Natured Thief;Neimi, the Tearful Archer;The childhood friends became lovers first, then husband and wife. Worried for Neimi’s well-being, Colm gave up his adventurer’s ways. Neimi passed on her grandfather’s skill in archery to her own son and daughter.

ending;Neimi;Neimi, the Tearful Archer;She returned to her village and passed her days in peace and quiet. Years later, she traveled to the capital of Renais as an archery instructor for their military. She never could resist a good cry.

ending;Artur;Artur, Saint of Light;Artur moved to Renais to help rebuild the shattered country. He worked without rest to ease the pain and grief of those who suffered during the war. His self-sacrifice made him into a folk hero among the peasantry.
if;game.check_alive('Lute') and game.check_alive('Artur') and game.game_vars['ArturAndLute'] == True

paired_ending;Artur;Lute;Artur, Saint of Light;Lute, Prodigy;Artur and Lute were married upon their return. Artur handled the housework, but otherwise, their lives were unchanged. When they had a son, Lute’s interests shifted from studying Artur to studying her son’s baffling habits.
elif;game.check_alive('Lute') and game.game_vars['ArturAndLute'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndLute'] != True

ending;Lute;Lute, Prodigy;After the War of the Stones, Lute returned to  Renais to continue her arcane studies. She  spent far less time locked in her library, preferring now to explore the outside world. She grew into a great and well-traveled sage.
if;game.check_alive('Natasha') and game.check_alive('Seth') and game.game_vars['SethAndNatasha'] == True

paired_ending;Seth;Natasha;Seth, the Silver Knight;Natasha, Sacred Healer;Natasha returned to Renais with Seth, where the two were wed. The reconstruction of Renais kept them busy, but when all the work was done, they settled down to live their days in peace and happiness.
elif;game.check_alive('Natasha') and game.game_vars['SethAndNatasha'] != True and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndNatasha'] != True

ending;Natasha;Natasha, Sacred Healer;Once the war was over, Natasha returned to Grado to help rebuild the empire. She dedicated herself to easing the grief of those families that lost soldiers during the war.
if;game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.check_alive('Natasha') and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndNatasha'] == True

paired_ending;Joshua;Natasha;Joshua, the Tempest King;Natasha, Sacred Healer;When Joshua returned to Jehanna, he took Natasha as his bride and claimed the throne as its rightful heir. Natasha was the perfect companion, and together, they carried the mighty desert nation to great glory.
elif;game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndNatasha'] != True and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndMarisa'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndJoshua'] != True

ending;Joshua;Joshua, the Tempest King;Joshua returned to Jehanna and ruled over it as king. His skills as a leader had grown great, and Jehanna flourished as never before. He never outgrew his love of travel and games of chance.
if;game.check_alive('Forde') and game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['FordeAndVanessa'] == True

paired_ending;Forde;Vanessa;Forde, the Wild Knight;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;Forde’s love for Vanessa grew after the war, and although she loved him as well, she placed her duty to Frelia first. Undeterred, Forde moved to Frelia himself. Over time, the two were wed.
elif;game.check_alive('Forde') and game.game_vars['FordeAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndForde'] != True and game.game_vars['EirikaAndForde'] != True

ending;Forde;Forde, the Wild Knight;Upon Forde's return to Renais, his secret hobby of painting was discovered. He was commissioned as a court artist. His work grew popular, and his days became so busy that he often regretted his career change.
if;game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.check_alive('Lute') and game.game_vars['KyleAndLute'] == True

paired_ending;Kyle;Lute;Kyle, Ardent Knight;Lute, Prodigy;After the war, Kyle and Lute were married in Renais. Kyle’s friends were disturbed by his choice of brides, but they could not deny his happiness. Before long, they had a son, and Kyle dedicated himself to his upbringing.
elif;game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.check_alive('Forde') and game.game_vars['KyleAndForde'] == True

paired_ending;Kyle;Forde;Kyle, Ardent Knight;Forde, the Wild Knight;Sometimes, the greatest friends also differ greatly in personality. When Kyle and Forde returned home, they were celebrated in song and story. They lived their days in happiness, as dearest friends and toughest rivals.
elif;game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.game_vars['KyleAndLute'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndForde'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndSyrene'] != True
ending;Kyle;Kyle, Ardent Knight;His service to the royal family of Renais continued without change. He became a battalion commander and gained much trust and responsibility for training new recruits.
if;game.check_alive('Tana') and game.game_vars['EirikaAndTana'] != True and game.game_vars['EphraimAndTana'] != True and game.game_vars['CormagAndTana'] != True
ending;Tana;Tana, Winged Queen;Tana lived happily in the prosperous post- war Frelia. She flew to Renais often to visit her dear friend Eirika.
if;game.check_alive('Innes') and game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['InnesAndVanessa'] == True

paired_ending;Innes;Vanessa;Innes, King and Strategician;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;At Innes’s request, Vanessa moved into Castle Frelia where she continued her duties as a knight of the realm. Thereafter, they had a child and lived happily with the blessing of all around them.
elif;game.check_alive('Innes') and game.game_vars['InnesAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['InnesAndEirika'] != True and game.game_vars['LarachelAndInnes'] != True

ending;Innes;Innes, King and Strategician;As time went on, he succeeded his father, Hayden, as king of Frelia. His resourcefulness and tactical prowess helped him build a court of loyal vassals that served to lead the country to greater prosperity.
if;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.check_alive('Gilliam') and game.game_vars['GilliamAndSyrene'] == True

paired_ending;Gilliam;Syrene;Silent Gilliam;Graceful Syrene;Gilliam and Syrene returned to Frelia, where they were married. All agreed they were a perfect match, and their union was blessed by the crown and the order of knights. The two continued their unwavering service together.
elif;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['SyreneAndVanessa'] == True

paired_ending;Syrene;Vanessa;Graceful Syrene;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;Sisters Syrene and Vanessa returned to Frelia after the war for a long-overdue talk. They talked of love and war, of friends now gone. Together, they renewed their bond as siblings and vowed never to let that bond fail.
elif;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.game_vars['KyleAndSyrene'] == True

paired_ending;Kyle;Syrene;Kyle, Ardent Knight;Graceful Syrene;After the war, Kyle visited Frelia, where he was greeted with a warm reception by Syrene. After the two retired, they were wed. They raised a daughter whose skill in martial arts and etiquette excelled.
elif;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.game_vars['KyleAndSyrene'] != True and game.game_vars['SyreneAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['GilliamAndSyrene'] != True
ending;Syrene;Graceful Syrene;Syrene continued as commander of Frelia's pegasus knights. Her grace and beauty in flight were the subject of many songs and paintings, and her popularity soared.
if;game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.check_alive('Franz') and game.game_vars['FranzAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Franz;Amelia;Franz the Faithful;Amelia, Rose of the War;Franz brought Amelia home with him to Renais. Amelia spent a short time in Renais’s army, but once she and Franz were married, she retired her commission. The two had a daughter who grew to be a great knight herself.
elif;game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.check_alive('Ross') and game.game_vars['RossAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Ross;Amelia;Ross, His Father's Son;Amelia, Rose of the War;Amelia traveled to Ross’s hometown, where she decided to remain. Over time, the two fell in love and were wed. Years later they had a son who grew into a warrior. As he grew in skill and strength, he surpassed even his father.

elif;game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.game_vars['RossAndAmelia'] != True and game.game_vars['FranzAndAmelia'] != True and game.game_vars['EwanAndAmelia'] != True and game.game_vars['DuesselAndAmelia'] != True

ending;Amelia;Amelia, Rose of the War;Following the war, she returned to Grado to assist in her country's reconstruction. She surrounded herself with new friends and used the strength she found on the battlefield to live her life in happiness.
if;game.check_alive('Duessel') and game.check_alive('Ameila') and game.game_vars['DuesselAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Duessel;Amelia;Duessel, Obsidian General;Amelia, Rose of the War;Upon their return to Grado, Duessel reunited Amelia with her mother. The two wept with joy, giving thanks to Duessel. Afterward, Amelia became the most trusted companion of the man once known as Obsidian.

ending;Duessel;Duessel, Obsidian General;Following the war, Duessel returned to Grado, where he was instrumental in its rebuilding. He spent his remaining years watching over Grado and sharing his wisdom with other nations as an expert combat instructor.

ending;Knoll;Knoll, Watcher of Darkness;Knoll returned to Grado, where he dedicated himself to rebuilding it and fulfilling Lyon's vision. When the country was restored to its former glory, he disappeared without a trace, never to be seen again.
if;game.check_alive('Cormag') and game.check_alive('Tana') and game.game_vars['CormagAndTana'] == True

paired_ending;Cormag;Tana;Cormag, Aloof Lanceman;Tana, Winged Queen;Cormag returned to Grado to assist in the reconstruction of his country. Shortly after, he left to wander on his own. Tana spent years looking for him. In time, she found him and knighted him in Frelia’s service.

ending;Cormag;Cormag, Aloof Lanceman;Cormag returned to Grado to assist in the reconstruction of his country. Shortly after, he left to wander on his own. When he reappeared, he rejoined the army not as a knight but as a common soldier.
if;game.check_alive('Larachel') and game.check_alive('Innes') and game.game_vars['LarachelAndInnes'] == True

paired_ending;L'arachel;Innes;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;Innes, King and Strategician;Stories tell of the sparks that flew between L’Arachel and Innes when they first met. As the love between them flourished, so too did the bond that united their two nations.
elif;game.check_alive('Larachel') and game.game_vars['LarachelAndDozla'] != True and game.game_vars['EphraimAndLarachel'] != True and game.game_vars['LarachelAndInnes'] != True

ending;Larachel;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;She succeeded her uncle as ruler of the Rausten Theocracy several years after the war ended. She never lost her...unique perspective on life. She spent much of her rule visiting the neighboring countries.
if;game.check_alive('Dozla') and game.check_alive('Larachel') and game.game_vars['LarachelAndDozla'] == True

paired_ending;L'arachel;Dozla;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;Dozla of the Steady Axe;L’Arachel was, in time, made queen of Rausten, with Dozla at her side, as always. Later, Dozla wept like a baby when L’Arachel was wed. His emotional outburst is remembered as much as, if not more than, the ceremony itself.
ending;Dozla;Dozla of the Steady Axe;As L'Arachel rose to become queen, he remained by her side. Watching L'Arachel grow to become the queen she was destined to be was Dozla's greatest joy in life.

ending;Rennac;Rennac, Rich "Merchant";L'Arachel summoned Rennac back to Rausten, and he was forced to return. He was never able to escape his service to the self- centered princess who became queen. Admittedly, he didn't try very hard.
if;game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.game_vars['GerikAndJoshua'] == True

paired_ending;Gerik;Joshua;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Joshua, the Tempest King;After the war, Joshua challenged Gerik to a duel in hopes of pressing him to move to Jehanna. The match ended in a tie, but Gerik was impressed by Joshua’s swagger. From that day forward, Gerik never left Joshua’s side.
elif;game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.game_vars['GerikAndJoshua'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndTethys'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndMarisa'] != True

ending;Gerik;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Gerik continued as a mercenary. Over the years, his reputation grew so great that he had more job offers than he could handle. One day, without warning, he left, never to return.
if;game.check_alive('Tethys') and game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.game_vars['GerikAndTethys'] == True

paired_ending;Gerik;Tethys;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Tethys, Beloved Dancer;Gerik and Tethys remained bound to no nation and beholden to no authority. They bought themselves a leisurely retirement. Gerik taught fencing to city youths, and Tethys found many stages on which to dance.
ending;Tethys;Tethys, Beloved Dancer;She danced from city to city, and the entire continent became her stage. Her fame grew and grew, and large crowds gathered wherever she performed.
if;game.check_alive('Ewan') and game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.game_vars['EwanAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Ewan;Amelia;Ewan, Enthusiastic Student;Amelia, Rose of the War;After the war, Ewan and Amelia set out, as promised, on a trip around the world. Their deeds along the way made small legends in the regions they visited. In time, Amelia gave birth to a daughter, and they settled down.
elif;game.check_alive('Ewan') and  game.game_vars['SalehAndEwan'] != True and game.game_vars['EwanAndAmelia'] != True

ending;Ewan;Ewan, Enthusiastic Student;Ewan continued his studies, modeling his life after the teachings of Saleh. Eventually, his education branched off into different paths. His insatiable curiosity led him on a trip to explore the world.
if;game.check_alive('Marisa') and game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndMarisa'] == True

paired_ending;Joshua;Marisa;Joshua, the Tempest King;Marisa, the Crimson Flash;Joshua returned to Jehanna with Marisa, where she pledged service to the crown and became the top swordfighter in the land. Joshua still loved games of chance, but when it came to Marisa, she was ever the winner.
elif;game.check_alive('Marisa') and game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.game_vars['GerikAndMarisa'] == True

paired_ending;Gerik;Marisa;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Marisa, the Crimson Flash;Gerik remained a mercenary, and Marisa became his company’s fencing instructor. Gerik returned the affection she gave him, although he was troubled to learn she was clumsy at everything but fighting.
elif;game.check_alive('Marisa') and  game.game_vars['JoshuaAndMarisa'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndMarisa'] != True
ending;Marisa;Marisa, the Crimson Flash;Marisa became battalion leader for an elite mercenary force. Many men sought to challenge her to a duel, and none of them stood up to her blade.
if;game.check_alive('Saleh') and game.check_alive('Ewan") and game.game_vars['SalehAndEwan'] == True

paired_ending;Saleh;Ewan;Saleh, the Well of Wisdom;Ewan, Enthusiastic Student;Master and student returned to Caer Pelyn to study in peace. Ewan worked hard, and in time, his power grew to rival Saleh’s. As equals, the two continued their studies together and expanded their knowledge ever more.
elif;game.check_alive('Saleh') and game.game_vars['SalehAndEwan'] != True and game.game_vars['EirikaAndSaleh'] != True and game.game_vars['SalehAndMyrrh'] != True

ending;Saleh;Saleh, the Well of Wisdom;Saleh returned to Caer Pelyn, where he remained a faithful servant of the Manakete. His days were not spent in isolation, though. Many of the friends he met during the War of the Stones came to visit his village.
if;game.check_alive('Myrrh') and game.check_alive('Saleh") and game.game_vars['SalehAndMyrrh'] == True

paired_ending;Myrrh;Saleh;Myrrh, the Great Dragon;Saleh, the Well of Wisdom;Myrrh returned to Darkling Woods, but at Saleh’s request, she eventually moved to Caer Pelyn. In time, the townsfolk learned to treat her not as the Great Dragon but rather as a normal girl, and she was happy.
elif;game.check_alive('Myrrh') and game.game_vars['EphraimAndMyrrh'] != True and game.game_vars['SalehAndMyrrh'] != True

ending;Myrrh;Myrrh, the Great Dragon;After bidding her farewells to Ephraim, she returned to Darkling Woods. She lived a long and full life, served by the people of Caer Pelyn and comforted by the memories of her dear friends.

paired_ending;Ephraim;Myrrh;Ephraim, Restoration King;Myrrh, the Great Dragon;After the war, Ephraim returned to Renais and Myrrh to Darkling Woods. They both turned their attention to their respective duties but never forgot one another. Though Myrrh never again left Darkling Woods, Ephraim often visited her.

paired_ending;Ephraim;Larachel;Ephraim, Restoration King;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;Ephraim and L’Arachel each returned home after the war, but L’Arachel visited Renais often. Over time, the two were wed. Their marriage threw Rausten into turmoil, but L’Arachel’s self-centeredness carried the day.

paired_ending;Ephraim;Tana;Ephraim, Restoration King;Tana, Winged Queen;Once Renais was stable again, Ephraim and Tana were wed. Innes protested vocally, but when he saw how happy Tana was, he gave the marriage his blessings. Renais and Frelia are now bound by blood as well as friendship.
elif;game.game_vars['EirikaAndEphraim'] != True and game.game_vars['EphraimAndMyrhh'] != True and game.game_vars['EphraimAndLarachel'] != True and game.game_vars['EphraimAndTana'] != True

ending;Ephraim;Ephraim, Restoration King;Busy days awaited him upon his return to Renais. He oversaw the rebuilding not only of his own country but also of the entire continent of Magvel. His work was difficult, but his success made him a legend.

paired_ending;Eirika;Ephraim;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Ephraim, Restoration King;Busy days awaited Eirika and Ephraim as they struggled to rebuild Renais. Their work gave new hope to those ravaged by the war, and with Eirika’s constant help, Ephraim grew to be a trusted and honorable king.

paired_ending;Eirika;Seth;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Seth, the Silver Knight;Upon their return to Renais, Eirika and Seth were wed, with the blessings of Ephraim and all of the Knights of Renais. The tale of the love that grew between a princess and her loyal knight became a beloved romance in Renais.

paired_ending;Eirika;Tana;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Tana, Winged Queen;Following the war, Tana and Eirika remained the best of friends. They visited one another when time permitted, and as they grew older, their children shared a bond of friendship as close as Eirika and Tana themselves did.

paired_ending;Innes;Eirika;Innes, King and Strategician;Eirika, Restoration Queen;After the reconstruction of Renais, Innes challenged Ephraim to a duel. The match ended in a tie. After the fight, Eirika acknowledged her love for Innes, and the two were wed with Ephraim’s blessings.

paired_ending;Eirika;Forde;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Forde, the Wild Knight;After the war, Eirika and Forde returned to Renais. Eirika spent her days toiling in the reconstruction of Renais, and he was her faithful supporter. His portrait of Eirika captured the smile he had thought lost forever.

paired_ending;Eirika;Saleh;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Saleh, the Well of Wisdom;After the war, Eirika and Saleh returned to their respective homes. Eirika visited Caer Pelyn when she could. Eventually, she left Renais in the care of her brother and wed Saleh. Their daughter resembles the legendary Nada Kuya.

ending;Eirika;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Eirika returned to Renais and began the reconstruction effort with her brother, Ephraim. Seeing peace return to the lives of her people filled her with happiness. Her smile became a symbol of her people's joy.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Larachel;Ephraim...|It is time I must be going.|I am still princess of Rausten, after all.|There is much to which I must attend.|Renais and Rausten are far apart, but that distance can be managed somehow.|If you and I were to be betrothed, that is...|I wonder if I appear too forward...|No, how silly of me!
speak;MyrrhD;Ephraim...|I must return to Darkling Woods.|With my father gone, much responsibility falls on my shoulders.|Yet I would ask...|May I come and visit you from time to time?

speak;Innes;We of Frelia will do what we can to aid in the restoration of Renais.|If you have need of our assistance, you can come to me at any time.|And another thing...|It...wasn't such a bad thing, fighting on the same side as you.|That's all.|The day will come, though.|One day, we will see who is the better.
speak;Eirika;Where are you going, Brother?|We've endured so much to get home, and now...
speak;Ephraim;I'm sorry, Eirika.|I must journey to Grado.|I just received word from Seth.|In the south, within the empire, there has been an enormous landslide.
speak;Ephraim;Yes.|Word is it was so great that whole cities were destroyed.|They say the damage is so severe, the empire itself is in danger...

speak;Ephraim;That's why I must go to Grado.|The people are saying this is Grado's divine punishment...|But these are the same citizens Lyon wanted nothing more than to protect.|I cannot ignore their plight.
speak;Eirika;Yes, of course not.|I will ride with you.
speak;Ephraim;No, you must remain in Renais.|Our country is recovering, but we cannot rest easy.|Someone must stay to protect the realm.
speak;Eirika;Ephraim...|I understand.|I will take your place until you return.|I will wait for you in Renais, Brother.

speak;Ephraim;I can always depend on you, Eirika.|Lyon...|I will be king.|The type of king we often spoke of...|Strong and kind in measure:|an ideal king.|The people of Renais and Grado are under my protection, and I won't fail them.|Watch and see...
music;68- Fly With the Breeze Orchestral Cover;500

speak;Lyon;Oh, are you...|I'm...|My name is Lyon.|Uh-huh.|That's me...|The son of the emperor.|You're Prince Ephraim and Princess Eirika from Renais, aren't you?|I heard you were coming, and I've been waiting here all day.|I've always wanted...|I don't have any friends my own age...|So, Prince Ephraim...|Princess Eirika...|What do you say?|From now on, let's be friends...
if;game.check_alive('Seth') and game.game_vars['EirikaAndSeth'] != True and game.game_vars['SethAndNatasha'] != True

ending;Seth;Seth, the Silver Knight;Seth returned to Renais with Ephraim and his fellow knights. His dedicated service made him the most trusted of the new king and queen's guardsmen, as well as the most famous of knights in all of Renais.
ending;Franz;Franz the Faithful;He continued to serve Renais with the same devotion that he had during the War of the Stones. His generous nature and easy smile made him a favorite among the people.

ending;Gilliam;Silent Gilliam;Gilliam returned to his home of Frelia, where he continued to serve the crown as a faithful knight. His imposing countenance was said to strike fear in the hearts of even the most arrogant and brash of Frelia's new recruits.

ending;Moulder;Moulder, Wise Counselor;After the War of the Stones, Moulder continued to serve the royal family of Frelia. His wisdom served to guide  King Innes as it had served King Hayden before him.
if;game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['SyreneAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['FordeAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['InnesAndVanessa'] != True
ending;Vanessa;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;She remained on active duty as an airborne knight in Frelia's army. Her beauty and determination became the standard to which her fellow knights aspired.
if;game.check_alive('Ross') and game.game_vars['GarciaAndRoss'] != True and game.game_vars['RossAndAmelia'] != True

ending;Ross;Ross, His Father's Son;He returned to Ide, village of his youth, and helped rebuild it after the bandit attack that brought it to ruin. Years later, he set out on his own to perfect his fighting skill and hone both body and spirit.
if;game.check_alive('Garcia') and game.check_alive('Ross') and game.game_vars['GarciaAndRoss'] == True

paired_ending;Garcia;Ross;Garcia, the Warrior Reborn;Ross, His Father's Son;Father and son returned to Ide, where they toiled together to rebuild their village. Ross grew to become a greater warrior than even his father. When he himself had a son, that child continued his family’s legacy.

ending;Garcia;Garcia, the Warrior Reborn;He returned to Ide to help with its reconstruction after the bandit attack. Afterward, he reenlisted in the army, serving Renais as a troop leader. His strength, valor, and experience inspired many.

ending;Colm;Colm, Good-Natured Thief;He politely refused an invitation to become a spy for Renais, returning instead to his hometown. He spent the rest of his days as a chivalrous rogue helping those in need from the shadows.
if;game.check_alive('Neimi') and and game.check_alive('Colm') and game.game_vars['ColmAndNeimi'] == True

paired_ending;Colm;Neimi;Colm, Good-Natured Thief;Neimi, the Tearful Archer;The childhood friends became lovers first, then husband and wife. Worried for Neimi’s well-being, Colm gave up his adventurer’s ways. Neimi passed on her grandfather’s skill in archery to her own son and daughter.

ending;Neimi;Neimi, the Tearful Archer;She returned to her village and passed her days in peace and quiet. Years later, she traveled to the capital of Renais as an archery instructor for their military. She never could resist a good cry.

ending;Artur;Artur, Saint of Light;Artur moved to Renais to help rebuild the shattered country. He worked without rest to ease the pain and grief of those who suffered during the war. His self-sacrifice made him into a folk hero among the peasantry.
if;game.check_alive('Lute') and game.check_alive('Artur') and game.game_vars['ArturAndLute'] == True

paired_ending;Artur;Lute;Artur, Saint of Light;Lute, Prodigy;Artur and Lute were married upon their return. Artur handled the housework, but otherwise, their lives were unchanged. When they had a son, Lute’s interests shifted from studying Artur to studying her son’s baffling habits.
elif;game.check_alive('Lute') and game.game_vars['ArturAndLute'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndLute'] != True

ending;Lute;Lute, Prodigy;After the War of the Stones, Lute returned to  Renais to continue her arcane studies. She  spent far less time locked in her library, preferring now to explore the outside world. She grew into a great and well-traveled sage.
if;game.check_alive('Natasha') and game.check_alive('Seth') and game.game_vars['SethAndNatasha'] == True

paired_ending;Seth;Natasha;Seth, the Silver Knight;Natasha, Sacred Healer;Natasha returned to Renais with Seth, where the two were wed. The reconstruction of Renais kept them busy, but when all the work was done, they settled down to live their days in peace and happiness.
elif;game.check_alive('Natasha') and game.game_vars['SethAndNatasha'] != True and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndNatasha'] != True

ending;Natasha;Natasha, Sacred Healer;Once the war was over, Natasha returned to Grado to help rebuild the empire. She dedicated herself to easing the grief of those families that lost soldiers during the war.
if;game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.check_alive('Natasha') and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndNatasha'] == True

paired_ending;Joshua;Natasha;Joshua, the Tempest King;Natasha, Sacred Healer;When Joshua returned to Jehanna, he took Natasha as his bride and claimed the throne as its rightful heir. Natasha was the perfect companion, and together, they carried the mighty desert nation to great glory.
elif;game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndNatasha'] != True and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndMarisa'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndJoshua'] != True

ending;Joshua;Joshua, the Tempest King;Joshua returned to Jehanna and ruled over it as king. His skills as a leader had grown great, and Jehanna flourished as never before. He never outgrew his love of travel and games of chance.
if;game.check_alive('Forde') and game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['FordeAndVanessa'] == True

paired_ending;Forde;Vanessa;Forde, the Wild Knight;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;Forde’s love for Vanessa grew after the war, and although she loved him as well, she placed her duty to Frelia first. Undeterred, Forde moved to Frelia himself. Over time, the two were wed.
elif;game.check_alive('Forde') and game.game_vars['FordeAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndForde'] != True and game.game_vars['EirikaAndForde'] != True

ending;Forde;Forde, the Wild Knight;Upon Forde's return to Renais, his secret hobby of painting was discovered. He was commissioned as a court artist. His work grew popular, and his days became so busy that he often regretted his career change.
if;game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.check_alive('Lute') and game.game_vars['KyleAndLute'] == True

paired_ending;Kyle;Lute;Kyle, Ardent Knight;Lute, Prodigy;After the war, Kyle and Lute were married in Renais. Kyle’s friends were disturbed by his choice of brides, but they could not deny his happiness. Before long, they had a son, and Kyle dedicated himself to his upbringing.
elif;game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.check_alive('Forde') and game.game_vars['KyleAndForde'] == True

paired_ending;Kyle;Forde;Kyle, Ardent Knight;Forde, the Wild Knight;Sometimes, the greatest friends also differ greatly in personality. When Kyle and Forde returned home, they were celebrated in song and story. They lived their days in happiness, as dearest friends and toughest rivals.
elif;game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.game_vars['KyleAndLute'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndForde'] != True and game.game_vars['KyleAndSyrene'] != True
ending;Kyle;Kyle, Ardent Knight;His service to the royal family of Renais continued without change. He became a battalion commander and gained much trust and responsibility for training new recruits.
if;game.check_alive('Tana') and game.game_vars['EirikaAndTana'] != True and game.game_vars['EphraimAndTana'] != True and game.game_vars['CormagAndTana'] != True
ending;Tana;Tana, Winged Queen;Tana lived happily in the prosperous post- war Frelia. She flew to Renais often to visit her dear friend Eirika.
if;game.check_alive('Innes') and game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['InnesAndVanessa'] == True

paired_ending;Innes;Vanessa;Innes, King and Strategician;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;At Innes’s request, Vanessa moved into Castle Frelia where she continued her duties as a knight of the realm. Thereafter, they had a child and lived happily with the blessing of all around them.
elif;game.check_alive('Innes') and game.game_vars['InnesAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['InnesAndEirika'] != True and game.game_vars['LarachelAndInnes'] != True

ending;Innes;Innes, King and Strategician;As time went on, he succeeded his father, Hayden, as king of Frelia. His resourcefulness and tactical prowess helped him build a court of loyal vassals that served to lead the country to greater prosperity.
if;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.check_alive('Gilliam') and game.game_vars['GilliamAndSyrene'] == True

paired_ending;Gilliam;Syrene;Silent Gilliam;Graceful Syrene;Gilliam and Syrene returned to Frelia, where they were married. All agreed they were a perfect match, and their union was blessed by the crown and the order of knights. The two continued their unwavering service together.
elif;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.check_alive('Vanessa') and game.game_vars['SyreneAndVanessa'] == True

paired_ending;Syrene;Vanessa;Graceful Syrene;Vanessa, Dutiful Rider;Sisters Syrene and Vanessa returned to Frelia after the war for a long-overdue talk. They talked of love and war, of friends now gone. Together, they renewed their bond as siblings and vowed never to let that bond fail.
elif;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.check_alive('Kyle') and game.game_vars['KyleAndSyrene'] == True

paired_ending;Kyle;Syrene;Kyle, Ardent Knight;Graceful Syrene;After the war, Kyle visited Frelia, where he was greeted with a warm reception by Syrene. After the two retired, they were wed. They raised a daughter whose skill in martial arts and etiquette excelled.
elif;game.check_alive('Syrene') and game.game_vars['KyleAndSyrene'] != True and game.game_vars['SyreneAndVanessa'] != True and game.game_vars['GilliamAndSyrene'] != True
ending;Syrene;Graceful Syrene;Syrene continued as commander of Frelia's pegasus knights. Her grace and beauty in flight were the subject of many songs and paintings, and her popularity soared.
if;game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.check_alive('Franz') and game.game_vars['FranzAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Franz;Amelia;Franz the Faithful;Amelia, Rose of the War;Franz brought Amelia home with him to Renais. Amelia spent a short time in Renais’s army, but once she and Franz were married, she retired her commission. The two had a daughter who grew to be a great knight herself.
elif;game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.check_alive('Ross') and game.game_vars['RossAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Ross;Amelia;Ross, His Father's Son;Amelia, Rose of the War;Amelia traveled to Ross’s hometown, where she decided to remain. Over time, the two fell in love and were wed. Years later they had a son who grew into a warrior. As he grew in skill and strength, he surpassed even his father.

elif;game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.game_vars['RossAndAmelia'] != True and game.game_vars['FranzAndAmelia'] != True and game.game_vars['EwanAndAmelia'] != True and game.game_vars['DuesselAndAmelia'] != True

ending;Amelia;Amelia, Rose of the War;Following the war, she returned to Grado to assist in her country's reconstruction. She surrounded herself with new friends and used the strength she found on the battlefield to live her life in happiness.
if;game.check_alive('Duessel') and game.check_alive('Ameila') and game.game_vars['DuesselAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Duessel;Amelia;Duessel, Obsidian General;Amelia, Rose of the War;Upon their return to Grado, Duessel reunited Amelia with her mother. The two wept with joy, giving thanks to Duessel. Afterward, Amelia became the most trusted companion of the man once known as Obsidian.

ending;Duessel;Duessel, Obsidian General;Following the war, Duessel returned to Grado, where he was instrumental in its rebuilding. He spent his remaining years watching over Grado and sharing his wisdom with other nations as an expert combat instructor.

ending;Knoll;Knoll, Watcher of Darkness;Knoll returned to Grado, where he dedicated himself to rebuilding it and fulfilling Lyon's vision. When the country was restored to its former glory, he disappeared without a trace, never to be seen again.
if;game.check_alive('Cormag') and game.check_alive('Tana') and game.game_vars['CormagAndTana'] == True

paired_ending;Cormag;Tana;Cormag, Aloof Lanceman;Tana, Winged Queen;Cormag returned to Grado to assist in the reconstruction of his country. Shortly after, he left to wander on his own. Tana spent years looking for him. In time, she found him and knighted him in Frelia’s service.

ending;Cormag;Cormag, Aloof Lanceman;Cormag returned to Grado to assist in the reconstruction of his country. Shortly after, he left to wander on his own. When he reappeared, he rejoined the army not as a knight but as a common soldier.
if;game.check_alive('Larachel') and game.check_alive('Innes') and game.game_vars['LarachelAndInnes'] == True

paired_ending;L'arachel;Innes;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;Innes, King and Strategician;Stories tell of the sparks that flew between L’Arachel and Innes when they first met. As the love between them flourished, so too did the bond that united their two nations.
elif;game.check_alive('Larachel') and game.game_vars['LarachelAndDozla'] != True and game.game_vars['EphraimAndLarachel'] != True and game.game_vars['LarachelAndInnes'] != True

ending;Larachel;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;She succeeded her uncle as ruler of the Rausten Theocracy several years after the war ended. She never lost her...unique perspective on life. She spent much of her rule visiting the neighboring countries.
if;game.check_alive('Dozla') and game.check_alive('Larachel') and game.game_vars['LarachelAndDozla'] == True

paired_ending;L'arachel;Dozla;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;Dozla of the Steady Axe;L’Arachel was, in time, made queen of Rausten, with Dozla at her side, as always. Later, Dozla wept like a baby when L’Arachel was wed. His emotional outburst is remembered as much as, if not more than, the ceremony itself.
ending;Dozla;Dozla of the Steady Axe;As L'Arachel rose to become queen, he remained by her side. Watching L'Arachel grow to become the queen she was destined to be was Dozla's greatest joy in life.

ending;Rennac;Rennac, Rich "Merchant";L'Arachel summoned Rennac back to Rausten, and he was forced to return. He was never able to escape his service to the self- centered princess who became queen. Admittedly, he didn't try very hard.
if;game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.game_vars['GerikAndJoshua'] == True

paired_ending;Gerik;Joshua;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Joshua, the Tempest King;After the war, Joshua challenged Gerik to a duel in hopes of pressing him to move to Jehanna. The match ended in a tie, but Gerik was impressed by Joshua’s swagger. From that day forward, Gerik never left Joshua’s side.
elif;game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.game_vars['GerikAndJoshua'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndTethys'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndMarisa'] != True

ending;Gerik;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Gerik continued as a mercenary. Over the years, his reputation grew so great that he had more job offers than he could handle. One day, without warning, he left, never to return.
if;game.check_alive('Tethys') and game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.game_vars['GerikAndTethys'] == True

paired_ending;Gerik;Tethys;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Tethys, Beloved Dancer;Gerik and Tethys remained bound to no nation and beholden to no authority. They bought themselves a leisurely retirement. Gerik taught fencing to city youths, and Tethys found many stages on which to dance.
ending;Tethys;Tethys, Beloved Dancer;She danced from city to city, and the entire continent became her stage. Her fame grew and grew, and large crowds gathered wherever she performed.
if;game.check_alive('Ewan') and game.check_alive('Amelia') and game.game_vars['EwanAndAmelia'] == True

paired_ending;Ewan;Amelia;Ewan, Enthusiastic Student;Amelia, Rose of the War;After the war, Ewan and Amelia set out, as promised, on a trip around the world. Their deeds along the way made small legends in the regions they visited. In time, Amelia gave birth to a daughter, and they settled down.
elif;game.check_alive('Ewan') and  game.game_vars['SalehAndEwan'] != True and game.game_vars['EwanAndAmelia'] != True

ending;Ewan;Ewan, Enthusiastic Student;Ewan continued his studies, modeling his life after the teachings of Saleh. Eventually, his education branched off into different paths. His insatiable curiosity led him on a trip to explore the world.
if;game.check_alive('Marisa') and game.check_alive('Joshua') and game.game_vars['JoshuaAndMarisa'] == True

paired_ending;Joshua;Marisa;Joshua, the Tempest King;Marisa, the Crimson Flash;Joshua returned to Jehanna with Marisa, where she pledged service to the crown and became the top swordfighter in the land. Joshua still loved games of chance, but when it came to Marisa, she was ever the winner.
elif;game.check_alive('Marisa') and game.check_alive('Gerik') and game.game_vars['GerikAndMarisa'] == True

paired_ending;Gerik;Marisa;Gerik, the Desert Tiger;Marisa, the Crimson Flash;Gerik remained a mercenary, and Marisa became his company’s fencing instructor. Gerik returned the affection she gave him, although he was troubled to learn she was clumsy at everything but fighting.
elif;game.check_alive('Marisa') and  game.game_vars['JoshuaAndMarisa'] != True and game.game_vars['GerikAndMarisa'] != True
ending;Marisa;Marisa, the Crimson Flash;Marisa became battalion leader for an elite mercenary force. Many men sought to challenge her to a duel, and none of them stood up to her blade.
if;game.check_alive('Saleh') and game.check_alive('Ewan") and game.game_vars['SalehAndEwan'] == True

paired_ending;Saleh;Ewan;Saleh, the Well of Wisdom;Ewan, Enthusiastic Student;Master and student returned to Caer Pelyn to study in peace. Ewan worked hard, and in time, his power grew to rival Saleh’s. As equals, the two continued their studies together and expanded their knowledge ever more.
elif;game.check_alive('Saleh') and game.game_vars['SalehAndEwan'] != True and game.game_vars['EirikaAndSaleh'] != True and game.game_vars['SalehAndMyrrh'] != True

ending;Saleh;Saleh, the Well of Wisdom;Saleh returned to Caer Pelyn, where he remained a faithful servant of the Manakete. His days were not spent in isolation, though. Many of the friends he met during the War of the Stones came to visit his village.
if;game.check_alive('Myrrh') and game.check_alive('Saleh") and game.game_vars['SalehAndMyrrh'] == True

paired_ending;Myrrh;Saleh;Myrrh, the Great Dragon;Saleh, the Well of Wisdom;Myrrh returned to Darkling Woods, but at Saleh’s request, she eventually moved to Caer Pelyn. In time, the townsfolk learned to treat her not as the Great Dragon but rather as a normal girl, and she was happy.
elif;game.check_alive('Myrrh') and game.game_vars['EphraimAndMyrrh'] != True and game.game_vars['SalehAndMyrrh'] != True

elif;game.game_vars['EirikaAndSaleh'] != True and game.game_vars['EirikaAndSeth'] != True and game.game_vars['EirikaAndForde'] != True and game.game_vars['EirikaAndTana'] != True and game.game_vars['InnesAndEirika'] != True

ending;Eirika;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Eirika returned to Renais and began the reconstruction effort with her brother, Ephraim. Seeing peace return to the lives of her people filled her with happiness. Her smile became a symbol of her people's joy.

paired_ending;Eirika;Ephraim;Eirika, Restoration Queen;Ephraim, Restoration King;Busy days awaited Eirika and Ephraim as they struggled to rebuild Renais. Their work gave new hope to those ravaged by the war, and with Eirika’s constant help, Ephraim grew to be a trusted and honorable king.

paired_ending;Ephraim;Myrrh;Ephraim, Restoration King;Myrrh, the Great Dragon;After the war, Ephraim returned to Renais and Myrrh to Darkling Woods. They both turned their attention to their respective duties but never forgot one another. Though Myrrh never again left Darkling Woods, Ephraim often visited her.

paired_ending;Ephraim;Larachel;Ephraim, Restoration King;L'Arachel, Queen of Light;Ephraim and L’Arachel each returned home after the war, but L’Arachel visited Renais often. Over time, the two were wed. Their marriage threw Rausten into turmoil, but L’Arachel’s self-centeredness carried the day.

paired_ending;Ephraim;Tana;Ephraim, Restoration King;Tana, Winged Queen;Once Renais was stable again, Ephraim and Tana were wed. Innes protested vocally, but when he saw how happy Tana was, he gave the marriage his blessings. Renais and Frelia are now bound by blood as well as friendship.

ending;Ephraim;Ephraim, Restoration King;Busy days awaited him upon his return to Renais. He oversaw the rebuilding not only of his own country but also of the entire continent of Magvel. His work was difficult, but his success made him a legend.
