name: Ch.4BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Eirika;Pardon, but I'm not sure we have ever met before?
speak;Anna;Oh dear.|Didn't my sister tell you about me coming?
speak;Eirika;I'm sorry, but you must have mistaken me with someone else.
speak;Anna;You're Princess Eirika correct?|My sister told me how much of a help you were in Elyos!
speak;Eirika;How do you know my identity?
speak;Eirika;Are you an assassin sent out to get me?
speak;Anna;Oh no!|I am no assassin!|There must have been sort of mistake!|I am a traveling merchant that was hoping to open a store in Magvel.|But I must have went to the wrong Magvel...

speak;Anna;Er...Umm...|Forget I said that.|Here, take this and just forget this whole conversation happened.|For some reason I can't get this to work for me here.|Maybe it works for this world's inhabitants?|If so maybe I can sell this junk.
speak;Anna;Er...|Ok, I better go now!|Bye bye!
speak;Eirika;I wonder what in the world that was about?...

name: Ch.5BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Artur;Ok Father Moulder.|I believe we have gathered everything the Princess has asked of us.
speak;Moulder;I believe so too, young Artur.|Thank you for your help. It soothes my soul that there's a good young lad like you out there.
speak;Artur;No no, I should be thanking you.|I'm happy to have this opportunity to learn from such a wise priest.
speak;Moulder;Oh ho ho, you humor me young one!|I'm just a simple priest who is doing what is right.
speak;Bandit1;Hold it right there you two!|Give me all of your gold if you know what's good for you.
speak;Artur;Father!|He has some dangerous looking brass knuckles!|Should I use my light magic to dispatch him?
speak;Bandit1;Are you gonna give me the money or not, old man?!
speak;Moulder;...Hit me with your best shot.
speak;Bandit1;You asked for it, old man!
speak;Moulder;...Is that all?|Let me show you a real punch.
speak;Moulder;Of course young Artur.|He will need a lot of training before he can cause any real damage.
speak;Artur;You took that hit like a boulder!|And look how far he flew!|Are you sure that was ok to do?
speak;Moulder;Sometimes the Divines know that it takes a hard hit to teach someone a lesson.|You just need to have faith young Artur.|I'll go patch him up and straighten him out.|Wait here for me.
alert;Artur's STR Growth has increased by 20!
alert;Moulder's STR Growth has increased by 20!
alert;Moulder's DEF Growth has increased by 20!
alert;Moulder's RES Growth has increased by 20!

name: Ch.5BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Lute;Don't tell me you're actually still going to hold the winter festival, are you?
speak;Artur;I was selected this year to be the representative, so I want to do my best.|I cannot back out now.
speak;Lute;So what do you need my help for then?

speak;Artur;I need you to judge my light magic.|It needs to be good enough for the festival.|I'm going to try to make glowing snowflakes.|The snowflakes should illuminate the area.|I want to make it feel very magical for the participants.
speak;Lute;I see.|Very well, I'll tell you what I think then.
speak;Artur;Perfect, thank you Lute.|I appreciate your honest feedback.
speak;Lute;Your stance is all wrong.|If you're going to be casting this spell for so long, you need a stance more like this.
speak;Lute;We are going to be here a long time...
speak;Lute;Ok, I think this will be good enough now...
speak;Artur;...Finally...|I think I'm about to fall over...
speak;Lute;I'm sorry Artur...|You did a good job though...|I'm looking forward to the winter festival...
alert;Lute and Artur have gotten closer!
alert;Artur gained WEXP in light magic!

name: Ch.5BaseConvo3
_source: speak;Garcia;Looking for a new weapon there, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;Hmm...|Yes, I've looked at a couple of stores, but I'm not sure what I should buy...
speak;Garcia;You are a Pegasus Knight, right?|You're most familiar with a lance then, correct?
speak;Vanessa;Correct, it is the weapon I feel the most comfortable with.
speak;Garcia;So you probably have the hardest time against axe fighters then.|If that's the case, I recommend this lance.
speak;Vanessa;An Axereaver!|Where did you find this?!
speak;Garcia;I'm good at finding weapons at these armories thanks to many years of experience.|I think this should help give you an edge against axes.
speak;Vanessa;Thank you General Garcia!|I appreciate it!
speak;Garcia;Please, just call me Garcia.|No need to be formal with me.
speak;Garcia;Yes, now go ahead and take that lance.|I'll take care of things here.
speak;Vanessa;Thank you!|You have my respect Gene-, er, Garcia!

name: Ch.5BaseConvo4
_source: speak;Ross;Wow!|Look at this town!|It's so big!|There are so many shops here!
speak;Colm;Don't get too excited there kid.|This isn't that big of a town!
speak;Ross;Hey!|I'm not a kid!|You don't even look that much older than me!|You're that Colm guy, right?|I heard you've been stealing stuff!
speak;Colm;Hey!|I've been stealing stuff from the bad guys!|No need to get mad at me!|I'm on your team!
speak;Ross;Oh really?|How can you steal while on the battlefield?
speak;Colm;That's a great question, friend!|You see, you've got to be quick, smart, and light!
speak;Colm;It's ok Neimi!|I was going to get you some jerky with the money I'll make from all this stuff!
speak;Ross;Jerky!|Now you're speaking my language!|Let me get in on that!
speak;Colm;Ok, you've got a deal!|I'll teach you the best tricks I know!

name: Ch.5BaseConvo5
_source: speak;Seth;Gilliam, I am aware it's your turn to count our supplies for this month.
speak;Gilliam;Correct, I'm just going through our war treasury right now.
speak;Seth;Excellent, how many bags of gold do we have remaining?
speak;Gilliam;It should be 5 bags, all right here.
speak;Seth;Why am I counting 6 bags instead of 5?
speak;Gilliam;...Please don't tell the princess about this...

name: Ch.5XBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Ephraim;Well Kyle, with supplies this low, we are gonna have to make this next battle count.
speak;Kyle;Agreed Prince Ephraim.|I hope we can scrape by.
speak;Anna;I'm Anna, a traveling merchant!|I'm here to make a deal with you.
speak;Kyle;A merchant, huh?|Prince Ephraim, this may be a good chance to resupply!
speak;Ephraim;You're right Kyle, this is a lucky break for us.|What wares do you have available?|We are in need of food and weapons.
speak;Anna;He he he, perfect!|I'm glad my sister's information was correct!|Now I can finally start making a profit!
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, I will let you handle selecting out the food.
speak;Anna;I also have someone for you to meet that might help you!
speak;Anna;Oh yes!|Ok you two!|Come on out!
speak;HorseyBoy;Indeed, though we don't think we were always this way.
speak;HorseyBoy;Indeed I did, though my sister here cannot speak.|So please don't consider her rude.
speak;HorseyBoy;I believe we aren't related by blood.|You see, we were experiments of some dark robed men.|Fortunately a dark robed man set us free.
speak;HorseyBoy;For what, I don't know.|My mind is all scrambled.|So there isn't much I can tell you...
speak;HorseyBoy;What I do know is that we have a friend in Renvall that we want to rescue.|Anna told us you were going there.|We want to join you.
speak;Ephraim;A friend...|I see...|If Anna trusted you, it should be ok...|But...
speak;Ephraim;All right, you two are in.|Keep a low profile though.|It's harder to lead a larger group for this operation.
speak;HorseyBoy;Well...|We don't have names yet...|If you need names, feel free to call us whatever you like.
speak;Ephraim;In that case, your names will be...
speak;Ephraim;Our operation needs a low body count.|I'm sorry, but I don't think I can win with you alongside us.
speak;HorseyBoy;I see...|While it saddens me to hear that, I understand.|We will see if we can find our friend another way...

name: Ch.5XBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Mercenary1;I saw you talk with that merchant...
speak;Ephraim;And who are you?|Speak carefully or meet your end by my lance.
speak;Mercenary1;Woah, woah, woah.|No need to get violent.|I just really want you to introduce me to that merchant...|I want to purchase some wares from her...
speak;Ephraim;Sorry there, but I don't know you.|Now I would recommend that you get out of here.|We've got other things to worry about than someone's shady requests.
speak;Mercenary1;All right, all right.|I'll make it worth your while then...|I think you will find this information useful.
speak;Ephraim;Ok, ok.|I'll introduce her to you.

speak;Mercenary1;Good....|Ok, here is the info.|<red>There is a secret lever by the southernmost pillar in the castle of Renvall.</>|<red>Pull on the lever and it will drain the water throughout the castle.</>|<red>Only the person on the throne will be able to survive the flood.</>|<red>You should be fine if you hide behind the pillars</>.|All right, I'll be waiting for you to introduce me to her.
speak;Ephraim;A secret lever?...|This might work well for us...
speak;Mercenary1;That's a shame...|I'll meet with her one way or another...

name: Ch.6BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Franz;Miss Lute!|May we take a minute of your time, please?
speak;Lute;Oh?|What would you two have in need of?
speak;Franz;We saw how you were using such amazing magic on the battlefield!|We were wondering if you could teach us some!|We have never seen such magic up this close until now.
speak;Lute;Oh, that magic?|It's just a basic spell that any mage can use.|If you study from a book, it should be as easy as breathing.
speak;Neimi;We were really hoping you could teach us!
speak;Lute;...Hmmm...|I'm not sure it would be worthy of my time...
speak;Artur;I think you should help them Lute.|You could also benefit from teaching them.
speak;Lute;What could I possibly learn that's not in a book?!
speak;Franz;I could train you some of the Renais knights' training regiments.|It's guaranteed to make you stronger!
speak;Lute;I have no interest in such things!
speak;Artur;How about I let you have this tome I bought if you help them out?
speak;Artur;I think this will benefit you all.
speak;Lute;It better be worth that book...
alert;Franz's MAG growth has increased by 25!
alert;Neimi's MAG growth has increased by 25!
alert;Lute's STR growth has increased by 25!

name: Ch.6BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Moulder;Good morning young lad.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Joshua;Yeah, I got a recommendation saying that you know a thing or two about magic.|Also, I heard that you can take a hit too.
speak;Moulder;I don't know where you heard that from.|Admittedly, you do learn a thing or two once you're my age.
speak;Joshua;That's what I like to hear!|I want you to teach me how magic works and how to take a hit from magic.
speak;Moulder;Why in the world are you interested now?
speak;Joshua;Let's just say I've got some...|Dealings coming in soon and I want to be prepared.
speak;Moulder;I see.|Unfortunately, I don't have time to teach you both.
speak;Joshua;I see...|Well, how about this.|We'll flip a coin and if it lands on heads, you teach me magic.|If it's tails, you teach me magic defense.|Ok?
speak;Moulder;I'm usually not one for chance, but it doesn't matter to me in this case.
speak;Joshua;All right then.|Let's see what lady luck has in store!
speak;Joshua;Looks like it was heads.|All right old man, teach me some magic.
speak;Moulder;I'm not that old, but I'll teach you a thing or two.
alert;Joshua's MAG growth has increased by 40!
speak;Joshua;Looks like it was tails.|All right old man, teach me how to take a magical blow.
speak;Moulder;I'm not that old, but I'll teach you a thing or two.|Now here I come.
alert;Joshua's RES growth has increased by 40!

name: Ch.6BaseConvo3
_source: speak;Ross;Hey, I finally found you pretty lady!
speak;Natasha;Pre-, pretty?!|Are you talking about me?!
speak;Ross;Of course!|You are the pretty lady I was looking for!
speak;Natasha;Oh, oh my!...|I'm not that pretty...
speak;Ross;Ha ha ha!|You're funny!|Of course you're pretty!
speak;Natasha;Why thank you, he he.|I'm just a simple cleric.|I've never thought myself as pretty...
speak;Ross;I see, though you do look pretty tiny...|Maybe I can help bulk you up!
speak;Natasha;Bulk me up?|What do you mean by that?
speak;Ross;I can help you train!|Put some muscle on you!
speak;Natasha;Oh...|I don't know about that...|I don't really want muscles...|I just want to help others with my magic...
speak;Ross;Oh!|You're good with magic?|Maybe you could teach me some then?|I don't mind learning from such a pretty lady!
speak;Natasha;Maybe?...|I don't know if I'm a good teacher...
speak;Natasha;Hmmmm...|Train Ross in magic or train my muscles?...
choice;NatashaRossTrain;Train Ross in magic, or train Natasha's muscles?;Train Ross,Train Natasha
speak;Natasha;I guess I can train you in some magic...
speak;Ross;Wow!|Thank you so much!|Let's get at it then pretty lady!
alert;Ross's MAG growth has increased by 40!
speak;Ross;You're taking too long lady!|Come on!|Let's go train!
alert;Natasha's STR growth has increased by 40!

name: Ch.6BaseConvo4
_source: speak;Garcia;All right, come out boy.|I know you're there...
speak;Colm;How did you know I was there?!|I didn't move at all!
speak;Garcia;I've raised Ross all these years, boy.|I can tell when a boy wants to cause trouble.
speak;Colm;Come on!|All I wanted was a little food!
speak;Garcia;You could've just asked if you wanted some more food...
speak;Colm;Where's the fun with that?!|I've got to keep up on my skills, you know?
speak;Garcia;Don't lie to me boy.|You wanted to give the food to someone else, didn't you?
speak;Colm;I, ugh...|Don't know what you're talking about...|I'm just a hungry boy, that's all!
speak;Garcia;Here, just take this bread and go, boy.|Try to do better next time.
speak;Colm;Um...|Thank you, I suppose.|I'll work on it...

name: Ch.6BaseConvo5
_source: speak;Vanessa;It looks like it's our turn to guard the supply tent.
speak;Gilliam;Yeah, glad to have you here with me.
speak;Vanessa;Thank you, I'm glad to work with you.
speak;Vanessa;Sorry Gilliam, I don't have much for conversation today...
speak;Gilliam;That's ok, I enjoy our time together.|Even the quiet times.

name: Arena_Mini_Boss
_source: speak;Arena Guy;I hate to break the news to you, but we're closed here too.|That scumbag Pablo has extorted everything from us.|You're always welcome to challenge the champ if you want though.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Larachel;Thank you so much for agreeing to help, Eirika, Ephraim!
speak;Eirika;We're happy to be of service to our friends, L'Arachel.|It's strange that these ruins just appeared out nowhere though.
speak;Ephraim;Indeed, I have never seen these kinds of ruins before.|What in the world happened here?

speak;Larachel;It's been a mystery to us too!|I've never seen or heard of these ruins in my whole life!|Our guards tried to investigate the ruins, but they were chased out by all the monsters lurking within.
speak;Seth;This could prove to be problematic for the neighboring countries.|The monsters could start migrating to unsuspecting villages.
speak;Ephraim;We must purge these ruins before it starts getting out of hand.
speak;Eirika;Agreed, but don't push yourself too hard brother...
speak;Larachel;Fear not!|As long as I am here, evil will cower in fear!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Seth;My lance is yours my liege.
speak;Ephraim;Alright everyone, prepare your weapons!|We march forward once I give the order!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Larachel;Thank you so much for agreeing to help, Eirika, Ephraim!
speak;Eirika;We're happy to be of service to our friends, L'Arachel.|It's strange that these ruins just appeared out nowhere though.
speak;Ephraim;Indeed, I have never seen these kinds of ruins before.|What in the world happened here?

speak;Larachel;It's been a mystery to us too!|I've never seen or heard of these ruins in my whole life!|Our guards tried to investigate the ruins, but they were chased out by all the monsters lurking within.
speak;Seth;This could prove to be problematic for the neighboring countries.|The monsters could start migrating to unsuspecting villages.
speak;Ephraim;We must purge these ruins before it starts getting out of hand.
speak;Eirika;Agreed, but don't push yourself too hard brother...
speak;Larachel;Fear not!|As long as I am here, evil will cower in fear!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Seth;My lance is yours my liege.
speak;Ephraim;Alright everyone, prepare your weapons!|We march forward once I give the order!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;Brother...|These ruins seem to go on forever...|Is there no end?
speak;Ephraim;I'm not sure if it ends either.|However, we have a duty to clear out all these monsters.
speak;Eirika;You're right brother.|We must stop this evil from coming into the world.
speak;Eirika;Where did that voice come from?
speak;???;Your bravery is needed, oh Twins of Fate...;top
speak;Ephraim;Are we needed to clear out this evil?
speak;???;You two have proven to destroy great evil, and we believe you can do it again.;top
speak;???;We are the spirits of those who tried to protect these ruins.|There is an ancient power here, but it will fall into the hands of evil soon if they aren't stopped.;top
speak;Ephraim;Is that so?|They must be stopped indeed if that is the case.|Can you tell us what evil has fallen upon these ruins?
speak;???;It is unclear to us, but they are aligned with some malevolent force and they have immense power.;top
speak;Eirika;How are we to stop such a force?
speak;???;Reach the bottom of the ruins and clear out the monsters.|You may take the treasure that is there. You have proven yourselves trustworthy.;top
speak;Ephraim;Understood, we will purge all evil from this land for good.
speak;???;We give our eternal thanks.|We will give you the remainder of our power to aid you in this trial.;top
alert;Eirika can now use Grand Sieglinde!;Grand_Sieglinde
alert;Ephraim can now use Grand Siegmund!;Grand_Siegmund
speak;Ephraim;I feel like I can take on anything.
speak;???;Please, Sacred Twins, purge the ruins.....;top
speak;Eirika;Yes, we will put your souls to rest.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;Brother...|These ruins seem to go on forever...|Is there no end?
speak;Ephraim;I'm not sure if it ends either.|However, we have a duty to clear out all these monsters.
speak;Eirika;You're right brother.|We must stop this evil from coming into the world.
speak;Eirika;Where did that voice come from?
speak;???;Your bravery is needed, oh Twins of Fate...;top
speak;Ephraim;Are we needed to clear out this evil?
speak;???;You two have proven to destroy great evil, and we believe you can do it again.;top
speak;???;We are the spirits of those who tried to protect these ruins.|There is an ancient power here, but it will fall into the hands of evil soon if they aren't stopped.;top
speak;Ephraim;Is that so?|They must be stopped indeed if that is the case.|Can you tell us what evil has fallen upon these ruins?
speak;???;It is unclear to us, but they are aligned with some malevolent force and they have immense power.;top
speak;Eirika;How are we to stop such a force?
speak;???;Reach the bottom of the ruins and clear out the monsters.|You may take the treasure that is there. You have proven yourselves trustworthy.;top
speak;Ephraim;Understood, we will purge all evil from this land for good.
speak;???;We give our eternal thanks.|We will give you the remainder of our power to aid you in this trial.;top
alert;Eirika can now use Grand Sieglinde!;Grand_Sieglinde
alert;Ephraim can now use Grand Siegmund!;Grand_Siegmund
speak;Ephraim;I feel like I can take on anything.
speak;???;Please, Sacred Twins, purge the ruins.....;top
speak;Eirika;Yes, we will put your souls to rest.

name: Outro
_source: alert;You have purged these ruins of evil!
speak;Eirika;Brother, I think that was the last of them.
speak;Ephraim;I think so too.|The air is starting to feel lighter.
speak;???;Oh Sacred Twins...|You have purged the evil from these ruins...|You have our eternal gratitude...;top
speak;Eirika;Why were there so many monsters here in the first place?

speak;???;The treasure that was located here...|Held a mysterious power that gave youth to those who drank it...|It never ran dry for many years, and would give its drinker unlimited potential...|There were those who desired it and used great evil magic to destroy our civilization...|We were able to seal the last of the water from that great evil, but it also sealed the forces that you have purged.|Thank you for doing what we could not...|You have proven yourself worthy of our final treasure...|There is just enough water to last for one year....;top
speak;Ephraim;We only did what would be good for the people of Magvel.|We will protect this land from any that would threaten to wreak havoc on it.
speak;Eirika;The forces that destroyed your civilization is gone forever...|Right?
speak;???;.....|That we are unsure of...|Our power wanes...|If it's still out there somewhere...|Please...|Destroy it...;top
music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;It will be ok Eirika.|As long as we are together, we can handle any threat that may come our way.
speak;Eirika;...You're right, brother.|Let's get out of here.|The others must be waiting for us.

name: Ch.9ABaseConvo1
_source: speak;Ross;It's the sea!|Wow!|I've never seen the sea before!
speak;Colm;Ha ha ha!|First time seeing the sea, huh, pipsqueak?
speak;Ross;Hey!|I'm not a pipsqueak!|I'm the son of a mighty warrior!
speak;Kyle;All right now, Colm.|Let's not cause a scene.
speak;Colm;Oh, it's all in good fun!|Right, Ross?
speak;Ross;I'm not sure I would call this my kind of fun.
speak;Colm;Ahhh, you'll come around.|Why are you so excited to see the sea anyway?
speak;Ross;Because I want to own a ship one day!|I want to go a grand adventure on the sea!
speak;Kyle;That's a good ambition to have there Ross.|I can see you being a mighty man of the sea.
speak;Ross;Thank you Kyle!|You'll see once I become as strong as my dad!
speak;Colm;Haha, just don't spend too much on the water or you might become one of those <red>Lizard Pirates</>.
speak;Ross;A <red>Lizard Pirate?</> There are Lizard Pirates out there?|That's a joke, right?
speak;Lute;May I intervene?|I have actually read about pirates that have gained the traits of a Lizard while at sea.|It seems to be due to the mana in the fish the pirates eat during a voyage.
speak;Ross;Really?!|So if I eat those fish, I'll gain the same strength?!
speak;Kyle;Possibly.|I have actually seen some boats with some strange men on them.|I thought I was just seeing things, but that might explain what I saw.
speak;Colm;When I was out selling some goods I stole, I have seen some cloaked men by the port with scaly hands.|It might be true afterall...
speak;Lute;Interesting, maybe I should do some more research on this phenomenon...
speak;Ross;That settles it!|I've got to see if I can find some of those fish!|What were those fish called?|Huh?|Where did she go?|Wait up for me!
speak;Kyle;So Colm.|You were selling some stolen goods, huh?

name: Ch.9ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Natasha;All right, that should do it.
speak;Seth;Thank you lady Natasha.|This feels better already.
speak;Natasha;That was such a terrible wound...|It's a miracle you survived...
speak;Seth;Is that so?|Everything went by so quickly that I didn't have time to think about it.
speak;Natasha;Well, please take care of yourself...
speak;Natasha;I would hate to see any more people hurt...
speak;Seth;This is war...|But I will do my best to end it quickly.
speak;Natasha;Oh!|I just remembered!|I was told to give this to you once you were healed up some more!
speak;Seth;My special lance!|Yes, I should be able to wield this again now.|Thank you Natasha. This might help me on the battlefield.
speak;Natasha;You're welcome sir Seth.|Please just be safe...
alert;Seth's growths and stats have increased!
alert;Seth can now use his signature lance!

name: Ch.9ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Eirika;Forde, Kyle.|Thank you so much for helping me out on Ephraim's behalf...
speak;Forde;Don't sweat it Princess!|Prince Ephraim wanted us to help you!|So helping you is helping him!
speak;Kyle;Correct.|It should ease his mind, knowing that we are with you.
speak;Eirika;That is good if it keeps him from worrying...|Well, is there anything you two would like to report before we continue onwards?
speak;Kyle;We are still unfamiliar with your fighting style...|It may benefit us if we were to get a first hand experience how you fight.
speak;Eirika;You want to spar with me?
speak;Forde;Yeah!|Unless you're not up to it?
speak;Eirika;I will not refuse a challenge!|All right you two, get your weapons ready!
speak;Kyle;She may be more like Ephraim than we thought!

name: Ch.9ABaseConvo4
_source: speak;Tana;Vanessa!|Gilliam!|Father Moulder!|I'm so happy to see you're all alive!
speak;Moulder;Be at peace Princess.|We cannot fall yet with the duty your father has left us.
speak;Gilliam;Moulder is right.|We wouldn't want to make you sad either.
speak;Tana;Awwww....|You guys are the best...|I'm going to cry...
speak;Vanessa;Don't cry princess!|How about we all have a good old Frelian dish together?|That should raise our spirits!
speak;Gilliam;Now I can get behind that.
speak;Tana;Fabulous!|This will be a great feast!

name: Ch.9ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Joshua;Hmmm...|I think I could get used to being by the sea...|It's a lot better than being in sand all the time...
speak;Joshua;I have a feeling trouble is approaching...
speak;Larachel;Excuse me sir!|I'm looking for a man who must be lost!|He has brown hair, likes to sneak around, and is mildly handsome.|Have you seen him around?
speak;Joshua;I'm sorry there pretty lady.|Can't say that I have.
speak;Larachel;Oooo, that Rennac!|Where in the world could he have gone off to!|*Sigh* Well, thank you sir.|If you see him around, please let me know...
speak;Joshua;Why do I get the feeling that she was royalty?...|I'm glad she went away though. That was a close one...|The last thing I need is more royalty to deal with...

name: Ch.4BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Garcia;No son.|As long as we live, so does the village.
speak;Garcia;It will be a lot of hard work, but we can rebuild it.|Even bigger than before.
speak;Garcia;Indeed, son.|I'm thinking we can build a memorial for your mother as well.
speak;Ross;Oh!|That's a great idea Dad!|We can even put Mom's favorite flowers around it!
speak;Garcia;That's a good idea son.|This time maybe I can carve out a figure of your mom's favorite wyvern too.
speak;Garcia;Indeed.|...Ross, It's about time I tell you something about our village.

speak;Garcia;It was way back in my military years.|There was an attempt to try to raise wyverns in Renais.|It was to show an act of goodwill between Renais and Grado.|The area they chose to try to raise the wyverns was right by our village.

speak;Garcia;Yes.|The nearby mountains are similar to what the wyverns in Grado are raised in.|Unfortunately, it was still too different and difficult to raise them there.|Your mother was the caretaker of the project.|She tried her hardest to raise them nice and strong.|But in the end the project was considered a failure.
speak;Garcia;She loved seeing them fly and play.|It broke her heart seeing them struggle to live in the Renais mountains...|We had to bring them back before they suffered anymore...
speak;Ross;I bet she did the best she could though!
speak;Garcia;Indeed she did.|She cried as she saw her favorite wyvern be taken away...
speak;Ross;Well, if I ever get a chance, I'll try to ride a wyvern!
speak;Garcia;Ha ha ha!|Well, if you're anything like your mom, you will be an excellent rider!
speak;Ross;Thanks Dad!|So what was the name of mom's favorite wyvern?
speak;Garcia;Ha ha ha!|He was such a young spirited, hotheaded wyvern with great potential!|Just like a little boy I know!
speak;Ross;Hey!|I'm not a little boy anymore!|You also didn't say his name!
speak;Garcia;One day you'll figure it out, my son!

name: Ch.4BaseConvo3
_source: speak;Moulder;Vanessa...|What is with all these weapons and books laying around?
speak;Vanessa;Father Moulder...|I'm pondering over some training...
speak;Moulder;Training?|Why are you pondering over training?
speak;Vanessa;I was just thinking...|Princess Tana is pretty talented magic wise, and my sister Syrene is pretty strong...|I feel like I lack both...
speak;Moulder;Oh, you doubt yourself.|You punish yourself too much.|Be confident!|You are strong in your own way!
speak;Vanessa;But I want to be better...|What do you think Father Moulder?|Should I train my body or my mind more?
speak;Moulder;Hmmmmm...|I would say training in both would be wise.|Though I don't think that's the answer you're looking for...|What is your heart telling you?
choice;VanessaChoice;Train in STR or MAG for Vanessa?;STR,MAG
speak;Vanessa;I will train like my sister.|It has always been my dream to be like her.
speak;Moulder;I'm glad to see your dedication to be like your sister.|Though, always remember that we love you for who you are too.

name: GenericPostPromotion
_source: #Runs after a unit promotes (still on promo screen)
speak;Eirika;She is looking at me with such warmth...|Riding her, I feel faster already!|Wait for me Lyon, I'm coming for you!
speak;Eirika;I remember Lyon teaching me some spells.|Pull some magic from one's self and.....
speak;Eirika;Wow!|I was able to cast a spell!|I think I have a talent for magic!
speak;Eirika;This pegasus looks so regal...|Am I worthy to ride such a beautiful steed?|...hm?|She seems to want me to ride her...|Well then.|We will take to the skies!
speak;Eirika;This was my mother's rider armor...|She was so elegant when riding her steed...
speak;Eirika;I must strive to become better, as the princess of Renais!|Thank you mother, thank you father.|I promise Ephraim and I will make you proud!
speak;Eirika;This blade is so big...|I'm not used a weapon so heavy, could be dangerous...
speak;Eirika;It cut a stump in half...|I'll have to be extra careful...
speak;Eirika;Hmmmm....|I remember reading a book about a noble archer princess.|How elegant!|Ephraim will be surprised how graceful I am, hehe!
speak;Eirika;I do miss my armor, but magic runs through these clothes.|For the people of Renais, I will fight!
speak;Eirika;I've mastered both light and dark magic...|I can use it to hide and attack from behind...|I must not abuse this power...|Lyon wouldn't want me to be corrupted by power...
speak;Eirika;This wyvern is so scary...|Am I really able to ride you?...
speak;Eirika;No, I will ride you for Lyon.|No matter how scary you are, I will do what it takes to save Lyon...

speak;Eirika;Wow!|This pegasus is as dark as the night sky!|I've heard these breed of Pegasus are very rare and powerful.|So rare that even a king might be too poor to afford...|How did you find your way to me then?...
speak;Eirika;This light...|It's so warm...|I feel so angelic.
speak;Eirika;Would Ephraim still recognize me? Hehe.|I can't wait to show him this.
speak;Eirika;Lyon also taught me Dark magic, but...|Something doesn't feel right...
speak;Eirika;Can I use this power to save you Lyon?....
speak;Eirika;It's a long shot, but maybe I can combine it with my Light magic?|I will study hard like Lyon!
speak;Seth;This light, it's befitting of a Paladin.|As a knight of Renais, I must strive to be a guiding light for others.
speak;Seth;Now this is some strong armor.|Though a little bit on the heavy side.|I'll be able to handle it...
speak;Seth;I do have more respect for Gilliam now however...
speak;Seth;I feel such power on this steed.|I will cut down anyone who dares to attack my liege!|Now, we ride forth!
speak;Seth;A Crusader, the bane of monsters.|I will cut down evil with swift justice.|No mercy, no hesitation.
speak;Seth;The Silver Knight, a title of the highest discipline.
speak;Seth;King Fado would've been so proud to see this...
speak;Seth;I will make you proud King Fado.|Eirika, Ephraim, my lance and light are yours!
speak;Seth;The Silver Knight, a title of the highest discipline.
speak;Seth;King Fado would've been so proud to see this...
speak;Seth;I will make you proud King Fado.|Eirika, Ephraim, my lance and light are yours!
speak;Seth;A Duke Knight is a knight of the people.|For Renais, her people will have no enemies with my lance and blade around.|Now, to the battlefield!
speak;Seth;A Duke Knight is a knight of the people.|For Renais, her people will have no enemies with my lance and blade around.|Now, to the battlefield
speak;Seth;I feel invincible in this armor.|I think I could take a ballista shot just fine.|I will be the shield of Renais and never falter!
speak;Seth;I feel invincible in this armor.|I think I could take a ballista shot just fine.|I will be the shield of Renais and never falter!
speak;Seth;Barrier magic.|If needs be, I will protect the princess with everything I've got.|Leave it to me.
speak;Seth;Now this is a little.....Unorthodox...|But I can tell this beast is loyal and courageous.|I will name you Njar, and together we will fight for Renais!|Njar!|Press forward!
speak;Seth;Now this is a little.....Unorthodox...|But I can tell this beast is loyal and courageous.|I will name you Njar, and together we will fight for Renais!|Njar!|Press forward!
speak;Franz;I feel a lot stronger!|All this hard work has been put to good use!|All right, let's get out there and get to work!
speak;Franz;This armor sure is heavy...|But, it's not too bad!|I'll just have to double my efforts!
speak;Franz;I finally did it...|I'm offically part of Renais' army now...
speak;Franz;Wow!|A Paladin!|I feel so chivalrous!|Forde will be so surprised to see me be such a strong knight!|I need to show him as soon as I can.
speak;Franz;Oh, a Ranger!|I remember seeing them ride by home all the time!|They are so swift and strong!|Now, let's see if I can get a hang of this bow...
speak;Franz;Whoops!|I almost hit someone with an arrow...|I better keep practicing...
speak;Franz;Magic huh?|Lute said I might have a talent for it...
speak;Franz;Oh wow!|I think Lute was right!
speak;Franz;I need to put out that fire...
speak;Franz;Magic huh?|Lute said I might have a talent for it...
speak;Franz;Oh wow!|I think Lute was right!
speak;Franz;I need to put out that fire...
speak;Franz;This horse sure is strong!|Being able to carry me and all this armor!|I'll make sure to give you extra rations for your hard work!
speak;Franz;Hmmmm...|I'm pretty good with one sword, and I think I can use magic...|What if I was good with TWO swords and magic?|Well, let's give it a try and see!
speak;Franz;This armor is pretty strong...|What if I combined some magic with armor?|Hmmmm...|Let's see how this goes!
speak;Franz;I can still run even in armor like this!|I've become so strong!|Now only if I could see out of this helmet better...
speak;Franz;Wow...|I'm a hero...|I wonder what my father and Forde would think of this?...|I'll do my best to live to their expectations!
speak;Franz;I feel such righteous fury!|All monsters, fear me!|I'm unstoppable now!
speak;Franz;This blade is so massive.....|I can barely hold it up...|I don't want to disappoint General Seth, so I better do some more training!
speak;Franz;I've gotten pretty good with barrier magic!|I feel like a master of blade and book!|Forde will be so jealous haha!
speak;Franz;A Silver Knight...|Am I as strong as General Seth now?...
speak;Franz;Forde...Mother...Father...|I'm sure you're proud of what I've become...|I will strive to be the best knight ever...
speak;Franz;I'm so high in the air!|This elephant is amazing!|I can see the whole battlefield now!
speak;Franz;Oh, I almost fell off...|That was a close one...
speak;Franz;I'm so high in the air!|This elephant is amazing!|I can see the whole battlefield now!
speak;Franz;Oh, I almost fell off...|That was a close one...
speak;Franz;This is some fancy technology here...|I know if I pull the wrong thing it might explode...|So I should only fight when necessary.
speak;Franz;I wonder what this lever does though?...
speak;Franz;This blade is so massive.....|I can barely hold it up...|I don't want to disappoint General Seth, so better do some more training!

speak;Franz;There is so much corruption around us...
speak;Franz;If only I was strong to stop them...|Stop all of them...|So they never dare pop up again...
speak;Franz;I feel so strong and heroic!|Like I've reached my peak!|But I can't stop moving forward!|Not until the fight is won!
speak;Franz;A great combination of armor, weapons, and speed.|I'll be an effective knight on the field!
speak;Franz;Now this is a strong shield!|I'll feel safe with this in my hand!|I don't fear charging into battle now!
speak;Franz;Now that I've mastered using two swords, I think it's time to step it up.|With these two massive blades, I will be unstoppable.|I will be victorious.
speak;Franz;Now THIS is a massive blade!|I never dreamed I could wield a weapon like this.|But now, it's in my grasp.|Now, let's get swinging.
speak;Franz;I've gotten pretty good with barrier magic!|I feel like a master of blade and book!|Forde will be so jealous haha!
speak;Franz;This black armor...|I feel something from it...|Great power, but something sad...|Am I worthy of wearing something like this?
speak;Franz;I'm so tall and strong!|I feel invincible!|Come, my enemies!|Break yourselves upon my body!
speak;Franz;Look at this magnificent horse!|We will make a great team!|Now, let's go and prove ourselves!
speak;Franz;I've gotten pretty good with barrier magic!|I feel like a master of blade and book!|Forde will be so jealous haha!
speak;Franz;This is so amazing!|I've never been on an elephant before!|I feel so tall!
speak;Franz;Woah!|Almost fell off...|I hope no one saw that...
speak;Franz;I feel so...excited...|I will be so strong.|I will bring glory!|Father, Forde!|Watch me as I crush my enemies to glory!
speak;Franz;I feel so...excited...|I will be so strong.|I will bring glory!|Father, Forde!|Watch me as I crush my enemies to glory!
speak;Franz;A marshall...|One of the highest honors as a knight of Renais.|I will become a pillar that holds up Renais!|Steadfast and immovable!
speak;Franz;This black armor...|I feel something from it...|Great power, but something sad...|Am I worthy to wear something like this?

speak;Franz;This armor feels...different...|Like I want to stay on the battlefield longer.|This power is kind of scary, but I can't let it control me.|My father wouldn't let power corrupt him, so I will do the same!
speak;Gilliam;Wow, what a mighty steed.|Being able to carry me in all this armor.|I feel like I can fight a lot better, thanks to you.
speak;Gilliam;I better give you some extra feed as thanks.....
speak;Gilliam;This is some mighty armor.|Before I wouldn't be able to fight in this armor, but now I'm strong enough to do so.|Now, time to do my duty.|For Frelia!
speak;Gilliam;Hmmmmm....This is quite a cannon.|I think I have a keen enough eye for this.|My armor will really help with the kick back too.|Let's see how this goes.
speak;Gilliam;I hope I don't scare anyone with this armor...|It just really helps against magic attacks...|I'm not a monster...|I swear...
speak;Gilliam;This is...Such magnificent armor.|Am I worthy of wielding such high caliber armor?
speak;Gilliam;For King Hayden, and for all of Frelia.|I will wear this armor and make all of Frelia proud!
speak;Gilliam;Is this the legendary Black Knight armor?|Those who wear it will fight with a unique fighting style of a legendary knight of old.|Well, I guess it's not too late to learn new tricks.
speak;Gilliam;I am an immovable fortress.|As a knight of Frelia, I challenge anyone to try to knock me down!
speak;Gilliam;I am not the most adept when it comes to magic....|But if it means protecting my allies, I will pick up any book.|Barrier magic!|Heed my call!

speak;Gilliam;Ha ha ha!|Now this is quite the change of pace!|I don't think he's bothered by my heavy armor!|I always felt bad making horses carry me as a burden.|Now I can fight with a clear conscious!
speak;Gilliam;I'm really getting the hang of this cannon.|Hmmm....|I know it's a little crazy, but let's try putting my lance into the cannon.|Time to do some real damage!

speak;Gilliam;I guess I'll just push whatever and pray...
speak;Gilliam;Ok, this doesn't sound too bad.|Just pull the lever whenever I have an enemy in my sights.|This might be too easy...
speak;Vanessa;I'm finally strong enough to be a Falcoknight.|Syrene would be so proud of me.|I will show the enemy the might of Frelia!
speak;Vanessa;Hmmmm....A wyvern is a little different from what I'm used to.|Though,it shouldn't take me too long to master.
speak;Vanessa;I just hope Prince Innes won't think I'm too scary now...
speak;Vanessa;I learned a little bit of medical procedures in my Frelian training.|If this is what will help my allies the most, I will do my best!
speak;Vanessa;I've fused with Titania with this fusion magic!|I can feel her soul and power...
speak;Vanessa;It feels amazing to be in the skies like this!|I can't wait to show Prince Innes!

speak;Vanessa;I'm so thankful to be your rider...|You mean so much to me.

speak;Vanessa;I'm so thankful to be your rider...|You mean so much to me.

speak;Vanessa;I think I've gotten the hang of riding a wyvern.
speak;Vanessa;Well, at least she is out of danger.|I will save the world so we can fly the skies with no more danger around!

speak;Moulder;Hmmm....A Paladin.|I am unsure of my riding abilities, but for Frelia, I will practice.|I'm never too old to learn.
speak;Moulder;I feel the holy light surging in my chest.|Monsters will know the light of wrath.|Now begone beasts!
speak;Moulder;Maybe it is time to expand my knowledge.|Though I won't stray from my path.|I will always choose to help my allies first.
speak;Moulder;A Crusader is one who purges evil with holy magic.
speak;Moulder;If evil were to grow if I did nothing, then I must take action and purge it!
speak;Moulder;Me? A Silver Knight?|I cannot believe I've earned such honor.|But for Frelia, I will do what I must to help others.
speak;Moulder;The others were telling me how heavy this blade is...|But, it really isn't as heavy as they were saying it is...
speak;Moulder;It is such an honor...|King Hayden, I never thought I would see the day...
speak;Moulder;I must guide the next generation to be bearers of light!

speak;Ross;This isn't enough yet...|I have to make those monsters pay...

speak;Ross;Dad is gonna get a laugh when I tell him that!

speak;Ross;Dad is gonna get a laugh when I tell him that!

speak;Ross;This dragon!|This armor!|It's amazing!|Wait, there is a letter in this armor.|"To my son, I know you will become big and strong like your dad.|I hope you will treat your friends with kindness.|Fight to protect them from harm.|I know you will, I love you my son..."
speak;Ross;Ooooooo, I feel so tall!|I feel so powerful on here!|Like I can squash anyone in my way!
speak;Ross;Perfect, now let's go rip and tear!
speak;Ross;Perfect, now let's go rip and tear!
speak;Ross;Take a look at me now!|The seas are mine to conquer!

speak;Ross;Now this is a strong steed.|You will help me on my journey to find more power.|Let's see what ancient magic we can find!

speak;Garcia;Me? A Hero?|I wouldn't be so bold to call myself a hero.|I just do what I must to protect my son!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Garcia;I'm feeling like my old self now.|I was a mighty general and I still am!|Ross, watch your old man, back in his prime!

speak;Garcia;This is a big sword and axe!|Now I can train more while I'm fighting!|I just hope I don't cleave the enemy too many times!
speak;Garcia;I never thought I would become this strong.|I think I'm even stronger than I was while in service.|Ide!|I will return to bring you glory!

speak;Garcia;Risa, look how strong I've become.|I will crush any foe who stands in my way!
speak;Garcia;As a father, I've learned where true strength comes from.|I will never waver from my family!
speak;Garcia;I'm usually not one for armor and shields.|But, I do feel pretty good in this set.|Come on!|Let me show you some new tricks!
speak;Garcia;I'm usually not one for armor and shields.|But, I do feel pretty good in this set.|Come on!|Let me show you some new tricks!

speak;Artur;Oh dear...|Riding a horse is quite new to me...|Lute will tease me for sure once she sees this...

speak;Artur;This is quite a heavy blade...|But the light guides me so.|I will not reject the call.

speak;Natasha;Oh my, such a lovely horse.|Her eyes are sparkling so brightly.|Let's go to those in need my new friend.
speak;Natasha;I'm a little afraid of heights, but this pegasus is so gentle.|Her mane is so beautiful...|I think I'll brush it for you this evening to keep it nice and clean.
speak;Natasha;I'm a little afraid of heights, but this pegasus is so gentle.|Her mane is so beautiful...|I think I'll brush it for you this evening to keep it nice and clean.

speak;Joshua;Looks like my luck is getting better.|Now, let's keep hoping Lady Luck continues to be on my side.|I'm betting on it!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Joshua;I've got some people who still owe me.|It may be a little gruesome, but I guess this will help convince them to pay their debt.
speak;Joshua;Hey now, this brings back some good memories.|I would take a ride on some wolves to get from gambling hall to gambling hall.|Well, how about another round for old time's sake!
speak;Joshua;Hey now, this brings back some good memories.|I would take a ride on some wolves to get from gambling hall to gambling hall.|Well, how about another round for old time's sake!

speak;Joshua;It was pretty common for us to ride Baels to cross the desert back at home.|This one looks like a pretty good breed.|Just don't let them near the food.|That's quite a mess to clean up.

speak;Ephraim;Don't worry, together we will be victorious!

speak;Amelia;It must be enchanted!|I feel some sort of blessing on it!|Is this...the blessing of a goddess?

speak;Amelia;Salamanders sure are quick!|I almost lost my helmet!|How do I slow a salamander down?

speak;Amelia;So regal!|So elegant!|I didn't know I could fight with such beauty!|I wonder what Franz and Ross will think of me now, he he he!
speak;Innes;I'm one step closer towards perfection.|I'll catch up to you soon Ephraim.
speak;Innes;I made sure to only pick the finest of steeds.|I can't let Ephraim beat me in any area possible.
speak;Innes;I've fine tuned this ballista to optimal operations.|The enemy will never know what hit them.
speak;Innes;A Silver Knight fits me well.|As future king, I will reach the highest discipline and guide Frelia to a bright future.
speak;Innes;A future king must be flexible.|I will learn various technologies and use them for the benefit of Frelia.
speak;Innes;A future king must be flixable.|I will learn various technologies and use them for the benefit of Frelia.
speak;Innes;A future king must be flixable.|I will learn various technologies and use them for the benefit of Frelia.
speak;Innes;My marksmanship has reached its peak.|I will never lose to Ephraim with a bow now.|I'm gonna get him to have a match with me as soon as possible.
speak;Innes;Now this is a regal mount.|It's very powerful, but intelligent.|We will get along quite well friend.
speak;Innes;Now this is a regal mount.|It's very powerful, but intelligent.|We will get along quite well friend.
speak;Innes;This is a little more complicated than I thought...
speak;Innes;Ugh...|Give me a day, and I'll figure this out.
speak;Innes;Loading up these boulders makes for great training.
speak;Innes;I might need Tana to get me some water.|This is getting tiring...
speak;Innes;Tana gave me a great idea on how to improve the ballista.
speak;Innes;I'll have to thank her later...
speak;Gerik;Ha ha ha!|It might be a little much to call me a hero.|But I ain't gonna complain!
speak;Gerik;The guild will appreciate a Ranger for hire.|This will make completing jobs a lot quicker.|Let's get some money!
speak;Gerik;They want me to be leader of the guild?|I do have some good connections, so it's not a bad idea.|Let's whip this guild into shape then!
speak;Gerik;All right, I think it's time to get serious now.|No need to hold back for the guild anymore.|Let's make some noise.
speak;Gerik;All right, I think it's time to get serious now.|No need to hold back for the guild anymore.|Let's make some noise.
speak;Gerik;I'm feeling pretty heroic right now.|Maybe they'll write legends about me?
speak;Gerik;Ha ha ha!|Funny to hear me talk like that!|A silly time to be making jokes!
speak;Gerik;A good mercenary knows what some good armor is.|And this is some good armor.|Not a bad change of pace!
speak;Gerik;A good mercenary knows what some good armor is.|And this is some good armor.|Not a bad change of pace!
speak;Gerik;Me, a Silver Knight?|A little too fancy for my taste.|I better not have to attend more meetings and stuff like that.|I've got jobs to do!
speak;Gerik;Hey there buddy.|You want to ride with me, huh?
speak;Gerik;It's not gonna be an easy ride, are really sure about this?
speak;Gerik;You're a confident one!|All right, follow my lead then!
speak;Gerik;Hey there buddy.|You want to ride with me, huh?
speak;Gerik;It's not gonna be an easy ride, are really sure about this?
speak;Gerik;You're a confident one!|All right, follow my lead then!
speak;Gerik;I'm more of a simple mercenary kind of guy...
speak;Gerik;Technology like this is a little beyond me...|But, if it will help the rest, I guess I better buckle down.
speak;Gerik;Now these are some big boys!|Jobs will be real quick with these by my side!|Marisa will probably be envious though ha ha!
speak;Gerik;Now these are some big boys!|Jobs will be real quick with these by my side!|Marisa will probably be envious though ha ha!

speak;Gerik;Got a job from the head of the local arena.|Gonna be working on promoting the  latest arena they have built.|This getup is a little weird, but the pay is real good.|I ain't gonna complain.
speak;Gerik;A lance and shield is pretty new to me.|I mean, I've faced them many times, but usually it was on the other end.|I guess it's good to learn how to use them ha ha!

speak;Gerik;Do you have any idea how much renting a wyvern from the guild costs?!|I had to pay extra fees since this wyvern came straight from Grado!|Better make this battle quick...|For my wallet's sake...
speak;Tethys;These are some beautiful wings!|Imagine what kind of show I can put on with these wings!|Time for the show of a lifetime!
speak;Tethys;Wow, this dance can let me attack like a dragon!|That old scroll I got from the market wasn't lying!|Good thing it's just temporary!|Gerik would miss seeing my beautiful face!
speak;Tethys;Can't really dance on a horse, but now I can practice the other arts now!|If I can master this instrument and dance, I will become even better!
speak;Marisa;This is my first time flying...|Must not fall off...
speak;Marisa;This is my first time flying...|Must not fall off...
speak;Marisa;This salamander runs so fast.|I wonder if I can catch up to it if I ran at full speed?
speak;Marisa;...Magic, huh?|Might not be a bad thing to learn.
speak;Marisa;I've finally reached the peak.|I wonder if Father would be proud?...
speak;Marisa;...I'll finish up these jobs so Gerik doesn't have to.|Let's get to work.
speak;Marisa;I hope Gerik doesn't get mad at me for this...
speak;Marisa;I hope Gerik doesn't get mad at me for this...
speak;Marisa;A kunoichi...|So they do exist...|I better let Gerik know.|This is some good info I've discovered.
speak;Marisa;Three heads...|She is even cuter now...
speak;Marisa;This bael is so cute...|The fur is so soft...|I could take a nap here...
speak;Larachel;It's only natural I would make a great Valkyrie!|Let's blow these monsters away!
speak;Larachel;Ooooo, this pegasus is so beautiful!|I will look so graceful flying through the air!|Evil beware!
speak;Larachel;Ooooo, this pegasus is so beautiful!|I will look so graceful flying through the air!|Evil beware!
speak;Larachel;A merchant said this dark magic would make me look younger!|With my purity, intellect, and holy radiance, even dark magic is light in my hands!
speak;Larachel;I am such a genius!|He he he!
speak;Larachel;Oh, I look so divine!|These wings are so big!|Don't I just make the most perfect angel?
speak;Larachel;I'm the best flier in all of Magvel now!|There is no way anyone can compete with my perfection!
speak;Larachel;I'm looking rather dashing in this armor, don't I?|I feel like the hero of a story!|Evil beware, here I come!
speak;Larachel;Oh, this set of armor and wings just looks fabulous!|Dozla is gonna be impressed with what I can do now!
speak;Larachel;Oh, I look so regal in these clothes!|I might start a new fashion trend if I do say so myself!
speak;Larachel;Dark magic sure has it uses, when used by me at least!|Dozla will laugh at the next trick I show him!|He he!
speak;Larachel;I'm gonna find who did this and slap them silly!
speak;Larachel;They do say bigger is always better!|Dozla taught me how to wield this axe!|I bet he will be proud to see me in action!
speak;Dozla;Ha ha ha!|I think it's time to bust some skulls!|Let me at 'em!
speak;Dozla;L'Arachel got this good boy for me at the last town's stables!|Come on boy!|It's time to wreck some havoc!
speak;Dozla;L'Arachel got this good boy for me at the last town's stables!|Come on boy!|It's time to wreck some havoc!
speak;Dozla;RAWRRR!(Ha ha ha! What a suprise!)|RAWRRR!(Guess I ate too many mana fish!)|RAWRRR!(Well, let's have some fun while we're at it then!)
speak;Dozla;Ha ha!|It's like back in my glory days!|My armor even still fits me!|All right, let's go out and fight!
speak;Dozla;Now this is some frightening armor!|I might give L'Arachel a fright!|Should I sneak up on her and go "Boo!"
speak;Dozla;L'Arachel helped me put this outfit together!|I look pretty terrifying in this, don't I?
speak;Dozla;Look how strong I've gotten!|I feel like I could fight forever!|No one can stop me now!
speak;Dozla;An elephant!|Wonderful!|I've always loved these magnificent beasts!|All right new friend!|Let's go cause a stampede!
speak;Dozla;You have three heads now boy!
speak;Dozla;Ha ha ha!|Fantastic!|This will be a fun battle!|Let's go rip and tear!
speak;Dozla;There is some darkness in this blade...|Hmmmm...|Well, this will make for an interesting fight!|Let's see if I conquer the blade, or if it conquers me!|Gwa ha ha!
speak;Dozla;I'm going to the skies, huh?|This will be new experience ha ha ha!|Let's see what a battle in the air feels like!
speak;Dozla;RAWRRR!(Look at this new form!)|RAWRRR!(I feel like I can blast through anything!)|RAWRRR!(Let's test my new limits, ha ha ha!)
speak;Dozla;RAWRRR!(Looks like I've gotten even stronger in this form!)|RAWRRR!(Feels like I can conquer the whole ocean!)|RAWRRR!(I'll see if L'Arachel will join me, ha ha ha!)
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Well, if you want me as one, so be it!|Try to knock me down!
speak;Dozla;Well now!|This is some weird armor!|It's a bit of a tight fit though...|Well,it just means that I need to get into better shape!
speak;Dozla;An Admiral huh?...|Never thought I would be one again...
speak;Dozla;Well, no time to reminisce!|Back to fighting!
speak;Saleh;It is good for one to keep their physical body trained as well.|A sound body makes a sound mind.
speak;Saleh;The dark arts...|Knowledge such as this must be taken with extreme caution...
speak;Saleh;Wisdom comes with time and experience.
speak;Saleh;I should shave off this beard though...
speak;Saleh;Caer Pelyn didn't have any knights, so this is new to me...|But I am not opposed to the idea of a knight.
speak;Saleh;I'm pretty good with barrier magic.|My grandmother taught me how to set them up effectively.|This will be an easy task.
speak;Saleh;This is a dark way to use the blade.|But it's about how one uses the blade, not the magic itself.|I must use it for a good cause.
speak;Saleh;It pains me to see a wyvern treated like this...
speak;Saleh;I will not stand for this.|I will seek who would do this.
speak;Saleh;It pains me to see a wyvern treated like this...
speak;Saleh;I will not stand for this.|I will seek who would do this.
speak;Saleh;The secrets of the dark arts are at my fingertips...
speak;Saleh;Am I strong enough to resist their tempting powers?...
speak;Saleh;All of my meditation has finally paid off.|Grandmother would be proud.|Now I need to guide Ewan to become like this one day too.
speak;Ewan;Master told me to practice some light magic.|Hmmmm....Maybe Artur or Moulder could help me?|Maybe Natasha knows some tips too?
speak;Ewan;Master said I have improved!|He even gave me this hat as an award!|I like this hat a lot!
speak;Ewan;Master told me to try my hand at some dark magic.|Lute seemed like she knew some dark magic...
speak;Ewan;She kind of scares me though...
speak;Ewan;Master said I'm just as good as he was when I was his age!|Hopefully Tethys will think I've gotten stronger too!
speak;Ewan;Master said I should try my hand at the blade as well.|I don't know how that will help me learn magic though...
speak;Ewan;I'm getting pretty good at dark magic!|I feel stronger and stronger each day!|I hope Master likes my progress!
speak;Ewan;I'm going to try to practice my dark magic on a horse.|Lute gave me the idea to help my brain by focusing on multiple things.|...This is harder than it looks...
speak;Ewan;I'm getting pretty good at dark magic!|I feel stronger and stronger each day!|I hope Master likes my progress!
speak;Ewan;I found this book on summoning!|I hope these summons will help me do the chores I give them!|Give me more time to come up with some pranks!
speak;Ewan;A Paladin?|I thought I was trying to become a great sage like Master?
speak;Ewan;What in the world is Master thinking?
speak;Ewan;These are some fancy robes!|It's a little big for me though...
speak;Ewan;Tethys will tease me if she saw how big these clothes are...
speak;Ewan;Ok, I'm getting better at light and anima magic!|I'm starting to feel more sage-like!
speak;Ewan;My training has paid off Master!|My magic is so powerful now!|Oh?|This beard?|It's a fake one!|I thought it would make me look more powerful!
speak;Ewan;I look pretty sage-like now, right!|I feel so powerful too!|I'll make Master and Tethys proud!
speak;Ewan;Marisa taught me some breathing techniques to help with swordfighting.
speak;Ewan;This is harder than I thought...
speak;Ewan;Marisa taught me some breathing techniques to help with swordfighting.
speak;Ewan;This is harder than I thought...
speak;Ewan;I think I'm starting to like being a knight!|Franz gave me some good tips and now this is easy!|I'll have to thank him later!
speak;Ewan;Barrier magic sounds fun to learn!
speak;Ewan;I look forward to learning and mastering this new magic!
speak;Ewan;My sword is so hungry too...|Need to feed...
speak;Ewan;My sword is so hungry too...|Need to feed...
speak;Ewan;This makes me so sad seeing a wyvern like this...|Who did this to you?|I'll take care of you though.|It will be all right...
speak;Ewan;This makes me so sad seeing a wyvern like this...|Who did this to you?|I'll take care of you though.|It will be all right...
speak;Ewan;Why didn't Master teach me these dark secrets?...|Do I even need him anymore?...
speak;Ewan;The darkness has showed me my future...|Is this what becomes of me?
speak;Ewan;It doesn't feel right using dark magic like this...|Maybe I should ask Gerik if he knows a better path?...
speak;Ewan;So summoning has been a success so far!|Now let's see if I can get them to do even more of my chores...|I wonder how good they are at pulling pranks?
speak;Ewan;A Crusader is the bane of monsters, so I guess this is what Master was going for?|I guess it makes for good light magic practice?
speak;Ewan;A Silver Knight?|I don't even know how I got a rank this high?|Does this even mean anything to the people of Caer Pelyn?
speak;Ewan;I think I'm starting to like being a knight!|Franz gave me some good tips and now this is easy!|I'll have to thank him later!
speak;Ewan;I think I trained with Moulder and Artur too much...|I do look pretty regal in these robes though!
speak;Ewan;So Moulder and Dozla were trying to combine magic with axes...|It looks like I ended up being their experiment...|Well, as long Master approves!
speak;Ewan;A Holy Knight?|What ever happened to becoming a sage like Master?|I'm just confused now...
speak;Ewan;My training has paid off Master!|My magic is so powerful now!|Oh?|This beard?|It's a fake one!|I thought it would make me look more powerful!
speak;Cormag;A Wyvern Lord...|Just like Glen...|If I follow his path, will he be proud of me?...
speak;Cormag;Genarog, you changed just for me?|I...|I cannot let your sacrifice be in vain...
speak;Cormag;RAWRRR!(What happened?!)|RAWRRR!(How did I become a wyvern?!)|RAWRRR!(Genarog, where are you?!)
speak;Cormag;Genarog...|You turned into a salamander for me?...|Why must you sacrifice yourself for my sake?...
speak;Cormag;Genarog...|You turned into a salamander for me?...|Why must you sacrifice yourself for my sake?...
speak;Cormag;Genarog?!|What dark powers took hold of you?!|It's ok boy, I'm here...|I'll reverse these dark powers that have seized you...
speak;Cormag;You must be proud of me Glen...|I miss you so much...|Thank you for all that you've done for me...
speak;Cormag;Genarog...|I can't afford to lose you too...|Take a break, and I will handle the rest.
speak;Cormag;Genarog, your scales have become so dark.|They feel warm too...|You've become so strong Genarog...|I'm so proud of you...
speak;Cormag;RAWRRR!(Genarog, I can feel your fiery soul...)|RAWRRR!(Have you been with me this whole time?...)
speak;Cormag;RAWRRR!(I thought I lost you...)|RAWRRR!(I'm glad you're with me...)
speak;Cormag;RAWRRR!(Genarog, I can feel your mystical soul...)|RAWRRR!(I can feel wisdom flowing within me...)|RAWRRR!(Have you been with me this whole time?...)
speak;Cormag;RAWRRR!(I thought I lost you...)|RAWRRR!(I'm glad you're with me...)
speak;Cormag;RAWRRR!(Genarog, I can feel your soul...)|RAWRRR!(I can feel a black fire growing within me...)|RAWRRR!(Have you been with me this whole time?...)
speak;Cormag;RAWRRR!(I thought I lost you...)|RAWRRR!(I'm glad you're with me...)
speak;Cormag;This power...|I feel a rage burning within me...|It begs for my next opponent!|Come and fight me!|I'll crush you where you stand!
speak;Rennac;Hey, you need a guy to do some dirty work?|I'll do it for enough money, but it does leave a bad taste in my mouth...
speak;Rennac;I'm the best there is!|Just look how fast I can get the treasure!
speak;Rennac;I'm the best there is!|Just look how fast I can get the treasure!
speak;Rennac;You got me a ride, huh?|Makes for a good getaway, doesn't it?
speak;Rennac;Hey now, you can't be serious?|This might be a litte too much...
speak;Rennac;This is gonna cost you double then...
speak;Rennac;Hey now, you can't be serious?|This might be a litte too much...
speak;Rennac;This is gonna cost you double then...
speak;Rennac;Ha ha ha!|A ninja, huh?|You've got some good intel, knowing about them.|I may know a thing or two on how they work.|Just leave it to me!
speak;Rennac;Now this is a unique fighting style.|You have to be pretty dexterous to pull it off.|Good thing my dancing skills helped me be very dexterous.|I should be able to master this in no time!
speak;Rennac;Now this is a unique fighting style.|Have to be pretty dexterous to pull it off.|Good thing my dancing skills helped me be very dexterous.|Should master this in no time!
speak;Rennac;It looks like I shouldn't have taken that lamp I found...|Well, I guess it's not half bad...|It can't be worse than being with L'Arachel...
speak;Rennac;It looks like I shouldn't have taken that lamp I found...|Well, I guess it's not half bad...|It can't be worse than being with L'Arachel...
speak;Rennac;Now this is my style!|Perfect for an elegant man such as myself!|Now, let's see what's ripe for that taking!
speak;Rennac;Now this is my style!|Perfect for an elegant man such as myself!|Now, let's see what's ripe for that taking!
speak;Rennac;I am familiar with elephants, since a lot of merchants have them in Carcino...
speak;Rennac;But, why in the world am I riding one?!
speak;Rennac;I think I got more than what I bargained for...|I hope you don't eat more now that you have two more heads...
speak;Rennac;I don't think I can be too sneaky while in the air...|But I am a lot faster.|I guess I just have to make do with what I have.
speak;Duessel;I always feel the best in armor like this.|Call me old fashioned, but there's nothing like a good ol' plate of armor.
speak;Duessel;I always feel the best in armor like this.|Call me old fashioned, but there's nothing like a good ol' plate of armor.
speak;Duessel;Flying is more of Glen's style, but he did teach me how to ride efficiently.|It's never too late to learn some new tricks.
speak;Duessel;Traveling by wolf is a lot quicker for this old man.|It's not too bad when I have a duty to fulfill.
speak;Duessel;I feel stronger than I ever have before!|Beware, for I am General Duessel the Obsidian!|Grado will be redeemed!
speak;Duessel;Barrier magic, huh?|I guess it can't be any different from raising a shield, right?|Well, leave this duty to me then.|I will protect everyone with my life.
speak;Duessel;An elephant.|Strong, loyal, and sturdy.|Everything I strive to be.|I have much respect for you, my friend.
speak;Duessel;A salamander.|I am more used to being on the ground.|This might work out for me pretty well.
speak;Duessel;A salamander.|I am more used to being on the ground.|This might work out for me pretty well.
speak;Duessel;Who dares to hurt a wyvern like this?!|How cowardly!|I will find whoever did this and bring them to justice!
speak;Duessel;Now this is a mighty dragon, and some mighty armor!|Maybe things would have been different for me if I took up riding wyverns earlier?
speak;Duessel;I feel a fury from my chest I've never felt before!|Is this the same fury this beast feels?|Well, I feel young again thanks to you!|Let us charge to the battlefield!
speak;Duessel;Am I so old that I'm reduced to a merchant?
speak;Duessel;I will do my best, no matter what role I have been given.
speak;Duessel;If I had this power earlier in life, could I have changed anything?|What was it I was lacking?|Did it really have to come to this?
speak;Duessel;If I had this power earlier in life, could I have changed anything?|What was it I was lacking?|Did it really have to come to this?
speak;Knoll;A horse?|I'm not sure if I'm good of taking care of one.|But I'll do my best...
speak;Knoll;The flow of time continues forward.
speak;Knoll;Of course I know of the summoning arts.|I will use them if that is what required.
speak;Knoll;Barrier magic is very helpful on the battlefield.|I am more than happy to use it to protect others.
speak;Knoll;The art of the shadowblade is pretty well known in Grado.|I've read up on it, though it will be my first time using it.
speak;Knoll;The art of the shadowblade is pretty well known in Grado.|I've read up on it, though it will be my first time using it.
speak;Knoll;The flow of time is easier to read now...
speak;Knoll;You have had a terrible fate, poor one...|Be at peace...|I will lighten your burden...
speak;Knoll;You have had a terrible fate, poor one...|Be at peace...|I will lighten your burden...
speak;Knoll;All matter of magic comes easily to me now.
speak;Knoll;If I only had such knowledge earlier...|Could I have changed fate then?...
speak;Knoll;Mastery of the dark arts.|It requires much, but I am ready to pay the cost.
speak;Knoll;This leaves a bad taste in my mouth...|I hope I don't have to do this for long...
speak;Knoll;I have gained mastery of the summoning arts.|It is nice to have extra hands around.|Even if they are phantom hands...
speak;Myrrh;This form...|It came to me in a dream...
speak;Myrrh;A fire that burns so bright.|Pure strength, unbound by mortal means...|A fury unleashed...
speak;Myrrh;Please let me not change who I am...
speak;Myrrh;This form...|It came to me in a dream...
speak;Myrrh;A darkness, lonely and expansive.|Magical strength filling the void...|A somber existence...
speak;Myrrh;Please let me not change who I am...
speak;Myrrh;This form...|It came to me in a dream...
speak;Myrrh;The shadow of corruption.|A form that is warped and dark...|A twisted transformation...
speak;Myrrh;Please let me not change who I am...
speak;Syrene;I remember when I became a Falcoknight quite a while ago.|It brings back good memories of teasing Gilliam.|
speak;Syrene;I don't know why I chose to ride a Wyvern.|Maybe because it felt so rebellious to do so at the time?
speak;Syrene;I felt learning how to treat wounds on the battlefield would be beneficial to the squad.|It has worked out well so far.
speak;Syrene;I learned fusion magic with my pegasus to take to the skies!|Let me show you what I'm capable of!
speak;Syrene;It was hard to get my hands on this rare breed of Pegasus.|But the results speak for themself!|I will show you the might of Frelia!
speak;Syrene;It was hard to get my hands on this rare breed of Pegasus.|But the results speak for themself!|I will show you the might of Frelia!
speak;Syrene;I am Syrene!|Commander of the third battalion!|I will bring glory to Frelia!
speak;Syrene;I learned fusion magic with my pegasus to take to the skies!|Let me show you what I'm capable of!
speak;Syrene;It was hard to get my hands on this rare breed of Pegasus.|But the results speak for themself!|I will show you the might of Frelia!
speak;Syrene;This is a different path I have taken.|Even Vanessa might be surprised.|But I must do what feels best.
speak;Syrene;I sure do look different riding this wyvern and wearing this armor.|Will Vanessa even recognize me?|I wonder if Gilliam would recognize me?|I would be suprised if Kyle recognized me.
speak;Syrene;I sure do look different riding this wyvern and wearing this armor.|Will Vanessa even recognize me?|I wonder if Gilliam would recognize me?|I would be suprised if Kyle recognized me.
speak;Syrene;Fighting on the ground still feels very foreign to me.|But I've learned more about fighting that I would have if I was still in the air.
speak;Syrene;Fighting on the ground still feels very foreign to me.|But I've learned more about fighting that I would have if I was still in the air.
speak;Syrene;I was told that I look beautiful while riding this Ebony Wyvern.
speak;Syrene;Why are they staring at me on the battlefield though?|We are in the middle of a battle!

name: Ch.9BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Natasha;All right, that should do it.
speak;Seth;Thank you lady Natasha.|This feels better already.
speak;Natasha;That was such a terrible wound...|It's a miracle you survived...
speak;Seth;Is that so?|Everything went by so quickly that I didn't have time to think about it.
speak;Natasha;Well, please take care of yourself...
speak;Natasha;I would hate to see any more people hurt...
speak;Seth;This is war...|But I will do my best to end it quickly.
speak;Natasha;Oh!|I just remembered!|I was told to give this to you once you were healed up some more!
speak;Seth;My special lance!|Yes, I should be able to wield this again now.|Thank you Natasha. This might help me on the battlefield.
speak;Natasha;You're welcome sir Seth.|Please just be safe...
alert;Seth's growths and stats have increased!
alert;Seth can now use his signature lance!

name: Tutorial_Enable
_source: speak;Anna;Welcome and thank you for playing Fire Emblem 8R!|I am your guide, the beautiful merchant Anna!|I am one of the main mascot characters of the Fire Emblem world!|I will help you understand the basics of gameplay to make sure you are caught up to speed!|You can also use the <red>"C"</> key anytime while navigating menus to get a description!|I'll also ask if you want tutorials on the new mechanics of FE8R here in minute.|If you don't want those, select no, and go ahead and select either Eirika or Seth and I'll give more information!;;;;6
speak;Anna;Ok!|I'll also be giving information on the new mechanincs of FE8R as well!|I'll do my best to help you out!;;;;6

speak;Anna;Welcome and thank you for playing Fire Emblem 8R!|I am your guide, the beautiful merchant Anna!|I will be explaining the new mechanics of FE8R as we go along!|I look forward to guiding you!|Go ahead and select either Eirika or Seth and we can get started!;;;;6

name: Tutorial_Select_Seth
_source: speak;Anna;Now Eirika and her ally Seth are equipped with some <red>weapons</>.|Mastery over weapons are key to defeating your enemies!|Weapons are divided into eight categories.|<red>Swords</><icon>Sword</>, <red>Lances</><icon>Lance</>, <red>Axes</><icon>Axe</>, <red>Bows</><icon>Bow</>, <red>Anima magic</><icon>Anima</>, <red>Dark magic</><icon>Dark</>, <red>Light magic</><icon>Light</>, and <red>Staves</><icon>Staff</>.|Each have their own strengths and weaknesses.|<red>Swords</><icon>Sword</> and <red>Light magic</><icon>Light</> are easier to hit and deal <red>Critical Hits</> with.|<red>Lances</><icon>Lance</> help provide protection to the wielder, and <red>Anima magic</><icon>Anima</> deals <red>Splash damage</> in an area.|<red>Axes</><icon>Axe</> and <red>Dark magic</><icon>Dark</> are not as accurate, but deal more damage and <red>reduces the enemy's DEF/RES</>.|<red>Bows</><icon>Bow</> attack enemies from a distance, but cannot attack from short distances.|<red>Staves</><icon>Staff</> can either heal allies or provide buffs.|There are also <red>Combat Staves</> that can attack an enemy with perfect accuracy, but <red>cannot Critical Hit</>.|Critical Hits deal 3 times the damage a unit would normally deal, by the way.|Now it's ok if you don't get it all at once, you'll get used to it over time.|Weapons also have what's called a <red>Weapon Triangle</>.|Certain weapons have an advantage over other weapon types.|If you can master this, you will do a lot better on the battlefield!|The <red>Weapon Triangle</> goes like this.|<red>Swords</><icon>Sword</> are strong against <red>Axes</><icon>Axe</> and are weak against <red>Lances</><icon>Lance</>.|<red>Axes</><icon>Axe</> are strong against <red>Lances</><icon>Lance</> and are weak against <red>Swords</><icon>Sword</>.|<red>Lances</><icon>Lance</> are strong against <red>Swords</><icon>Sword</> and are weak against <red>Axes</><icon>Axe</>.|Now for magic, it is very similar.|<red>Light magic</><icon>Light</> is strong against <red>Dark magic</><icon>Dark</> and is weak against <red>Anima magic</><icon>Anima</>.|<red>Dark magic</><icon>Dark</> is strong against <red>Anima magic</><icon>Anima</> and is weak against <red>Light magic</><icon>Light</>.|<red>Anima magic</><icon>Anima</> is strong against <red>Light magic</><icon>Light</> and is weak against <red>Dark magic</><icon>Dark</>.|Then <red>Bows</><icon>Bow</> are strong against all 3 forms of magic, while <red>Staves</><icon>Staff</> are neutral against everything.|Yet again, don't feel bad if you don't have it all memorized now.|You'll get the hang of it!|For now, all the enemies on the field right now use axes.|So Eirika will have advantage against them!|Normally Seth's personal lance would be at a disadvantage against axes, but his is special!|His lance ignores the Weapon Triangle!|So remember that if he fights with that lance against any sword enemies!;;;;6

speak;Anna;In FE8R, every unit has their own personal weapons in their <red>Arsenal</>.|They have their own unique quirks/abilities.|Unlike other weapons though, most personal weapons evolve as your unit gets better with said weapon type!|You can see what weapons a unit is proficient in by typing the <red>"C"</> key over the unit's Arsenal in the combat menu.|Eirika for example has a proficiency in Swords<icon>Sword</>.|Once she gets a C rank in swords, her Aegis Rapier will evolve!|Most main weapons evolve at C, A, then SSS rank.|Most secondary weapons evolve at B, then SS rank.|Some don't unlock until certain events have passed like Seth's personal lances, so keep an eye out!;;;;6

name: Tutorial_Select_Eirika
_source: speak;Anna;Now, if you were paying attention to the story, you will know that our main Heroine is <red>Eirika</>.|We will be referring her to as our <red>"Lord"</> from now on.|<red>"Lord"</> is the common term used in FE for the main hero/heroine.|<red>If your Lord's HP is reduced to 0, that's game over for you!</>|You will then have to start the chapter over!|You will want to do your best to keep your Lord alive!|Now to win, you must complete the goal of each chapter.|In this case, it is to defeat or <red>"Rout"</> all the enemies on the map.;;;;6

speak;Anna;In this version of FE8, if you get unlucky and Eirika dies, there is still hope!|You have a timewheel with 3 charges that you can use!|Though, for this chapter I'll cut you a deal and give you unlimited charges!|So feel free to use it as much as you like!|A charge will be used automatically if Eirika dies and you can turn back time to continue the game.|You can also use the timewheel during your turn anytime you want if want to change fate.|If Eirika dies while you have no charges, then it's game over though!|Since this is the Prologue though, I'll let Eirika come back as many times as needed.|But do your best to keep her alive!;;;;6

name: Tutorial_T2
_source: speak;Anna;Keep your eye out for terrain like forests or forts!

speak;Anna;They will give you bonuses like more <red>DEF</> and/or more <red>Avoid</> to dodge enemy attacks!|Forts will even restore some HP each turn!|Use them to your advantage!|Though watch out, enemies can take advantage of them too!|Also to note down the line, <red>Flying</> allies don't get bonuses from the terrain since they are in the air!|We will now go over the main stats!|You can find them on a unit's status screen, typically by selecting a unit with the <red>"C"</> key.|Strength, or <red>"STR"</>, affects how much damage a unit will deal with physical weapons.|Magic, or <red>"MAG"</>, affects how much damage a unit deals with magical weapons.|Skill, or <red>"SKL"</>, affects how easy it is to hit enemies or certain skills/weapons.|Speed, or <red>"SPD"</>, affects if you attack the enemy again or vice versa.|Also affects if you dodge enemy's attacks and certain skills/weapons.|<red>Luck</>, affects various things such as Crit rate, or Crit avoid.|Defense, or <red>"DEF"</>, affects how much physical damage a unit will prevent.|Resistance, or <red>"RES"</>, affects how much magical damage a unit will prevent.|Constitution, or <red>"CON"</> determines if a unit will be slowed down by a weapon's weight or not.|If a weapon's weight is higher than a unit's CON, then the unit will be slower against the enemy by that difference.|Movement, or <red>"MOV"</> will determine how many spaces a unit can normally move.|Terrain will affect how much unit can move.|Forests and deserts will affect the MOV of units like calvary units.|Stats have a chance to increase each time a unit gains 100 EXP.|To see those chances, hit the <red>"A"</> key on the unit's status page.|Items and events can influence these chances, so keep an eye out for those!|Most units will automatically promote to a higher tier class at level 21.|You will have 3 choices to promote into, so have fun trying new combinations!;;;;6
