speak;Anna;Now I will be discussing a new mechanic in FE8R called <red>Elemental Combos</>!|A lot of weapons have elements and they can swing the tide of battle!|For example, Eirika's weapon has a <red>Thunder</><icon>Thunder</> element.|What this means, if she attacks any enemies that are <red>Drenched</><icon>Drenched</> with that weapon, she will deal bonus damage!|You are in luck too!|Seth's personal weapon has the <red>Water</><icon>Water</> element!|Seth's lance will cause adjacent enemies to become drenched, letting Eirika zap them to death!|So mastery over the elementals will lead to good results!|Here are all the elements in FE8R.|<red>Fire</><icon>Fire</>, <red>Wind</><icon>Wind</>, <red>Water</><icon>Water</>, <red>Thunder</><icon>Thunder</>, <red>Dark</><icon>Dark</>, <red>Light</><icon>Light</>,<red>Earth</><icon>Earth</>, and <red>Ice</><icon>Ice</>.|Here are all the elemental combos as well!|<red>Fire</><icon>Fire</>, then <red>Wind</><icon>Wind</>.|<red>Water</><icon>Water</>, then <red>Thunder</><icon>Thunder</>.|<red>Dark</><icon>Dark</>, then <red>Light</><icon>Light</>.|Then for <red>Ice</><icon>Ice</>, while not an element if you hit a frozen enemy with a <red>Heavy weapon</>, you will deal big damage!|An enemy hit with a fire element weapon will only be weak to wind element weapons for 2 turns or after their next combat, so be wise!|See what you can do with the Elemental Combos!;;;;6

name: Tutorial_T3
_source: speak;Anna;In FE8R, weapons don't have durability, so feel free to use weapons as much as you like!|However, there are weapons that have <red>"Cooldowns!</>|Take Seth's Javelin for example.|Once it is used, it will go on cooldown for 2 turns.|You can tell how long a cooldown is in the unit's item menu.|A 0/3 would mean that once the weapon is used, the weapon will take 3 turns before it is usable again.|The number on the left indicates how many turns have passed, so 1/3 means it needs 2 more turns until usable.|A lot of ranged weapons, Killer weapons, or Brave weapons have cooldowns.|So keep your eye out and make sure you've got a weapon usable in your reserves!;;;;6

name: Tutorial_First_Battle
_source: speak;Anna;Ok!|Your first battle!|I believe in you!|I will teach you some things before you get started though !|As you can see, that box to the right of your weapon is very important information!|<red>HIT</> shows what percentage chance you have to hit the enemy with your attack.|<red>DMG</> shows how much damage you will do to the enemy if you hit.|<red>CRIT</> shows what percantage chance you have that your attack will be a Critical Hit.|Critical Hits will do 3 times the normal damage you would deal.;;;;6

speak;Anna;In FE8R, there is the pair up mechanic, along with <red>Attack Stance</>, <red>Defense Stance</>, and the new <red>Affinity Strike!</>|<red>Attack Stance</> will trigger when you have two unpaired units next to each other while attacking or being attacked.|The unit next to the main combat unit will join in the attack and deal half the damage they would normally deal.|The extra damage can help you win the battle!|Though, <red>Attack Stance</> won't happen while the enemy is in <red>Defense Stance</>.|A unit will automatically enter <red>Defense Stance</> while paired up.|While in <red>Defense Stance</>, they will gain 2 points in the gauge seen below that says 0-10.|Once it reaches 10-10, the next source of damage will be completely negated.|A unit in <red>Defense Stance</> will also activate an <red>Affinity Strike!</>|<red>Affinity Strike</> will grant the unit an additional bonus attack, and deal a debuff to the enemy based on the main unit's paired up Affinity!|For example, if Seth was paired up with Eirika, Eirika would give the Light Affinity Strike to Seth!|Here is what each Affinity does for Affinity Strike.|<red>Light</><icon>LightA</> reduces enemies' Hit rate by 60.|<red>Thunder</><icon>Thunder</> stuns an enemy for a turn.|<red>Dark</><icon>DarkA</> gives enemies the Shadowblight and Curse(8) debuff.|<red>Fire</><icon>Fire</>gives enemies the Seared debuff.|<red>Ice</><icon>Ice</> gives enemies the Frozen debuff.|<red>Wind</><icon>Wind</> gives enemies the Breach(8) debuff.|<red>Anima</><icon>Anima</> has a 50% chance to give Seared, Drenched, Shadowblight, and/or Rock Puncture to the enemy!|Paired up enemies only have a 50% chance to proc Affinity Strike.|In Lunatic mode they also have a chance to inflict any of these debuffs from the ones listed above.|You can look up what each Affinty does for Affinity Strike by using the <red>"C"</> key on the unit's Affinity in the status menu.|You'll get the hang of it over time, but mastery of these 3 things will help out a lot.;;;;6

name: Item_Select_And_Ambush
_source: speak;Eirika;Oh, look at this sword!|Someone must have dropped it!|I can make use of it, I suppose.
speak;Valter;There you are Princess.|I'm not done with you yet.|How about you entertain me more?
speak;Eirika;Oh no!|That wyvern rider!|They found us!
speak;SoldierRed;The Princess has been found!|After her!
speak;Seth;They have us surrounded!|We have no choice to but break through!

speak;Anna;Whoopsies!|Looks like you are in a pickle!|I believe in you though!|All you have to do is <red>escape!</>|Have either Eirika or Seth reach this spot and you'll have the option to <red>"Escape"</> to saftey!|It doesn't matter who reaches it.|They will both be safe either way once you escape.;;;;6

name: Tutorial_T1
_source: speak;Anna;Welcome to Chapter 1!|For this chapter we now have to take back or <red>"Seize"</> the castle!|There is a powerful boss protecting it, so be careful!|Bosses are immune to certain statuses and can't be moved, so plan accordingly!|Once you defeat the boss you can go to where he was standing and select the <red>Seize</> command.|You will beat the map and move to the Free Roam phase!|All right, I will let you at it!|Take care!;;;;6

name: Franz_Select_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;Fire Emblem has had unit types for a while, but it has been expanded in FE8R!|There are <red>Horse units</><icon>Horse</> like Franz and Seth.;;;;6
speak;Anna;Then there are <red>Armored units</><icon>Armor</> like Gilliam.;;;;6
speak;Anna;Then units that are not on any mount are called <red>Infantry</><icon>Infantry</>.|So Eirika is considered an <red>Infantry</><icon>Infantry</> unit.;;;;6

speak;Anna;Here are the rest of the unit types that you will encounter throughout the game.|<red>Flying units</><icon>Flying</>.|<red>Dragon units</><icon>Dragon</>.|<red>Magical units</><icon>Magic</>.|<red>Monster units</><icon>Monster</>.|<red>Pirate or Brigand units</><icon>Pirate</>.|Finally <red>Support units</><icon>Staff</>.|Keep note, for <red>Support units</><icon>Staff</>, this allows them to use healing/support staves such as <red>Heal</> or <red>Warp</>.|So a class that can use staves, but are not <red>Support units</><icon>Staff</> can only use combat staves.|For example, Sages can only use combat staves.|Ok, keep an eye out for unit types, since certain weapons deal extra damage against certain unit types!|You can check a unit's type anytime by hitting the <red>"C"</> key in the unit's status menu and hovering over their class!|Best of luck!;;;;6

name: Gilliam_Select_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;There are weapons in FE8R that are considered <red>Heavy Weapons</>.|There are four types of heavy weapons, <red>Blades</>, <red>Greatlances</>, <red>Warhammers</>, and <red>Greatbows</>.|They are very strong, but the enemy will always attack first when using them, and you <red>normally</> cannot multi-attack with them.|Certain skills will allow them to multi-attack, though.|They will also knock back the enemy one space after they are hit.|Certain unit types also gain special skills while using certain heavy weapons!|Blades allow <red>Infantry</><icon>Infantry</> or <red>Armored units</><icon>Armor</> to <red>Cleave</> while attacking when at Max HP!|This will hit all enemies around them with increased damage!|This enemy right here has a blade, so he will attack all around him on Enemy Phase.|Be careful!;;;;6

speak;Anna;Gilliam also has a blade as a personal weapon so take advantage of that!|Greatlances allow <red>Armored</><icon>Armor</> and <red>Horse units</><icon>Horse</> to counterattack an additional 2 spaces away when defending while above 75% max HP!|Gilliam's other personal lance is a greatlance, so Gilliam is a great unit to test heavy weapons!|Warhammers allow <red>Pirate or Brigand</><icon>Pirate</> and <red>Dragon units</><icon>Dragon</> to deal 20% Max HP damage and <red>Stun</><icon>Stun</> to enemies around the target!|These are powerful effects, but be careful since these can be used against you as well!|Last thing to note is that heavy weapons can deal effective damage against <red>Frozen</><icon>Frozen</> units, so try to combo those together!|All right, now go deal some massive damage!;;;;6

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Man1;So you got rid of those Grado soldiers, did you?|It was quite the ruckus.|You guys must be pretty strong if even those defenses wouldn't help them win.
speak;Eirika;I suppose...|We have to rescue Princess Tana, so we couldn't fall to them with her life on the line!
speak;Man1;The Princess, huh?|She is a sweet girl...|Thank you for your good deeds then!|I will be wishing you luck!

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Man2;It looks like that Rapier of yours proved pretty effective against that knight fellow.
speak;Eirika;Yes, I'm glad I learned how to wield it.|It has been proven to be very useful.
speak;Man2;I believe it.|Us country folk don't have much use for weapons, but we are lucky.|King Hayden has been good at protecting us.
speak;Eirika;Indeed, King Hayden is a wonderful man.
speak;Man2;Yes, now see what else you can do about those Grado guys.

name: Talk_Lute
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you again for your help this battle.|I was surprised to see you join us, but you did good work.
speak;Lute;Of course!|I am a prodigy!|My first battle was destined to be excellent!
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well, your magic power is very much appreciated.
speak;Lute;Was that the best those Grado soldiers can do?|If so, this war should be over soon with me in it now!
speak;Eirika;I hope so.|I want the fighting to end as soon as possible...
speak;Lute;Leave it to me.|My books on the strategies of war will bring us victory!
speak;Eirika;Do your books say anything about those mountain spiders?

speak;Lute;Of course.|They are actually called Bael.|They have very tough hides and can run as fast as horses.|It says that back then, some drunken merchants mistook their horses for them.|They rode the Baels for miles until they realized their mistake.
speak;Eirika;Oh dear...|How did they get so far without being eaten?
speak;Lute;Apparently the Baels ate their horses, so they weren't hungry.|That is why they didn't attack the merchants.
speak;Eirika;Lute, I didn't know you were helping the villagers too.
speak;Lute;One of the villagers promised to give me a book if I helped.
speak;Lute;It was a book on 1000 ways to cook a zombie.
speak;Lute;I disagree. It just needs a little spice.
speak;Eirika;I'm surprised to see you near a chest, Lute.
speak;Lute;Yes, there was a strange accessory in here.|Its feathers were unlike anything I have seen before.
speak;Lute;Yeah, so I have this theory that if I-
speak;Eirika;Um, sorry Lute, I don't think I have time for a long lecture...
speak;Eirika;Anything good in this store, Lute?
speak;Lute;Hmmm....|Still looking through their collection...|Might be some new spells in there.
speak;Eirika;I see.|I hope you find something worthwhile.
speak;Eirika;Why are you hiding all the way over here?
speak;Lute;I'm not hiding.|I'm practicing my new spell.
speak;Lute;It is an invisibility spell.|It stops working if a human sees you though.
speak;Lute;You don't understand.|It's great if you're hiding from predators or monsters.
speak;Eirika;I guess if you put it that way...
speak;Eirika;I've been informed you're in charge of researching the monsters.|Is there anything to report from your studies?
speak;Lute;Yes.|It looks like these monsters have gained power from dark magic.|It's similar to necromancy, but this magic is not like normal dark magic.|It's more primal.|More organic.
speak;Lute;Like the power comes from the earth but corrupted.|These monsters have something close to life, but something is missing.|I feel like I'm close to something big...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well, let me know if you find anything important...
speak;Lute;Princess.|I have some news to report.
speak;Lute;This monster attack seemed different...|More organized.|Like an army.|Like they were being controlled.
speak;Eirika;They did seem to be more precise in their attack.
speak;Lute;I could sense a faint of dark magic trailing off somewhere.|But it was too thin to trace.|I'll see if I can find anything else.|I'll continue experimenting.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Lute...|Please let me know if find anything else.|I'm starting to worry...
speak;Eirika;Why do you look so sad Lute?
speak;Lute;I'm disappointed that we didn't fight any monsters today...
speak;Lute;No!|I was close to a breakthrough, but I need more monster parts!|Ugh!|Why did they have to not show up now?!
speak;Lute;I'm testing to see if I can use some hellhound blood to track her down.
speak;Lute;Of course.|This book says that this ritual can help track down someone.|I just need this blood and dark magic to get it to work.
speak;Eirika;How long will it take until the ritual is ready?
speak;Eirika;We'll use that as a last resort I suppose then...
speak;Eirika;Are you examining the bones here, Lute?
speak;Lute;Yes, it seems to be a monster from long past.|I am examining my notes to see what it could be.
speak;Eirika;What do you think it may be?
speak;Lute;I'm thinking it might be a long dead Water Dragon.|This might have been part of the ocean at some point.
speak;Eirika;Really?|That would be surprising if it were true.
speak;Lute;I've got 26 books about it!|Let me show you the one with the closest theory in my opinion!
speak;Eirika;Ummm...|That's ok, Lute...|Not right now please...
speak;Eirika;Why do you look so serious, Lute?
speak;Lute;There is some really foul dark magic here...|It's disgusting, even to me...
speak;Eirika;...That's worrisome...|Should I ask what it is?
speak;Lute;I think you'll see for yourself...|But steel yourself...|I need to go lay down...|These people are real monsters...
speak;Eirika;Lute, please tell me you can track down Lyon with your magic?...
speak;Lute;No, I don't have the kind of materials for that.|I need a lot of ingredients for a tracking ritual to work.
speak;Eirika;What kind of ingredients?|Is it something we can purchase?
speak;Lute;Not unless you can buy something like the person's hair.
speak;Eirika;Oh...|I see why that would be a problem then...
speak;Lute;Indeed.|If you do get his hair, let me know and I can do the ritual.
speak;Eirika;I don't think I'll be able to get that anytime soon if we are still tracking him...
speak;Eirika;Lute, why do you look so disappointed?
speak;Lute;All of these gorgon eggs...|Such a waste...
speak;Eirika;Lute...|Were you thinking of taking one with you?...
speak;Lute;If there was one surviving, yes.|Gorgon eggs still have a lot of mysteries behind them.|I could have done a lot of research.
speak;Eirika;I see...|I guess that is unfortunate then.
speak;Eirika;Lute, it's your turn to take a break.|Thank you for your hard work, Lute.
speak;Lute;Finally...|This has been one long night.|I wouldn't mind if I got to finish reading my book.|But all these battle interruptions have been a major pain.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well, I hope you can finish your book soon.|I bet it must be...interesting...
speak;Lute;Yes, it is about how a cyclops eye might contain a dark core.|I can go into more detail if you want?
speak;Eirika;That's ok, Lute...|I feel sleepy just hearing about that...
speak;Lute;Princess, look at all of the research material laying around here.|I've got enough to fill up a whole library!|I'll never regret my decision to come with you for the rest of my life.
speak;Eirika;I'm glad you found a lot to study.|Your research has been a major help.|I'm thankful, even with your...eccentric methods.
speak;Lute;They may be eccentric, but no one can deny my genius!|It will go down in history for centuries!|Now, let me gather my resources.|History is about to happen!

name: Talk_Tethys
_source: speak;Eirika;Oh thank you!|You are too!|You were with Innes' party, correct?
speak;Tethys;Correct!|It was part of our latest job.
speak;Tethys;Kind of.|I'm a dancer!|I help motivate those on the battlefield!|You should watch sometime, dear!
speak;Eirika;Wow!|A dancer!|Our army will be excited to have you along then!
speak;Tethys;Yes, sleep is important for your skin!|I've got to keep my skin nice and beautiful!
speak;Eirika;That's true.|I suppose that would be important for a dancer.
speak;Tethys;It is!|It's hard upkeep for us beautiful women, isn't it?
speak;Eirika;I do wish it was easier...
speak;Eirika;You look so beautiful dancing near the fire, Tethys.
speak;Tethys;He he!|Why thank you, Princess!|I hope this motivates everyone who is collecting bones!
speak;Eirika;I think it will, he he!|Just make sure they don't stare for too long!
speak;Tethys;He he!|Let them stare!|I don't mind!
speak;Eirika;Tethys...|I'm so sorry about your brother...
speak;Tethys;.....It is a dance for the dead...|I hope Ewan will find his way in the next world...|This dance will hopefully keep the dark rider away from him...
speak;Tethys;Yes...|I've been dancing for so long, that my feet are starting to get sore...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Get plenty of rest, Tethys.|Our troops would be sad if you worked yourself too hard.
speak;Tethys;He he!|Indeed!|I can't disappoint my fans!
speak;Eirika;Are you not too hot, Tethys?
speak;Tethys;Of course not!|Look how I'm dressed!|I'm used to the desert!
speak;Eirika;I guess if you put it that way...
speak;Tethys;Don't worry, Princess!|I'll do what I can to keep the tension low.|Don't want morale to go down!
speak;Eirika;Thank you Tethys.|You sure do know how to keep morale high.
speak;Eirika;Tethys...|It looks like there are five of you dancing!
speak;Tethys;He he!|Yes!|This is my special desert dance!|The desert mirages make this dance extra mysterious.
speak;Tethys;He he!|Thank you!|The desert is where I truly shine!
speak;Eirika;Why are you still outside Tethys?
speak;Tethys;I'm trying to see where the closest tavern is!|It's so cold here compared to the desert that I want to warm up by dancing!
speak;Eirika;I see...|I believe there should be a tavern that way.
speak;Tethys;Thank you, Princess!|Now, let's get a good dance workout and warm up!
speak;Eirika;Tethys...|My spirits are down...|I think I could use one of your dances...
speak;Tethys;Oh, Princess...|I understand!|Let me raise your spirits with my dance!|I've got a special one I can do by these waters!|Just you watch!
speak;Tethys;Oh!|I can't stand all of this smoke!|It cannot be good for my skin!
speak;Eirika;I know it's hot and the smoke is troublesome, would you a different outfit in the meantime?|I imagine a dancer outfit is not the best protection from the smoke.
speak;Tethys;This outfit is part of my job!|Do you not say the same thing to the knights?!
speak;Eirika;Well, when you put it that way...
speak;Tethys;I want to help everyone too!|Now I just need to get out of this smoke!|Got to keep my skin young and smooth!
speak;Eirika;Tethys, you may go and rest now.|I understand staying up late is bad for your skin.
speak;Tethys;Oh!|Thank you so much for understanding!|I need at least ten hours of sleep to keep my skin looking young.
speak;Eirika;Ten hours?|That's quite a long time.
speak;Tethys;I know it can be very inconvenient.|A dancer has a very strict diet and sleep regiment though.

speak;Eirika;Tethys, I wanted to thank you for the service you have done for us.|I have learned just how valuable having high troop moral can truely bring.|When you're around, the troops are a so much happier and outgoing.
speak;Tethys;I'm glad to be of service!|I just hope everyone will still come to see me dance when this is over.
speak;Eirika;I bet they will.|I think you've made quite the impression on them.
speak;Ephraim;Excuse me, young lady.|I noticed you were fighting alongside that mercenary.
speak;Tethys;Why, hello handsome!|You must be the prince of Renais I've heard about!|I am Tethys of the Gerik mercenaries.|Happy to be of service!
speak;Ephraim;Well, that explains the outfit and why you were dancing.|You are a good dancer, I will admit.
speak;Tethys;He he!|I hope you come see me dance again soon!
speak;Ephraim;Excuse me, young lady.|Are you ok?|Why are you crying?
speak;Tethys;I...|Just lost my brother...|Can you please let me grieve in peace?...
speak;Tethys;Yes?|I'll be happy to answer any question!
speak;Ephraim;The servants here have been through a troubling time.|They look like they were suffering.|Is there anything you would be able do to lift their spirits?
speak;Tethys;I have just the thing!|There's a special, gentle song and dance I know!|It should hopefully bring them joy.
speak;Ephraim;That's good to hear.|I'll leave it to you then.
speak;Ephraim;Tethys...|It looks like there are five of you dancing!
speak;Tethys;He he!|Yes!|This is my special desert dance!|The desert mirages make this dance extra mysterious.
speak;Tethys;He he!|Thank you!|The desert is where I truly shine!
speak;Ephraim;Why are you still outside Tethys?
speak;Tethys;I'm trying to see where the closest tavern is!|It's so cold here compared to the desert that I want to warm up by dancing!
speak;Ephraim;I see.|I believe there should be a tavern that way.
speak;Tethys;Thank you, handsome Prince!|Now, let's get a good dance workout and warm up!
speak;Tethys;Now that is quite the serious there for a handsome man.|What is troubling you?
speak;Ephraim;Tethys, sorry.|I have a lot on my mind right now.
speak;Tethys;I understand.|Would you like a special dance then?|That might ease your mind a little bit.
speak;Ephraim;Sorry, but not right now.|I appreciate the gesture though.
speak;Tethys;This must be very serious then...
speak;Tethys;Oh!|I can't stand all of this smoke!|It cannot be good for my skin!
speak;Ephraim;I know it's hot and the smoke is troublesome, would you a different outfit in the meantime?|I imagine a dancer outfit is not the best protection from the smoke.
speak;Tethys;This outfit is part of my job!|Do you not say the same thing to the knights?!
speak;Ephraim;Well, when you put it that way.
speak;Tethys;I want to help everyone too!|Now I just need to get out of this smoke!|Got to keep my skin young and smooth!
speak;Ephraim;Tethys, you may go and rest now.|I understand staying up late is bad for your skin.
speak;Tethys;Oh!|Thank you so much for understanding!|I need at least ten hours of sleep to keep my skin looking young.
speak;Ephraim;Ten hours?|That's quite a long time.
speak;Tethys;I know it can be very inconvenient.|A dancer has a very strict diet and sleep regiment though.

speak;Ephraim;Tethys, I wanted to thank you for the service you have done for us.|I have learned just how valuable having high troop moral can truely bring.|When you're around, the troops are a so much happier and outgoing.
speak;Tethys;I'm glad to be of service!|I just hope everyone will still come to see me dance when this is over.
speak;Ephraim;I bet they will.|I think you've made quite the impression on them.

name: Talk_Saleh
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help this battle Saleh.
speak;Saleh;No, I should be thanking you for helping the village.|There are not many people, so any help is significant.
speak;Eirika;Glad to help those in need.|The people's needs must be met.
speak;Saleh;I see you are wise as you are kind.|Thank you.
speak;Saleh;No, the blame is on me...
speak;Saleh;I should have been a better master.|His blood is on my hands...
speak;Saleh;As his master, I will be the one to bury him.|It will be my final duty as master for him...|I'm sorry I have failed you...
speak;Eirika;Sorry Saleh, did I interrupt something?|Your eyes were closed until I came up to you.
speak;Saleh;It's ok, Princess.|I was just finishing up something over here.|Did you need something?
speak;Eirika;I was wondering if you could look over the medical supplies for a while.|The troops are about to rotate shifts.
speak;Eirika;Thank you.|I hope you can tell me what what you were doing sometime, Saleh.|It looked interesting.
speak;Saleh;Yes, we can talk about it another time.
speak;Saleh;Not yet.|I'm gathering my thoughts.|This place was a quiet place for me to think.
speak;Eirika;Ok.|Please let me know if you find anything.
speak;Eirika;Anything special about these bones, Saleh?
speak;Saleh;Yes...|I believe these might be the bones of the ancestors of dragons...

speak;Saleh;That just might be a theory I have.|Something has to come before legends, and these might be a part of the answer.|These bones don't match what current dragons look like.|So they changed form, either by magic or time.
speak;Eirika;They changed form?|I'd imagine that must take a lot of magic to do that...

speak;Saleh;Possibly, this is just a theory.|Another theory is that other dragons came from other lands.|The magic of Magvel then changed them to match the environment over time.|But there are still many unanswered questions...
speak;Eirika;Saleh, I wanted to thank you for your help this last battle.
speak;Saleh;Think nothing of it.|As long as Myrrh is safe, you have my strength.
speak;Eirika;I promise that Myrrh's safety will be a top priority.
speak;Saleh;That brings me ease.|I know she isn't weak and insists on fighting, but it still is a concern.|Anything can happen in war.|It would be a disaster if anything happened to her.
speak;Eirika;I understand.|Ephraim holds her in high esteem, so I will do the same.
speak;Saleh;Princess, I wish to speak to you.
speak;Saleh;That aura coming from Prince Lyon...|It was most foul...
speak;Eirika;Do you think it could be a fake?|Someone impersonating Lyon with dark magic?
speak;Saleh;...I cannot say for sure yet...|It is a possibility.

name: Talk_Ewan
_source: speak;Eirika;Ewan!|I'm glad to see you are ok!
speak;Ewan;Of course!|I knew my master could take care of things!
speak;Eirika;Saleh has indeed been a big help with his magic.
speak;Ewan;He's the best!|I will be like him someday!|Just you wait, lady!
speak;Eirika;Oh my!|Saleh has quite the fan!
speak;Ewan;Go away!|I want to be alone...
speak;Eirika;You ok Ewan?|This was your first major battle since joining us officially.
speak;Ewan;Yes!|It was a lot longer than I thought it was gonna be!|But I did learn a lot!
speak;Eirika;You're doing pretty well for someone so young...
speak;Ewan;Of course!|I'm just putting to use what I learned from my master, Saleh!
speak;Ewan;Ha ha!|Become my student and I can teach you!
speak;Ewan;I'm trying a technique that master taught me...|But, it's hard to stay so still...
speak;Eirika;That must be hard for you indeed...
speak;Ewan;What is that supposed to mean?!
speak;Eirika;Ewan, you look so red...|Are you ok?
speak;Ewan;Darn...|I was trying to make an oasis using water magic...|But it didn't work...
speak;Eirika;Oh Ewan...|Try not to scare me like that again, ok?
speak;Ewan;Wow!|That sure was a big battle, Princess!
speak;Eirika;Indeed...|But it was worth it...|We're finally home...
speak;Ewan;Welcome home, Princess!|I bet you're happy to be back.
speak;Eirika;Yes, Ewan.|I'm very happy, it's almost like a dream...
speak;Ewan;Well, we ought to have a big celebration later!|I learned a new spell to make fireworks!
speak;Eirika;Ewan, what magic are you practicing there?
speak;Ewan;I'm trying to mimic what spell that Lyon guy was casting.|His dark magic was impressive!
speak;Eirika;Lyon...|His magic didn't used to be so...Dark...|His magic was a lot more warm than that...
speak;Ewan;Oh really?|I couldn't sense any warmth in his magic at all...

name: Talk_Cormag
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you for joining us Cormag...
speak;Eirika;If there is anything that you need.|Please let us know.|We will be happy to help you...
speak;Cormag;That was an impressive invasion, Princess.|You were able to take over the castle so efficiently.
speak;Eirika;This wasn't an invasion, Cormag.|This is a rescue mission.|We are here to save the Queen, not take over.
speak;Cormag;You're right.|I apologize, Princess...|I guess I'm not used to not being on Grado's side yet...|We've done nothing but invade for quite a while now...
speak;Eirika;...I understand...|It's ok...|Just let me know if you find out anything about the Queen...
speak;Eirika;So Cormag...|Now that Valter is dead...|What are you going to do?...
speak;Cormag;Just as I worried...|Even though Valter is dead, I feel nothing...
speak;Eirika;Cormag...|Valter was a monster, and now he is gone.|The people of Grado need reformation...|They need good men.|Cormag, you can become a good man that Grado needs.
speak;Cormag;A good man for Grado...|Yes...|I think my brother would want me to do that...|Thank you, Eirika...
speak;Cormag;I will help you finish this fight.|Then I will help Grado recover.|For my brother.|For my country.
speak;Eirika;Cormag...|Thank you for your help this battle...
speak;Cormag;It was nothing.|Are you glad to be back home?|I'd imagine you would be happy to be back.
speak;Eirika;I am happy...|I just wish I could've gotten here sooner...|I feel terrible for the people of Renais and their suffering...
speak;Cormag;Eirika...|I'm glad I didn't hurt you...|Glen would have been angry at my foolishness...
speak;Eirika;Cormag...|Your brother must be proud of you.|You did the right thing.
speak;Cormag;I think he is proud.|I will see that his legacy lives on.
speak;Eirika;Cormag, any luck with your wyvern?|Found any signs of Lyon?
speak;Cormag;...No.|No signs of the Prince anywhere...
speak;Cormag;...The Prince sure has changed.|In Grado, he was known for his kindness.|So it's hard to believe that was the real Prince Lyon...
speak;Eirika;I agree...|The Lyon I know was so kind...
speak;Cormag;...I guess we'll have to see if this is his true nature or not.

name: Talk_Rennac
_source: speak;Rennac;Yes, that's me.|Professional thief at your service.
speak;Eirika;Is that why you are in that chest?
speak;Eirika;What in the world are you doing, Rennac?
speak;Rennac;I'm trying to find buried treasure in this stupid desert!|With the palace burned down, I need to make up for my losses!
speak;Eirika;Rennac...|How much money do you even need?...
speak;Eirika;I don't think you'll find much treasure here Rennac...
speak;Rennac;First Jehanna, now Renais?!|Aren't castles supposed to be full of treasure?!|Gold?!|Jewelry?!
speak;Eirika;Father always had our wealth invested more in agriculture, rather than gold.|That way the people of Renais would be able to benefit as well.
speak;Rennac;Ughhh...|Well that's fair...|I suppose I would make sure I was fed first, before riches...|But I better find some gold soon!
speak;Eirika;Rennac, how deep do your contacts go with the merchants?
speak;Rennac;Pretty deep, if I do say so myself.|Why do you ask?
speak;Eirika;Do you think you would be able to find some information on Lyon?
speak;Rennac;Royal family espionage, huh?|That's gonna be a tall order, but I'll see what I can do.
speak;Rennac;Don't thank me yet, I might not even find anything.
speak;Eirika;Still, I really appreciate it Rennac!
speak;Rennac;Ughh...|Royalty, I swear they are gonna be the end of me...

name: Talk_Duessel
_source: speak;Duessel;Ahh...|Princess Eirika...|It soothes my old soul to see you still alive...
speak;Eirika;I'm relieved to see you alive as well.|But, why are you here?|You are a general of Grado...
speak;Duessel;I was until I was declared a traitor by the king...|Ephraim found me and came to my side while I was being attacked.|I have been by his side ever since.

speak;Eirika;Sorry...|It's been so hard fighting against Grado for so long...|We used be such good friends before all of this...|I'm glad to see the good people of Grado still, even with all of this fighting...
speak;Duessel;Princess...|You are a kind soul...|I thank you again for living...|Magvel needs good souls like you and Ephraim...
speak;Duessel;These soldiers didn't want to fight...|They must have been demoralized working under Orson.|Fighting under a traitor of a nation...
speak;Eirika;I see...|They must have been proud of their home...|Having to fight under a traitor...
speak;Duessel;Let me give them proper burials, Princess.|They would be honored to be put to rest by a general of Grado.|Even if I may be a traitor myself...
speak;Eirika;We know you are not a traitor, Duessel...|You are fighting to restore Grado.|I know they will be proud, knowing that.
speak;Duessel;You have my thanks again, Princess.|This old man is becoming sentimental again...
speak;Duessel;I'm sorry, Princess.|I have nothing to report...|I'm worried with what is going on with the Prince...
speak;Eirika;Me too...|The Lyon I know is so kind and peaceful...|I can only imagine that something else is afoot...

speak;Duessel;I believe so too...|Looking back, there were signs that something was bothering Prince Lyon and King Vigarde...|I was a fool not to act sooner...|I may have been able to stop this all from happening...
speak;Eirika;I wonder if I could've have done something too, if I knew earlier...|If only I was there...
speak;Duessel;Well, we can't ponder upon the past for too long.|I still have my lance, so I can fight to fix what is wrong.|You can do the same with your sword.
speak;Eirika;You're right, Duessel.|We must do what we can to end this war.|As long as we are alive, we have a chance.

name: Talk_Knoll
_source: speak;Eirika;Excuse me.|I don't recognize your face...
speak;Knoll;Pardon me, I am Knoll.|I am of Grado.|Prince Ephraim saved me from being executed and I've been by his side since.
speak;Eirika;I see...|I am Princess Eirika, sister of Ephraim.|I'm glad my brother saved you.|I don't want any more unwarranted deaths...
speak;Knoll;I see...|You are a kind one...|Fate is interesting like that...
speak;Knoll;Excuse me.|I have things I must to attend to.|If there is anything you need, please make it quick.
speak;Knoll;I can sense some evil magic at work near.|Forbidden magic.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Is it a threat to us?
speak;Knoll;I don't think so, but keep your guard up.|Who knows what we might find next.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Knoll.|I'll keep my guard up.
speak;Knoll;Good.|I'll let you know if I find anything new.
speak;Eirika;Knoll, is there anyway you can track down Lyon?
speak;Knoll;I'm sorry, Princess...|I don't have the resources to track him down in a short amount of time...|I fear you might not be ready to face him yet, at least in the state you are in.
speak;Knoll;If what he said was true, we need proper preparation.|An army out of position could easily be wiped out by a strong enemy.|...I know it's tough, but take some time to gather more intel.
speak;Eirika;You're right Knoll...|I will ponder upon your words...
speak;Knoll;...That's all I can do for now then.

name: Talk_Seth
_source: speak;Seth;We have gained control of the area.|We should be safe for now.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Seth.|I can't believe it has come to this...
speak;Eirika;What is going on in Grado?...|Lyon...
speak;Seth;We've done all that we can here.|It would be wise to move on now, Princess.
speak;Eirika;If only we could've been quicker...
speak;Seth;What's done is done.|We have to keep moving or we start to doubt ourselves.
speak;Eirika;You're right, we have to keep moving forward.
speak;Seth;Finding your bracelet is our top priority.|Let's get to it as soon as we can.
speak;Eirika;Ok, I'll let keep an eye out.
speak;Seth;First Grado and now monsters.|This journey is becoming a lot more than we expected...
speak;Eirika;Yes...|Though, we cannot stop now...|We still have to find Ephraim...
speak;Seth;You're right, Princess.|Let me know when you're ready to depart.
speak;Seth;It looks like the area is cleared out.|Let's talk with that cleric as soon as we can.
speak;Eirika;Agreed, it sounded like she knew something.
speak;Seth;The fog has lifted and we are ready to move out whenever you are.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Seth.|I'm glad this fog is gone.|It was difficult to navigate with it.
speak;Seth;It was quite the hinderance, but now we can move forward.
speak;Seth;Are you ready to enter the castle?|We don't know what will happen once we go inside.
speak;Seth;It was a tough battle, but we pulled through...
speak;Eirika;We found Ephraim too...|It was long, but we finally found my dear brother...
speak;Seth;It is a miracle.|I'll prepare us some space so we can discuss further.|Let me know when you are ready.
speak;Seth;I'm trying to pull some strings here.|I'll let you know if I find any leads.
speak;Seth;I'm working on securing the palace right now.|Let me know if you learn of anything new.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Seth.|I'll keep my eyes open.
speak;Seth;Even more monsters...|They were even stronger than before...|This isn't good Princess...
speak;Eirika;No...|How are they growing in numbers so much?...
speak;Seth;Looks like the area is secure.|Let me know when you're ready to talk.
speak;Eirika;Will do Seth.|Glad to see the monsters are finally gone...
speak;Seth;We survived the onslaught.|Let's recollect ourselves then we can go over our next plan.
speak;Eirika;I agree.|I'm a little tired after such a tough battle...
speak;Seth;We are still searching for the Queen.|The troops are spread out wide.
speak;Eirika;Good.|I hope we find her soon...
speak;Seth;I'm setting up the council room for our meeting.|Let me know when you are ready.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Seth...|I'm so happy we finally found Ephraim...
speak;Seth;We finally did it...|Renais castle is secured...
speak;Seth;King Fado...|I hope now you can rest in peace...
speak;Eirika;Father...|We are finally home...|The people of Renais are free...|It took so long, but we did it...
speak;Seth;No signs of Lyon anymore...|Wherever he went, it's certainly not around here anymore.
speak;Eirika;How did it come to this?|You can't truly be gone, can you?...
speak;Seth;Looks like all the monsters have been cleared out.|Your orders?
speak;Eirika;Hmmmm....|I must make sure our troops are doing ok.|This area is rough to move around in...
speak;Seth;Understood, Princess.|I'll be here waiting.|Keep your guard up though.
speak;Seth;The enemy is retreating.|The sun will be coming out soon.|It looks like we have won this fight.
speak;Eirika;The enemy was very strong...|How does Grado still have so many strong troops?...
speak;Seth;Their troops seemed...|Odd...|They had no fear.|No emotion...|I don't think these were normal men...|Or Grado had some disciplined troops left in reserve.
speak;Seth;This is it, Princess.|Prince Lyon should be just ahead...|This could be our final battle.
speak;Seth;Do you think you're ready?|Or do you still need some time?
speak;Seth;The fort is now ours, Prince Ephraim.|Our first battle together has been a success.
speak;Ephraim;Indeed.|I'm still getting used to fighting with a full army, but your presence helps.|I can see why my Father trusted you with my sister.
speak;Seth;I've only done what I must, my Liege.|I'm your lance and your guard.
speak;Ephraim;And with that, we will win any battle.
speak;Seth;We have secured the port, my Liege.|I'm working on getting us a proper ship.|I'll let you know if I find any leads.
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|Thank you, Seth.|I might need something from you, so be on standby.
speak;Seth;The ship is now ours.|That was...|An interesting battle...
speak;Ephraim;I'm glad we were ready to fight.|We wouldn't have won if our troops weren't in tip top shape.
speak;Seth;I agree.|Now, I'll stand guard.|Let me know if you need anything.
speak;Seth;Our surrounding area is now clear, my Liege.|The town seems to have minimal damage as well.
speak;Ephraim;Good.|Last thing I want is civilians to be hurt due to our battle.|I want this war to end quickly, for their sake.
speak;Seth;I agree.|King Fado would be proud of the kind of man you are becoming.
speak;Ephraim;I bet this is what he would have wanted.|And I'll make it come true.
speak;Ephraim;I understand...|There was nothing I could do to change her mind...
speak;Ephraim;Seth.|See to it that she has a proper funeral.|She may have fought against us, but I do not see her as an enemy.
speak;Seth;The capital is now ours, my Liege.|Though where King Vigarde went, I do not know.|It's like he...|Disappeared.
speak;Ephraim;Vigarde...|Why did things come to this?...
speak;Seth;Do you feel sorrow for King Vigarde?
speak;Ephraim;...I believe so...|Something doesn't feel right.|When we fought, he seemed distant...|Gone...|Then with Lyon.....
speak;Ephraim;I need answers.|I can't rest until I know the truth.
speak;Seth;I'm setting up the council room for our meeting.|Let me know when you are ready.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you Seth...|I'm glad we were able to reach Eirika in time.
speak;Seth;We finally did it...|Renais castle is secured...
speak;Seth;King Fado...|I hope now you can rest in peace...
speak;Ephraim;Father...|We are finally home...|The people of Renais are free...|It took so long, but we did it...
speak;Seth;No signs of Lyon anymore...|Wherever he went, it's certainly not around here anymore.
speak;Ephraim;How did it come to this?|Is my friend truly gone?...
speak;Seth;Looks like all the monsters have been cleared out.|Your orders?
speak;Ephraim;Hmmmm....|I'll go check on our troops.|This area is taxing on our men.
speak;Seth;Understood, my Liege.|I'll be here waiting.|Keep your guard up though.
speak;Seth;The enemy is retreating.|The sun will be coming out soon.|It looks like we have won this fight.
speak;Ephraim;The enemy was very strong.|How does Grado still have so many strong troops?
speak;Seth;Their troops seemed...|Odd...|They had no fear.|No emotion...|I don't think these were normal men...|Or Grado had some disciplined troops left in reserve.
speak;Seth;This is it, my Liege.|Prince Lyon should be just ahead...|This could be our final battle.
speak;Seth;Do you think you're ready?|Or do you still need some time?

name: Talk_Franz
_source: speak;Franz;Princess Eirika, it is good to see you're well.
speak;Eirika;Franz, you made it through unscathed...

speak;Franz;Y-yes, Your Highness!|I met up with Sir Gilliam of Frelia and explained the situation in Renais.|He told me that Princess Tana was in danger as well, here at Mulan.|We rode as swiftly as we could.
speak;Eirika;Tana is here?|Franz, we must hurry!
speak;Franz;I'm ok Princess Eirika...|This was just my first battle...|It was tougher than I thought.
speak;Eirika;It's ok, Franz.|This has been scary for me too...
speak;Franz;I see...|Well, Forde must have gone through the same thing.|I have to stay strong, just like him!
speak;Eirika;He he he!|That's a good attitude Franz!
speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help Franz.
speak;Franz;I feel like I could've done more...
speak;Eirika;It's all right Franz, don't push yourself too hard.
speak;Franz;If you say so, Princess...|I'll keep training to be more like General Seth though!
speak;Eirika;He he!|I'll make sure not to fall behind you then!
speak;Franz;What in the world were those weird wolves?
speak;Eirika;They didn't look like normal wolves...|They were a lot stronger than normal wolves too...
speak;Franz;True...|Hope we don't run into any more of them...
speak;Franz;These monsters look so gross!|Look how they turn to ash after you kill them!
speak;Eirika;Yeah, it's so grotesque...|I hope we don't have to fight them ever again...
speak;Franz;Well, if we do Princess, I'll fight extra hard so you don't have to!
speak;Eirika;He he he!|Thank you Franz!|We are so lucky to have you!
speak;Eirika;How does this area look Franz?
speak;Franz;Clear.|I think most of the citizens were able to get out of the way in time.
speak;Eirika;That's good.|I don't want any innocent lives to be lost because of us.
speak;Franz;Yeah...|I agree...|I'll see what else I can do to help the citizens in the meantime.
speak;Franz;I'm helping General Seth for our departure.|I've been doing my best to learn from him as much as I can!
speak;Eirika;That's good.|You're shaping into a great knight Franz!
speak;Franz;Hey Princess, I've been doing some thinking lately.
speak;Eirika;Oh?|What have you been thinking about Franz.
speak;Franz;I've been thinking about Forde and Ephraim.
speak;Franz;Oh!|I wanted to say that I've been thinking that they are probably ok!|Forde wouldn't let anything happen to Ephraim!|Please don't be sad princess!
speak;Franz;Yeah!|I just knew he was alive!|I'm so happy to see him!
speak;Eirika;I'm so happy for you Franz.|I'll let you two have some time to talk.
speak;Eirika;Do you like the sea, Franz?
speak;Franz;I can appreciate its beauty.|My brother Forde likes it more, though.
speak;Franz;He says that the sea is great at inspiring beauty.|Though I'm not entirely sure what he means by that...
speak;Eirika;I see...|I guess Forde is a lot more sophisticated than I thought...
speak;Eirika;Yeah, that must have taken a lot of time to make...
speak;Franz;Yeah.....|No wonder this place was hard to take back.
speak;Eirika;Indeed, it was a very strategic point.
speak;Eirika;I've got to say Franz, you seem a lot more confident than you were before.|You look like a mighty knight now!
speak;Franz;Really?|Thank you Princess.|I thought I would be more excited to hear that, but...
speak;Franz;This journey has been a lot longer than I thought.|I knew it wouldn't be easy, but...
speak;Eirika;I understand...|It's been hard for both of us...|But stay strong for me Franz.|That helps more than you know Franz.
speak;Franz;Ok, I'll make sure to be strong for the both of us!
speak;Eirika;Are you working on collecting the bones, Franz?
speak;Franz;Yeah, there is a lot of ground to cover.|I can get around faster since I'm on a mount.
speak;Eirika;True.|Well, don't push yourself too hard collecting them, ok?
speak;Franz;Will do Princess!|I'll keep my eye out for any strays!
speak;Franz;Yes!|He wants me to get used to setting up meetings if I ever take command!
speak;Eirika;That's great Franz!|You are shaping up to be a great knight!
speak;Franz;I get more used to it day by day!|I'll be like my father in no time!
speak;Eirika;Thank you Franz.|Your vigilance is needed more than ever now.
speak;Eirika;I'm glad you're alive Franz. That was a deadly trap.
speak;Franz;Me too...|I can't believe they are willing to resort to that kind of tactic...|No honor in fighting that way...
speak;Eirika;I know you would never fight like that, Franz.|You are an honorable knight.
speak;Franz;Ha ha!|Thank you, Princess!|That makes me feel better!
speak;Eirika;Franz...|We did it.|We are back home...
speak;Franz;It almost feels unreal, Princess.|It all looks the same, but I feel so different.|It's almost like a dream.
speak;Eirika;I agree...|We've been through so much...|Being home makes me feel tired...|But we can't stop yet, we still have a job to do Franz.
speak;Franz;Yes, Princess!|I will get back to work!
speak;Eirika;I'll be ok...|Just a little shaken...
speak;Franz;Because of that encounter with Prince Lyon?|Something seemed wrong with him.|I was too far away though to hear what he was saying...
speak;Eirika;It's ok Franz, I'll see if I can find a way to help him...
speak;Franz;Ok, if you say so Princess...
speak;Franz;Oh wow!|It sure is hot here!|I'm dripping in sweat!
speak;Eirika;I hate to admit it, but I'm feeling the same way...|Make sure you drink enough water Franz.|I don't want anything to happen to you...
speak;Franz;Thank you, Princess!|We've come this far, I can't falter now!
speak;Eirika;We have come so far...|We've grown so much.
speak;Eirika;Are you ok, Franz?|It looks like we are safe for now.
speak;Franz;That was quite the battle!|Good thing I'm always prepared for battle!|A true knight of Renais is always ready to fight!
speak;Eirika;You truly are a knight of Renais.|Franz, I'm honored to have such an excellent knight.|You do Renais proud.
speak;Franz;Thank you, Princess!|I will fight for Renais until the day I perish!
speak;Eirika;He he!|Well, I hope you will serve us for a long time.|Now get some rest, the sun is already close to coming out!
speak;Franz;Princess...|I can tell you're nervous.|I can tell, because I was like that when I first became a knight.
speak;Eirika;Franz...|I am...|I am nervous about what could happen next...|Do I have the strength needed?...
speak;Franz;Everything will be ok, Princess!|Here, come smile with me!
speak;Eirika;He he!|Now that's a silly smile, Franz!
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Franz.|I feel a little better now.
speak;Franz;Good!|Now, let me know where you need me!|I will always fight for Renais!
speak;Franz;Yes, Prince Ephraim!|I am Franz!|An official knight of Renais!|My father served many years ago, and I am Forde's brother!
speak;Ephraim;Ahh, I can see the resemblance now.|I'm more used to seeing Forde's sleeping face than his awake face.
speak;Ephraim;I trust him with my life though.|He puts in the work when needed.|That means I have high expectations for you.|You got that Franz?
speak;Franz;Understood, my Liege!|I will fight for Renais with my life!
speak;Ephraim;Good, now let's get to work.
speak;Franz;Did he at least die with honor?...
speak;Ephraim;...Yes.|Like a true knight of Renais...
speak;Franz;I see...|Like a true knight...|Thank you, Prince Ephraim...
speak;Franz;Yes, Sir!|I'm helping transfer supplies to those affected!
speak;Ephraim;Good.|Make sure they are taken care of.|I won't let them suffer due to our fighting.
speak;Franz;Will do!|Consider it done, my Liege!
speak;Ephraim;Great, now keep up the good work, Franz.
speak;Franz;Looks like it!|Nothing left but bones!
speak;Ephraim;These bones give me the creeps.|I wish they would disappear like everything else.
speak;Franz;It's strange that the bones remain...
speak;Ephraim;Well, as long as they stay dead, I won't be too upset.
speak;Franz;I won't complain too much either.
speak;Franz;The villages are secured and supplies have been delivered!
speak;Ephraim;Perfect.|Franz, you have been doing a great job at meeting my expectations.|Keep it up, and you might get a promotion soon.
speak;Franz;Wow!|A promotion!|You honor me, my Liege!
speak;Ephraim;It's to be expected of great work.|Our army needs reliable men like you.
speak;Franz;Yes, Sir!|I will do my best to live up to your expectations!
speak;Franz;That general...|She didn't seem like a bad person...
speak;Franz;Her troops seemed really dedicated to her.|They must have really trusted her.
speak;Franz;Prince Ephraim!|Nothing to report here!|The area has been secured.
speak;Ephraim;...Thank you Franz.|Make sure any servants are taken care of.
speak;Ephraim;It seems like they've been through a lot...|We'll see to make sure they are treated with respect.
speak;Ephraim;I'm glad you're alive Franz, that was a deadly battle.
speak;Franz;Me too...|I can't believe the devastation they left behind...|No respect for who they fight against...
speak;Ephraim;Me either...|That's why we must not fight like that, Franz.|You must stay an honorable knight.
speak;Franz;Understood, my Liege.|I will not stray from my path.
speak;Ephraim;Good, I will see to that.
speak;Ephraim;Franz...|We did it.|We are back home...
speak;Franz;It almost feels unreal, my Liege.|It all looks the same, but I feel so different.|It's almost like a dream.
speak;Ephraim;I agree.|We've been through so much...|Being home makes me feel tired.|But we can't stop yet. We still have a job to do, Franz.
speak;Franz;Yes, Prince Ephraim!|I will get back to work!
speak;Franz;Nothing so far, sorry, my Liege...
speak;Ephraim;I'll be ok.|Just a little shaken...
speak;Franz;Because of that encounter with Prince Lyon?|Something seemed wrong with him.|I was too far away though to hear what he was saying...
speak;Ephraim;It's ok Franz, I'll see if I can find a way to help him.|I must find a way.
speak;Franz;Oh wow!|It sure is hot here!|I'm dripping in sweat!
speak;Ephraim;I hate to admit it, but I'm feeling the same way...|Make sure you drink enough water Franz.|I don't want anything to happen to you.
speak;Franz;Thank you, my Liege!|We've come this far, I can't falter now!
speak;Ephraim;We have come so far.|We're almost there.
speak;Ephraim;Are you ok, Franz?|It looks like we are safe for now.
speak;Franz;That was quite the battle!|Good thing I'm always prepared for battle!|A true knight of Renais is always ready to fight!
speak;Ephraim;You truly are a knight of Renais.|Franz, I'm honored to have such an excellent knight.|You do Renais proud.
speak;Franz;Thank you, my Liege!|I will fight for Renais until the day I perish!
speak;Ephraim;Well, I hope you will serve us for a long time.|Now get some rest, the sun is already close to coming out!
speak;Ephraim;Franz, are you ready?|I will need your strength for this fight.
speak;Franz;Yes, Sir!|It's strange, usually I used to be nervous, but not anymore.|I feel like I can take on any challenge.
speak;Ephraim;Franz.|You are a true knight of Renais.|Your bravery is what we all strive for.|Now, finish preparing.|We have a war to win.
speak;Franz;Yes, Sir!|I'm with you until the end!

name: Talk_Gilliam
_source: speak;Gilliam;Thank you for your assistance Princess Eirika.
speak;Eirika;You're welcome!|May I ask for your name?
speak;Gilliam;Forgive me Princess, I forgot to introduce myself!
speak;Gilliam;I am Gilliam, a knight in service of Frelia!|I will give my life for Frelia!
speak;Gilliam;Likewise, though we must hurry into the castle and save Princess Tana!
speak;Eirika;Indeed!|We'll be there with you soon Tana!
speak;Eirika;What are you doing Sir Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;I am helping move goods between the villages before we depart.
speak;Eirika;That's so kind of you Gilliam!|I bet they appreciate it!
speak;Gilliam;As a knight, I must do what I can to serve and improve lives, Frelian or not.
speak;Gilliam;Ha ha ha!|Why thank you Princess!
speak;Eirika;Thank you for protecting us Gilliam!
speak;Gilliam;They had some magic users in this stronghold...|It was tough, but I'm glad I'm still standing.
speak;Eirika;Yeah, armor isn't as effective against magic, but you're tougher than the average man!|He he!
speak;Eirika;Thank you for staying with us Gilliam.|I know we weren't prepared to fight monsters...
speak;Gilliam;I was a little surprised too...|But whether it be lances or claws, I will see my duty to the end!
speak;Eirika;He he!|A true knight to the end!
speak;Eirika;How is this area holding up Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;Some of the buildings took some damage.|I'm gonna help restore what buildings I can.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Don't push yourself too far though Gilliam...
speak;Gilliam;Ha ha ha!|Don't worry Princess!|I'll leave plenty of strength for you!
speak;Eirika;Anything we can salvage from this fort?
speak;Gilliam;Not really...No...|I've searched high and low, but nothing really of notice.
speak;Eirika;Well, thank you for looking Gilliam.|Your vigilance is very admirable!
speak;Gilliam;Thanks as always Princess!|You are too kind ha ha!
speak;Eirika;Looks like we will be going into the castle soon Gilliam.
speak;Gilliam;I'm glad to hear that.|I like being in a castle compared to marching outside.
speak;Eirika;I guess marching in that armor would be tiring after a while.
speak;Gilliam;You get used to it over time, ha ha!|Want to try princess?
speak;Eirika;Are you trying to repair the bridge Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;Yeah, there isn't much else for me to do.|Might as well make our lives easier for later.
speak;Eirika;Oh Gilliam...|You should probably take a break soon...
speak;Eirika;You seem to be enjoying yourself Gilliam
speak;Gilliam;Yes, it's great to be by the sea again.|I feel like I'm back at home.
speak;Eirika;Frelia was close to the sea.
speak;Gilliam;Oh the sea...|It soothes my soul...
speak;Eirika;Why are you gathering rocks Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;A townsman wanted some rocks to make a trap.|Just in case anyone else invades.
speak;Eirika;I see...|The people must be afraid they'll be attacked again...
speak;Gilliam;Indeed...|Things have taken a turn for the worst around Magvell...
speak;Eirika;These monsters are getting stronger...|Glad you're ok though Gilliam...
speak;Gilliam;Yeah...|How are these monsters getting stronger?|It's not like they can train or anything...
speak;Eirika;It's beyond me...|I hope they don't get any stronger than that though...
speak;Gilliam;Yeah, I'm in charge of maintaining the fire for bone burning.
speak;Eirika;It looks a little hot though...|Are you ok?
speak;Gilliam;It is...|A little hot...|...Can you get some water for me please?...
speak;Eirika;Of course, I'll be back in a moment!
speak;Eirika;Thank you for shielding us Gilliam.|It was a big barrage, but you handled it quite well.
speak;Gilliam;You're welcome, Princess.|Though, it wasn't easy.|Going from monsters to an actual army again feels very different...
speak;Eirika;I'm not sure who I would rather fight at this point...
speak;Gilliam;Princess, it looks like there are some scratches on the floor here.
speak;Eirika;Did the Queen try to fight to escape her kidnappers?|Can we track where she went?
speak;Gilliam;Possibly by the looks of it, but the scratches stop by the stairs.|They must have stunned her and carried her away.
speak;Eirika;I see...|See if you can find any more tracks.
speak;Gilliam;Yes...|It was getting way too hot...|I thought my armor was going to fuse with me...
speak;Eirika;That wouldn't be good...|Make sure to get enough water...
speak;Eirika;Gilliam...|Thank you so much for your service to Renais.|I cannot give King Hayden enough thanks.
speak;Gilliam;You're welcome, Princess.|I'm happy to see Renais finally have its rightful ruler back.|The people will rejoice.
speak;Eirika;I hope so.|They have had enough suffering.|It's time for Renais to heal.
speak;Gilliam;Princess, we are secure down the south route...
speak;Gilliam;It will be ok, Princess.|We've got your back.
speak;Eirika;Gilliam, are you getting enough water?|You must be so hot in that armor...
speak;Gilliam;After being in the desert, I feel used to this now.
speak;Gilliam;...I might need some more water...
speak;Eirika;Gilliam, can I ask you to stand guard for just a little longer?|We don't want anymore ambushes this morning.
speak;Gilliam;Understood, Princess.|I will stay guard as long as you need.
speak;Eirika;Thank you.|I'll get you a replacement soon. I don't want you to be tired.
speak;Gilliam;Don't mind me, Princess.|After everything we've been through, I want to serve with all my strength.
speak;Eirika;Gilliam...|Thank you for staying with us for so long.|Frelia will be proud of your dedication.
speak;Gilliam;It has been an honor fighting with you, Princess.|I think it's time we put an end to this war.
speak;Eirika;Yes...|It has gone on for far too long.|Magvel must have peace restored.
speak;Gilliam;Exactly.|And by my lance, I will help bring peace!
speak;Ephraim;Gilliam, you are a knight of Frelia, correct?
speak;Gilliam;Yes, Prince Ephraim.|I was assigned to help Princess Eirika by King Hayden himself.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|I must thank King Hayden next time I see him.|I can tell you were trained well.
speak;Gilliam;You honor me, Prince Ephraim.|I hope my skills meet your expectations.
speak;Ephraim;Those are some heavy logs you're carrying, Gilliam.|Do you need help?
speak;Gilliam;No, Prince Ephraim.|I've got them just fine.|Thank you though.
speak;Ephraim;You are as strong as I imagined.|I had some doubts, but those have been washed away.
speak;Ephraim;Do not worry, Gilliam.|My training growing up has been rigid, so I am strict with my troops.|I can tell now, I won't have any issues with you.
speak;Gilliam;Glad to hear.|Now if you'll excuse me, I need to deliver these logs.
speak;Ephraim;Keep up the great work, Gilliam.
speak;Gilliam;I'm holding up ok...|I don't like boats too much though...
speak;Ephraim;Oh yeah?|You grew up in Frelia though, right?|You're right by the ocean.
speak;Gilliam;Yes, but the sea doesn't agree with me too much.|It's part of why I became a knight, so I wouldn't have to go to sea.|I could still get paid without getting sick.
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Well, if you get too sick, go see a cleric.
speak;Gilliam;The villagers need some more supplies.|I'm going to go and help with the transfer.
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|Once you're done, see if you can help get rid of these bones.|The villagers would appreciate that.
speak;Gilliam;Consider it done.|I want these bones gone as soon as possible too.|They give me a bad feeling.
speak;Ephraim;You too, huh?|Well, I don't have to tell you twice then.
speak;Gilliam;Not too much, but they were surprised there was a battle.|It seems the Grado troops didn't bother the villagers at all.|They said they were treated with respect.
speak;Gilliam;It sounds like there was honor among these troops.
speak;Ephraim;I can see why, because General Selena was very disciplined.
speak;Ephraim;Gilliam, any signs of King Vigarde anywhere?
speak;Gilliam;No, I haven't seen anyone go down this way except us and the servants.
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Well, stay vigilant.|He could still be anywhere.
speak;Gilliam;Understood.|I will keep my eye out.
speak;Ephraim;I leave it to you then.|Though, he could be long gone by now...|If he even was here...
speak;Ephraim;You're so far from the desert, Gilliam.|Are you ok?
speak;Gilliam;Yes...|It was getting way too hot...|I thought my armor was going to fuse with me...
speak;Ephraim;That wouldn't be good.|Make sure to get enough water.|That's an order.
speak;Ephraim;Gilliam.|Thank you so much for your service to Renais.|I cannot give King Hayden enough thanks.
speak;Gilliam;You're welcome, Prince Ephraim.|I'm happy to see Renais finally have it's rightful ruler back.|The people will rejoice.
speak;Ephraim;I hope so.|They have had enough suffering.|It's time for Renais to heal.
speak;Gilliam;Prince Ephraim, we are secure down the south route...
speak;Gilliam;It will be ok, Prince Ephraim.|We've got your back.
speak;Ephraim;Gilliam, are you getting enough water?|You must be so hot in that armor.
speak;Gilliam;After being in the desert, I feel used to this now.
speak;Gilliam;...I might need some more water...
speak;Ephraim;I'll see to it that you get some water.
speak;Ephraim;Gilliam, can I ask you to stand guard for just a little longer?|We don't want any more ambushes this morning.
speak;Gilliam;Understood, Prince Ephraim.|I will stay guard as long as you need.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you.|I'll get you a replacement soon. I don't want you to be tired.
speak;Gilliam;Don't mind me, Prince Ephraim.|After everything we've been through, I want to serve with all my strength.
speak;Ephraim;Gilliam.|Thank you for staying with us for so long.|Frelia will be proud of your dedication.
speak;Gilliam;It has been an honor fighting with you, Prince Ephraim.|I think it's time we put an end to this war.
speak;Ephraim;Yes...|It has gone for far too long.|Magvel must have peace restored.
speak;Gilliam;Exactly.|And by my lance, I will help bring peace!
speak;Ephraim;Make it two lances, cause we're in this together!

name: Talk_Vanessa
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help in this battle.|Your ability to fly was a huge asset to us.
speak;Vanessa;You're welcome Princess.|I'm glad I was able to fulfill my duty today.
speak;Eirika;The Frelian knights sure are well trained.|No wonder King Hayden has so much respect for them.
speak;Vanessa;Indeed.|We have high respect to our king, and will give our lives for him.
speak;Eirika;Well, I'll make sure that it won't come to that.|I don't want to lose anyone...
speak;Vanessa;Understood Princess.|We will live to fight another day.
speak;Eirika;How are you able to fly in an enclosed space like this Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;It is very tough, but I'm getting the hang of it...
speak;Eirika;How does your pegasus feel about it?
speak;Vanessa;She doesn't like it very much to be honest.|I had to train her a lot just to get her to walk into places like this.
speak;Eirika;How are you holding up Vanessa?
speak;Eirika;You sure?|You look a little pale...
speak;Vanessa;Yeah, just need a little break...
speak;Eirika;Are you busy right now Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;I'm sorry Princess, I am a little busy.|I'm helping this little girl find her parents.
speak;Eirika;It's ok Vanessa, that is more important.|I hope you find her parents soon.
speak;Vanessa;We will.|I'm gonna take her up in the air on my pegasus and see if we can find them.|She seems excited to go flying.
speak;Eirika;He he!|I would be excited too!|You're a wonderful person Vanessa.
speak;Eirika;What are you looking for Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;I'm looking for any herbs that could help out the injured.
speak;Eirika;That is so kind of you Vanessa.|I bet they will appreciate that.
speak;Vanessa;This is just to keep my mind off of things.|My blood is boiling right now at Grado...
speak;Eirika;Are you flying down supplies for the locals, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;Yes, it's the least I could do for them.|I was hoping to learn anything from as well.|Nothing noteworthy though...
speak;Eirika;That's ok.|As long as you're helping the people Vanessa.
speak;Eirika;What are you doing with those blocks?
speak;Vanessa;I'm helping rebuild the bridge.|I can get down to the lower part of the structure with my Pegasus without getting wet.
speak;Eirika;Wow!|That's amazing!|That must take some skill!
speak;Vanessa;He he!|Nothing too much to brag about!
speak;Eirika;Your pegasus seems to be happy to be near the sea.
speak;Vanessa;Yeah, she love the spray of the water.|We have taken many trips flying over the sea.|We have many great memories flying together back in Frelia.
speak;Vanessa;It is!|I hope you get a chance to try it in Frelia someday!
speak;Eirika;Do you see anything up there Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;Looks clear for now.|I'll keep watch though.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Vanessa.|I'll leave that to you then.
speak;Vanessa;I'll be ok Princess...|Just need to get some rest...
speak;Vanessa;I...|I'm afraid of monsters...|Something about them scares me so much...
speak;Eirika;Vanessa...|It's ok...|The monsters are gone...|Just get some rest...|We'll be ok...
speak;Eirika;Anything to report from the skies Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;It looks clear so far.|Collecting all the bones will take time.
speak;Eirika;Yeah, fortunately we have so much help to get this done.
speak;Vanessa;Indeed.|I'll do my part to help once I'm done scouting.
speak;Eirika;Your pegasus seemes a little panicked.|Is she ok Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;Yeah, just trying to calm her down.|There were a lot arrows flying and it scared her a bit...
speak;Vanessa;It's ok, we are lucky nothing hit us this time.
speak;Eirika;I know it's hard for you to fly around Vanessa, but did you find anything?
speak;Vanessa;Nothing right now, Princess.|Searching inside buildings is harder for me...
speak;Eirika;I understand...|Just let me know if you find anything...
speak;Vanessa;It looks like we are clear.|You shouldn't be interrupted for your council meeting.
speak;Eirika;That's good.|Thank you Vanessa.|Your diligence is much appreciated.
speak;Eirika;How are we looking outside the castle, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;We look secure, Princess.|No signs of reinforcements, and the paths look secure.|We should be safe for the time being.
speak;Eirika;Vanessa, I'm so thankful for your help...|I couldn't have done this without Frelia's help..
speak;Vanessa;...Princess...|It has been a long journey...|But you're finally home...
speak;Vanessa;No, he's gone...|Our search crew wouldn't be able to track him down now...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Thank you for trying though.
speak;Vanessa;I will keep my eye out though.|I'll let you know if I spot anything.
speak;Eirika;How are you and your pegasus holding up, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;The hot air makes it easier to fly up high.|Getting down is a little tough, though.|With all the updrafts.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well, the fighting is over, so we don't need you in the air as much.
speak;Vanessa;It's pretty hot down here though...|I'm not sure which one is worse...
speak;Eirika;Did you have any difficulties with the fight, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;Titania and I were half asleep, but we woke up quickly enough.|Any later and I don't think we could've helped...
speak;Eirika;Well, thank you for your help, even with the low ceilings.
speak;Vanessa;That was the second issue.|We almost hit our heads a couple of times...
speak;Eirika;Vanessa...|Thank you for coming with us this far...|You didn't have to fight for so long...

speak;Vanessa;I could say it was my duty as a knight of Frelia, but...|It's more than that now.|I'm glad to fight for my friends.|I can help bring peace to Magvel.|For that, I will go where I am helpful.
speak;Ephraim;Vanessa, I'm amazed that you could fight in a fort like that.|You had such little room for error with such low ceilings.
speak;Vanessa;He he, not the first time I've impressed someone.|It took a lot of practice.|...And headaches from hitting ceilings...
speak;Ephraim;I can imagine training came with some pain as well.|Either way, you have my respect.
speak;Ephraim;Any threats that could come from the sea, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;No pirates, or enemy ships from what I can see.|I did see one ship sail away, though...|Should we be worried about that, Prince Ephraim?
speak;Ephraim;I'll keep it in mind.|We should be fine now, but keep your eyes on the sea.|They could bring reinforcements.
speak;Ephraim;Vanessa, any other ships in sight?
speak;Vanessa;None that I can see.|We should be safe for now.
speak;Ephraim;Excellent, I don't want to extend this fight any longer.|I don't want to see another boat until we dock.
speak;Vanessa;I agree.|The sooner we land, the better.
speak;Ephraim;I thought we would at least get past the port before we ran into more battles.
speak;Vanessa;No rest for us, isn't there?|At least we won this time.
speak;Ephraim;Hopefully we can rest a bit after a long earned victory.
speak;Vanessa;I think Titania agrees, he he!
speak;Ephraim;Is that the name of your pegasus?|It sounds familiar somehow?...
speak;Vanessa;Not the first time, I've heard that one.
speak;Ephraim;I'm glad you survived Vanessa.|There was a lot of anti-air weaponry fielded out there this time.
speak;Vanessa;There was, and it made my job very difficult...|I pray that Grado doesn't have more of that.|I fear I can't keep my luck up forever...
speak;Ephraim;Don't worry, Vanessa.|I'll make sure they don't shoot you down.
speak;Vanessa;If you can do that, it will be a relief.
speak;Ephraim;Vanessa, can I ask you a favor?
speak;Ephraim;The servants appear to be rattled.|Can you fly to the nearest village and get some supplies for them.
speak;Vanessa;Yes, Sir!|You can count on me!
speak;Ephraim;I knew I could.|Keep up the great work.
speak;Vanessa;It looks like we are clear.|You shouldn't be interrupted for your council meeting.
speak;Ephraim;That's good.|Thank you, Vanessa.|Your diligence is much appreciated.
speak;Vanessa;I simply do what I can, Prince Ephraim!
speak;Ephraim;How are we looking outside the castle, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;We look secure, Prince Ephraim.|No signs of reinforcements, and the paths look secure.|We should be safe for the time being.
speak;Ephraim;Vanessa, I appreciate your dedication.|Frelia's help has been immeasurable...
speak;Vanessa;...Prince Ephraim...|It has been a long journey...|But you're finally home...
speak;Vanessa;No, he's gone...|Our search crew wouldn't be able to track him down now...
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Thank you for trying though.
speak;Vanessa;I will keep my eye out though.|I'll let you know if I spot anything.
speak;Ephraim;How are you and your pegasus holding up, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;The hot air makes it easier to fly up high.|Getting down is a little tough, though, due to the updrafts.
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Well, the fighting is over, so we don't need you in the air as much.
speak;Vanessa;It's pretty hot down here though...|I'm not sure which one is worse...
speak;Ephraim;Did you have any difficulties with the fight, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;Titania and I were half asleep, but woke up quickly enough.|Any later and I don't think we could've helped...
speak;Ephraim;Well, thank you for your help, even with the low ceilings.
speak;Vanessa;That was the second issue.|We almost hit our heads a couple of times...
speak;Ephraim;Vanessa.|Thank you for coming with us this far.|You didn't have to fight for so long, but you did.

speak;Vanessa;I could say it was my duty as a knight of Frelia, but...|It's more than that now.|I'm glad to fight for my friends.|I can help bring peace to Magvel.|For that, I will go where I am helpful.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Vanessa.|You are great example for all knights of Frelia.

name: Talk_Moulder
_source: speak;Eirika;May I ask what you are doing Father Moulder?
speak;Moulder;.....I am praying for the souls that were lost this day...
speak;Moulder;You are a kind soul Princess...|I'm very thankful to be traveling with you.
speak;Eirika;I'm happy to be traveling with you too...
speak;Eirika;Were you able to figure out anything about those weird wolves?
speak;Moulder;No...|They seemed to turn to ash and disappear once they were dispatched...|Leaving nothing but bones...
speak;Moulder;I don't like the sound of this...
speak;Eirika;Do these monsters have anything to do with those weird wolves from the last battle?
speak;Moulder;I believe so...|How those bandits were able to capture such beasts is beyond me...
speak;Eirika;Do you think anyone else might have captured these creatures?...
speak;Moulder;I pray that no else has their hands on these abominations...
speak;Eirika;Are there any injured civilians Moulder?
speak;Moulder;A couple, but nothing I can't tend to.
speak;Eirika;That's good.|They don't deserve what we brought upon them...
speak;Moulder;What's done is done...|We must focus on helping the innocent...
speak;Eirika;You holding up ok, Father Moulder?
speak;Moulder;I'll be fine.|I'm just disgusted that Grado would stoop so low...|Using hostages...
speak;Eirika;I'm shocked too...|This isn't right at all...
speak;Eirika;Learned anything from the locals, Father Moulder?
speak;Moulder;Be of good cheer, Princess.|We still live, and that is most important.
speak;Eirika;How does the water look here?
speak;Moulder;It looks like it doesn't need any purification.|It should be good to drink.
speak;Eirika;That's good news.|That will save us time for when we need to cook or if the troops get thirsty.
speak;Moulder;There's nothing like good water to keep up our spirits.
speak;Moulder;Oh, I just was thinking of old times...
speak;Moulder;King Hayden and I would have discussions by the sea back in Frelia...|Time sure does fly by...
speak;Eirika;Well, I think you still have plenty more years to be with us, Father Moulder!
speak;Moulder;Ha ha!|I hope you're right there Princess!
speak;Moulder;Nothing too bad, but it looks like they've been roughed up.|They are very afraid of what happens next...
speak;Eirika;I see...|I wonder if there is anything we can do to bring them hope?...
speak;Moulder;Your smile and kindness is enough Princess.|It's enough...
speak;Eirika;Is the area secure now, Father Moulder?
speak;Moulder;Yes, my holy magic should keep out any evil that might come our way.|We'll be able to get some sleep tonight.
speak;Eirika;That's good...|The last thing we need tonight is more monsters to fight...|Thank you Father Moulder.
speak;Moulder;You're always welcome Princess.|Leave the protection to me.
speak;Eirika;Is anyone in the village injured?
speak;Moulder;Doesn't look like it.|Their houses had some protection wards on them.
speak;Eirika;That's a relief to hear.|Thank you Father Moulder.
speak;Moulder;I'm just as thankful and relieved as you are Princess.
speak;Eirika;Father Moulder, how are we looking for supplies?
speak;Moulder;We should last for a while.|Though the troops should be hungry after a long battle.
speak;Eirika;I agree.|I must admit I'm getting pretty hungry myself.
speak;Moulder;I'll make sure you are fed then, Princess!
speak;Eirika;How are the castle servants holding up, Father Moulder?
speak;Moulder;Fortunately, none of them were killed.|There are some that are injured.|I am tending to them now.
speak;Eirika;Did any of them see where the Queen was taken?
speak;Moulder;They did not...|They were all taken hostage beforehand.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well, continue tending to them.|They need attention too.
speak;Eirika;How is this village, Father Moulder?..
speak;Moulder;It was way too late for us to do anything...
speak;Moulder;That snake Valter...|He was brutal...|These poor villagers...
speak;Eirika;Father Moulder, are any of the castle servants injured?
speak;Moulder;No, it looks like most of them have been dismissed quite a while ago.|However, the ones that remained are in low spirits.
speak;Eirika;What kind of trials did Orson put them through?...
speak;Moulder;...They will not say...|It sounds like it has scarred them enough though...
speak;Eirika;Moulder, I hope you are not too burdened with the work we give you...

speak;Moulder;Princess...|It is my job to help heal others.|It will be my job until the day I die.|And I will do it with no complaints.|Don't let your thoughts weigh you down.|I will do my best here so you don't have to worry.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Moulder, I guess I'm overthinking things right now...
speak;Moulder;I understand, Princess.|Take things one at a time, don't let yourself be overwhelmed.
speak;Eirika;That's good advice Moulder, I'll do just that.
speak;Moulder;...I'll be fine...|I'm helping push away the poisonous gas coming from the area...|It takes some concentration to do so...
speak;Eirika;Wow...|That must be so difficult...|Thank you for keeping us safe, Moulder...
speak;Eirika;Are you ready to rest, Moulder?|You have been up for so long.
speak;Moulder;I will be ok, Princess.|When you get to my age, losing sleep doesn't affect you as much.|I can go on as long as I am needed.
speak;Eirika;You're not that old, Moulder.|You still have some spirit left in you, right?
speak;Moulder;I hope so, at least for a little longer while all of you are depending on me.
speak;Eirika;I don't know where we would be without you, Father Moulder.
speak;Moulder;Yes, I'm praying for everyone's protection.|That building is flooded with a dark aura.|I want to make sure we come back safely.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Moulder...|I feel safer with you in our army.|I think I should say a prayer as well.
speak;Moulder;You're welcome, Princess.|May the light always be with us.|Till the end.
speak;Ephraim;Father Moulder.|Thank you for joining us.|I heard from the troops you're a great man of faith.
speak;Moulder;Prince Ephraim.|I only do as divine guidance leads me to do.|I hope that I can save the lives of those around me.
speak;Ephraim;Well, if you need anything to fulfill your duty, let me know.|My troops are in your hands.
speak;Moulder;Just a few who are mostly shocked from the battle.|Nothing I can't fix.
speak;Ephraim;Good, I'll let you see to them then.|I trust they are in good hands.
speak;Ephraim;How is the progress of destroying the monster bones, Moulder?
speak;Moulder;Since we can't start a fire on the boat, it is taking longer with light magic.|It should take a couple more hours.
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|See that we get that taken care of.
speak;Ephraim;Moulder, I know we just landed, but may I ask a favor?
speak;Moulder;Yes, Prince Eprhaim.|I trust your task is very important.
speak;Ephraim;It is.|I need you to use any pure water we have and bless the villages.|They have been through a lot with Grado and the monsters.
speak;Moulder;Understood.|I will see that peace is brought upon them quickly.
