speak;Ephraim;...Moulder...|If we could have healed General Selena earlier, could we have saved her?...
speak;Moulder;She was determined to fight until her last breath...|It's hard to say...
speak;Moulder;We cannot be stuck on things of the past.|We must move forward.|She chose the path she wanted.
speak;Ephraim;You're right...|We can only move forward.|I must steel my resolve as she has.|It's the only way I can win these next fights.
speak;Moulder;Prince Ephraim, the servants are not holding up well.|May I use the good medical supplies to treat them?
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Yes, see to their ailments.|They are victims of this war too.|We cannot let them suffer.
speak;Moulder;Understood.|I'm glad to be serving under you, Prince Ephraim.|You are a man of honor.
speak;Ephraim;I should be the one saying that, Father Moulder.|Good men are needed to bring peace.
speak;Moulder;Wise words, young Prince.|Good men are needed indeed.
speak;Ephraim;How is this village, Father Moulder?
speak;Moulder;It was way too late for us to do anything...
speak;Moulder;That snake Valter...|He was brutal...|These poor villagers...
speak;Ephraim;What monster would do such a thing?...
speak;Ephraim;Father Moulder, are any of the castle servants injured?
speak;Moulder;No, it looks like most of them have been dismissed quite a while ago.|However, the ones that remained are in low spirits.
speak;Ephraim;What kind of trials did Orson put them through?...
speak;Moulder;...They will not say...|It sounds like it has scarred them enough though...
speak;Ephraim;Moulder, let me know if you are feeling overwhelmed...

speak;Moulder;Prince Ephraim...|It is my job to help heal others.|It will be my job until the day I die.|And I will do it with no complaints.|Don't let your thoughts weigh you down.|I will do my best here so you don't have to worry.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you Moulder, there are still a lot of unanswered questions...
speak;Moulder;I understand, Prince Ephraim.|Take things one at a time, don't let yourself be overwhelmed.
speak;Ephraim;That's good advice Moulder, I'll do just that.
speak;Moulder;...I'll be fine...|I'm helping push away the poisonous gas coming from the area...|It takes some concentration to do so...
speak;Ephraim;I see...|That must be taxing.|Thank you for keeping us safe, Moulder.
speak;Ephraim;Are you ready to rest, Moulder?|You're overdue for your relief.
speak;Moulder;I will be ok, Prince Ephraim.|When you get to my age, losing sleep doesn't affect you as much.|I can go on as long as I am needed.
speak;Ephraim;You're not that old, Moulder.|You still have some spirit left in you, right?
speak;Moulder;I hope so, at least for a little longer while all of you are depending on me.
speak;Ephraim;I'm glad to have a man as reliable as you, Father Moulder.
speak;Moulder;Yes, I'm praying for everyone's protection.|That building is flooded with a dark aura.|I want to make sure we come back safely.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Moulder.|That will mean a lot to our troops.|I will let them know of your deeds.
speak;Moulder;You're welcome, Prince Ephraim.|May the light always be with us.|Till the end.

name: Talk_Ross
_source: speak;Ross;Sorry...I'm not in the mood to talk right now.|If you need me to do something, just let me know...
speak;Eirika;You holding up ok, Ross?|Let me know if this is too much for you.
speak;Ross;I'm doing great!|I might not be as good as my dad yet, but I'm working on it!
speak;Eirika;We have great expectations of you Ross, just don't push yourself, ok?
speak;Ross;Just wait and see!|I'll clear the battlefield all by myself one day!|Just you wait!
speak;Eirika;You don't look so shaken up Ross.|Were you not afraid of the monsters?
speak;Ross;Of course not!|I would say it made it easier!|I could practice my swing more easily!
speak;Eirika;Well, it's good to see you in high spirits then Ross!
speak;Ross;Those blockheads were no match against me!|My axe will bring down any foe!
speak;Eirika;You sound more and more confident each battle Ross.
speak;Ross;Yeah!|I feel closer to reaching my dad's strength each day!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Ross;I can't believe they were using hostages!|How dishonorable!
speak;Eirika;Dishonorable indeed...|That man truly was vile...
speak;Ross;Yeah!|I wish he was here again so I could smack him some more!
speak;Eirika;Please Ross...|No more violence for today...
speak;Ross;Yeah!|It's a lot of fun!|You want to try?
speak;Ross;That's pretty good!|You've got good form!
speak;Eirika;He he he!|Thanks!|This is more fun than I thought!
speak;Ross;Yeah!|I'm so thirsty!|I ate something spicy before the battle, so my mouth was on fire the whole fight!
speak;Eirika;Why did you eat something spicy?
speak;Ross;I was told that the pain would get your blood boiling to the max before you fight...
speak;Ross;Yeah!|I want to explore the sea on my own boat one day!
speak;Eirika;That's a great dream, Ross.|I think you would make a great captain to work with!
speak;Eirika;Ross, why are you standing on your head?
speak;Ross;I got thinking...|If I rush blood through my brain, it works more right?|If it works more like a muscle, I should get smarter too, right?|So this might help me get smarter, faster!
speak;Eirika;You look so sleepy Ross...|I think you should go to sleep...
speak;Ross;I'm not sweepy...|I'm a mwighty wayyar...
speak;Eirika;Come on Ross, let's get you to bed...
speak;Eirika;Do you need any help Ross?
speak;Ross;Nah!|I've got it, Princess!|I'm running back and forth with the bones for training!
speak;Eirika;If you insist.|Just don't faint from overworking.
speak;Eirika;What are you looking in the sand for Ross?
speak;Ross;I heard there is treasure sometimes found in the sand.
speak;Ross;Yeah!|Maybe I'll find a new axe, or some gold!
speak;Ross;I've run around the castle, but didn't see anything...
speak;Eirika;Thank you Ross...|I appreciate the effort...
speak;Ross;Those monsters...|What they did to those people...
speak;Ross;They will pay for what they did.|I'll make sure of it...
speak;Eirika;Ross...|Thank you so much for your help.|You've become a mighty warrior...
speak;Ross;Thanks, Princess!|We finally took Renais back!|That felt like a battle to write stories about!
speak;Eirika;I imagine it will be Renais history for many centuries to come.
speak;Ross;Exactly!|And I hope they remember the mighty warrior Ross, who helped bring victory!
speak;Ross;The Lyon guy seemed off!|What was up with him?
speak;Eirika;I hope that isn't the real Lyon...|The real Lyon is so much kinder, and wouldn't hurt anyone...
speak;Ross;Oh really?|Maybe he has someone holding his family hostage!|That would explain why he is acting weird!
speak;Eirika;No...|That wouldn't make any sense...|He has no siblings and his parents are already gone...
speak;Ross;Oh...|Sorry Princess...|I'm not good when it comes to thinking like this...
speak;Eirika;It's ok, I understand Ross...|Thank you for trying though...
speak;Eirika;Ross, it's this hot and you're still training?!
speak;Ross;Yeah!|Nothing like working off this extra energy!|I feel like I can keep going!
speak;Eirika;I feel tired just watching you...
speak;Ross;Here, come exercise with me!|You won't be tired anymore afterwards!
speak;Eirika;I think I'll pass this time...Thank you though...
speak;Eirika;You look pretty tired Ross, do you need some sleep?
speak;Ross;Yes...|I think I trained too hard today...|I'm so beat...
speak;Eirika;Ok, I think you earned a good rest after today's battle.
speak;Ross;Thank you, Princess...|I'll take you up on that...
speak;Eirika;Ross...|You need to find a bed first...
speak;Eirika;Ross, this could be our final battle.|Are you ready to head out soon?
speak;Ross;I'm always ready!|If we win this, we'll all be legends!|My family's legacy will remembered for generations!
speak;Eirika;Wow, Ross...|I never even thought of that...|I'm surprised you thought about stuff like that.
speak;Ross;Oh yeah?|Though I just want people to remember the legacy my father left behind.|It's not for me, if you think I'm being cocky!
speak;Eirika;I see, that's actually pretty honorable, Ross.|Well, in that case, I hope your legacy will continue for generations!
speak;Ross;Thank you, Princess!|Now, let's win this war!
speak;Ephraim;Hey you!|Kid!|What are you doing here?|Were you kidnapped by the troops here?
speak;Ross;Kid?!|Are you talking to me?!|I'm part of your army!
speak;Ephraim;You are?|Since when did we start letting kids into our army?
speak;Ross;I'm old enough to fight!|I'm the son of the great warrior Garcia!
speak;Ross;Do you doubt me?|Here watch this!
speak;Ross;Hya!|See!|Look how I chopped that log in one swing!
speak;Ephraim;Hmmm...|That wasn't half bad...|All right, you can stay.
speak;Ross;Of course I can stay!|Who do you think you are?!|Prince Ephraim?!
speak;Ephraim;Ross!|I've got some heavy lifting for you!|Think you can handle it?
speak;Ephraim;You don't have to be so nervous, Ross.|I've forgiven you already.
speak;Ross;Ok, good!|I was worried you were still mad at me.
speak;Ephraim;I'm beyond holding a grudge, especially not against a hard working soldier.
speak;Ross;Hard work is my middle name, Boss!|You can leave that all to me!
speak;Ephraim;Glad to hear that. Now get to it.|The villagers will be grateful for the help.
speak;Ephraim;Think you can handle that pile of bones over there, Ross?
speak;Ephraim;You don't look shaken up from fighting all those monsters.
speak;Ross;Why should I be?|We killed all of them, didn't we?
speak;Ephraim;Well, I guess if you put it that way...
speak;Ross;I'm not scared of what can't kill me!
speak;Ephraim;Ok, good to know.|I'll keep you on the front lines then, next time.
speak;Ross;Let me at them!|I'll knock them all down!
speak;Ephraim;Why are you staring at that boat, Ross?
speak;Ross;You could tell I was looking at it from here?|You're pretty good, Boss.|Yeah, I was thinking how nice it would be to have my own boat to travel across the sea and see new places.
speak;Ephraim;I could see you sailing your own ship one day, Ross.
speak;Ross;Ha ha!|Glad to hear!|I've even been practicing my own pirate laugh!|Want to hear?
speak;Ephraim;Pirate laugh?...|I think I'll pass this time...
speak;Ross;That general lady didn't seem so bad!|Why didn't she join us?!
speak;Ephraim;I wish we could've convinced her too...
speak;Ross;I see...|I guess there are people with an even thicker head than me...
speak;Ephraim;I wouldn't say that was the case here...|She had conviction that I wish I understood more.
speak;Ross;Maybe we'll understand someday, as my dad would say.
speak;Ephraim;Ok, good.|Make sure this sector remains secure.|We don't know if there are any incoming reinforcements.
speak;Ross;Those monsters...|What they did to those people...
speak;Ross;They will pay for what they did.|I'll make sure of it...
speak;Ephraim;Ross.|I'd like to thank you for your contributions.|You've become a mighty warrior.
speak;Ross;Thanks, Boss!|We finally took Renais back!|That felt like a battle to write stories about!
speak;Ephraim;I imagine it will be Renais history for many centuries to come.
speak;Ross;Exactly!|And I hope they remember the mighty warrior Ross, who helped bring victory!
speak;Ross;The Lyon guy seemed off!|What was up with him?
speak;Ephraim;I hope that isn't the real Lyon...|The real Lyon is so much kinder, a true friend.
speak;Ross;Oh really?|Maybe he has someone holding his family hostage!|That would explain why he is acting weird!
speak;Ephraim;No...|That wouldn't make any sense.|He has no siblings and his parents are already gone...
speak;Ross;Oh...|Sorry, Boss...|I'm not good when it comes to thinking like this...
speak;Ephraim;It's ok, I understand Ross.|It's my responsibilty to find out the truth.
speak;Ephraim;Ross, it's this hot and you're still training?!
speak;Ross;Yeah!|Nothing like working off this extra energy!|I feel like I can keep going!
speak;Ross;Here, come exercise with me!|You won't be tired anymore afterwards!
speak;Ephraim;I think I'll pass, I'm not that crazy.
speak;Ephraim;You look pretty tired Ross, do you need some sleep?
speak;Ross;Yes...|I think I trained to hard today...|I'm so beat...
speak;Ephraim;Ok, I think you earned a good rest after today's battle.
speak;Ross;Thank you, Boss...|I'll take you up on that...
speak;Ephraim;Ross...|You need to find a bed first...
speak;Ephraim;Ross, this could be our final battle.|Are you ready to head out soon?
speak;Ross;I'm always ready!|If we win this, we'll all be legends!|My family's legacy will remembered for generations!
speak;Ephraim;Wow, Ross...|Interesting thought...|I'm surprised you thought about stuff like that.
speak;Ross;Oh yeah?|Though I just want people to remember the legacy my father left behind.|It's not for me, if you think I'm being cocky!
speak;Ephraim;I see, that's actually pretty honorable, Ross.|Well, in that case, I hope your legacy will continue for generations.
speak;Ross;Thank you, Boss!|Now, let's win this war!

name: Talk_Garcia
_source: speak;Garcia;...Sorry miss.|I'll do what you want real quickly, but give me some time after...
speak;Eirika;How are you holding up Garcia?|This has been your first full battle since joining us.
speak;Garcia;I'm still pretty rusty, but it's all coming back to me.|If I only had my old equipment on me...
speak;Eirika;You must have been quite the warrior back in the day.
speak;Garcia;Ha ha ha!|I suppose so, since Ross keeps reminding me each time anyone mentions me!
speak;Eirika;He he!|I'll keep that in mind then!
speak;Eirika;Sir Garcia, have you ever fought monsters before?
speak;Garcia;I'm sorry Princess.|Fighting monsters is new to me too...|Though a part of it makes it easier for me.
speak;Garcia;It can be hard to take the life of another.|But when you know it's an evil monster, it's not as difficult to cut it down.
speak;Eirika;I suppose that is true, when you look at it that way...
speak;Garcia;Well, don't fret about it too much Princess.|Just leave the fighting to me!
speak;Eirika;These soldiers were pretty well trained...
speak;Garcia;Yeah, tougher than any troops we've dealt with so far.|They were no match against us though!
speak;Eirika;He he!|I suppose not, especially not against the mighty General Garcia!
speak;Garcia;Hey!|You dare tease me!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Garcia;My blood is boiling right now lass...|I need a moment...
speak;Eirika;Are you gathering some water, Sir Garcia?
speak;Garcia;Correct, the water here looks pretty clear.|We don't know when we will need more water.
speak;Eirika;That's a smart idea.|Where would we be without you?
speak;Garcia;Well, I hope we don't have to end up in that situation, ha ha!
speak;Eirika;About how many castles would you say you've had to seize in your campaign as general?
speak;Garcia;A couple.|It's never easy, but once you win it's a lot easier to rest compared to fighting outside.
speak;Eirika;True...|It will be nice to sleep in a room tonight...
speak;Eirika;Anything we can do with the sea water, Garcia?
speak;Garcia;We can try to get the salt from it.|It will be good for preserving our food.
speak;Eirika;That's a good idea.|Think I can leave that to you Garcia?
speak;Garcia;Leave it to me Princess!|I'll get us plenty of salt!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Eirika;Doing some training in the mountains, Garcia?
speak;Garcia;Yes.|Things will be getting tougher and tougher from here.|I need to make sure I'm in top shape.
speak;Eirika;That's a good point Sir Garcia...|I need to make sure I don't fall behind either...
speak;Eirika;Don't want to be in the fortress, Garcia?
speak;Garcia;Nah.|I figured I would help keep watch and let the younger ones get more rest.
speak;Eirika;That's kind of you...|Let someone know if you need rest, ok?
speak;Garcia;It feels like it...|But we can't stop.|If we stop, we die.
speak;Eirika;You're right Garcia...|We must stay strong...
speak;Eirika;This has been the biggest army we've faced so far...|Did you fight in battles like this one, Garcia?
speak;Garcia;Similar, but not quite to this scale...|The biggest we've ever fought were against bandit strongholds...
speak;Eirika;I see...|I suppose it's different against an organized army...
speak;Garcia;Indeed...|It really puts all my experience to the test...
speak;Garcia;Nothing to report outside, Princess.|I don't think they went this way.
speak;Eirika;Ok, that is good to know.|Thank you Garcia.
speak;Garcia;You're welcome Princess.|I'll keep my eye out.
speak;Garcia;This village...|It reminds me of Ide...|If only we could have gotten here sooner...|I could've seen them...
speak;Eirika;Garcia...|You can't beat yourself up...|We were ambushed, and there is nothing we could've done...
speak;Garcia;You're right...|I'll at least help make sure they have a proper burial...
speak;Eirika;Thank you so much for your help, Garcia.|Your contributions have helped us take back Renais.
speak;Garcia;Bah, I was only a small factor.|Princess, we couldn't have done it without your guidance.|Renais is lucky to have such a talented, kindhearted princess.
speak;Eirika;A princess is nothing without her people's support.|I'm thankful I have yours too.
speak;Garcia;So that was Prince Lyon, huh?|This war is starting to make a little more sense...
speak;Eirika;The Lyon I know wouldn't start a war...|But was what he was saying true?|It feels like my whole world is flipped upside down again...
speak;Garcia;...I know it's tough, Princess.|For now, all we can do is move forward.|Let's finish the fight, Princess.
speak;Eirika;Finish the fight...|I do want to finish this soon...
speak;Garcia;All right, leave it to me then.|Let's get this done.
speak;Eirika;Garcia, I'm afraid to ask you for a favor under such terrible conditions.
speak;Garcia;Oh, this heat?|It doesn't bother me one bit, Princess!
speak;Garcia;Yeah!|I'm getting older and I like it warmer!
speak;Garcia;Ha ha ha!|Guess my age is showing!
speak;Eirika;So you prefer the heat when you are older?|I wonder if I'll be the same when I get older?
speak;Garcia;Yes, still need some time to unwind.|Especially after a battle like that.|
speak;Garcia;Ross as a baby kept me up more at night than this.|This is child's play in comparison!
speak;Eirika;I see...|Ross must have been a handful as a baby...
speak;Garcia;You have no idea, Princess!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Garcia;So this is it, huh?|The person that's caused all of this is in that building, right?
speak;Garcia;All right, it's time to end this.|We're going to bring peace to all of Magvel.
speak;Eirika;Garcia...Thank you so much for fighting with us.
speak;Garcia;Thank me once the battle is over.|Keep your focus up.
speak;Ephraim;Seth has informed me that you're the mighty warrior, Garcia, correct?
speak;Garcia;Well, Seth might have exaggerated details, but yes, that's me.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you for your service.|I have heard stories from my father of your victories.
speak;Garcia;King Fado, huh?|I only had a few chances to meet him.|But he was a good man, a righteous king.
speak;Ephraim;Father...|It still feels wrong that he is gone...
speak;Garcia;I understand.|Losing someone is always difficult.|But you have to keep looking forward.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Garcia.|You're right.|I can only keep moving forward.
speak;Ephraim;You'll be a great asset to our army, Garcia.|
speak;Ephraim;Garcia, do you happen to have any connection to anyone in the port?
speak;Garcia;Hmmm...|If only you asked me 10 years ago, I might have.
speak;Erphaim;How unfortunate...|Well, I figured I could at least ask.
speak;Garcia;Sorry I can't help you there, Prince Ephraim.|I'll keep my eyes open if I spot anyone I know.
speak;Ephraim;Ok.|Let me know if anything changes.|I'll leave time for you if you do.
speak;Ephraim;This isn't your first naval battle, right, Garcia?
speak;Garcia;Not my first.|But I can't say I've had too many to be honest.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Back then there were only pirates and sea monsters to worry about.
speak;Garcia;Yeah, the pirates were easy to take care of.|The sea monsters on the other hand...
speak;Ephraim;Did you have a run in with one?
speak;Garcia;Yes, Prince Ephraim...|They are different from the monsters we fought...|More mysterious...|Like what you would see from a fairy tale.
speak;Ephraim;Well, for our sakes I hope we land soon...
speak;Garcia;The inn here needs some repairs.|I'm busy trying to get some stone together to repair it.
speak;Ephraim;That's good.|It would be nice to have a decent place to rest for the night.
speak;Garcia;Yeah, it looks like they have some good food and drinks available too!
speak;Ephraim;Good to see you in good spirits, Garcia.|We need more of that here.
speak;Ephraim;Garcia...|What would you have done in this situation?|Do you think you could have convinced her?
speak;Garcia;No...|She made up her mind.|She held onto her convictions until the end.
speak;Ephraim;I see...|I guess we can't change one's heart...
speak;Garcia;No, and unless they have an assassins guild, we should be fine.
speak;Ephraim;Yeah, I've heard that there is some sort of guild of assassins.|Grado could haved hired them to take us out at night, but the chances of that are low.
speak;Ephraim;I see...|That could prove troublesome.|We'll have extra guards set up tonight then.
speak;Garcia;That would be a good idea.
speak;Garcia;This village...|It reminds me of Ide...|If only we could have gotten here sooner...|I could've seen them...
speak;Ephraim;Garcia...|You can't beat yourself up.|Even if we doubled our troops' marching pace, I don't think we could have made it.
speak;Garcia;You're right...|I'll at least help to make sure they have a proper burial...
speak;Ephraim;Thank you so much for your help, Garcia.|Your contributions have helped us take back Renais.
speak;Garcia;Bah, I was only a small factor.|Prince Ephraim, we couldn't have done it without your guidance.|Renais is lucky to have such a strong, honorable prince.
speak;Ephraim;A prince is nothing without his people's support.|I'm thankful I have yours too.
speak;Garcia;So that was Prince Lyon, huh?|This war is starting to make a little more sense...
speak;Ephraim;The Lyon I know wouldn't start a war.|But, something has changed...|I don't know what's going on anymore.
speak;Garcia;...I know it's tough, Prince Ephraim.|For now, all we can do is move forward.|Let's finish the fight.
speak;Ephraim;Finish the fight.|You're right, and we'll win this fight too.
speak;Garcia;All right, let me in on it.|We'll win this together.
speak;Ephraim;Garcia, I know it's hot, but I have a favor to ask.
speak;Garcia;Oh, this heat?|It doesn't bother me one bit, Prince Ephraim!
speak;Garcia;Yeah!|I'm getting older and I like it warmer!
speak;Garcia;Ha ha ha!|Guess my age is showing!
speak;Ephraim;So you prefer the heat when you are older?|I wonder if I'll be the same when I get older?
speak;Garcia;Yes, I still need some time to unwind, especially after a battle like that.|
speak;Garcia;Ross as a baby kept me up more at night than this.|This is child's play in comparison!
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Ross must have been a handful as a baby...
speak;Garcia;You have no idea, Prince!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Garcia;So this is it, huh?|The person that's caused all of this is in that building, right?
speak;Garcia;All right, it's time to end this.|We're going to bring peace to all of Magvel.
speak;Ephraim;Garcia.|Thank you so much for fighting with us.
speak;Garcia;Thank me once the battle is over.|Keep your focus up.

name: Talk_Neimi
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help Neimi. I appreciate it.
speak;Neimi;Um...|You're welcome...|Sorry, I've got to keep my eye on Colm...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well I'll make it quick then...
speak;Eirika;Thank you Neimi for your archery support.|It is a big help to us in battle.
speak;Neimi;Shooting arrows at people sure is a lot different than hunting...
speak;Eirika;...I see.|It must be hard, but know that we are thankful for your help...
speak;Eirika;You're welcome Neimi.|It'll be ok, so smile!|You have a very bright smile!
speak;Neimi;He he!|Thank you so much Princess!
speak;Eirika;Why are you gathering flowers Neimi?
speak;Neimi;I heard these flowers help ward off evil...|I want to give them to the locals...
speak;Eirika;That's so kind of you Neimi...|I will help you gather them too...
speak;Eirika;Are you looking at the destroyed ballista Neimi?
speak;Neimi;Yeah...|I'm trying to learn how it works...|I want to become stronger...
speak;Eirika;Neimi...|We are here to support you, however you need us.
speak;Eirika;Sitting by the chests again Neimi?
speak;Eirika;Do you get bored sitting there for so long?
speak;Neimi;I'm used to it by now.|I can do stuff like restring my bow or write in my journal.
speak;Neimi;Yeah, I like writing down the stuff that makes me happy.
speak;Eirika;That's good Neimi, I think that's a great idea.
speak;Eirika;Enjoying splashing in the water, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;Yes!|It feels really nice!|The water is so cool and refreshing!
speak;Eirika;He he!|Maybe I should join you!
speak;Eirika;The valley there looks really pretty from here, doesn't it Neimi?
speak;Neimi;Yeah!|I could stay here for hours!|It's so relaxing...
speak;Eirika;...Sorry, did I wake you up Neimi?
speak;Neimi;It's ok Princess...|I just need some sleep...
speak;Eirika;Ok, get some sleep Neimi.|You'll need it.
speak;Eirika;That bone looks pretty heavy Neimi...
speak;Eirika;Are these your arrows you're collecting, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;No...|I'm collecting the enemy's lost arrows.|They are pretty good quality, so I'm taking them.|It saves me time from having to make new ones.
speak;Eirika;I see.|That would save you time if you don't have to make your own.
speak;Neimi;Yeah, so I can focus on other things.
speak;Eirika;Can you track down the Queen, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;I'm trying what I can...|Whoever took her is good though...|After the stairs there, it becomes a lot more difficult...
speak;Eirika;You ok, Neimi?|You look like you are about to faint...
speak;Neimi;The sun is soooo hot...|I'm so quenched...|I need something quenchy...
speak;Eirika;Quenchy?|Neimi...I think you need to sit down...
speak;Neimi;I am sitting down!|I'm just waiting for the quenchiest drink!...
speak;Eirika;Neimi...|Thank you so much for your help...|If you want, you're more than welcome to stay in the castle.
speak;Neimi;For real?!|Thank you so much!|I'm so happy, that I...
speak;Eirika;Oh Neimi...|We will be happy to have you here...
speak;Eirika;Neimi, can you use your tracking skills to find Lyon?
speak;Neimi;...No, I don't think I can Princess...
speak;Eirika;I see...|I know it wasn't likely, but I thought I would ask...
speak;Neimi;I wish my skills were better...|*sniff*
speak;Eirika;Oh Neimi...|I'm so sorry...|Please don't cry...
speak;Eirika;Will you be ok in the heat this time, Neimi?
speak;Eirika;I don't know...|You're sweating a lot...
speak;Neimi;I guess I could use some water...
speak;Eirika;Ok, wait here.|I'll get you some water.
speak;Eirika;You'd better not cry here, Neimi.|You're losing a lot of water as is...
speak;Eirika;Neimi, you can go rest now.|You look tired...
speak;Eirika;Awwww...|She's already asleep.|She's been working so hard.|I'll let her rest.
speak;Neimi;Princess...|This is the final battle, right?|That temple looks scary...
speak;Eirika;This could be...|Neimi, you have become strong and helped us so much.|I know that place looks scary, but...|May I ask for your help, one last time?
speak;Neimi;I will fight.|Even though it's scary...|I will fight with you...|I want Magvel to be peaceful...
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Neimi.|You've become so strong.
speak;Ephraim;You, young lady.|Is that a bow you're working with?
speak;Neimi;M-me?!|Y-yes...|I'm w-working on the string on my b-bow...
speak;Ephraim;Hmmmm...|That is a well kept bow.|You must be a good archer.|What's your name?
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, huh?|Let me see you shoot.|See if you can hit that pillar over there.
speak;Ephraim;You might even be a better shot than Innes...
speak;Neimi;N-no way!|Don't say things like that, please!
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, the armory needs a supply of bow strings.|Think you could help them?
speak;Ephraim;Why are you so nervous around me, Neimi?|Am I that scary?
speak;Ephraim;I see...|I apologize, Neimi.|I don't mean to be intimidating.
speak;Neimi;I-it's ok...|Your face just scares me for some reason...
speak;Ephraim;My face?|Well...|This might be difficult then...
speak;Ephraim;Do you see any other ships in the horizon, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;N-no, it looks clear all around us...
speak;Ephraim;Good, thank you for looking.|My apologies if I still scare you, Neimi.
speak;Neimi;It's ok...|You're at least not as scary as the monsters...
speak;Ephraim;Is that so?|Well, I didn't think I would be happy to lose to monsters in that way.
speak;Neimi;He he!|That's a funny way to put it, Sir!
speak;Ephraim;Huh, finally got you to laugh.|I think we are making some progress then.
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, can you do some recon in the forests over there later?|I want to make sure we are safe up North.
speak;Neimi;Yes, Sir!|Forests are my specialty.|I feel safer there sometimes.
speak;Ephraim;Ok, good.|I trust you with that then.|Burn this torch if you run into trouble.|We'll come to your aid.
speak;Ephraim;Wow, she almost is like a different person when she isn't scared.
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, can you check on the villages and see what they need?
speak;Neimi;Yes, Sir.|I'll take the route by the river.|It seems so calm and pretty...
speak;Ephraim;The landscape here is pretty.|No wonder the villagers live here.|There's plenty of water and they can fish by the sea.
speak;Neimi;This would be a nice place to live.|Maybe I could live here some day...
speak;Neimi;Maybe, at least some place like this.|A place with rivers, forests, the sea.
speak;Ephraim;That does seem nice.|I hope you have a nice place to live when this war is over.
speak;Ephraim;Can I ask you to look after the female servants, Neimi?|They could use a gentle soul like yours right now.
speak;Neimi;Yes, Sir.|I understand.|I'll help treat them.|They must have been through a lot...
speak;Ephraim;Exactly why I need you.|You're one of the few people I trust to handle this.|They deserve help and respect.
speak;Neimi;That's so kind of you, Prince Ephraim...
speak;Ephraim;You ok, Neimi?|You look like you are about to faint.
speak;Neimi;The sun is soooo hot...|I'm so quenched...|I need something quenchy...
speak;Ephraim;Quenchy?|Neimi.|I think you need to sit down.
speak;Neimi;I am sitting down!|I'm just waiting for the quenchiest drink!...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi.|Thank you for your help.|You have been a great asset to the army.
speak;Neimi;Really?|Thank you so much!|That's so kind of you to say...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi...|Well, I guess I should let her cry it out.
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, can you use your tracking skills to find Lyon?
speak;Neimi;...No, I don't think I can Prince Ephraim...
speak;Ephraim;I see.|I know it wasn't likely, but I thought I would ask.
speak;Neimi;I wish my skills were better...|*sniff*
speak;Ephraim;Neimi...|Don't be sorry.|I asked too much of you.
speak;Ephraim;Will you be ok in the heat this time, Neimi?
speak;Ephraim;I don't know...|You're sweating a lot.
speak;Neimi;I guess I could use some water...
speak;Ephraim;Ok, wait here.|I'll get you some water.
speak;Ephraim;You'd better not cry here, Neimi.|You're losing a lot of water as is.
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, you can go rest now.|You look tired.
speak;Ephraim;She's already asleep.|She's been working so hard.|I'll let her rest.
speak;Neimi;Prince Ephraim...|This is the final battle, right?|That temple looks scary...
speak;Ephraim;This could be...|Neimi, you have become strong and helped us so much.|I know that place looks scary, but I must say.|May I ask for your help, one last time?
speak;Neimi;I will fight.|Even though it's scary...|I will fight with you...|I want Magvel to be peaceful...
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Neimi.|You've become so strong.

name: Talk_Colm
_source: speak;Colm;Hm?|Make it quick, I'm seeing if there's anything else left to steal.
speak;Colm;Yeah...|She just frightens easily...|It's ok Neimi, I'm here...
speak;Colm;I was able to swipe some goodies off of those soldiers!|I'm seeing what will be worth the most.
speak;Eirika;How do you find time to steal while on the battlefield?
speak;Colm;That's for me to know and for your wallet to find out!
speak;Eirika;I see...|Just as long it's nothing from the citizens...
speak;Colm;Of course!|I only steal from the bad guys!|Trust me!
speak;Eirika;What in the world are you doing Colm?
speak;Eirika;That store there has a lot of ribbons...|Why were you looking at ribbons Colm?
speak;Colm;No reason!|Look at the time!|I've got to go!
speak;Eirika;Are you salvaging parts from that destroyed ballista?
speak;Colm;Yeah!|There's gotta be something of value here!
speak;Eirika;It just looks like a bunch of broken wood and strings to me...
speak;Colm;That's just because you don't have a thief's eye!
speak;Colm;Bah, nothing good in here either!
speak;Colm;Nah, but it was worth the look at least.
speak;Eirika;What was the best thing you ever found?
speak;Colm;The first chest I ever found had Neimi next to it.|It had Neimi's precious mirror in it.
speak;Eirika;So was the mirror the best treasure or Neimi?
speak;Colm;Oh!|Ummmm....|I think I've got to go!
speak;Eirika;You don't like getting into the water, Colm?
speak;Colm;Nah, I'm more for watching the water.|It feels calming, seeing the waves go back and forth.
speak;Eirika;Hmmmm....|I think I get what you mean.|It does feel calming...
speak;Colm;Yeah, I'm making some lockpicks from the trees here.
speak;Colm;Yeah, the trees here are strong, but flexible.|I can make a lot of lockpicks from them!
speak;Eirika;I suppose that is good for you then...
speak;Eirika;You're sleeping in a chest Colm?!
speak;Colm;Huh?|You got a problem with that?|I just find chests a very safe place to sleep in!
speak;Eirika;Oh Colm...|I wonder what Neimi had to go through with you...
speak;Colm;Hey Princess, do you think these bones would be worth anything?
speak;Eirika;I don't think so...|We should be safe and burn them all, though...
speak;Colm;You sure?|I bet someone might buy them!
speak;Colm;All right, all right.|I'll make sure they are burnt.
speak;Eirika;Ok, I'll be double checking with you later though.
speak;Eirika;Colm, where did you get that armor from?
speak;Colm;Oh, I just found some laying around!|It would be a shame if this armor just went to rust!
speak;Eirika;Don't tell me you were looting them from the enemy's corpses...
speak;Colm;Oh come on!|It's not like they're using it anymore!
speak;Eirika;You're not looking for the Queen, are you Colm?
speak;Colm;I'm looking to see if I can find any hints.|I just so happen to be looking in chests for them.
speak;Eirika;Are you looking for coconuts in that tree, Colm?
speak;Colm;Yes!|I need one to make the quenchiest drink ever!
speak;Colm;Yeah!|I need to make it quick!|It's way too hot here!
speak;Eirika;Colm are you in the chest again?
speak;Colm;Princess...|I have to ask something serious.
speak;Colm;Can I live here, please?|This is the most comfy chest I've ever been in...|I could sleep in here for hours!|Please say yes, Princess!
speak;Eirika;Oh, fine...|You can stay here Colm...
speak;Eirika;Colm, are you able to track down Lyon?
speak;Colm;Sorry, Princess.|I'm good at tracking down gold, not people.
speak;Colm;Hey, don't get so down.|I'll keep my eye out for you.|I'll let you know if I find anything.
speak;Eirika;Colm, why don't you take off that cloak?|Aren't you too hot?
speak;Colm;This cloak is a part of me!|I can't just take it off!|You wouldn't tell a knight to take off their armor, right?
speak;Eirika;I suppose...|Just don't collapse from the heat, ok?
speak;Colm;I've got it under control, Princess!
speak;Eirika;Are you looting so late at night, Colm?!
speak;Colm;Hey, when there's treasure, there's treasure!|Gotta collect while the loot is still warm!
speak;Colm;It's ok, I'll save some for you too, Princess!
speak;Colm;Think you still got a use for a thief like me in there?
speak;Eirika;Colm, you have always been useful to us.|I'm so thankful you have traveled with us so far.
speak;Colm;Is that so?|Even after the earful you kept giving me about loot collecting?
speak;Eirika;Despite your looting habits, you still have been very helpful.
speak;Colm;Well, I'm glad to hear that then!|Who knows?|Maybe there is a chest or two in there that needs lockpicking!
speak;Eirika;I would be surprised if there was...|But who knows?
speak;Ephraim;Hey, you!|What are you doing with that loot?!
speak;Colm;What?|Me?|I'm just making sure we got everything collected!
speak;Ephraim;I don't remember assigning anyone to do that.|Who are you, exactly?
speak;Colm;I'm Colm!|I've been in this army for a while thanks to Princess Eirika!
speak;Colm;Yes, ever since the incident with her bracelet.
speak;Ephraim;What's this about a bracelet incident?
speak;Colm;Woah!|No need to get all scary!|She got her bracelet back safe and sound!
speak;Colm;Hold on now!|I feel like we need to restart this conversation...
speak;Ephraim;Colm, come over here.|I want to apologize for the misunderstanding last time we talked.
speak;Colm;You sure did grill me last time...|I thought you were gonna run through me with your lance...
speak;Ephraim;Sorry about that.|Seth told me to be cautious when it comes to our bracelets.|Hearing you did something with my sister's bracelet...|My instincts as a brother kicked in.
speak;Colm;I see...|Well, I keep getting in trouble over those stupid bracelets.|So I don't want anything to do with them anymore.|I've got other things I could be collecting!
speak;Colm;Gah!|Um...|I think that's my cue to get out of here!
speak;Ephraim;Colm, can you see any other enemies hiding in this darkness?
speak;Colm;So far looks all clear.|I'm good at seeing in the darkness.|If something were still alive, I would've seen it by now.
speak;Ephraim;I can imagine how you got good at seeing in the darkness like that.
speak;Colm;Hey!|Are still that hung up on me?!|I'm on your side!
speak;Ephraim;Sorry, sorry.|If my sister could trust you, I need to as well.
speak;Colm;Good, that's better.|Now just leave the scouting to me!|I'll let you know if I spot something.
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|Thank you, Colm.|I'll leave it to you then.
speak;Colm;Ok, now we are making some progress.
speak;Ephraim;Colm, can I ask you to get some supplies?|The local villagers need it soon.
speak;Colm;Yeah, I can do that.|I'll be there and back in a flash!
speak;Colm;Glad you're finally trusting me more!
speak;Ephraim;Keep up the good work and my doubts will all be washed away soon.
speak;Colm;Glad to hea-...Wait!|That means you still have doubts?!
speak;Ephraim;Just a bit.|Your mischievous smile doesn't help with that.
speak;Colm;I can't help that, ok?!|That's my normal face!
speak;Ephraim;You're not going to loot these troops here?
speak;Colm;...Nah...|Looting these guys will leave a bad taste in my mouth...
speak;Colm;Yeah...|They may have been our enemy, but they didn't seem like bad guys.|Plus their equipment had family crests on them.|I feel bad selling stuff like that...
speak;Ephraim;Family crests, huh?|Their families in Grado must have spend all their money on their equipment...
speak;Ephraim;Thank you for not looting their equipment then.
speak;Colm;Ahh, think nothing of it.|I've got honor too, ya know?
speak;Ephraim;Does it look like any of this loot can be used for the servants, Colm?
speak;Ephraim;Colm, these servants have been through a lot.|They may be from Grado, but they need to be taken care of.
speak;Colm;You're right, you're right.|I'll put something together.|Leave it to me!
speak;Ephraim;Ok good, make sure that they are treated well.
speak;Ephraim;Are you looking for coconuts in that tree, Colm?
speak;Colm;Yes!|I need one to make the quenchiest drink ever!
speak;Colm;Yeah!|I need to make it quick!|It's way too hot here!
speak;Ephraim;Colm are you in the chest again?
speak;Colm;You...|I have to ask something serious.
speak;Colm;Can I have this chest, please?|This is the most comfy chest I've ever been in...|I could sleep in here for hours!|Please say yes!
speak;Ephraim;Colm, are you able to track down Lyon?
speak;Colm;Sorry.|I'm good at tracking down gold, not people.
speak;Colm;Hey, don't get so down.|I'll keep my eye out for you.|I'll let you know if I find anything.
speak;Ephraim;Colm, why don't you take off that cloak?|Aren't you too hot?
speak;Colm;This cloak is a part of me!|I can't just take it off!|You wouldn't tell a knight to take off their armor, right?
speak;Ephraim;I suppose...|Just don't collapse from the heat.
speak;Ephraim;Are you looting so late at night, Colm?!
speak;Colm;Hey, when there's treasure, there's treasure!|Gotta collect while the loot is still warm!
speak;Colm;It's ok, I'll save some for you too!
speak;Colm;Think you still got a use for a thief like me in there?
speak;Ephraim;Colm, I'll admit, we might need you in there.|Your skills have been valuable.
speak;Colm;Is that so?|Even after the earful you kept giving me about loot collecting?
speak;Ephraim;Despite your looting habits, you still have been very helpful.
speak;Colm;Well, I'm glad to hear that then!|Who knows?|Maybe there is a chest or two in there that needs lockpicking!
speak;Ephraim;I would be surprised if there was...|But who knows?

name: Talk_Artur
_source: speak;Eirika;Your magic is so beautiful Artur!|It feels like it is Winter!
speak;Artur;Much appreciated!|Lute told me that my light magic is like this because my <red>Affinity</> is of ice.
speak;Lute;From what Lute said, one's birth month decides one's Affinity.|I was born during the peak of Winter, so that is why my affinity is ice.
speak;Eirika;I see, I never knew that.|I should ask her about my affinity...
speak;Artur;Yes, just be prepared to leave if you don't have much time.
speak;Artur;You'll find out once you ask her...
speak;Eirika;Are you gathering supplies for us Artur?
speak;Artur;Yes, we should be fully stocked by the time we depart.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Artur.|You are very dependable!
speak;Artur;You're welcome Princess.|The Divines bless those who are prepared.
speak;Eirika;I see...|I will keep that in mind.
speak;Eirika;Hey Artur, do you know any light magic that gets rid of fog?
speak;Artur;I'm sorry Princess, I do not...
speak;Eirika;It's ok, I thought it would be worth at least asking.
speak;Artur;I do know of a staff that can clear it out for a little bit.|Maybe I should practice using staffs...
speak;Eirika;It's ok Artur, don't push yourself too hard...
speak;Artur;Nothing in particular.|I do like the look of the water though.|Looks very clean.
speak;Eirika;Yeah, It's a very pretty lake.|It's a shame we had to fight near it...
speak;Eirika;Artur, do you think these quarters will be good to sleep in?
speak;Artur;They look secure to me.|We should be good to rest here tonight.
speak;Eirika;That's great. It will be nice to sleep inside a room tonight.
speak;Artur;Agreed, and it'll be nice to have fresh water too.
speak;Eirika;I hope our luck is starting to change now...
speak;Artur;Yes, since we are not sure what the plans are for the next while.
speak;Eirika;True, it is best to be prepared for whatever may happen.
speak;Artur;Indeed.|It's pretty well stocked though.|I wonder if a lot of merchants stay here?
speak;Eirika;It seems like a good stopping point for them.
speak;Artur;I wonder where they are right now though?
speak;Eirika;How is the burning of the monster bones going?
speak;Artur;Should be done here soon.|Infusing the fire with light helps burn the bones faster.
speak;Eirika;I thought your light magic was infused with ice?
speak;Artur;Normally yes.|But I'm using this book to artune it more with fire.|It has been very useful for tasks like this.
speak;Eirika;I see.|That is very handy indeed.
speak;Eirika;Can I ask a favor of you Artur?
speak;Eirika;Some of villagers are in need of water.|Can you please do what you can to help?
speak;Artur;Of course.|I would be happy to help.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Artur.|You are such a wonderful and kind man.
speak;Artur;No need to thank me, Princess.|I am just happy to be of help to the people.|Now if you would excuse me.|I will go help the villagers.
speak;Artur;Yes, they were very prepared to hold us down for a long time...|This army was very organized.
speak;Eirika;I'm glad we were able to finish the battle quickly then...
speak;Artur;Yes.|Pray tell how things would have gone if it went on for too long...
speak;Eirika;How are things looking on your end, Artur?
speak;Artur;It looks like we have some high quality supplies here.|We should be well off for a while.
speak;Eirika;That's good to hear.|Though I need to worry about that later and find the queen.
speak;Artur;I'm checking to see if these are demon bones.|I want to make sure they won't be a threat to us.
speak;Eirika;That's a good idea.|That would be unpleasant if we have to do any more fighting in this heat.
speak;Artur;Fortunately, it looks like we should be safe.|These bones are too brittle to be any threat to us.
speak;Eirika;That's a relief to hear.|Thank you for your assessment though, Artur.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for you hard work, Artur.|The supplies were low, but your assistance should help us ration them until we can restock.
speak;Artur;You're welcome, Princess.|I just feel bad for the people here...|Food was very scarce...
speak;Eirika;That's terrible...|Did Orson not eat too much himself?
speak;Artur;I'm not too sure...|I'd imagine morale wasn't too high either way...
speak;Artur;Oh!...Um...|I'm sorry...|No, I didn't find Lyon...|I wanted to report that the water here should be good to use for tonight...
speak;Eirika;Oh...|I see...|Sorry...|That is good news about the water though...
speak;Artur;Yes...|Well, keep in good spirits, Princess.|Everything will be ok.
speak;Eirika;Artur, I was told that your ice magic has been helping keep other cool.
speak;Artur;Yes, it's so hot that it's been difficult.|If my magic can help relieve others, I'll keep it up though.
speak;Eirika;Just don't push yourself too hard...|We can't afford to lose you now...
speak;Artur;Don't worry, Princess.|I can't fall now.|While you're here, I can cool you down some.
speak;Eirika;Artur, some of the hallway lights are starting to burn out.|Our soldiers requested some more lights until dawn.
speak;Artur;Understood.|We don't want another ambush in the dark.|I will provide some light.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Artur, I hope it isn't asking too much...
speak;Artur;No fear, Princess.|I find joy in bringing light to others.|It is my duty as a monk.
speak;Eirika;As reliable as ever, Artur.|We will be safe as long as you are here.
speak;Artur;I pray that be the case.
speak;Eirika;Artur, thank you for all of your help and light.|They have been effective against all of these monsters.
speak;Artur;I am just a simple monk, doing his job.|I am just relieved that the guiding light has always been with us.
speak;Artur;May it be with us until the very end.
speak;Ephraim;Excuse me, you are the young monk that has been traveling with us, correct?
speak;Artur;Yes, you may call me Artur, your Highness.
speak;Ephraim;Artur, then.|I may have some need of your talents.|May I trust that I can leave them to you?
speak;Artur;Yes, your Highness.|I would be honored.|It is my duty to use my powers to help those around me.
speak;Ephraim;Excellent.|I have high expectations of your work.
speak;Artur;I hope I can live up to them then, your Highness.
speak;Ephraim;Artur, I have a task for you.|I trust you should be able to take care of it?
speak;Artur;Yes, your Highness?|I pray I can complete the task you need accomplished.
speak;Ephraim;The vendor needs supplies checked for any defects on the magical equipment.|Is that something you can handle?
speak;Artur;Yes, that should be within my abilities.|Leave it to me, your Highness.
speak;Artur;I hope to meet them.|I'll let you know the results once I'm done.
speak;Ephraim;How is the destruction of the monster bones going?
speak;Artur;Since we cannot use a conventional fire on a ship, it's taking longer than expected.|I have to use basic light magic tomes to burn the bones.
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Would it be possible to get these burned by dawn?
speak;Artur;It might be close, but I believe I can.
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|I pray that no more monsters attack during that time.
speak;Artur;That would certainly be...inconvenient.|I pray that doesn't happen either...
speak;Ephraim;I'm sorry, but can I request you to burn the monster bones again?
speak;Artur;I understand.|At least I can use a conventional fire.|Shouldn't take as long this time.
speak;Ephraim;Indeed.|I'll leave it to you then.|If you need more man power picking up the bones, feel free to request for it.|I'll give you proper authorization.
speak;Artur;Thank you, your Highness.|That should help me save some time.
speak;Ephraim;Hey Artur...|What would happen if we didn't burn the bones?
speak;Artur;The bones contain darkness in them.|It will bring bad luck to the villagers if we don't burn them...
speak;Ephraim;I see...|I'll leave you to it then...
speak;Ephraim;I'll be fine, Artur...|This has just been a taxing battle for me.|I should be fine after some rest.
speak;Artur;I see...|Yes, some rest should be good after such a long battle.|Is there anything I can do in the meantime, your Highness?
speak;Ephraim;No, you've been working hard as is lately.|I'll need you in top shape for once we depart.
speak;Artur;If you say so, your Highness.|May the guiding light give you some calming rest.
speak;Ephraim;Any stragglers in the dark dungeons, Artur?
speak;Artur;I haven't checked yet, your Highness.|I can make that a priority if you desire?

speak;Ephraim;There could be some prisoners or survivors we could get information from.|Your ability to light up darkness with light magic helps out a lot.|Take a few troops with you just in case there are some enemy survivors.
speak;Artur;Understood.|I'll begin the search immediately.|I pray we aren't too late to save anyone.
speak;Ephraim;I pray for your success too.
speak;Artur;I'm checking to see if these are demon bones.|I want to make sure they won't be a threat to us.
speak;Ephraim;That's a good idea.|The last thing I want is to do any more fighting in this heat.
speak;Artur;Fortunately, it looks like we should be safe.|These bones are too brittle to be any threat to us.
speak;Ephraim;That's good to hear.|Good work on your assessment though, Artur.
speak;Ephraim;Artur, I wanted to say that you've been doing a lot of great work.|The supplies were low, but your assistance should help us ration them until we can restock.
speak;Artur;You're welcome, your Highness.|I just feel bad for the people here...|Food was very scarce...
speak;Ephraim;Orson...|Were you not eating too much yourself?
speak;Artur;He might not have been, from the look of things...|I'd imagine morale wasn't too high either way...
speak;Artur;Oh!...Um...|I'm sorry...|No, I didn't find Lyon...|I wanted to report that the water here should be good to use for tonight...
speak;Ephraim;Thank you for the report on the water.
speak;Artur;Yes...|Well, keep in good spirits, your Highness.|Everything will be ok.
speak;Ephraim;You're right, Artur.|We must move forward.
speak;Ephraim;Artur, I was told that your ice magic has been helping keep other cool.
speak;Artur;Yes, it's so hot that it's been difficult.|If my magic can help relieve others, I'll keep it up though.
speak;Ephraim;Just don't push yourself too hard.|We can't afford to lose you now.
speak;Artur;Don't worry, your Highness.|I can't fall now.|While you're here, I can cool you down some.
speak;Ephraim;I'll take you up on that offer, Artur.|It's blazing hot here.
speak;Ephraim;Artur, some of the hallway lights are starting to burn out.|Our soldiers requested some more lights until dawn.
speak;Artur;Understood.|We don't want another ambush in the dark.|I will provide some light.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you Artur, let me know if you need a break.
speak;Artur;No fear, your Highness.|I find joy in bringing light to others.|It is my duty as a monk.
speak;Ephraim;As reliable as ever, Artur.|We will be safe as long as you are here.
speak;Artur;I pray that be the case.
speak;Ephraim;Artur, your service and mastery of light magic has been vital.|They have been effective against all of these monsters.
speak;Artur;I am just a simple monk, doing his job.|I am just relieved that the guiding light has always been with us.
speak;Artur;May it be with us until the very end.
speak;Ephraim;Until the end.|Now, let's end this battle.

name: Talk_Natasha
_source: speak;Eirika;Are you able to talk with us soon?
speak;Natasha;Yes, I just need to tend the injured first.|If you need anything else, please be quick.
speak;Eirika;Are you able to talk with us soon?
speak;Natasha;Yes, I just need to tend the injured first.|If you need anything else, please be quick.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help Natasha.|Your healing is much appreciated
speak;Natasha;I do what I can...|I hope this violence ends soon...|I just want peace...
speak;Natasha;Yes.|Seeing the beautiful water helps ease my soul.
speak;Eirika;I agree.|It's something to take our minds off the battle...
speak;Natasha;This was a long battle.|I must tend to those that were injured...
speak;Eirika;Thank you Natasha for all that you do...|It really helps the morale of the troops to have you around.
speak;Natasha;Even though I am from Grado?
speak;Eirika;I think you have proven to them enough that you are a good soul.
speak;Eirika;Are there any villagers injured from the fighting?
speak;Natasha;There are a couple of wounded ones I can take care of...|There's always someone that needs healing...
speak;Eirika;Why are you all the way over here Natasha?
speak;Natasha;There were a couple of Bishops that we fought with over here...
speak;Eirika;...Did you know any of them Natasha?...
speak;Eirika;How goes the purging of the inside of the fort Natasha?
speak;Natasha;There was a lot of evil residing in here...|I don't want to know what made so much evil gather here...
speak;Eirika;Me neither...|Some things are better left unknown...
speak;Natasha;Agreed...|I would rather fill this place with light...
speak;Eirika;Do the villagers have enough medical supplies, Natasha?
speak;Natasha;They seemed well stocked.|However, I'm unfamiliar with a lot of their supplies.
speak;Natasha;They have a lot of herbs and medicine that I've never seen before, and they are full of magic.|They should be effective, but I hope I don't mix something I shouldn't...
speak;Eirika;I see...|I pray for your success...
speak;Eirika;Was there anyone you know this time Natasha?...
speak;Natasha;A couple...|But I didn't know them that well...|But still...
speak;Eirika;I'm sorry Natasha...|I hope we can end this soon.|This just isn't right...
speak;Natasha;No...|I've been busy helping the captured servants...
speak;Natasha;...It is so cruel what happened to them...|I'll make sure they are treated with respect in the end...
speak;Eirika;Thank you Natasha...|I believe they are happy that you were the one to pray for them in the end...
speak;Natasha;Princess...|Yes...|I believe they are at peace now too...
speak;Eirika;So Natasha...|How many bishops did you know this time?...
speak;Natasha;Quite a few this time...|They were not the kind to hurt others, so they were probably forced to do this...
speak;Natasha;These poor men...|They didn't have a choice...|I could've been one of them among the dead if I didn't run away...
speak;Eirika;Natasha...|Thank you for living...|We need you...|There are injured that need you.
speak;Eirika;You can heal these wounded people.|You can heal their spirits.
speak;Natasha;Yes, Princess...|I know what I must do...|Thank you Princess for your strength.
speak;Natasha;We are getting low on medical supplies...|There have been a lot of injured civilians lately...
speak;Eirika;I see...|I'll see if I can send someone to get some supplies from that nearby vendor.
speak;Natasha;Thank you, Princess.|That should help raise the spirits of the people.
speak;Eirika;That would help lift up my spirits too...
speak;Natasha;Oh, Princess...|Please, heed me no mind.|I'm simply trying to keep the poisonious vapors away.|It requires a lot of concentration...
speak;Eirika;Ok, I better not disturb you too much then...
speak;Natasha;You are not a bother to me, Princess.|I appreciate your concern.
speak;Eirika;You're always welcome, Natasha.|If you require some water, I will bring it to you immediately.
speak;Natasha;Thank you, some water sounds pleasent right now.
speak;Eirika;I'll get that to you right away.
speak;Eirika;You look very exhausted Natasha...|Please get some rest soon...
speak;Natasha;I must finish treating some wounds.|I cannot rest while there are people in need.
speak;Natasha;You are a kind soul, Natasha...
speak;Eirika;Natasha, may I ask for a favor?
speak;Natasha;Of course, Princess.|How can I be of service to you?

speak;Eirika;This could be our final battle together.|I want to make sure the people of Grado are taken care of when this is over.|Can I trust you in their care?|There is no one else I would trust to make sure they are healed than you.
speak;Natasha;I see...|In that case, I will be sure to look after Grado for you.|I will heal the people to the best of my ability.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Natasha...|If there is anyone who can do it, it's you.
speak;Natasha;I pray that I will have the strength to live to your expectations.
speak;Ephraim;Ah, you must be lady Natasha.|Glad I can finally speak with you.|I've heard a lot of good things from the troops about you.
speak;Natasha;Ah!|You must be Prince Ephraim.|You've heard good things about me?|I'm just a simple cleric.
speak;Ephraim;Well, the troops seem to hold you in high regard.|I thank you for your honorable service.|If you have any requests, please reach out.|Work like yours is extremely important.
speak;Natasha;Thank you, your Highness.|I am running low on bandages.|May I request some more?
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Yes, I will see to it that those bandages get to you.
speak;Ephraim;Lady Natasha, I understand you are from Grado.|Has fighting your own countrymen been...difficult?
speak;Ephraim;I see...|If you ever need anything, we will be here for you.|We may be fighting against Grado, but that doesn't mean they are evil.|There are good people within Grado.
speak;Natasha;I'm relieved to hear that, your Highness.
speak;Ephraim;Good, glad I could bring some peace of mind.
speak;Ephraim;Are you in need of more antitoxins, Natasha?
speak;Natasha;I should have enough until we get to shore.|Though if we fight anymore monsters, I am unsure our supplies will last.|Their venom is very potent.
speak;Ephraim;Their venom has been a bane to our supplies.|We are lucky we have to help reduce their effects.
speak;Natasha;I pray we don't run into anymore monsters.|I don't want to see so much suffering by their hands...
speak;Ephraim;I agree.|The less monsters we have to fight, the better.
speak;Ephraim;Natasha, I've got a strange request from the local arena.|They have some fighters that got injured during the battle.|Do you think you could patch them up?
speak;Ephraim;Is being in the arena going to be an issue?
speak;Natasha;No...|No, it's ok.|Seeing that arena made me remember something...
speak;Ephraim;Oh?|Sorry, did I bring up a bad memory?
speak;Natasha;No, no...|I wouldn't call it a bad memory.|Forget I mentioned it.|I will take care of the task at hand.
speak;Ephraim;Understood, I'll leave it to you then.
speak;Ephraim;Natasha...|You knew some of troops, didn't you?

speak;Natasha;General Selena was well known within the clergy.|She treated her troops very well and made sure they were taken care of.|There...|There were some troops that I have treated...|I recognized their armor...|I saw some of their faces...
speak;Ephraim;Natasha...|General Selena wouldn't listen to reason.|I wish we didn't have to fight her.|Her troops could still be alive if she joined us.
speak;Natasha;Why?...|Why did she have to fight us?...
speak;Ephraim;Are you holding up ok, Natasha?|This can't be easy for you, fighting in the main castle.
speak;Natasha;I am holding up ok.|The fighting is now over.|I can help the people of Grado recover.|I cannot rest until they are treated.
speak;Ephraim;I understand Natasha.|Grado needs your healing touch.|Speaking of, there are some servants that need some treatment.|You are one of the few I can trust in taking care of them.
speak;Natasha;Understood.|I will do my best to heal them.|The guiding light will set my path before me.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Natasha.|They will be in good hands.
speak;Natasha;...It is so cruel what happened to them...|I'll make sure they are treated with respect in the end...
speak;Ephraim;That is very honorable, Natasha.|I believe they are happy that you were the one to pray for them in the end.
speak;Natasha;Your Highness...|Yes...|I believe they are at peace now too...
speak;Ephraim;Natasha...|How many bishops did you know this time?...
speak;Natasha;Quite a few this time...|They were not the kind to hurt others, so they were probably forced to do this...
speak;Natasha;These poor men...|They didn't have a choice...|I could've been one of them among the dead if I didn't run away...
speak;Ephraim;Natasha.|You are a virtuous, holy woman.|We need a woman like you in times like this.|There are injured that need you.
speak;Ephraim;You can heal these wounded people.|You can heal their spirits.
speak;Natasha;Yes, your Highness...|I now what I must do...|Thank you, your highness, and thank you for your strength.
speak;Natasha;We are getting low on medical supplies...|There have been a lot of injured civilians lately...
speak;Ephraim;I see...|I'll see if I can send someone to get some supplies from that nearby vendor.
speak;Natasha;Thank you, your highness.|That should help raise the spirits of the people.
speak;Ephraim;Yes, that should raise their spirits...
speak;Natasha;Oh, your Highness...|Please, heed me no mind.|I'm simply trying to keep the poisonious vapors away.|It requires a lot of concentration...
speak;Ephraim;Ok, I better not disturb you too much then...
speak;Natasha;You are not a bother to me, your Highness.|I appreciate your concern.
speak;Ephraim;You're always welcome, Natasha.|If you require some water, I will bring it to you immediately.
speak;Natasha;Thank you, some water sounds pleasent right now.
speak;Ephraim;I'll get that to you right away.
speak;Ephraim;You look very exhausted Natasha.|Please get some rest soon.
speak;Natasha;I must finish treating some wounds.|I cannot rest while there are people in need.
speak;Natasha;You are a kind soul, Natasha...
speak;Ephraim;Natasha, may I ask for a favor?
speak;Natasha;Of course, your Highness.|How can I be of service to you?

speak;Ephraim;This could be our final battle together.|I want to make sure the people of Grado are taken care of when this is over.|Can I trust you in their care?|There is no one else I would trust to make sure they are healed than you.
speak;Natasha;I see...|In that case, I will be sure to look after Grado for you.|I will heal the people to the best of my ability.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Natasha.|If there is anyone who can do it, it's you.
speak;Natasha;I pray that I will have the strength to live to your expectations.

name: Talk_Joshua
_source: speak;Eirika;May I ask who you are?
speak;Joshua;The name is Joshua.|I'm looking for who is the leader of this gang of do-gooders.
speak;Joshua;It's fine, it's fine.|I'm not going to sell you out or anything.|I just have a nose for this kind of thing...
speak;Joshua;Just my luck though...|What in the world did I get myself into?...|I didn't want to get involved with royalty stuff...
speak;Joshua;Don't worry, I'll fight for you guys.|You've got some pretty women in your ranks, so it can't be that bad, right?
speak;Eirika;How are you holding up Joshua?
speak;Joshua;It's my first battle with you guys and I can hardly see a thing.|I suppose I've had worse though.
speak;Joshua;Let's just say I'm used to sandstorms obstructing my vision.
speak;Joshua;Just a little mercenary work back in the day.|Don't think about it too much.|Now if you will excuse me, I've got a tavern to find.
speak;Eirika;What are you doing on this mountain Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Just reading the wind a little bit...|I don't like how it is blowing...
speak;Joshua;Just a little bit.|Someone I know can do it better than I can.|She could tell when things would start to go south.
speak;Joshua;Talk about storming the castle, huh?
speak;Eirika;You seemed pretty comfortable fighting in the castle Joshua.
speak;Joshua;Eh, you've seen one castle, you've seen them all.
speak;Eirika;You've been in a castle before Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yeah, more than I would've liked.|Doesn't matter though...|
speak;Joshua;Yeah...|Yeah, just need to get my mind off of things.
speak;Eirika;How does the armory look, Joshua?
speak;Joshua;There might be some good weapons here.|Doesn't really suit my style, but they aren't bad.|I've seen better though.
speak;Eirika;You do have a good eye for valuables, Joshua.
speak;Joshua;I've had my share of using the best and the worst.|That experience has helped me learn how to discern between the two.
speak;Eirika;That's good then.|I'll leave arming the troops to you then.
speak;Joshua;What, am I a war advisor now?
speak;Eirika;Were you going to gamble again Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yeah, but this arena's been closed down too!|Where can a simple man like me go to earn a little coin?!
speak;Eirika;What do you even do with the money you make anyway?
speak;Joshua;That's for me to know and for others' wallets to never find out!
speak;Eirika;How can you sleep while standing up Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Hmmm?|Just close your eyes and stop thinking...|Not much else to it.
speak;Joshua;Yeah...|I like to feel the heat from the flames.
speak;Joshua;Oh yeah?|...I guess you could say that.
speak;Joshua;I guess this heat just reminds me of home...
speak;Eirika;That's quite a sharp look you've got there Joshua...
speak;Eirika;You come from the desert, don't you Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yes...|I guess that's easy to figure out at this point, huh?
speak;Eirika;Yes...|Though, you're still a mystery to me.
speak;Joshua;Well, glad I have some mystery to me then.|I don't want to be an open book.
speak;Eirika;He he.|Oh Joshua.|...Are you afraid to go back to the desert?
speak;Joshua;No...|Not anymore...|I think it's about time I go back...|I need to face something...
speak;Eirika;We are here for you if you need us, Joshua.
speak;Eirika;Joshua, you look pale...|Are you ok?
speak;Joshua;...I'm fine.|We need to find Mo-, the Queen quick.
speak;Eirika;...Yes.|We need to find her quickly.|I'll let you know if we find anything.
speak;Joshua;I was such a fool...wasn't I?

speak;Eirika;...I know how you feel, Joshua...|I lost my father to this war too...|It pains me that I couldn't do anything to save him...|But I know my father wants me to move forward and save Renais.|The people are in need, and I want to protect them.|I know your mother would want the same for you.|Jehanna needs a righteous ruler.

speak;Joshua;"sigh".|I guess we've got a lot in common, don't we now?|You're right though, Mother wouldn't want me to mope around so much.|Jehanna needs a king.|A good one at that.|I guess it's time for me to step up.
speak;Eirika;Joshua, I know you can do it.|You are a strong man.
speak;Joshua;Thank you Eirika.|May Lady Luck bless us both.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for your strength, Joshua.|We finally got Renais back.
speak;Joshua;Anytime there, Eirika.|Looks like we are in the same boat now.|We both lost our kingdoms, and now we have to clean up the mess.
speak;Eirika;I suppose we are similar in that way...|Are you sure you should still be with us?|Shouldn't you be helping Jehanna?
speak;Joshua;The faster we end this war, the faster Jehanna can heal.|Plus, I've been gone for so many years.|They can wait just a little longer for my return.
speak;Joshua;Now this is rare.|I've never seen you this down before.
speak;Eirika;Joshua...|Forgive me, this has been a eventful day for me...
speak;Joshua;Let me bet.|That Lyon guy, right?|That's the prince of Grado, right?
speak;Eirika;Yes...|I just can't believe he is gone...|There must be something I can do...
speak;Joshua;I'm not good with royalty stuff, but I know how to handle a tough situation.|You don't have all the cards in your hand yet, right?|Don't fold yet until you've got a winning hand.
speak;Joshua;What I'm saying is, don't give up.|You're not dead yet and neither is he.|So don't look so down while you still have a chance to win.
speak;Eirika;Wow...|That was pretty inspiring Joshua...|You might make a good king afterall...
speak;Joshua;Hey now!|I'm not king yet!|We've still got a lot of business to take care of!
speak;Eirika;He he!|You're right, we still have work to do!|Thank you, Joshua.
speak;Eirika;I take it you're used the heat?
speak;Joshua;I take pride in my ability to withstand hot temperatures.|Though even I would say this is pretty hot.
speak;Eirika;That is understandable.|I don't think a normal person could live in heat like this.
speak;Joshua;Not a normal person, for sure.|Though I could think of a few people that might like enviroments like this.
speak;Eirika;I could think of some that would too...
speak;Joshua;I've had my fair share of sleepless nights.|A small nap would sound good about now.
speak;Eirika;You can take a break if you are tired.
speak;Joshua;Maybe I will, though I hate these castle beds.
speak;Eirika;Too comfy?|Are the beds in Jehanna better?
speak;Joshua;Much better.|My mother knew what beds were best for sleeping.|Not like these stuck up priests.
speak;Eirika;Joshua, are you ready for the final battle?
speak;Joshua;Yes, I'm ready to end this war.|I need to get back to Jehanna as soon as I can.
speak;Eirika;Ready to go back so soon?
speak;Joshua;What?|You trying to get me to change my mind after all of this?
speak;Eirika;No.|I'm just suprised how much you have changed.|You've become a mercenary to a king right before my eyes.
speak;Joshua;I guess that is quite the change to witness.|Just don't make a big deal of it in the history books.|They make those stories so boring, and stuffy.
speak;Eirika;Not one for the history books?|Though I do look forward to see how history paints you.
speak;Joshua;That part I'm not looking foward to.
speak;Ephraim;Hey you, the one with the hat.
speak;Joshua;You talking to me, fancy caped one?
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I'm trying to talk to all of my new troops.|I've heard from my sister that you were an intriguing one.
speak;Joshua;Ah, so your Eirika's brother.|I thought I noticed a resemblance.|So your another royal type, huh?
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I am a prince.|Though I try not to have that get in the way between me and my troops.|I understand that working together is what will bring us victory.
speak;Joshua;Your highly optimistic, just like your sister.|You really are family.
speak;Ephraim;I suppose we are similar in that sense.|Though don't always expect the same kindness as my sister.|I'm not afraid to strike with my lance if needs be.
speak;Joshua;Hey, that's something I can respect.|We just might get along then.|I like a prince that can bear his fangs.
speak;Ephraim;Good, I look forward to seeing what you can do then.
speak;Joshua;Just don't lag too behind me then.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua, I need a man to gather food supplies for the boat ride.|Can you do that?
speak;Joshua;No, I hate being on the ocean.|Too much swaying.|Can't even drink the water.|I would rather be on land.
speak;Ephraim;I can see where you're coming from.|Unfortunately, we have no other faster alternatives.
speak;Joshua;This is gonna be a long boat ride...
speak;Ephraim;How are you holding up, Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Please...|Don't talk to me right now...|It's hard enough to stand...as it is...|Ugh...
speak;Ephraim;Poor soul...|I've never seen someone look so pale before...
speak;Ephraim;Were you at the arena, Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yes, but those blasted imbeciles closed down the arena due to the fighting!|Don't they know that's the best time to have arena matches?!
speak;Joshua;Yeah!|That's when your blood is boiling the most!|People are more likely to bet more money when they are like that!|I used to make a fortune that way!
speak;Ephraim;Eirika did say he had a major gambling problem.|I guess I took her word for granted.
speak;Joshua;Hey Ephraim.|You look unusually down.|Was it because that Selena woman?
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I just wish we could've convinced her to join us.

speak;Joshua;You can't let something like this get you down.|It was a fifty-fifty chance she would join you.|You may have lost your hand there, but you won the battle here.|Can't complain about the chips you end up with.
speak;Ephraim;I suppose you're right, Joshua.|We live to fight another day.
speak;Joshua;Another day, another bet.|Another chance to get a winning hand.
speak;Ephraim;You look uncomfortable, Joshua.|You don't like being in castles.
speak;Joshua;Castles aren't my forte...|Plus, I've got a bad feeling...|I don't know why, but I feel like something bad is going to happen soon...
speak;Joshua;Yeah, my instincts are telling me something is up.|Like I need to be somewhere.|Maybe it's just being back in a castle making me feel this way.
speak;Ephraim;You've been in a castle before?
speak;Joshua;...Yes.|A long time ago...|Far too long ago...
speak;Ephraim;Joshua.|You are the prince of Jehanna, aren't you?
speak;Joshua;I was such a fool...Wasn't I?

speak;Ephraim;...I know how you feel, Joshua.|I lost my father to this war too.|It pains me that I couldn't do anything to save him.|But I know my father wants me to move forward and save Renais.|The people are in need, and I want to protect them.|I know your mother would want the same for you.|Jehanna needs a righteous ruler.

speak;Joshua;"sigh".|I guess we've got a lot in common, don't we now?|You're right though, mother wouldn't want me to mope around so much.|Jehanna needs a king.|A good one at that.|I guess it's time for me to step up.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua, you can do it.|We have to, for our kingdoms.
speak;Joshua;Thank you, Ephraim.|Lady Luck bless us both.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you for your cooperation, Joshua.|We finally got Renais back.
speak;Joshua;No need for thanks, Ephraim.|Looks like we are in the same boat now.|We both lost our kingdoms, and now we have to clean up the mess.
speak;Ephraim;I suppose we are similar in that way.|Are you sure you should still be with us?|Shouldn't you be helping Jehanna?
speak;Joshua;The faster we end this war, the faster Jehanna can heal.|Plus, I've been gone for so many years.|They can wait just a little longer for my return.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Well, let's try to end this war quickly then.
speak;Joshua;Now this is a sight.|I've never seen you this down before.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua.|Excuse me, this has been a eventful day for me.
speak;Joshua;Let me bet.|That Lyon guy, right?|That's the prince of Grado, right?
speak;Ephraim;Yes...|I can't believe things have gotten this bad...|I fail to think of a perfect solution.
speak;Joshua;I'm not good with royalty stuff, but I know how to handle a tough situation.|You don't have all the cards in your hand yet, right?|Don't fold yet until you've got a winning hand.
speak;Joshua;What I'm saying is, don't give up.|You're not dead yet.|So don't look so down while you still have a chance to win.
speak;Ephraim;Wow...|That was pretty inspiring Joshua.|You might make a good king afterall.
speak;Joshua;Hey now!|I'm not king yet!|We've still got a lot of business to take care of!
speak;Ephraim;You're right, we still have work to do.|Thanks, Joshua.
speak;Ephraim;I take it you're used the heat?
speak;Joshua;I take pride in my ability to withstand hot temperatures.|Though even I would say this is pretty hot.
speak;Ephraim;That is understandable.|I don't think a normal person could live in heat like this.
speak;Joshua;Not a normal person, for sure.|Though I could think of a few people that might like enviroments like this.
speak;Ephraim;I could think of some that would too...
speak;Joshua;I've had my fair share of sleepless nights.|A small nap would sound good about now.
speak;Ephraim;You can take a break if you are tired.
speak;Joshua;Maybe I will, though I hate these castle beds.
speak;Ephraim;Too comfy?|Are the beds in Jehanna better?
speak;Joshua;Much better.|My mother knew what beds were best for sleeping.|Not like these stuck up priests.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua, are you ready for the final battle?
speak;Joshua;Yes, I'm ready to end this war.|I need to get back to Jehanna as soon as I can.
speak;Ephraim;Ready to go back so soon?
speak;Joshua;What?|You trying to get me to change my mind after all of this?
speak;Ephraim;No.|I'm just suprised how much you have changed.|You've become a mercenary to a king right before my eyes.
speak;Joshua;I guess that is quite the change to witness.|Just don't make a big deal of it in the history books.|They make those stories so boring, and stuffy.
speak;Ephraim;Not one for the history books?|Though I do look forward to see how history paints you.
speak;Joshua;That part I'm not looking foward to.

name: Talk_Ephraim
_source: speak;Ephraim;Well, of course I am.|After we escaped Renvall, I thought I'd strike a blow against the emperor himself.|When I heard that you'd been waylaid by the enemy, however, I turned back to find you.|Looks like my timing was impeccable.
speak;Eirika;I'm so sorry.|The irony is that I was trying to rescue you.|All I did was interfere with your plans...
speak;Ephraim;What are you talking about?|You came to help me, didn't you?|Your efforts alone are enough to inspire me.|Come on, Eirika!|The enemy awaits.
speak;Ephraim;Don't be sad Eirika...|There is no way I can die yet.|Now don't be so sad.|We've got to some stuff to take care of.
speak;Ephraim;Eirika...|I want to talk with you more, but I have to set up this meeting...|If there is anything I can do for you let me know.|I'll do it quickly.
speak;Ephraim;Home...|It feels almost like a dream...|Like we are almost strangers in our own home...
speak;Eirika;I feel the same way...|But now we can finally heal.|The people of Renais can heal...
speak;Ephraim;You're right Eirika.|It's now our responsibilty to restore Renais.|I just hope I am up to the task.
speak;Eirika;Any signs of Lyon in the castle, Ephraim?
speak;Ephraim;Doesn't look like he is hiding in there, Eirika...
speak;Ephraim;Don't lose heart yet.|There is still a chance that we can catch up to him.
speak;Eirika;You're right, brother.|We cannot give up hope yet.
speak;Ephraim;We cannot.|Now let's continue our search.
speak;Eirika;Brother, are you ok in this heat?
speak;Ephraim;I've been better, to be honest.|Probably going to be the only time I'm jealous that you have a skirt.|Must be a lot cooler in that.
speak;Eirika;He he!|I'll be more than happy to lend you a spare one, if you want?
speak;Ephraim;I wouldn't be caught dead wearing that.|Imagine what the troops would think.
speak;Eirika;Oh, they would never let you live it down.|All the more reason I want you to wear it!|He he!
speak;Eirika;Are you going to rest soon, Brother?
speak;Ephraim;No, there is still too many uncertainties.|There could be enemies still lurking in the dark.|Waiting for us to turn our backs.
speak;Eirika;Brother...|The battle is over, you need to rest...
speak;Ephraim;Maybe I could use some rest...
speak;Eirika;You need to rest.|I'll grab you a blanket.
speak;Eirika;Brother...|This is it...|Lyon...|He must be in that temple...
speak;Ephraim;Yes, this is our final battle.|We have to put an end to this, one way or another.
speak;Eirika;Do you think we can do it, with the last stone?
speak;Ephraim;As long as we are together, it will work.|It has to work.|All of Magvel depends on it.
