speak;Eirika;You're right.|We can do it together, Brother.|We will save Magvel!|Together!

name: Talk_Eirika
_source: speak;Ephraim;Eirika...|I want to talk with you more, but I have to set up this meeting...|If there is anything I can do for you let me know.|I'll do it quickly.
speak;Ephraim;Home...|It feels almost like a dream...|Like we are almost strangers in our own home...
speak;Eirika;I feel the same way...|But now we can finally heal.|The people of Renais can heal...
speak;Ephraim;You're right Eirika.|It's now our responsibilty to restore Renais.|I just hope I am up to the task.
speak;Eirika;Any signs of Lyon in the castle, Ephraim?
speak;Ephraim;Doesn't look like he is hiding in there, Eirika...
speak;Ephraim;Don't lose heart yet.|There is still a chance that we can catch up to him.
speak;Eirika;You're right, brother.|We cannot give up hope yet.
speak;Ephraim;We cannot.|Now let's continue our search.
speak;Eirika;Brother, are you ok in this heat?
speak;Ephraim;I've been better, to be honest.|Probably going to be the only time I'm jealous that you have a skirt.|Must be a lot cooler in that.
speak;Eirika;He he!|I'll be more than happy to lend you a spare one, if you want?
speak;Ephraim;I wouldn't be caught dead wearing that.|Imagine what the troops would think.
speak;Eirika;Oh, they would never let you live it down.|All the more reason I want you to wear it!|He he!
speak;Eirika;Are you going to rest soon, Brother?
speak;Ephraim;No, there is still too many uncertainties.|There could be enemies still lurking in the dark.|Waiting for us to turn our backs.
speak;Eirika;Brother...|The battle is over, you need to rest...
speak;Ephraim;Maybe I could use some rest...
speak;Eirika;You need to rest.|I'll grab you a blanket.
speak;Eirika;Brother...|This is it...|Lyon...|He must be in that temple...
speak;Ephraim;Yes, this is our final battle.|We have to put an end to this, one way or another.
speak;Eirika;Do you think we can do it, with the last stone?
speak;Ephraim;As long as we are together, it will work.|It has to work.|All of Magvel depends on it.
speak;Eirika;You're right.|We can do it together, Brother.|We will save Magvel!|Together!

name: Talk_Forde
_source: speak;Forde;Doesn't look like it.|I don't see anyone so far.
speak;Ephraim;Ok, good.|Keep your eye out for any reinforcements.
speak;Forde;Sure can do boss.|Leave it to me!
speak;Eirika;You must be Franz's brother, right?
speak;Forde;Yes!|Princess Eirika!|It's a pleasure to see you alive!
speak;Eirika;He he!|Thank you!|I hope my brother hasn't pushed you too hard!
speak;Forde;Nothing we can't handle!|We are knights of Renais after all!
speak;Eirika;He he he!|Indeed, the finest knights I've seen!
speak;Eirika;I'm so sorry...|He was a brave soldier...
speak;Forde;I know...|I bet he was...|If you excuse me, I need a moment...
speak;Forde;First Dad, then Mom...|Now Franz...|I'm all alone...
speak;Eirika;This is our real battle together Forde.
speak;Forde;Yeah, you fight completely different than Ephraim.|It was kind of refreshing actually!
speak;Forde;Yeah!|You're a lot prettier than Ephraim!|I would rather look at you than Ephraim!|Ha ha!
speak;Eirika;Forde, are you taking a nap?
speak;Eirika;I'm not even going to try to wake him up...
speak;Eirika;How can Forde sleep by a fire like this?
speak;Eirika;Maybe I should splash some water on him?
speak;Eirika;It's surprising to see you awake Forde.
speak;Forde;Yeah...|That was a tough battle.|Couldn't afford to close my eyes for a moment.
speak;Eirika;Well, thank you for helping.|We need as much man power as we can get.|Even you Forde.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for searching and not taking a nap, Forde.
speak;Forde;This is serious business.|I'm doing what I can to help find the Queen.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Forde...|Let me know if you find anything.
speak;Eirika;I guess the heat got to him...|Well, at least he's sleeping in the shade...
speak;Eirika;I'm surprised you're not asleep Forde, now that we are back home.
speak;Forde;Oh, trust me Princess.|I would if I could, but there is too much to do for me to nap!
speak;Eirika;Huh, that's pretty knightly of you.
speak;Forde;Hey!|I didn't become a knight of Renais by doing nothing, you know!
speak;Eirika;He he!|If you did, I would have been worried about our troops long ago!
speak;Forde;Oh!|Sorry Princess!|This just seemed like a great place to take a nap!
speak;Eirika;Forde!|How can you sleep right now!|We need to find Lyon!
speak;Eirika;Let me know if you find anything!
speak;Forde;Ok...|Looks like that was a bad time to nap...
speak;Eirika;Forde, it's too hot here.|You better not take a nap, or you could die!
speak;Forde;You're right, Princess...|As much as I'd hate to admit it.|I might not wake up if I nap here.
speak;Eirika;Excatly.|Let me know if you need any water, we might be here for a while longer.
speak;Forde;Thanks!|That would hit the spot actually!
speak;Eirika;He he!|Coming right up then!|You know, you might be useful in enviroments like this!
speak;Eirika;I knew you would be asleep, Forde.|I brought you a blanket.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help this battle, Forde.|You deserve this rest.
speak;Eirika;Forde, this could be our final battle.|Can I ask that you don't fall asleep for this next battle?|I need all the strength we can get for us to win.
speak;Forde;Of course, Princess!|I can't sleep in a time like this!
speak;Forde;Well, I probably could if I tried, but I won't sleep!|My sword is yours, Princess!
speak;Eirika;Good.|I know we can win with you by my side.
speak;Ephraim;Forde, don't tell me you're thinking of napping?
speak;Forde;Oh, come on, your Highness!|We've got all of these hands to help now!|I can shut my eyes for a little bit, can't I?
speak;Ephraim;We may have more troops, but there is still plenty of work to be done.|I can give you an assignment if you don't have one.
speak;Forde;Alright, alright.|I've got some supplies I can deliver.|Just leave it to me.
speak;Ephraim;Ok, good.|Now I better not catching you doozing off at a later time.
speak;Forde;Sorry, I couldn't hear you over the sound of the waves.
speak;Ephraim;Forde, your guard shift is over.|You can go rest now.
speak;Forde;Finally!|I felt like I was gonna pass out anytime now!
speak;Ephraim;I have a task for you, Forde.
speak;Forde;Oh yeah?|What is it, your Highness?
speak;Ephraim;Some of the villagers are worried about any more monsters coming to attack.|Can I have you do a sweep around the forests?|Make sure there are no monsters that survived.
speak;Forde;Leave it to me, your Highness.|I'll make sure the perimeter is safe!
speak;Ephraim;Good.|I'm reminded how good of a knight you are when you're not asleep.
speak;Ephraim;Forde.|Do you think I could've done more?|What was I lacking?
speak;Forde;Prince...|You're overthinking this.|She made her choice.|A choice that neither her or you can take back anymore.|If it makes you feel better, tomorrow this will all be in the past.
speak;Forde;...Did that make you feel a little bit better?
speak;Forde;Did you see that?|The king just...disappeared?|Where in the world did he go?
speak;Ephraim;I...don't know...|Was it an illusion?|This doesn't make any sense...
speak;Forde;This could be a trap, your Highness.|We need to stay on our gaurd.
speak;Ephraim;You're right.|We better keep our arms ready.|At least until we know we are clear.
speak;Ephraim;Good.|Let me know if you discover anything.
speak;Ephraim;I guess the heat got to him.|Well, at least he's sleeping in the shade...
speak;Ephraim;I'm suprised you're not asleep Forde, now that we are back home.
speak;Forde;Oh, trust me your Highness.|I would if I could, but there is too much to do for me to nap!
speak;Ephraim;Huh, that's pretty knightly of you.
speak;Forde;Hey!|I didn't become a knight of Renais by doing nothing, you know!
speak;Ephraim;If you did, I would have been worried about our troops long ago.
speak;Forde;Oh!|Sorry, your Highness!|This just seemed like a great place to take a nap!
speak;Ephraim;Forde!|How can you sleep right now?!|We need to find Lyon!
speak;Ephraim;Let me know if you find anything!
speak;Forde;Ok...|Looks like that was a bad time to nap...
speak;Ephraim;Forde, it's too hot here.|You better not take a nap, or you could die.
speak;Forde;You're right, your Highness...|As much as I'd hate to admit it.|I might not wake up if I nap here.
speak;Ephraim;Excatly.|Let me know if you need any water, we might be here for a while longer.
speak;Forde;Thanks!|That would hit the spot actually!
speak;Ephraim;Ok, I'll get that arranged for you then.|You know, you might be more useful in enviroments like this.
speak;Ephraim;I knew you would be asleep, Forde.|I arranged a blanket to be brought to you.
speak;Ephraim;Good job on your work this battle.|You deserve this rest.
speak;Ephraim;Don't sleep for too long, though.
speak;Ephraim;Forde, this could be our final battle.|Can I ask that you don't fall asleep for this next battle?|I need all the strength we can get for us to win.
speak;Forde;Of course, your Highness!|I can't sleep in a time like this!
speak;Forde;Well, I probably could if I tried, but I won't sleep!|My sword is yours, Princess!
speak;Ephraim;Good.|May this be our greatest battle.

name: Talk_Kyle
_source: speak;Kyle;I'm doing good, thanks to your brilliant strategies.
speak;Ephraim;It was a risky bet, but I knew we would win.
speak;Kyle;Yeah, and it paid off well.|Now let's get ready for our next move.
speak;Eirika;You must be Kyle, right?|Thank you so much for helping my brother.
speak;Kyle;It was my pleasure Princess Eirika.|Your brother is a valiant man.
speak;Kyle;That can be true too...|Though we had many victories because of him.
speak;Eirika;I'm thankful to hear that...|I don't know what I would do without him...
speak;Eirika;Anything to report from the battle, Kyle?
speak;Kyle;Looks like the area is secure.|I hope I have been thorough enough, since this is our first time fighting together.
speak;Eirika;It's ok Kyle.|You don't have to work so hard for my sake.
speak;Kyle;It's ok Princess.|As a knight of Renais, I swear my life to do my best for our country.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Kyle...|We are lucky to have a knight like you around...
speak;Kyle;No, there is still too much for me to do.|Too many things to prepare for.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Don't push yourself too hard Kyle...
speak;Kyle;It's ok, I'm prepared for rest soon.
speak;Eirika;Why are you in a rush Kyle?
speak;Kyle;I'm gathering wood to keep the fire burning.
speak;Eirika;I don't think you need to rush that fast though...|You might get hurt.
speak;Kyle;...You're right Princess.|I just didn't want the fire to go out while I was gone...
speak;Eirika;It will be ok Kyle.|You don't have to push yourself that hard.
speak;Kyle;Thank you Princess.|I will do my best to not push myself too hard.
speak;Eirika;That's a lot of supplies you got there, Kyle.
speak;Kyle;Yes, I'm taking as much of the supplies from these nearby forts as we can.
speak;Eirika;Ok, just don't overwork the horses too much...|They might get too tired with a heavy load.
speak;Kyle;Noted, Princess.|I'll see what the maximum weight the horses can carry is.
speak;Kyle;I'm searching as hard as I can, but nothing to report yet.
speak;Eirika;Understood.|I trust you will report to me as soon as you find something.
speak;Kyle;Correct.|I've brought some tracking tools, just in case.|I'm hoping to find her soon.
speak;Kyle;Not really, Princess...|It looks like merchants were chased out from here.|A lot of shelves were raided and it's a mess everywhere.
speak;Eirika;I see...|It's a good thing a vendor stayed or we would have been in major trouble.
speak;Eirika;Kyle, thank you so much for your help...
speak;Eirika;...This is sruprising for Kyle to take a nap...|He has been pushing himself so hard.|Being home must have finally caused him to rest...|I'll let him sleep this time.
speak;Kyle;My apologies, Princess...|I have nothing to report...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Please let me know if you find anything...
speak;Eirika;Please Kyle, I hope you find something...
speak;Eirika;Would you like some water, Kyle?|Making sure everyone is keeping cool is very important here.
speak;Kyle;I'm ok on water, I made sure to be well hydrated.|Thank you for checking up on me though, Princess.
speak;Eirika;You're welcome, Kyle.|I should have figured you would already be prepared.
speak;Kyle;I am always prepared.|Though it's nice to know my allies care for me.
speak;Eirika;We can't afford to lose you now.|Especially not in a place like this.
speak;Kyle;This would be a terrible place to die.
speak;Kyle;No signs of movement since the enemy retreat.|I'm keeping a vigiliant eye out though.|They will not get past me if they strike again.
speak;Eirika;That's good to hear.|Just be sure to rest once your guard duty time is up.|We have been up for a long time, and we will need our rest.
speak;Kyle;I understand, Princess.|I will find a way to optimize my time.|I have to show the Rausten knights the might of the knights of Renais.
speak;Eirika;I think you've proved your might enough, Kyle.|Renais is lucky to have such honor bound knighs such as you.
speak;Kyle;Thank you, Princess.|That only makes me want to work harder.
speak;Eirika;Kyle, how are our supplies looking?|Are we fully prepared for this final battle?
speak;Kyle;I have taken proper actions to make sure we are fully prepared.|We should have a weeks worth of supplies, in case of the worst scenario.
speak;Eirika;That's a relief to hear.|Your vigilance has been very handy.
speak;Kyle;We can never be too prepared.|Our victory could depend on it.
speak;Eirika;Indeed.|I have confidence in our victory.
speak;Ephraim;It looks like we have secured the area, Kyle.
speak;Kyle;Indeed, your Highness.|We should be secure for the night.|It will be nice to have walls to protect us while we sleep.
speak;Ephraim;It will be nice.|Our troops will really appreciate it.|Will help out morale.
speak;Kyle;High morale will lead to effective results.
speak;Ephraim;That is what we like to see.|Let's keep it up, Kyle.
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, I'm putting you in charge of stocking up a ship.|Once a boat becomes available, load it up.|We don't know how long we are going to be at sea.
speak;Kyle;Understood, your Highness.|I'll make sure we are stocked with at least a months worth food.
speak;Ephraim;A months worth?|Do you think we will really need that much?
speak;Kyle;We have to be prepared for any kind of disaster.|The last thing we want is to be stuck at sea with no food.
speak;Ephraim;You've got a good point there.
speak;Kyle;Ah!|My apologies, your Highness.|We appear to be secure for now.|Those blasted monsters seem to all be eradicated.
speak;Ephraim;Do you dislike monsters that much, Kyle?
speak;Kyle;I don't have a soft spot for them.|The way they move...|The fur...
speak;Ephraim;I see...|I'm kind of suprised that monsters would be your bane.
speak;Kyle;Don't you dare tell anyone about this.
speak;Kyle;There is some damage, but could have been worse.|They could have been treated better though.
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Kyle, see if you can gather a list of supplies they need.|We'll tend to them before we depart.
speak;Kyle;Understood.|They are lucky to have your support.
speak;Ephraim;Even if they are not from Renais, a prince must support the people.|They don't deserve to suffer due to our battles.
speak;Kyle;Wise words to live by.|You'll be a great future king.
speak;Ephraim;Kyle...|I want you to prepare a respectful funeral for General Selena.|She at least deserve that much.
speak;Kyle;Understood.|I will make the arrangments as soon as possible.|My uncle was from Grado, I know the traditions of a Grado funeral.
speak;Kyle;Yes, he was a retired wyvern rider of the Grado army.|He used to take me on trips across the country on his wyvern.
speak;Ephraim;I never knew that.|I'm glad I can trust you with this then.
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, any signs of the king?
speak;Kyle;No...|I don't like what's going on here.|There are too many questions.
speak;Ephraim;Agreed.|Too much going on, not enough answers.
speak;Kyle;I'm going to prepare for anything that might come our way.|The king could be nearby with more troops.
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|Find me as soon as you hear anything.
speak;Kyle;Not really, your Highness...|It looks like merchants were chased out from here.|A lot of shelves were raided and made a mess.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Good thing a vendor stayed or we would have been in major trouble.
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, I wanted to say thank you for your help throughout this journey.
speak;Ephraim;...This is suprising for Kyle to take a nap.|He has been pushing himself hard lately.|Being home must have finally caused him to rest.|I'll let him sleep this time.
speak;Kyle;My apologies, your Highness...|I have nothing to report...
speak;Ephraim;I see...|Please let me know if you find anything.
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, I know you will find something.
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, do you need some water brought to you?|Making sure everyone is keeping cool is very important here.
speak;Kyle;I'm ok on water, I made sure to be well hydrated.|Thank you for checking up on me though, your Highness.
speak;Ephraim;Anytime, Kyle.|I should have figured you would already be prepared.
speak;Kyle;I am always prepared.|Though it's nice to know my allies care for me.
speak;Ephraim;We can't afford to lose you now.|Especially not in a place like this.
speak;Kyle;This would be a terrible place to die.
speak;Kyle;No signs of movement since the enemy retreat.|I'm keeping a vigiliant eye out though.|They will not get past me if they strike again.
speak;Ephraim;That's good to hear.|Just be sure to rest once your guard duty time is up.|We have been up for a long time, and we will need our rest.
speak;Kyle;I understand, your Highness.|I will find a way to optimize my time.|I have to show the Rausten knights the might of the knights of Renais.
speak;Ephraim;I think you've proved your might enough, Kyle.|Renais is lucky to have such honor bound knighs such as you.
speak;Kyle;Thank you, your Highness.|That only makes me want to work harder.
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, how are our supplies looking?|Are we fully prepared for this final battle?
speak;Kyle;I have taken proper actions to make sure we are fully prepared.|We should have a weeks worth of supplies, in case of the worst scenario.
speak;Ephraim;That's a relief to hear.|Your vigilance has been very handy.
speak;Kyle;We can never be too prepared.|Our victory could depend on it.
speak;Ephraim;Indeed.|I have confidence in our victory.

name: Talk_Tana
_source: speak;Eirika;Tana...|It is actually a huge relief to have you by my side.|Having a friend I can rely on will be a huge help...
speak;Tana;Of course Eirika!|I'm happy to help you!|We are in this together now!|We can't let the boys have all the fun!
speak;Eirika;He he he!|Right, we can help out too!|Together, we are unstoppable!
speak;Eirika;Oh, sorry Tana.|Looks like you're busy talking to Innes.
speak;Tana;It's ok Eirika.|I've got a second if it's for you!
speak;Tana;Innes...|I'm so sorry we couldn't save you...|I'm so weak...
speak;Eirika;Tana...|I'm so sorry...|It's all my fault...
speak;Eirika;Tana looks so cute when she is sleeping, he he!
speak;Tana;...Oh Ephraim...|That's so sweet of you...|He he...|I didn't know you were the cuddle type...|Oh Ephraim...
speak;Eirika;Tana, are you ok with cooking duty?
speak;Tana;Of course!|I've got some ideas for some great Frelian dishes!
speak;Eirika;I'm glad to hear that Tana.|I always look forward to your cooking!
speak;Tana;He he!|Thank you Eirika!|Let's make the night joyous with some food!
speak;Tana;Look at all of these Rausten knights!|They look so regal!
speak;Eirika;Indeed...|I'm thankful they showed up...|The fighting would have gone on a lot longer without them...
speak;Tana;I wonder who sent them?|They must have been really strong and powerful!
speak;Eirika;Possibly, for an army that's as strong as this.
speak;Tana;I'm trying to think where I would be if I was the Queen...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Where do you think she is?
speak;Tana;If I was the Queen, I would want to be as far away from the Sacred Stone as possible.|But they are probably forcing her to reveal where it is...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Any idea where that would be?
speak;Eirika;Tana, were we able to get all of the servants out of the building?
speak;Tana;Yes Eirika, it looks like everyone is accounted for.|That's a huge relief!
speak;Eirika;Indeed.|I was so worried when the fire started...|It was so fast, I was worried someone didn't make it.
speak;Tana;Me too...|I'm thankful all of our troops helped them evacuate.
speak;Eirika;Tana...|Thank you so much for your help...|I could never thank you and your family enough...
speak;Tana;You're finally home Eirika...|It's so beautiful...|I could just...
speak;Eirika;It's going to make me...|*Sob*...|It's been so long...
speak;Eirika;Please tell me you found Lyon, Tana...
speak;Tana;I'm sorry Eirika, I haven't found anything...
speak;Tana;So...|That was Lyon...|He looks like how you've always described him...|But my first meeting with him was totally different from what I would imagine...
speak;Eirika;Something must be wrong...|The Lyon I know is kind, gentle, and cares for others...|That demon must be doing something to him...|I must help him...
speak;Eirika;Are you staying cool enough, Tana?
speak;Tana;It is so hot down here!|I have to keep flying up to cool down!|I can't wait for us to get out of here!
speak;Eirika;I have to agree with you...|The faster we get out of here, the better.
speak;Tana;As quick as possible!|I hope we can take a bath soon to get all this sweat off!
speak;Eirika;A bath does sound really good at this point.
speak;Eirika;You look like your about to pass out, Tana...
speak;Tana;...I'm so sleepy...|Can't last much longer...|So sleepy...
speak;Eirika;She is out like a light...
speak;Eirika;Tana.|Thank you so much for fighting with us for so long.|I can't thank you and your father enough.|We couldn't have gotten this far without Frelia's help.
speak;Tana;Of course!|You are my friend, and Frelia will always help allies!|Hopefully we can finish this war and go back home.|I miss being back at home.
speak;Eirika;Me too.|Once we are home, we will need to celebrate.|It's been too long since we could enjoy our time at home.
speak;Tana;I came here in hopes of helping you in some way.|But while I was looking for you, I got captured by Grado troops.
speak;Ephraim;Is that so?|Well, I'm glad to see you're unharmed.|Tana, you should head back to Castle Frelia immediately.|King Hayden must be worried about you.
speak;Tana;No!|Ephraim, I came all this way so I could help you!
speak;Ephraim;And yet, here I am, helping you.
speak;Tana;Ah, well...|Yes, that may be true, but-|But I've been so worried about you, Ephraim!
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Oh, please don't look at me with those teary eyes.|If you're really determined to help, then you're welcome to come with us.|But you must promise me not to try anything reckless.
speak;Tana;Ephraim...|Thank you.|I knew that you would understand how I feel.
speak;Ephraim;Ok, looks like we are safe now.|Tana, are you still unharmed?
speak;Tana;I'm fine, Ephraim...|Thank you so much for rescuing me, I was so worried...
speak;Ephraim;I was worried too!|As soon as I saw you, I was worried you were going to get hurt!
speak;Ephraim;Please, I don't want to see anything happen to you.|I know you want to help, so you have to follow my exact orders.|Can you promise me that?
speak;Tana;Yes, I promise...|I'll do my best to help you!
speak;Ephraim;Understood.|That brings me some relief.|Thank you, Tana.
speak;Tana;Of course!|Ephraim, look at the sea!|I feel so refreashed to be by the sea again!|I feel like I'm at home!
speak;Ephraim;It does make me feel back at Frelia.|The seafood there was great.|I hope they have some good seafood here as well.
speak;Tana;That would be wonderful!|If they have the right fish, I can cook us up a Frelian dish!
speak;Ephraim;Oh, you improved your cooking, Tana?|Last time we saw each other, Innes mentioned how you burnt some fish.
speak;Tana;Oooo!|I told Innes that was an accident!|I haven't burned any fish in years!
speak;Ephraim;I see.|That is reassuring then.|I would be happy to have your cooking then.
speak;Tana;Oh, Ephraim!|I'll be happy to cook you anything!
speak;Ephraim;Tana, don't fly off too far.|I don't want you to lose you in this darkness.
speak;Tana;Thank you, Ephraim.|Achaeus and I will be fine though.|Flying at sea comes naturally to us!
speak;Ephraim;I see.|I suppose you do have a lot of experience from living in Frelia.
speak;Tana;Yes!|Mother used to take me on her pegasus all the time when I was young!|Innes used to be so jealous that I got to ride with her!
speak;Ephraim;That sounds like a wonderful time.|Though it's hard for me to imagine Innes being jealous.
speak;Tana;You jest, Ephraim!|He's jealous all the time!|Have you not noticed?
speak;Ephraim;I never expected we would fight another battle so soon.|Are you tired, Tana?
speak;Tana;I'm a little tired...|I was hoping we could get some more rest...|I'm glad we are safe now though.|I hope the villagers are ok, though.
speak;Ephraim;Me too.|I'm sending some troops to make sure their needs are taken care of.|I hope we kept destruction to a minimum.
speak;Tana;I hope so too...|Is there anything I can do to help them?
speak;Ephraim;They might need help transferring supplies.|Would you be able to help with that?|You can rest if you want, though.
speak;Tana;I will be happy to help them!|Anything I can do to help others!
speak;Ephraim;Amazing.|You are a sweet soul, Tana.
speak;Ephraim;I just feel a little frustrated.|I felt like I could have done more to prevent this unnecessary death.|If I had a different approach.
speak;Tana;I know what will cheer you up!|I have some fish jerky leftover in my bag!|It is really yummy!|I made it myself!|Would you like some?
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Tana.|I will happy to try some.
speak;Tana;Good!|A yummy treat will cheer you right up!
speak;Ephraim;Tana, I have a special assignment for you.
speak;Ephraim;I'm gathering a team to help the castle servants.|They are in need of treatment and support.|I want you to be the leader of this team.|You're the only one I can trust with this.
speak;Tana;Ephraim...|I understand.|I will take this assignment and do my best.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you, Tana.|I know they are in good hands with you at the helm.
speak;Tana;I know what will bring them in good spirits!|A good dinner!|Something nutritious, but also easy on the stomach!
speak;Ephraim;I think that will be perfect.|They will enjoy that.
speak;Ephraim;We were able to get to Eirika and Innes in time.
speak;Tana;I'm so glad they are safe...|If anything happened to them...
speak;Ephraim;I don't want to think the alternative.|We just need to be thankful that we are reunited.
speak;Tana;You're right, Ephraim.|I wonder if Innes will be annoyed if I give him a big hug!|He he!
speak;Ephraim;Knowing Innes, he proably would get angry.|Ha ha!
speak;Ephraim;Tana...|I'm so sorry...|I can't believe it...|Innes...
speak;Ephraim;Tana.|Thank you so much for your help.|I would never be able to make it this far without you and King Hayden's help.
speak;Tana;You're finally home, Ephraim...|It's so beautiful...|I could just...
speak;Ephraim;Please tell me you found Lyon, Tana.
speak;Tana;I'm sorry Ephraim, I haven't found anything...
speak;Tana;So...|That was Lyon...|He looks like how you've always discribed him...|But my first meeting with him was totally different from what I would imagine...
speak;Ephraim;Why have thigns come to this?|Lyon was always so kind, gentle, and cares for others.|That demon changed him.|I must help him...
speak;Ephraim;Are you staying cool enough, Tana?
speak;Tana;It is so hot down here!|I have to keep flying up to cool down!|I can't wait for us to get out of here!
speak;Ephraim;I have to agree with you.|The faster we get out of here, the better.
speak;Tana;As quick as possible!|I hope we can take a bath soon to get all this sweat off!
speak;Ephraim;A bath does sound really good at this point.
speak;Ephraim;You look like your about to pass out, Tana.
speak;Tana;...I'm so sleepy...|Can't last much longer...|So sleepy...
speak;Ephraim;She is out like a light...
speak;Ephraim;Tana.|Thank you so much for fighting with us for so long.|I will be sure to thank King Hayden when we get back.|We couldn't have gotten this far without you and Frelia's help.
speak;Tana;Of course!|I care about you, and Frelia will always help allies!|Hopefully we can finish this war and go back home.|I miss being back at home.
speak;Ephraim;Me too.|Once we are home, we will need to celebrate.|It's been too long since we could enjoy our time at home.
speak;Tana;Far too long!|I can't wait for you to come back to Frelia with me!

name: Talk_Amelia
_source: speak;Eirika;I know this may be hard for you, but I hope you will be happy with us.
speak;Amelia;Thank you...|It is quite a shock when I think about it...|But, I hope I can do my best to help...|Even though I am from Grado...
speak;Eirika;It's ok, Renais and Grado have been friends for years before all of this.|I still think highly of a lot of people from Grado.|I promise that no one will harm you here.
speak;Eirika;How are you holding up Amelia?|This was your first battle with us.
speak;Amelia;I'm still nervous...|Things happen so fast...|My hands are shaking...
speak;Eirika;I know how you feel...|It was scary for me the first few times too...|We've got to stay strong though...|We'll get through this together.
speak;Amelia;Thank you Princess...|I'm glad you are so much more kind than I heard...
speak;Amelia;...I'm ok...|I just...|Tripped in my dream...
speak;Eirika;Thank you for helping picking up the bones, Amelia.|I'm sure the villagers appreciate it.
speak;Amelia;Glad to be of help!|It's good training for me too!
speak;Eirika;You're getting stronger each day Amelia!|I can tell!
speak;Amelia;Really?!|Yay!|That makes me happy to hear that!
speak;Eirika;Do you like the sand, Amelia?
speak;Amelia;Yeah!|I've never seen so much sand before!|It feels so nice on my feet!
speak;Eirika;He he!|You make the desert look so much fun!
speak;Amelia;He he!|Is that so?|Well, maybe that means you should try it soon!
speak;Eirika;Are you holding up ok, Amelia?
speak;Amelia;I'm ok...|I took a look in the desert a little bit, but got too hot and came back in...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Take a break Amelia.|I don't want you too exhausted.
speak;Eirika;Are you ok, Amelia?|Why don't you take a break in the shade?
speak;Amelia;Oh, Princess!|I promised I would help this vendor here with repairs!|She said she would give me some juice if I helped!
speak;Amelia;Yeah!|They say Jehanna has some of the best Juna juice in all of Magvel!
speak;Eirika;Oh, I think I've heard of Juna juice before.|They say it helps make one stronger.
speak;Amelia;Exactly!|I think it would help me become stronger!
speak;Eirika;I see.|Well, let me know if you have any!|I think I would like to try some as well.
speak;Eirika;Why are you in this corner, Amelia?
speak;Amelia;These poor soldiers...|I can tell...|They didn't want to fight...|They didn't have their Grado insignia on...
speak;Amelia;A proud Grado soldier will wear their insignia to show their dedication.|I didn't see a single troop in this battle wear one...
speak;Eirika;I see...|What in the world was going on here?...
speak;Amelia;I don't know, but it must have been terrible...
speak;Eirika;Do you have any info on Lyon, Amelia?
speak;Amelia;Not really, no...|I'm sorry...|I've only ever seen paintings of Prince Lyon...|But he looked a little different from his paintings.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Lyon is such a kind soul...|He is my friend...|There must be a way to help him...
speak;Amelia;Princess...|If there is anything I can do to help, please let me know!

name: Talk_Innes
_source: speak;Eirika;Prince Innes...|I'm so glad to see you alive...
speak;Innes;Likewise.|I can talk with you for a moment, though Tana's patience runs thin.
speak;Eirika;I can't believe she is gone either...|'Sob'...
speak;Innes;If only I was stronger...|You could've left it all to me...
speak;Eirika;He he, Innes looks cute while he is sleeping.
speak;Innes;...Ephraim...|I can't lose to you...|Ha ha...|I win...|That's right Ephraim...|Grovel like a dog...|Eirika will be impressed now...
speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help Innes.|You have been working hard lately.
speak;Innes;This is nothing.|If I'm going to be king, I need to be able to do much more.
speak;Eirika;That's very honorable Innes.|Just don't push yourself too hard.|I remember how much Father would push himself too hard sometimes...
speak;Innes;...My father does that too sometimes...|...Don't worry Eirika.|I will not falter.
speak;Eirika;Why do you look so serious, Innes?
speak;Innes;I'm looking over the battlefield and planning out our next move.
speak;Eirika;I see.|Thank you Innes.|I'll leave that to you then.|I'll work with the troops on the field.
speak;Innes;Wait, Eirika.|Can you do something for me?
speak;Innes;I need you to write a list of supplies we will need for the next few days.|I trust you know more of what our troops need.
speak;Eirika;Yes, I can do that.|I'll be back with that in a moment.|I'll get you some rations too.|I can tell you have been sweating...
speak;Innes;...This is nothing...|Ephraim would say the same thing...
speak;Innes;Sorry, Eirika...|I'm just frustrated that I haven't found her yet...
speak;Innes;Yes Eirika...|I don't like what's going on...|I've got a bad feeling about this...
speak;Innes;Those cowards.|Trying to trap us in a fire like that.|Can't fight us with any honor.
speak;Eirika;Valter and Caellach really used some vile tactics, didn't they?...
speak;Innes;Those monsters are the lowest of scum.|I'm glad they were no match to my tactics and power.|I would rather die a thousand times, than lose to them.
speak;Innes;We did it Eirika, we have reclaimed back Renais.|You're finally home.
speak;Eirika;Yes, Innes...|I almost don't believe it...|To think being home would be this difficult...
speak;Innes;It must be difficult, but you are not alone.|Frelia will help Renais rebuild.|Renais will rise again.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Innes...|Frelia has proven to be our greatest ally...
speak;Innes;And I intend to keep it that way.
speak;Innes;So that was Lyon, huh?|It sure doesn't sound like he will listen to diplomacy at this point.
speak;Eirika;Innes...|The Lyon I know wouldn't have started this war.|It must be some sort of trick or something...
speak;Innes;Maybe.|Whoever it is, I'll be sure to shoot him down with my arrow.
speak;Innes;...I hope it doesn't come to that then...
speak;Innes;Are you holding up ok, Eirika?
speak;Eirika;I'm holding up just fine.|Thank you for checking on me.|Are you doing ok, Innes?
speak;Innes;I'm always in top shape.|Fortunately, we are wearing light attire.|We are not melting like those troops in metal armor.
speak;Eirika;Ephraim used to make fun of my outfit.|I bet he isn't laughing now!|He he!
speak;Innes;I bet he didn't think of a situatuion like this.|I thought two steps ahead of him on this one!
speak;Eirika;Innes, did you just finish up checking up on this area?
speak;Innes;Yes.|I have secured this area.|I'm about to set a meeting with some Rausten officials.
speak;Eirika;At this hour?|Don't you need to rest?
speak;Innes;I'm using this opportunity to improve Frelia and Rausten relations.|Father will be happy if I could do that in his stead.
speak;Eirika;I'm impressed, Innes.|You sound like a king already.
speak;Innes;Naturally.|Since I am the future king of Frelia.
speak;Innes;Eirika, I have to say.|You're amazing.
speak;Eirika;Oh, Innes!|What makes you say that all of a sudden?!

speak;Innes;You have managed to bring all of Magvel together.|People from Renais, Frelia, Jehanna, Carcino, Rausten, and even Grado.|To bring down this threat, all of Magvel stands behind you.|That is commendable.
speak;Eirika;I suppose it does sound grand when you put it that way.
speak;Innes;It is.|Now, let me prove the might of Frelia for all of Magvel to see!
speak;Ephraim;Innes, you're alive.|I see you were traveling with Eirika.
speak;Innes;Eirika came to my aid, so it's natural I help her.|I see that you kept Tana safe.|I suppose I must thank you for that.|Though don't get too comfortable with her.
speak;Innes;I'm keeping my eyes on you, Ephraim.
speak;Innes;Silence.|I already know.|Tana died under your watch.
speak;Ephraim;It is my fault.|I should have been more careful...
speak;Innes;You should have.|She trusted you...|Frelia will mourn for her.|I will mourn for her...
speak;Innes;We took back Renais.|It's yours again.
speak;Ephraim;Yes, Innes...|I almost don't believe it...|To think being home would be this difficult...
speak;Innes;It must be difficult, but you're the victor.|Now, fix your country.
speak;Ephraim;I intend to do so, Innes.|We will rebuild, stronger than ever.
speak;Innes;And Frelia will respond in tandem.|We won't lose to you in strength.
speak;Innes;So that was Lyon, huh?|It sure doesn't sound like he will listen to diplomacy at this point.
speak;Ephraim;Innes...|The Lyon I know wouldn't have started this war.|It must be some sort of trick or something.
speak;Innes;Maybe.|Whoever it is, I'll be sure to shoot him down with my arrow.
speak;Innes;...It better not come to that then...
speak;Innes;You must be melting in that armor, Ephraim.
speak;Ephraim;I'm holding up just fine, Innes.|A little heat isn't going to kill me.|You must not be doing well with all that sweat on you, though.
speak;Innes;Ha!|I'm always in top shape, Ephraim.|Fortunately, I am wearing light attire.|I'm keeping a lot more cool than you are.
speak;Ephraim;We'll we will see who lasts the longest, won't we?
speak;Innes;I thought two steps ahead of him on this one!|Don't think for a moment that I will lose!
speak;Ephraim;Innes, did you just finish up checking up on this area?
speak;Innes;Yes.|I have secured this area.|I'm about to set a meeting with some Rausten officials.
speak;Ephraim;At this hour?|Don't you need to rest?
speak;Innes;I'm using this opportunity to improve Frelia and Rausten relations.|Father will be happy if I could do that in his stead.
speak;Ephraim;Always the diligent one, aren't you?
speak;Innes;Naturally.|Since I am the future king of Frelia.
speak;Ephraim;This could be our last battle, Innes.
speak;Innes;Indeed.|This could be my last chance to show you up.|I'm going to put you in your place once and for all.|Show who is the superior prince.
speak;Ephraim;Even at a time like this you want to compete?|Alright, I'll take your challange.|Let's end this Innes.

name: Talk_Gerik
_source: speak;Eirika;Hello, you were part of Innes' party, right?
speak;Gerik;That's right, the name is Gerik.|Nice to meet ya!
speak;Eirika;Likewise!|You look like a strong, dependable man.|No wonder Innes hired you.
speak;Gerik;You would be correct.|I do my best to be worth the money people spend on me.
speak;Eirika;Well, thank you for your services!
speak;Gerik;Nah, I'm used to not getting much sleep.|The life of a mercenary does that to you.
speak;Eirika;I see...|It must have been hard on you...
speak;Gerik;What doesn't kill you makes you stronger.|Just call on me if you need anything.
speak;Eirika;That's a big log you're carrying, Gerik!
speak;Gerik;This?|This is nothing!|I've got a bigger one I've got to bring down later!|This should help the fire last longer.
speak;Gerik;Ha ha!|Maybe someday you can be as strong as me!
speak;Eirika;I think that's something Ephraim wants more than me...
speak;Gerik;I know this isn't your first fight, Princess.|But this is your first of this scale, right?
speak;Eirika;You are correct...|It was a very tough battle...|Have you been in fights this big before?
speak;Gerik;A couple of times.|You get used to it as a mercenary.|Just got to shrug it off and move on.|Gotta focus on tomorrow.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Gerik...|That is good advice...|Just got to focus on tomorrow...
speak;Gerik;Nah, the desert is my natural enviroment.|They don't call me the "Desert Tiger" for nothing.
speak;Eirika;Oh, I didn't know you were called that...
speak;Gerik;Ha ha!|You didn't?|Well, I'm actually happy to hear that.
speak;Eirika;Why are you happy to hear that?
speak;Gerik;That you've been working with me as "Gerik" this whole time.|And not as "The Desert Tiger".|Just feels a lot more friendly.|If that makes sense.
speak;Eirika;I think it does.|Well, I'm happy to work with you Gerik.|"Desert Tiger" or not.
speak;Gerik;Yes...|I was thinking about Caellach...|He was a pretty famous mercenary in the guild...|I heard he was going places, but I didn't suspect this...
speak;Eirika;I see...|He seemed driven by power...
speak;Gerik;Yeah...|Though, it makes me think...|I could've been like that...|Striving for more...|More and more...|Crushing those below me...
speak;Eirika;Gerik...|I don't think you would become that.|The Gerik I know is strong and heroic.|He doesn't use his power to crush the weak.
speak;Gerik;Ha ha ha!|Is that so?|Glad to hear!|Well, I've been thinking of what ifs for too long!|Gotta focus on the present!
speak;Eirika;Are you sure you don't want to rest in the castle, Gerik?
speak;Gerik;Thank you, but castles are a little to stuffy for me.|I prefer being outdoors.
speak;Eirika;All right, I'll respect your wishes.|Please let me know if you have any requests.|It's the least I can do for all of your help.
speak;Gerik;Well...|I guess there is one thing...
speak;Gerik;I may not like castles, but I do like a nice bath.|Think I'll be able to take one tonight?
speak;Eirika;He he!|Of course!|I'll make sure a bath is drawn for you!
speak;Eirika;Gerik, do you think anyone in your guild could track down Lyon?
speak;Gerik;Hmmmm...|That's a tough one, Princess...|Possibly, but it won't be cheap...
speak;Eirika;How much?|I could go back to Renais and sell some items from the castle.
speak;Gerik;Woah, hold your horses, Princess.|This is a big maybe.|I can't guarantee they can do anything.|Let me check first before you do anything rash.
speak;Eirika;...You're right, Gerik...|I just want to find Lyon soon and get to the bottom of this...
speak;Gerik;I understand, but you've got an army to lead.|Their needs come first.
speak;Eirika;...You're right again, Gerik.|My apologies, my mind is all over the place...
speak;Gerik;It's ok, just keep your wits about you.
speak;Eirika;Do you need any water, Gerik?
speak;Gerik;Nah, I had some earlier.|I should be good for a couple more miles.
speak;Eirika;I guess this place isn't too hot for you?
speak;Gerik;It's a little warmer than the desert.|But not enought to get me down.|Nowthen, if you notice anyone falter, let me know and I'll carry them!
speak;Eirika;Gerik, I wanted to ask you something.
speak;Eirika;With your mercenary work, have you done any night ambushes similar like tonight?
speak;Gerik;Only once.|It was a terrible job to take.

speak;Gerik;I took a job from an unknown contractor.|Already should have seen the bad signs there.|I needed the money though and the job paid a lot.|The job was to track down a wagon and report what was being transferred.|Attack and kill the travelers if they retaliate.|It was suspected of carrying children slaves to be sold off.|My friend and I went, but the job was a lie...|The wagon was a convoy bringing in supplies to Caer Peyln.|It was night and my friend saw the shadow a child resting in the wagon by a campfire.|He must have thought the child was a prisoner and went to save him.....
speak;Gerik;I tried to stop him, but I was too late...|A mage killed him with a fire spell, trying to protect the child.|That mage was Saleh...
speak;Gerik;I know he did it to protect the child...|It still hurts to lose your friend.|I was powerless to stop him...|I learned a terrible lesson that night...
speak;Eirika;Gerik...|It wasn't your fault...|It sounds like it was some sort of set up.
speak;Gerik;I was able to track down the contractor of that job.|So no more loose ends.|But, that's a part of being a mercenary.|The honorable and the dark side of mercenary work.
speak;Eirika;Gerik, this could be our last battle in there.|Do you think you can join us for one more battle?
speak;Gerik;I've come this far.|I think I've got one more fight in me.|Plus the guild will be proud to have heroes that ended the war!
speak;Eirika;Heroes, huh?|I guess that would give you some sway in the guild.
speak;Gerik;That would be an understatement.|Jobs will come flowing in!|The Gerik mercenaries will become legends!
speak;Eirika;He he!|Well, I'm glad to have worked with the Gerik mercenaries!
speak;Ephraim;Gerik, was it?|I heard you will be joining us.|I want to extend a thanks to you for that.|I can tell your a man with a lot of battle experience.
speak;Gerik;You're welcome there, Prince.|The Gerik mercenaries are happy to be of service!|Though, I will say, it will be my first time servin Renais royalty.
speak;Ephraim;The Gerik mercenaries, huh?|Well, you've got a lot of work ahead of you.
speak;Gerik;I suppose we've got to earn our pay, don't we?
speak;Gerik;Our second battle together and it's sieging the heart of Grado castle?|I didn't think our work was gonna be so big from the get-go.
speak;Ephraim;I know it was a tall order, but your help was valueable.|I think your strength made a difference.
speak;Gerik;Well, glad to make our customer happy.|Don't want to get a bad reputation.
speak;Ephraim;I'd imagine a bad reputation would make your life harder.
speak;Gerik;Yes...|I was thinking about Caellach...|He was pretty famous mercenary in the guild...|I heard he was going places, but I didn't suspect this...
speak;Ephraim;I see...|He seemed driven by power.
speak;Gerik;Yeah...|Though, it makes me think...|I could've been like that...|Striving for more...|More and more...|Crushing those below me...
speak;Ephraim;Gerik.|I don't think you would become that.|I know you're not the kind of warrior to do that.|You're better than that.
speak;Gerik;Ha ha ha!|Is that so?|Glad to hear!|Well, been thinking of what ifs too long!|Gotta focus on the present!
speak;Ephraim;Are you sure you don't want to rest in the castle, Gerik?
speak;Gerik;Thank you, but castles are a little to stuffy for me.|I prefer being outdoors.
speak;Ephraim;Alright, I'll respect your wishes.|Let me know if there is any request.|It's the least I can do for all of your help.
speak;Gerik;Well...|I guess there is one thing...
speak;Gerik;I may not like castles, but I do like a nice bath.|Think I'll be able to take one tonight?
speak;Ephraim;I see.|That does sound nice.|I'll make sure a bath is drawn for you.
speak;Ephraim;Gerik, do you think anyone in your guild could track down Lyon?
speak;Gerik;Hmmmm...|That's a tough one, Prince...|Possibly, but it won't come cheap...
speak;Ephraim;How much?|I could go back to Renais and sell some items from the castle.
speak;Gerik;Woah, hold your horses, Prince.|This is a big maybe.|I can't guarantee they can do anything.|Let me check first before you do anything rash.
speak;Ephraim;...You're right, Gerik.|I just want to find Lyon soon and get to the bottom of this...
speak;Gerik;I understand, but you've got an army to lead.|Their needs come first.
speak;Ephraim;...You're right again, Gerik.|My apologies, my mind is all over the place.
speak;Gerik;It's ok, just keep your wits about you.
speak;Ephraim;Do you need any water, Gerik?
speak;Gerik;Nah, I had some earlier.|I should be good for a couple more miles.
speak;Ephraim;I guess this place isn't too hot for you?
speak;Gerik;It's a little warmer than the desert.|But not enought to get me down.|Nowthen, if you notice anyone falter, let me know and I'll carry them!
speak;Ephraim;Gerik, I wanted to ask you something.
speak;Ephraim;With your mercenary work, have you done any night ambushes similar like tonight?
speak;Gerik;Only once.|It was a terrible job to take.

speak;Gerik;I took a job from an unknown contractor.|Already should have seen the bad signs there.|I needed the money though and the job paid a lot.|The job was to track down a wagon and report what was being transferred.|Attack and kill the travelers if they retaliate.|It was suspected of carrying children slaves to be sold off.|My friend and I went, but the job was a lie...|The wagon was a convoy bringing in supplies to Caer Peyln.|It was night and my friend saw the shadow a child resting in the wagon by a campfire.|He must have thought the child was a prisoner and went to save him.....
speak;Gerik;I tried to stop him, but I was too late...|A mage killed him with a fire spell, trying to protect the child.|That mage was Saleh...
speak;Gerik;I know he did it to protect the child...|It still hurts to lose your friend.|I was powerless to stop him...|I learned a terrible lesson that night...
speak;Ephraim;Gerik.|It wasn't your fault.|It sounds like it was some sort of set up.
speak;Gerik;I was able to track down the contractor of that job.|So no more loose ends.|But, that's a part of being a mercenary.|The honorable and the dark side of mercenary work.
speak;Ephraim;Gerik, this could be our last battle in there.|Do you think you can join us for one more battle?
speak;Gerik;I've come this far.|I think I've got one more fight in me.|Plus the guild will be proud to have heroes that ended the war!
speak;Ephraim;Heroes, huh?|I guess that would give you some sway in the guild.
speak;Gerik;That would be an understatement.|Jobs will come flowing in!|The Gerik mercenaries will become legends!
speak;Ephraim;Legends, huh?|Well, I'm glad to have worked with the Gerik mercenaries.

name: Talk_Marisa
_source: speak;Eirika;I don't remember seeing you earlier.|Are you part of Innes' party?
speak;Eirika;I see...|I'll keep that in mind then...
speak;Eirika;How can she sleep with a sword next to her?
speak;Marisa;...Gerik...|He is riding a spider...|So cute...
speak;Eirika;Marisa!|Are you ok?!|There's a baby bael right there!
speak;Marisa;I'm ok...|This young one is not dangerous...
speak;Eirika;Are...you sure?|We just fought so many baels...
speak;Marisa;I'm sure...|This one is so cute...
speak;Marisa;Can I have some rations?|I'm hungry...
speak;Eirika;Oh...|Yes, I'll get you some Marisa.|One moment.
speak;Marisa;Thank you...|The battle made me so hungry.....
speak;Marisa;I can sense some bloodlust...|But not sure where yet...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Please let me know if you tracked it down.
speak;Eirika;I'm a little hot...|I probably should find some shade soon.
speak;Marisa;...There is some good shade over there...
speak;Eirika;Oh, that does look nicer in that shade over there.|Thank you Marisa.
speak;Eirika;So...Marisa...|Do you want to go into the castle?
speak;Eirika;Would you like some water, Marisa?
speak;Eirika;That's good then.|Let me know if you need more.
speak;Eirika;It's your turn for guard duty, Marisa.|Here is your torch.
speak;Marisa;Yep.|I'm trained to fight at night.|Plus, a torch messes up my swordstyle.
speak;Eirika;I see...|I'll give this torch to someone else then.
speak;Eirika;Marisa, I know we don't talk much, but I wanted to say thank you.|You have been a great fighter in our army.
speak;Marisa;You're welcome.|It has been an honor fighting with you.
speak;Ephraim;Excuse me, are you the recruit Ewan was telling me about?
speak;Ephraim;That was an interesting swordstyle I saw you using.|Who taught you?
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Was it a common style where you are from?
speak;Ephraim;Marisa...|Well, I have big expectations of you.|I'll try to meed yours as well.
speak;Ephraim;Ah, I believe that is the mercenary that joined us this battle.|He is your commander?
speak;Ephraim;I see.|I'll keep that in mind.
speak;Ephraim;It looks like she is mourning...|I think I'll leave her be.
speak;Ephraim;Marisa, have you seen any signs of King Vigarde?
speak;Marisa;.....No.|Want me to hunt him down?
speak;Ephraim;No, if you find him, let me know.
speak;Ephraim;I'm a little hot.|I probably should find some shade soon.
speak;Marisa;...There is some good shade over there...
speak;Ephraim;Oh, that does look nicer in that shade over there.|Thanks for the heads up, Marisa.
speak;Ephraim;So...Marisa...|Do you want to go into the castle?
speak;Ephraim;Would you like some water, Marisa?
speak;Ephraim;That's good then.|Let me know if you need more.
speak;Ephraim;It's your turn for guard duty, Marisa.|Here is your torch.
speak;Marisa;Yep.|I'm trained to fight at night.|Plus, a torch messes up my swordstyle.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|I'll give this torch to someone else then.
speak;Ephraim;Marisa, I know we don't talk much, but I wanted to say thank you.|You have been a great fighter in our army.
speak;Marisa;You're welcome.|It has been an honor fighting with you.

name: Talk_Larachel
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you again for your help!
speak;Larachel;You're welcome!|Though I've got some evil bones to extinguish, so I can only talk for a moment!
speak;Larachel;Of course I am!|I have no idea what any of these herbs are!|What in heaven's name is Baelwort?!|These people are crazy!
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well, I better not get in your way then...
speak;Larachel;Who names an herb Deathgoyle's Delight?!
speak;Eirika;Were you talking to one of those Rausten knights earlier, L'Arachel?
speak;Larachel;O-Oh, yes!|One of them had a question for me!
speak;Larachel;Y-yes!|He was asking me for directions!
speak;Eirika;Why was he asking you for directions?|They don't look like they are going anywhere anytime soon.
speak;Larachel;Ha ha!|W-Why indeed?|Maybe he just wanted to talk to a beautiful woman such as me?|Anyway, let me know if there is anything else you want, ok?
speak;Eirika;What are you doing over here L'Arachel?
speak;Larachel;I'm trying to make sure Rennac doesn't escape again!|This rascal can't be let out of my sight!|So I'm letting him stay in the treasure room here where I can keep an eye on him!
speak;Eirika;I see...|Good luck with that...|Oh Rennac...
speak;Larachel;I finally found that idiot Rennac...|But...|It's too late for me to heal him... "sob"
speak;Larachel;Why didn't he just stay with me?...|That idiot...
speak;Larachel;Yes, I'm arranging things for the upcoming meeting.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Eirika;Nothing right now, just let me know when everyone is ready.
speak;Larachel;Just leave it to me!|Now if we could just do something about this heat!|It's not very much to my liking...
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel, I can't thank you enough for your help.|Taking back Renais means a lot to me.
speak;Larachel;Of course, Eirika!|What a beautiful story it will be!|A Princess finally being reunited with her home country!|This will be recorded for centuries!
speak;Eirika;If it was only as grand as you make it out to be...
speak;Eirika;There's no way that was the real Lyon...|The real Lyon isn't like that...
speak;Larachel;I'm sorry Eirika, I'm a little busy right now.|Please make it quick so I can go back to my duties...
speak;Larachel;Oh Eirika!|I am such a genius!
speak;Larachel;I found a way I can protect us from all this poisonious vapors in one cast!
speak;Eirika;Oh wow, that does sound amazing!
speak;Larachel;Of course!|I just casted a massive barrier around the whole area!
speak;Eirika;I see.|That seems pretty simple.|Though I suppose the most simple solution is sometimes the best.
speak;Larachel;Indeed!|I thought casing this big barrier would exhaust my strength, but I feel fine!|I must be stronger than I thought!
speak;Eirika;The exhaustion must have hit...|And hit hard...
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel, how does it feel to be back home?
speak;Larachel;Oh great!|Rausten is just so heavenly!|I am so glad you could be here to experience it yourself!|Though I wish less night ambushes...
speak;Eirika;I understand, that ambush wasn't your fault.|So let's forget the bad and enjoy the time we have together!
speak;Eirika;L'Arachel, this is it.|Do you think Rausten's stone alone will be enough?
speak;Larachel;It has to be.|The fate of all Magvel depends on us.|It will be our duty to eradicate this evil!
speak;Eirika;Yes, it all depends on us now.|Our final hope.
speak;Larachel;As long as we have hope, we will win!
speak;Larachel;Ah!Sorry, I must gather myself for a moment.|If it's important, make it quick and I'll get back to you later.
speak;Larachel;Finally!|I can finally enjoy being back on land!|Having to fight right as we land is unbelievable!
speak;Ephraim;Fortunatley, we can now gather ourselves and rest.
speak;Larachel;Get some rest, indeed!|I think I deserve a nice bath!|With all the best soaps!
speak;Ephraim;Nice soaps?|That's the luxury of a princess for you.
speak;Larachel;I am the beautiful princess of Rausten!|I have to make sure I am always presentable!|Plus the soaps smell really good!
speak;Larachel;What a tragedy that has happened today...|She seemed honorable for a Grado general
speak;Ephraim;Indeed.|If only things didn't come to this.
speak;Larachel;It would've been nice to have avoided a fight.|I think I would've enjoyed having tea with her.
speak;Ephraim;Tea?....|Maybe she would've liked that too...
speak;Ephraim;How much useable medical supplies does Grado have?|It would be good to start treatment on the servents.
speak;Larachel;It doesn't look good, Ephraim...|There is hardly anything here...
speak;Ephraim;That's terrible...|Were things really getting that desperate over here?
speak;Larachel;I don't know.|It could have gone to all of the deployed troops.|Or is it just neglect?
speak;Ephraim;Maybe?...|I remembered King Vigarde being more prepared than this though.
speak;Larachel;Yes, I'm arranging things for the upcoming meeting.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Ephraim;Nothing right now, just let me know when everyone is ready.
speak;Larachel;Just leave it to me!|Now if we could just do something about this heat!|It's not very much to my liking...
speak;Ephraim;L'Arachel, I want to extend my thanks to you.|Taking back Renais means a lot to me.
speak;Larachel;Of course, Ephraim!|What a beautiful story it will be!|A Prince finally being reunited with his home country!|This will be recorded for centuries!
speak;Ephraim;If it was only as grand as you make it out to be...
speak;Ephraim;I have hard time believing that is Lyon, but...
speak;Larachel;I'm sorry Ephraim, I'm a little busy right now.|Please make it quick so I can go back to my duties...
speak;Ephraim;My apologies, L'Arachel...|If you will excuse me.
speak;Larachel;Oh Eirika!|I am such a genius!
speak;Larachel;I found a way I can protect us from all this poisonious vapors in one cast!
speak;Ephraim;Oh wow, that does sound amazing!
speak;Larachel;Of course!|I just casted a massive barrier around the whole area!
speak;Ephraim;I see.|That seems pretty simple.|Though I suppose the most simple solution is sometimes the best.
speak;Larachel;Indeed!|I thought casing this big barrier would exhaust my strength, but I feel fine!|I must be stronger than I thought!
speak;Ephraim;The exhaustion must have hit...|And hit hard...

name: Talk_Dozla
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help.|May I ask for your name?
speak;Dozla;I am Dozla!|I am a mighty warrior!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Eirika;You do look very strong!|Your strength was a major help in this battle.
speak;Dozla;Ha ha ha!|Of course!|Crushing a couple of bones is my specialty!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Eirika;Glad to see you're in high spirits!
speak;Eirika;Are you carrying a whole tree Dozla?!
speak;Dozla;Ha ha ha!|Indeed I am Princess!|Not my first time!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Eirika;Will you be ok by yourself?
speak;Dozla;Just leave it to me!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Dozla;Now that was a battle!|Ha ha ha!|Of course those knuckleheads had to end the battle so early!
speak;Dozla;The Rausten knights!|They always get in the way of my fights!
speak;Dozla;Oh!|I mean...|Ugh...|Knights LIKE them always get in the way of my fights!
speak;Eirika;I see...|So knights interrupt your fights?
speak;Dozla;Y-Yes!|Ha ha!|Knights are always getting in my way!|A-anyway, let's talk about something else!
speak;Eirika;Are you knocking down walls Dozla?
speak;Dozla;Indeed I am!|I want to see if I can find the Queen faster!
speak;Eirika;Please stop Dozla...|I don't want the palace to get anymore damaged than it is...
speak;Dozla;Understood Princess!|I'll run around the palace then!|Ha ha ha!
speak;Eirika;You look very comfortable lounging around there Dozla.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Indeed I am!|It was such a fine battle, I though I deserved a nice swim!|Now I am just drying off!|Gwa ha ha!
speak;Eirika;That does sound nice.|Maybe I'll take a swim later too!
speak;Eirika;Dozla, thank you so much for your help in retaking Renais.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|My pleasure, Princess!|Another battle taking back a kingdom underneath my belt!|Gwa ha ha!
speak;Eirika;Another interesting story you can tell, right Dozla?
speak;Dozla;Right you are!|My tavern buddies are gonna roar when they hear this one!
speak;Eirika;Dozla, do you think Lyon could've escaped by water?
speak;Dozla;No, the water is too slow to make a useful escape.|If he did, we would've found him by now.
speak;Eirika;I see...|You're right, that kind of escape wouldn't work...
speak;Dozla;Cheer up lass!|We will find him one way or another!|Just be patient!
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|That's more like it!

name: Talk_Myrrh
_source: speak;Eirika;Are you all right, Myrrh?|You're not injured or anything?
speak;Myrrh;I'm....fine...|As long as I have my Dragonstone, I'll be ok...
speak;Eirika;It will take some time getting used to fighting with you, but I'm glad you are with us, Myrrh.
speak;Eirika;Myrrh, how are you holding up?
speak;Myrrh;...I'm doing better now...|That man had a very dark aura...|It was suffocating...|The area feels a lot more clear now...
speak;Eirika;Is it true then?...|What Lyon was saying?
speak;Myrrh;...I'm not certain...|But, that man was overflowing with dark power...|Similar to what I have been sensing...
speak;Eirika;Lyon...|Please don't let it be true...

name: Talk_Syrene
_source: speak;Syrene;Oh, you know of my sister?|I am Syrene, Vanessa's older sister.

speak;Eirika;Oh!|My apologies, you look so similar that I mistook you for your sister.|But, I am very happy to meet you!|I am Princess Eirika of Renais.|We appreciate having Vanessa with us.|She is a mighty and beautiful warrior.|I imagine you are the same!
speak;Syrene;Oh!|The Princess of Renais!|It's an honor to meet you!|I'm happy to hear that about my sister!|I hope to catch up with her and her journey.
speak;Eirika;I'm glad you two are finally reunited.|Please, go ahead and spend some time with her!|You both deserve it.
speak;Syrene;Thank you Princess!|I'm happy to work with you from now on!
speak;Syrene;Oh, you know of my sister?|I am Syrene, Vanessa's older sister.
speak;Eirika;I see...|I don't know how to tell you this...
speak;Syrene;It's ok, I can tell from your eyes...|We are in war...|I've prepared myself if this were to happen...
speak;Eirika;I see...|She was a fantastic warrior...|She died with honor...
speak;Syrene;Vanessa...|Thank you...|I can at least be in peace knowing she died in honor...
speak;Syrene;May you rest in peace, Vanessa...

name: No_More_Talk
_source: speak;Eirika;I have nothing else to say.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Ephraim;I have nothing else to say.;;;thought_bubble

name: Talk_Innes_Eirika
_source: speak;Eirika;We've come to aid you.|You must be exhausted.|Please fall back and rest.|We'll take care of these dogs
speak;Innes;I cannot allow that.|I will not run and hide while a woman protects me...|We will continue the fight.|You can join us.
speak;Eirika;If that's how you want it.|Let's go then.
speak;Innes;I would give you my thanks.|You, the princess of Renais, came to my aid...|...I am in your debt.

name: Ambush
_source: speak;Eirika;Huh?|Looks like someone a bag of something.|It looks like to be some gold...and a looking glass?
speak;Eirika;Oh no!|Looks like there are some reinforcements!

name: RoutAmbush
_source: if;game.current_mode.permadeath == False and game.get_unit('Ross').team == 'player' and game.get_unit('Garcia').team == 'player'

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Selena;Good job on clearing out those bandits Erina.|If I didn't have to leave right now, I would've made short work of them.
speak;Eirika;Thank you...|I don't want to see anymore innocent lives lost...
speak;Selena;I will take my leave now.|I hope I'm incorrect and I never see you again.
speak;Selena;Good job on clearing out those bandits.|Who are you?|You aren't from one of the neighboring towns, are you.|And your weapons give you away...|You're no peasant.
speak;Eirika;I am Er...|My name is Erina.{br}I'm a mercenary.
speak;Selena;A mercenary named Erina, is it?|There's more to you than that, I feel.|But don't worry--it's none of my business.|I haven't told you who I am yet, have I?
speak;Selena;I am Selena, a general in Grado's army.
speak;Selena;Well...|Again, good job.|The destruction would have been a lot worse without you.
speak;Eirika;Thank you...|I don't want to see anymore innocent lives lost...
speak;Selena;I will take my leave now.|I hope I'm incorrect and I never see you again.

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Woman2;Ohhh, if only I could see that one man again...
speak;Eirika;What did this man look like?
speak;Woman2;Oh he had the most beautiful red hair!|He has such a stylish hat!|Looked so rough, but so regal!
speak;Woman2;Oh, only if we had an arena here...|He said he was looking for one.|Said something about needing some money to pay off a debt.
speak;Woman2;Yeah, said the elixir he gave me was gonna pay it off.|But he told me to give to someone else in need instead.
speak;Woman2;Ohhhh, I want to see him again!|Please come back soon!

name: Talk_Civ3
_source: speak;Man3;Thank you again for saving us!|We are forever in your debt!
speak;Eirika;No need for thanks, it was the right thing to do.
speak;Man3;You bring hope to this old man...|We will remember this good deed.

name: ReinT5
_source: speak;Bazba;Alright, let's unleash the beasts on them boys!|Release them in the front entrance!

name: ReinT4Warning
_source: speak;Bazba;Hmmmm....|They are tougher than I thought.|I might need to unleash the beasts on them...|Better get them ready.

name: T1_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;Keep your eye out for villages!

speak;Anna;They will need to be visited in order to protect them from bandits!|They may even give you rewards like items, weapons, or maybe someone will join your cause!|Get there quickly because Bandits can destroy the villages.|You'll then lose any reward you could've gotten from them!;;;;6

speak;Anna;Here are some tips to help make the most out of the pair up mechanic!|For this example we have poor Ross and Garcia just out of reach by normal walking means.|Fortunately, we have Vanessa here!;;;;6

speak;Anna;If we pair up Eirika with Vanessa we can get across the mountains!|Then you can switch to Eirika with the <red>"Switch"</> command and talk with Ross and recruit him Turn 1!|Here is just one example of what pair up can do to get units to places they normally can't.|See what you can come up with!;;;;6

name: T2_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;Also keep your eyes out for <red>Armories or Vendors!</>

speak;Anna;They will have weapons or items available to buy for your army!|They will cost Gold to buy them, so choose carefully!|Each Armory or Vendor has different items for sale, so keep your eye out for a new one.|After you beat the chapter, you can always shop from any Armory and Vendor that was in the chapter from the world map.|So don't be afraid because you'll never lose access to any shops!;;;;6

name: T3_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;Ross is a special type of unit.|He is a <red>"Trainee"</> unit.

speak;Anna;They start off very weak, but have great potential!|They promote at level 11 and cannot get BEXP until they promote at that point.|Fortunately, they are quick to level up!|They have a lot of potential promotion paths, so try and see what is fun to you!;;;;6

name: Colm_Select_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;Colm has a special item in his inventory called a <red>Magic Key.</>|It allows him to open chests from afar!|It restores uses between chapters, so don't be afraid to use it!|Also, one thing to note is that <red>units will unpair from their partner if they are paired up when opening a chest.</>|So keep that in mind!;;;;6

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;OldMan1;...So our little Lute is finally leaving, huh?
speak;Eirika;Yes, she seems to want to go with Artur on our journey.|Her knowledge should hopefully be an asset to us.
speak;OldMan1;Of course she will be!|She is a genius after all!|She was raised in the village of the most magically gifted in all Magvel!
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well we look forward to her efforts...
speak;OldMan1;Good!|As the most gifted old man in this village, I can't recommend her enough!|She will save Magvel in her sleep!
speak;Eirika;...Ok?|Well, thank you and I will excuse myself now...
speak;OldMan1;Go Lute!|Show the world your knowledge!|You are the smartest!!!

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Man1;Were you able to knock down that snag?|I hope that tool was able to knock it down.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, though it is a little perplexing to try to knock down a snag with a warhammer...
speak;Man1;What do you mean?|Just give it a good whack and knock it clear down!
speak;Eirika;I suppose, but a warhammer is a litte bit too much for me right now...

speak;Man1;Hmmmm...|You might have a point there...|Well, give it to someone big then!|Ha ha ha!|I had a buddy who used to be a <red>Pirate</> that could use it well!|He also had a buddy who rode <red>dragons</> that could use it well too!
speak;Eirika;I will probably do that for now.|Maybe someday I can use it, but not right now.

name: Axe_Fairy
_source: speak;???;Oh beautiful maiden...|Thank you so much for clearing out those vile monsters...|They were corrupting this area I love so much.;top
speak;Eirika;Oh my!|Umm...You're welcome?|We are glad those monsters are gone too...

speak;???;In return for your brave deed, I wish to give you a blessing.|But there is one more test, to make sure you are truly worthy.|Please answer my question...|Which one of these axes is yours?|This gold axe, or this silver axe?...|I will return to you whichever axe is yours...;top
choice;Axe;Which axe did you drop?;Gold Axe,Silver Axe,I didn't drop either axe
speak;???;Oh.....|How disappointing...|I hoped you were truly worthy of this blessing...|One must not tell lies...|You will be punished for telling such a big lie...;top
speak;Eirika;Why did I lie?...|Ephraim would be so disappointed in me...
speak;???;Oh.....|How disappointing...|I hoped you were truly worthy of this blessing...|One must not tell lies...|You will be punished for telling a lie...;top
speak;Eirika;Why did I lie?...|Ephraim would be so disappointed in me...
speak;???;Oh!|You are as honest as you are beautiful!|This makes me so happy!|Let me reward you for your honesty!;top
speak;Eirika;Wow!|I feel so much stronger!|What a wonderful blessing I stumbled upon!

name: Sketchy
_source: speak;Colm;It's ok Princess!|I was nearby and was swindle back the gold!
speak;Eirika;Oh Colm!|Thank you so much!|We would have lost all our money if he got away!
speak;Colm;Ha ha ha!|That would've been bad!|Lucky for us I was nearby!
speak;Eirika;Yeah, it's our lucky day indeed!|He he!
alert;Eirika and Colm's LCK growths has increased by 15%!
speak;Eirika;All of our money is gone...

name: Drain
_source: speak;Narrator;{v:HorseyGirlName} points aggressively at a lever.;;;narration_top
speak;Narrator;{v:HorseyGirlName} aggressively motions to take cover.;;;narration_top
speak;{unit};Ok!|I found the lever!|Everyone take cover!
speak;Zonta;What in the world happened?!|Where did all that water come from?!|You!|Ephraim, you did this, didn't you?!
speak;Ephraim;Correct.|We got some great info and now we are here to take over this castle.
speak;Zonta;Grrrrr!...|Well, I'm still here!|You'll have to get through me first!

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Villager Boy 1;Glad to see the fog cleared up!|It sure makes it hard to get stuff done with it around!
speak;Eirika;Indeed.|Does it get foggy around here often?
speak;Villager Boy 1;Yeah, it has been happening more and more lately too.|I wonder if it has something to do with the increase in spiders around here?
speak;Eirika;There are even more spiders?|That can't be a good sign...
speak;Villager Boy 1;Yeah...|We've got to do something about them soon.|They are becoming quite a problem.

name: Talk_101
_source: speak;Villager Man;I'm saved...|I can't believe it...
speak;Eirika;How did you end up in this situation?|Did Grado kidnap you?
speak;Villager Man;Please...|Just leave me alone.|I just want you to go away...

name: Talk_102
_source: speak;Woman2;Please, just give me a minute...|I was so scared.

name: Talk_103
_source: speak;Eirika;It's ok little one, everything will be ok...

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Man1;Aw man...|I really wanted to catch that woman dancing before she left...|She was so beautiful...
speak;Man1;Of course!|She had such a beautiful dance!|I could watch for hours!|Oh....|I pray she comes back again soon...

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Man2;That's for getting rid of those Grado soldiers!|I'll feel a lot better walking around town, knowing they won't bother me!
speak;Eirika;It makes me sad that things have gotten this bad here...
speak;Man2;Hey young lass, cheer up!|We are free now!|Now if we could just get rid of Grado forever!|Ha ha ha!|Maybe someday!

name: Talk_Civ3
_source: speak;OldMan1;Ohhh...|Please make sure to read that old book...|My techniques must not be lost...
speak;Eirika;Oh dear...|I'll be sure to give it a read soon...
speak;OldMan1;Oh thank you young lass...|That soothes my worrysome heart to hear that...

name: Talk_Civ4
_source: speak;Woman1;Ugh...|That silly girl...|She left in a hurry again, didn't she?!
speak;Woman1;Yes, I am the owner of this house.|I have a tenant that I let stay, but she always leaves it in such a mess!|I can't stand it anymore!|She is such a klutz!
speak;Eirika;Huh...|I hope she will be ok then...

name: Natasha_Multi_Target_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;There are certain weapons that can target multiple enemies.|For example, Natasha's Frost Wand here can <red>select up to 2 enemies.</>|An item will tell you in the description if you can select multiple targets.|There are some weapons that let you <red>select the same target multiple times.</>|So keep an eye out.|Also, another thing to note is that <red>enemies cannot retaliate against multi-target attacks.</>|So make most of it!;;;;6

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Villager Man 7;Here's another thing I've heard about Tirado.|I've heard that he hates to lose.|He would be willing to do anything to make sure he wins.|You should probably stop him as soon as you can before he does anything bold.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Thank you for the information.

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Villager Old Woman 1;I'm so sorry I was asleep.|I wish I was there so I could give you more information...
speak;Villager Old Woman 1;If I hear anything else while you're around, I will let you know!

name: RecruitAmeliaEirika
_source: speak;Eirika;Are you from around here?|You should find someplace to hide.|These men are after me.|It's not safe.
speak;Amelia;I'm a Grado soldier.|I'm here to stop the princess of Renais...
speak;Amelia;And you're Princess Eirika?|But the commander said Eirika's a cruel and merciless fiend...
speak;Eirika;What?|No, I'm...|...I don't know what Grado's officers have been telling you, but...|Our two countries are at war, so I suppose they can say what they want.
speak;Amelia;...Mistress Eirika...|I, uh, I surrender.|I won't fight you.

speak;Amelia;I became a soldier because I admired General Duessel's sense of honor.|But the generals have been very opposed to this war from the beginning...|And now I see you, and you look so sad about all of this.|I don't know what's right anymore.|I'm just a soldier, but I want to decide for myself.|I want to understand the truth myself, to see it with my own eyes.
speak;Eirika;...I see.|So...does this mean you're coming with us?|I suppose I should ask your name then.

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Man1;Did that guy finally leave?|He gave me some money to hide in my house for a while.|I was afraid he was going to mess up my house.
speak;Man1;I agree, but he gave a lot of money...|He seemed really desperate to escape from someone.|There was a beautiful young lady yelling really loudly for some guy...|I wonder?...

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Villager Man;Are you guys finally done?
speak;Villager Man;Good!|Now get out of here!|Take your problems away from us normal folk!

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Man1;You might have saved Carcino for one more day, but I fear for our future...|Klimt isn't going to live for that much longer...|Are we just going to have another old, dying man lead us once he is dead?
speak;Man1;Well, we better get our stuff together or I fear we are not long for this world...

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Woman2;Thank you so much for getting rid of Pablo...|Lord Klimt has treated us way better than he ever would...
speak;Woman2;Indeed...|I'm glad we averted a great disaster...

name: Talk_Civ3
_source: speak;Villager Man;I hope you were able to save that Prince Innes.|He would be a valuable asset to your army.|Now get out of here!|I've got a lot of work to do!

name: Ch.10ABaseConvo1
_source: speak;Natasha;Yes, I am Natasha.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Amelia;Yes, my name is Amelia.|Princess Eirika informed me that you're from Grado too.
speak;Natasha;Oh!|You're from Grado too?!|Oh, how wonderful is it to have another woman from Grado here...
speak;Amelia;Yay!|Everyone here has been so kind so far, but it's nice to have someone from Grado!|What part of Grado are you from?
speak;Natasha;I'm from the monastery.|I'm a cleric from there.
speak;Amelia;I see!|No wonder you have such pretty robes!|I've been helped by a lot of clerics from there!
speak;Natasha;Oh thank you!|We worked so hard there to help the people...
speak;Amelia;We are so thankful for your service...
speak;Amelia;Oh!|I just had a wonderful idea!|Why don't I cook us up a Grado dinner!|A little taste of home!
speak;Natasha;Oh, that would be delightful!|I will help you cook as well!

name: Ch.10ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Colm;Ok, now that the Princess is here, we can settle this.
speak;Eirika;Why did you bring me here?|We've got to hurry you know?
speak;Joshua;This won't take long.|I just want to prove to him that I'm faster.
speak;Colm;No way!|I'm totally faster than you!|Right, Princess?
speak;Colm;Well, we will need to race then!|That's why you're here!|Joshua and I will race and we want you to be the judge!
speak;Joshua;Yeah, though we will know I will win.|You ready, Colm?
speak;Colm;I'm ready to beat you and prove I'm the fastest!
speak;Colm;I totally won that one, didn't I!
speak;Colm;Ha!|I told you I'm the fastest Joshua!
speak;Joshua;Bah, you just caught me at a bad day.|I'll show you that I'm the fastest another day!
speak;Colm;Ha ha!|I'll take on your challenge anytime!
alert;Colm's SPD growth has increased by 15!
speak;Joshua;I told you I was the fastest!
speak;Colm;Grrrr...|Just you wait Joshua!|I'll be faster than you soon!
speak;Joshua;Ha!|I'd like to see you try!
alert;Joshua's SPD growth has increased by 15!

name: Ch.10ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Gilliam;Good morning Kyle.|Here for guard duty?
speak;Kyle;Correct.|Looks like we are both on guard duty for this morning.
speak;Gilliam;Good to have you.|By the way, your armor looks extra shiny today.
speak;Kyle;Yeah, I had extra time to polish my armor this morning.|Your armor is looking pretty shiny yourself.
speak;Gilliam;Thank you.|I take pride in my armor.|I make sure it's good to go in any occasion.
