speak;Kyle;That's very admirable, Gilliam.|Say, what do you do to try to mitigate magical attacks?|I have a hard time dealing with those...|Even my armor doesn't do much against spells...
speak;Gilliam;I'll be honest Kyle...|I have a hard time against magical attacks too...
speak;Kyle;I see...|Maybe we can see if Lute can teach us anything?
speak;Gilliam;Hmm...|Yeah, she might be able to help.
speak;Kyle;Wait one minute.|I'll go get her.
speak;Lute;You two want to know how to resist magical attacks?
speak;Gilliam;Correct.|Anything that you can teach us will be very helpful.
speak;Lute;Hmmm...|I have been wanting to test a new method that may work for the two of you.|It involves getting shocked by Mogall tentacles multiple times.|Hold on, I'll go grab them...
speak;Kyle;I think this may have been a mistake...
alert;Gilliam and Kyle's RES growths have increased by 15!

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Woman1;Thank you for taking care of those monsters...|We are in your debt.
speak;Eirika;Oh, no need to thank me.|I am just happy everyone is ok.|I don't want to see anyone else hurt...
speak;Woman1;Oh, what a wonderful young woman you are.|Your kindness will never be forgotten...

name: Talk_Civ_1
_source: speak;Villager Old Woman 1;So, it's finally over...|What will become of Jehanna?...
speak;Eirika;The army of Renais will not let Jehanna collapse.|We will help with rebuilding.
speak;Villager Old Woman 1;Oh, praise the heavens...|We may not be doomed after all...|
speak;Eirika;It will be ok, Jehanna will be restored...

name: Talk_Civ_2
_source: speak;Man1;The fighting is finally over...|Tell me girl...|Did you find anything...|Interesting, in the sand?
speak;Man1;Yes!|If you find anything, let me know!|I'm looking for something rare...|Oh very rare indeed...|Oh, if I found it...|Oh....

name: Talk_Civ_3
_source: speak;Villager Man;So you beat the Tiger Eye, and the Moonstone...|That's pretty impressive...|You're pretty strong, huh?
speak;Eirika;I suppose...|Who are you though?|How do you know so much?
speak;Villager Man;I have my ways.|We of Jehanna have ways of getting information...|But that's a secret.
speak;Eirika;A secret?|I have a feeling I shouldn't ask more about it though...

name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;OldMan1;Thank you so much for saving me...|I thought I was done for...
speak;Eirika;You're welcome.|It was a close call.|If we came any later, we might not have been able to rescue you...
speak;OldMan1;Well, I'm glad you did...|So thanks again...

name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Woman2;Thank the heavens for your help!|My body couldn't stop trembling!
speak;Eirika;It's all ok now, you are safe.
speak;Woman2;I will remember this for the rest of my life!|My grandchildren will know of your valor!

name: Talk_Civ3
_source: speak;Villager Girl;Thank you for saving me, pretty lady!
speak;Villager Girl;I hope I can be as strong and beautiful as you are someday!

name: Talk_Civ4
_source: speak;Eirika;It's ok little one...|You are safe now...

name: DoggoJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;Hey...|It looks like there is someone injured there!
speak;Eirika;Are you ok?|Those wounds look terrible...
speak;Neimi;Oh dear!|Those wounds look terrible...|Princess, is this person still alive?
speak;Eirika;I'm not sure, let's get the treatment started.
speak;Neimi;It sounds like it's in pain...|I'll see if I can treat the poor dog...
speak;Eirika;Are you sure about that, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;I can, if you think it's ok, Princess?
speak;Neimi;Ok, that should be good for now...
speak;Neimi;My pleasure!|Say Princess...|Do you think we can keep this hound?
speak;Neimi;Yay!!!|Thank you!|I promise to be a good tamer!
speak;Neimi;I'm not sure...|They don't seem to transform back...|If I learn anything new, I'll let you know though.
speak;Eirika;Understood.|Now, what should we name the hound?...
speak;Eirika;I agree!|Now let's hope things don't get messy!
speak;Eirika;I don't think it's a good idea...|But I'm glad the hound is alive...
speak;Neimi;Awww...|Alright...|I understand...|I'm sorry, but you've got to go little doggy...
speak;Eirika;It's gone now...|Hopefully it will be ok...
speak;Seth;Those wounds look terrible...|Princess, is this person still alive?
speak;Eirika;I'm not sure, let's get treatment started.
speak;Seth;It sounds in pain...|I'll see if I can treat the hound.
speak;Eirika;Are you sure about that, Seth?
speak;Seth;I can, if you desire, Princess?
speak;Seth;Ok, that should be good for now.
speak;Seth;No problem.|Princess...|Are you thinking of keeping this hound?
speak;Eirika;I think we should keep the hound.
speak;Seth;Understood, though could it be a person under a spell?
speak;Eirika;A spell?|That is a good question...
speak;Seth;I'm not sure, though...|They don't seem to transform back...|If I learn anything new, I'll let you know though.
speak;Eirika;Understood.|Now, what should we name the hound?...
speak;Eirika;I agree!|Now let's hope things don't get messy!
speak;Eirika;I don't think it's a good idea...|But I'm glad the hound is alive...
speak;Seth;Understood, don't want to risk any danger.
speak;Eirika;It's gone now...|Hopefully it will be ok...

name: SkeletonJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;Ah!|There are some monsters still left!|I must defeat you!
speak;BoneBoy;We don't have names, but we are not your enemies either.|We have been wandering a long time, searching for answers.
speak;BoneBoy;Yes...|My friend and I here woke up one day with no memories...|So we have been searching for any hints on what we are...
speak;Eirika;I see...|Does your friend there speak?
speak;Lute;I was right!|I knew I sensed some monsters!
speak;Eirika;Oh, Lute, right?|What are you doing here?

speak;Lute;I know we just met a little bit ago, but I just had to come.|My magic was telling me there was some monsters still nearby so I came here!|You don't look you were fighting, so I think something else is going on here?
speak;BoneBoy;Yes, this lady and I were having a conversation.
speak;Lute;This skeleton just spoke!|Interesting!|My books have never mentioned them being able to communicate!
speak;BoneBoy;I've had no trouble with communication.|Though, my appearance makes talking with people difficult...
speak;Lute;I see, I see!|I must study you and your friend there!|Imagine all the things we can learn from them!
speak;Eirika;I don't know...|This might not be a good idea...|They could be spies or something?
speak;Lute;Leave them to my care!|I promise nothing bad will happen while I'm in charge.|<red>I can even revive them with my magic if they were to fall in battle.</>
speak;Eirika;Hmmm....|Are you two ok with that?
speak;BoneBoy;She may be able to help get our memories back.|Not like we have many other options.
speak;Eirika;Alright...|I'll leave them in your care Lute.
speak;Lute;Perfect!|This is exciting!|I can't to start research.
speak;BoneBoy;We'll follow your orders Master Lute.|I hope you can help us find out what we are.
speak;Eirika;Oh!|Last thing, what should we call you two?
speak;Lute;Ok, now let's hurry up and go!
speak;Eirika;That skeleton's armor...|It looked like really old Renais knights armor...|Is he from Renais?...
speak;Eirika;It just might be too risky...|I'm sorry, but we do wish you the best...
speak;BoneBoy;...That is regrettable, but I understand...|We will take our leave them.
speak;Lute;Ah...|There goes a great chance...|I hope we don't regret that...

name: EyeballJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;Ok Lute, this is the spot where you were sensing some magic?
speak;Lute;Yes, it should be in that direction.
speak;Eirika;What is that in the middle of the cage?
speak;Lute;Yes, I believe so.|And it's talking!|Amazing!
speak;EyeBoy;Ahhh, yes, Mogall.|That is what you humans call my race.
speak;Lute;You must be pretty smart to be able to speak our language.
speak;EyeBoy;Knowledge is all I seek.|I would be out seeking more, if it wasn't for those blasted ruffians.
speak;EyeBoy;Yes, you see that Arena over there?|The ruffians that captured me are trying to sell me there.|I will most likely meet my end if I end up there...|Unless...
speak;EyeBoy;I can tell you two ladies are of high honor.|If you free me, I promise to help with my services.|I'm very knowledgeable in magic.
speak;Lute;That does sound like a good deal to me.
speak;Bandit1;Alright boys!|Let's get the eyeball and make some money!
speak;EyeBoy;Thank you for freeing me!|Now let's get out of here!
speak;Lute;I look forward to hearing what knowledge you have!|I even have a great name for you!
text_entry;EyeBoyName;What did Lute name the Mogall?;force_entry
speak;Eirika;There is no time...|I'm sorry, but I don't know if I can trust you just yet...
speak;Lute;Quick!|They are almost here!|Maybe we can come back later?
speak;EyeBoy;I fear it will be too late for me...|Go...|I will face my fate...

name: BabyBaelJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;You felt another magic source here, Lute?
speak;Lute;Correct.|I think we found something good too.
speak;Lute;This is great!|I've always wanted a pet Bael!
speak;Lute;Yes, it's said their webs make for great book binding!
speak;Eirika;It's a Gargoyle!|There was still one alive!
speak;Lute;I think that Gargoyle is protecting that baby Bael.
speak;Eirika;No, we are not your enemies.
speak;Lute;Here, let me take care of this.
speak;Lute;That was a spell for me to talk to monsters.|I learned it just a few days ago.|It's already proving to be useful.
speak;Lute;Excellent!|She says she will join us!
speak;Lute;She seems like a shy girl.|But she seems nice.|She was just protecting the last baby of her best friend.|If we protect the baby, they will help us.
speak;Eirika;I see...|So these monsters can have friends...
speak;Lute;Well, "friends" isn't quite the right word.|They will kill each other pretty quickly if necessary.
speak;Eirika;Should we really let these two join us?
speak;Eirika;Well, if you can talk with them, I'll let you deal with them.
speak;Lute;Excellent.|I've got two great names for these two already in mind.
speak;Lute;Now that is settled, let's go.
speak;Eirika;This army keeps growing more and more...
speak;Eirika;I think it might be best to let these two rest in peace...
speak;Lute;You think so?...|Alright...|If you say so...
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Lute.|I would feel bad bringing a baby into battle.
speak;Lute;Well, Baels age fast, so I wouldn't feel too bad.

name: CyclopsBoyJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;It's so dark down here...|What could be down here?|Lute, this better not be something dangerous again...
speak;Lute;Wait!|Look, the Cyclops is tied up!
speak;Eirika;Oh...|It is...|Is the cyclops a prisoner?
speak;Eirika;Oh no...|Are we able to heal a Cyclops?
speak;Lute;I should be able to.|But I think there is something else of concern.
speak;Eirika;Oh!|There is an egg there!|Was the Cyclops protecting that egg?
speak;Lute;It's a Gorgon.|They are very rare.|I've never seen one hatch before either.
speak;Eirika;It looks like an adult woman.
speak;Eirika;Let me guess, you want to add these two to our army, Lute?
speak;Lute;Perfect.|Alright, now for the best part.|The names.
speak;Eirika;Heal the Cyclops, then set them free...

name: Talk_Anna
_source: speak;Anna;Welcome to the Dragon's Gate!|Here you can experience Paralogues, new events, and more!|Unfortunately the creator is busy and doesn't have any new content yet...

speak;Anna;If you like, I have something that may interest you?|This is an Einherjar card!|It's a custom one to boot!|If you want, we can add a new unit to your army of your own choosing!|Shall we make you one?
speak;Anna;And there we go!|Let's go summon our new friend!

speak;Anna;Perfect!|I hope you enjoy your new soldier!|This soldier is special!|Every 5th and 15th level, this unit can choose a random class skill to learn!|These choices are randomized!|I hope you get lucky!
speak;Anna;Oh!|I almost forgot!|You'd better give your new soldier a name!
speak;Anna;{v:MyUnitName}!|An interesting choice!|Well, that's all I've got for now!|Please look forward to any new releases!
speak;Anna;Well, that's all I have for you for now then.|Please come back another day once the creator makes more content!
speak;Anna;Well, that's all I have for you for now then.|Please come back another day once the creator makes more content!

speak;MyUnit;My name is {v:MyUnitName}.|Thank you for bringing me to life!|I will serve you with all my might!
speak;Eirika;Oh wow, this is some very strange magic!|Well, thank you for your service!

name: Outro
_source: alert;You have purged these ruins of evil!
speak;Eirika;Brother, I think that was the last of them.
speak;Ephraim;I think so too.|The air is starting to feel lighter.
speak;???;Oh Sacred Twins...|You have purged the evil from these ruins...|You have our eternal gratitude...;top
speak;Eirika;Why were there so many monsters here in the first place?

speak;???;The treasure that was located here...|Held a mysterious power that gave youth to those who drank it...|It never ran dry for many years, and would give its drinker unlimited potential...|There were those who desired it and used great evil magic to destroy our civilization...|We were able to seal the last of the water from that great evil, but it also sealed the forces that you have purged.|Thank you for doing what we could not...|You have proven yourself worthy of our final treasure...|There is just enough water to last for one year....;top
speak;Ephraim;We only did what would be good for the people of Magvel.|We will protect this land from any that would threaten to wreak havoc on it.
speak;Eirika;The forces that destroyed your civilization is gone forever...|Right?
speak;???;.....|That we are unsure of...|Our power wanes...|If it's still out there somewhere...|Please...|Destroy it...;top
music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;It will be ok Eirika.|As long as we are together, we can handle any threat that may come our way.
speak;Eirika;...You're right, brother.|Let's get out of here.|The others must be waiting for us.
